tika-s0201t:483_12: Paṭhamañhi bhagavā anupubbikathādinā paṭipattiyā saṃkilesaṃ nīharitvā pacchā sāmukkaṃsikaṃ desanaṃ deseti
tika-s0201t:483_14: tasmā kammaṭṭhānameva avatvā imāya anupubbiyā desanā pavattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:484_1: taṃ pana atthato dassanādi evāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:484_4: Evaṃbhūtā ca yasmā pavattidvārapidhānena pihitā nāma honti,
tika-s0201t:484_6: Evaṃ accantikassa saṃvarassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ anaccantikaṃ saṃvaraṃ dassetvā idāni accantikameva saṃvaraṃ
tika-s0201t:484_7: dassento yasmiṃ dassanādimhi sati uppajjanārahā āsavā na uppajjanti,
tika-s0201t:484_8: so tesaṃ anuppādo nirodho khayo pahānanti ca vuccamāno atthato appavattimattanti tassa ca dassanādi kāraṇanti
tika-s0201t:484_9: āha “yena kāraṇena anuppādanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ khayaṃ gacchanti pahīyanti nappavattanti,
tika-s0201t:485_1: manatopīti cakkhuviññāṇādivīthīsu tadanugatamanoviññāṇavīthīsu ca kiñcāpi kusalādīnampi pavatti atthi,
tika-s0201t:485_2: kāmāsavādayo eva pana vaṇato yūsaṃ viya paggharaṇakaasucibhāvena sandanti,
tika-s0201t:485_4: Tattha hi paggharaṇaasucimhi niruḷho āsava- saddoti.
tika-s0201t:485_5: Dhammato yāva gotrabhunti tato paraṃ maggaphalesu appavattanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:485_6: Ete hi ārammaṇavasena dhamme gacchantā tato paraṃ na gacchanti.
tika-s0201t:485_7: Nanu tato paraṃ bhavaṅgādīnipi gacchantīti ce? Na,
tika-s0201t:485_8: tesampi pubbe ālambitesu lokiyadhammesu sāsavabhāvena antogadhattā tato paratābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:485_11: tato paraṃ pana maggaphalasamānatāya aññesu maggesu maggavīthiyaṃ samāpattivīthiyaṃ nirodhānantarañca
tika-s0201t:485_12: pavattamānesu phalesu nibbāne ca āsavānaṃ pavatti nivāritāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:485_17: Tattha mariyādaṃ kiriyaṃ bahi katvā pavattati yathā “āpāṭaliputtā vuṭṭho devo”ti.
tika-s0201t:485_18: Abhividhi pana kiriyaṃ byāpetvā pavattati yathā “ābhavaggā bhagavato yaso pavattatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:486_6: koṭi na paññāyati bhavataṇhāyā”ti idaṃ suttaṃ saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:486_7: Avijjāsavabhavāsavānaṃ ciraparivutthatāya dassitāya tabbhāvabhāvino kāmāsavassa ciraparivutthatā dassitāva hoti.
tika-s0201t:486_8: Aññesu ca yathāvutte dhamme okāsañca ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānesu mānādīsu vijjamānesu attattaniyādiggāhavasena
tika-s0201t:486_12: Na cettha diṭṭhāsavo nāgatoti gahetabbaṃ bhavataṇhāya viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi bhavāsavaggahaṇeneva gahitattā.
tika-s0201t:486_15: Na hi taṃ kiñci saṃsāradukkhaṃ atthi,
tika-s0201t:486_17: Purimāni cetthāti ettha etesu catūsu atthavitappesu purimāni tīṇi.
tika-s0201t:486_19: Tattha yujjanti kilesesuyeva yathāvuttassa atthattayassa sambhavato.
tika-s0201t:487_2: Vivādamūlabhūtāti vivādassa mūlakāraṇabhūtā kodhūpanāha- makkha- paḷāsa- issā-
tika-s0201t:488_0: Yena devūpapatyassāti yena kammakilesappakārena āsavena devesu upapatti nibbatti assa mayhanti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:488_1: Gandhabbo vā vihaṅgamo ākāsacārī assanti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:488_2: Ettha ca yakkhagandhabbatāya vinimuttā sabbā devagati devaggahaṇena gahitā.
tika-s0201t:488_3: Avasesā ca akusalā dhammāti akusalakammato avasesā akusalā dhammā āsavāti āgatāti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:489_2: upaddavāti idaṃ yadi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na paññapeyya,
tika-s0201t:489_3: tato asaddhammappaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā,
tika-s0201t:489_4: ye ca tannimittā eva nirayādīsu nibbattassa pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena mahādukkhānubhavādippakārā anatthā,
tika-s0201t:489_9: Yathāti yena duvidhādippakārena aññesu ca suttantesu āgatāti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:490_2: Tattha hi āsavā chadhā āgatā āsava-
tika-s0201t:490_6: saddoti āsavapadeti āsavappakāre saddakoṭṭhāse atthakoṭṭhāse vāti attho.
tika-s0201t:491_0: Tathā hīti tasmā saṃvaraṇaṃ pidahanaṃ pavattituṃ appadānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:491_2: Sīlādisaṃvare adhippete pavattituṃ appadānavasena thakanabhāvasāmaññato dvāraṃ saṃvaritvāti gehadvārasaṃvaraṇampi udāhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0201t:491_3: Sīlasaṃvarotiādi heṭṭhā mūlapariyāyavaṇṇanāya vuttampi imassa suttassa atthavaṇṇanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vattukāmo puna vadati.
tika-s0201t:491_4: Yuttaṃ tāva sīlasatiñāṇānaṃ saṃvarattho pāḷiyaṃ tathā āgatattā,
tika-s0201t:491_8: sītassa uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādiniddese khantivīriyānaṃ saṃvarapariyāyo nāgato,
tika-s0201t:491_9: uddese pana sabbāsavasaṃvarapariyāyanti saṃvarapariyāyena gahitattā attheva tesaṃ saṃvarabhāvoti.
tika-s0201t:492_0: Pubbe sīlasatiñāṇānaṃ pāṭhantarena saṃvarabhāvo dassitoti idāni taṃ imināpi suttena gahitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:492_1: Khantivīriyasaṃvarā vuttāyeva “khamo hoti sītassā”tiādinā pāḷiyā dassanavasena.
tika-s0201t:492_3: tañca agocara”nti ayaṃ panettha sīlasaṃvaroti tañca “yathārūpe”tiādinā vuttaṃ ayuttaṃ aniyatavatthukaṃ raho paṭicchannāsanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:492_6: ayaṃ pana ettha etasmiṃ sutte āgato sīlasaṃvaroti attho.
tika-s0201t:492_9: Tathā hi bhagavatā “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī”ti sīlasaṃvaravibhajane ācāragocarasampattiṃ dassentena “atthi anācāro,
tika-s0201t:492_11: Idañca ekadesena samudāyanidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ samuddapabbatanidassanaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:493_4: Yonisomanasikaraṇampi atthato paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaramevāti evaṃ pana atthe gayhamāne yuttametaṃ siyā.
tika-s0201t:493_5: Keci pana “yattha yattha ‘idha paṭisaṅkhā yoniso’ti āgataṃ,
tika-s0201t:493_6: taṃ sabbaṃ sandhāya ‘sabbattha paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaro’ti vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:493_7: Tesaṃ matena “idaṃ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādikassa ñāṇasaṃvarena ca asaṅgaho siyā,
tika-s0201t:493_8: “dassanaṃ paṭisevanā bhāvanā ca ñāṇasaṃvaro”ti ca vacanaṃ virujjheyya,
tika-s0201t:493_10: “Sabbattha paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaro”ti iminā sattasupi ṭhānesu yaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:493_11: so ñāṇasaṃvaroti parivajjanādivasena vuttā sīlādayo sīlasaṃvarādayoti ayamattho dassito.
tika-s0201t:493_12: Evaṃ sati saṃvarānaṃ saṅkaro viya hotīti te asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “aggahitaggahaṇenā”ti vuttaṃ parivajjanavisesasaṃvarādhivāsanavinodanānaṃ
tika-s0201t:493_15: Te pana aggahite sarūpato dassento “dassanaṃ paṭisevanā bhāvanā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:494_4: upanissayakoṭiyā vā paccayabhūtena anuppannā kusalā dhammā uppattiṃ gacchanti uppajjanti,
tika-s0201t:494_5: tathā aniruddhā akusalā dhammā nirodhaṃ gacchanti nirujjhantīti attho.
tika-s0201t:494_6: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “anuppannā ceva āsavā na uppajjanti,
tika-s0201t:494_7: uppannā ca āsavā pahīyantī”ti akusaladhammānaṃ anuppādapahānāni eva vuttāni,
tika-s0201t:494_12: manasikaroto”tiādinā kusaladhammānampi uppatti pakāsitāva āsavasaṃvaraṇassa padhānabhāvena gahitattā.
tika-s0201t:494_13: Tathā hi pariyosānepi “ye āsavā dassanā pahātabbā,
tika-s0201t:494_14: te dassanā pahīnā hontī”tiādinā āsavappahānameva padhānaṃ katvā nigamitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:495_1: Jānato passatoti ettha dassanampi paññācakkhunāva dassanaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0201t:495_2: na maṃsacakkhunā dibbacakkhunā vāti āha “dvepi padāni ekatthānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:495_10: “Jānato passato”ti ca jānanadassanamukhena puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā pavattāti āha “ñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇappabhāvaṃ upādāya puggalaṃ niddisatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:495_11: Jānato passatoti “yoniso ca manasikāraṃ ayoniso ca manasikāra”nti vakkhamānattā yonisomanasikāravisayajānanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:495_13: Tañca kho pana nesaṃ āsavānaṃ khayūpāyasabhāvassa adhippetattā uppādanānuppādanavasena na ārammaṇamattenāti
tika-s0201t:496_1: atha kho rūpādi viya cakkhuviññāṇena yonisomanasikārāyonisomanasikāre paccakkhe katvā tesaṃ uppādavasena
tika-s0201t:496_2: dassananti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “passato”ti vuttanti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:496_6: ajānataṃ apassata”nti ca ādīsu ñāṇakiccassa sāmaññavisesadīpanavasenetaṃ padadvayaṃ āgatanti.
tika-s0201t:496_8: Te hi “samādhinā jānato vipassanāya passato jānaṃ jānāti passaṃ passati,
tika-s0201t:497_1: So pana nesaṃ anuppādo sabbena sabbaṃ khīṇatā abhāvo evāti āha “āsavānaṃ accantakhayamasamuppādaṃ khīṇākāraṃ natthibhāva”nti.
tika-s0201t:497_2: Ujumaggānusārinoti kilesavaṅkassa kāyavaṅkādīnañca pahānena ujubhūte savipassane heṭṭhimamagge anussarantassa.
tika-s0201t:497_5: Tato aññā anantarāti khayasaṅkhāte aggamagge tappariyāpannameva ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:497_8: samucchedavasena pana āsavehi khīṇotīti maggo khayoti vuccatīti āha “maggo āsavakkhayoti vutto”ti.
tika-s0201t:497_10: So pana khīṇāsavo hotīti “āsavānaṃ khayā”ti imassa phalapariyāyatā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:498_0: “Jānato passato”ti jānato eva passato evāti evamettha niyamo icchito,
tika-s0201t:498_1: na aññathā visesābhāvato aniṭṭhasādhanato cāti tassa niyamassa phalaṃ dassetuṃ “no ajānato no apassato”ti vuttanti āha “yo pana na jānāti na passati,
tika-s0201t:498_7: “Bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti,
tika-s0201t:498_9: Tesu hi keci abhijātisaṅkantimattena bhavasaṅkantimattena ca saṃsārasuddhiṃ paṭijānanti,
tika-s0201t:499_5: Anupāyo eva hi āsavānaṃ khayassa yadidaṃ yoniso ca ayoniso ca manasikārassa ajānanaṃ adassanañca,
tika-s0201t:499_7: Nanu “passato”ti iminā ayonisomanasikāro yathā na uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:499_8: evaṃ dassane adhippete purimeneva anupāyapaṭisedho vutto hotīti? Na hoti,
tika-s0201t:499_9: ayonisomanasikārānuppādanassapi upāyabhāvato satibalena saṃvutacakkhundriyāditā viya sampajaññabaleneva niccādivasena abhūtajānanābhāvo hotīti.
tika-s0201t:499_12: anvayato byatirekato ca vitthāraṃ akatvāti attho. Ñāṇaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:499_15: Ñāṇassa padhānabhāvadassanatthaṃ evamayaṃ desanā katāti nāyaṃ doso,
tika-s0201t:499_16: tathā aññatthāpi “ariyaṃ vo bhikkhave sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi saupanisaṃ saparikkhāra”nti vitthāro.
tika-s0201t:500_1: So hi drabyoti vuccati “drabyaṃ vinassati nādrabya”ntiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:500_4: Yathāha “na kho dabba dabbā evaṃ nibbeṭhentī”ti.
tika-s0201t:500_7: Yo hi parisuddhājīvo kātuṃ ajānantānaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ,
tika-s0201t:500_10: Padaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti na vattabbā nāthakaraṇadhammabhāvena upanissayabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:501_2: Aniccādīsu aniccantiādināti aniccadukkhaasubhaanattasabhāvesu dhammesu “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ asubhaṃ anattā”tiādinā eva nayena,
tika-s0201t:501_5: Cittassa āvaṭṭanātiādinā āvaṭṭanāya paccayabhūtā tato purimuppannā manodvārikā kusalajavanappavatti phalavohārena tathā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:501_6: Tassā hi vasena sā kusaluppattiyā upanissayo hoti.
tika-s0201t:501_11: Tadevārammaṇaṃ attānaṃ anubandhitvā uppajjamānaṃ manasi karoti ṭhapetīti manasikāro.
tika-s0201t:501_12: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ upāyapathamanasikāralakkhaṇo yonisomanasikāro nāma vuccati,
tika-s0201t:501_13: yassa vasena puggalo dukkhādīni saccāni āvajjituṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0201t:502_6: Kasmā panettha ayamuddesaniddeso parivattoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yoniso”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:502_7: Tattha manasikārapadaṃ dvinnaṃ sādhāraṇanti adhippāyena “yoniso ayonisoti imehi tāva dvīhi padehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:502_9: ayonisoti ca ayonisomanasikāro tattha anuvattanato vakkhamānattā ca.
tika-s0201t:502_10: Satipi anatthuppattisāmaññe bhavādīsu puggalassa bahulisāmaññaṃ dassetvā taṃ parivattitvā visesadassanattaṃ nāvādi upamāttayaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:503_5: aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā nāma āsavā na santī”ti.
tika-s0201t:503_8: Idāni āsavavasenapi anuppannapariyāyo labbhatīti dassetuṃ “anubhūtapubbepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:503_17: sā ca abhiṇhuppattiyā bahulīkāratoti te laddhāsevanā bahulabhāvaṃ pattā maddantā pharantā chādentā andhākāraṃ
tika-s0201t:503_18: karontā aparāparaṃ uppajjamānā ekasantānanayena “uppannā pavaḍḍhantī”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:503_19: Tena vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ uppajjamānā uppannā pavaḍḍhantīti vuccantī”ti.
tika-s0201t:503_20: Ito aññathāti ito aparāparuppannānaṃ ekattaggahaṇato aññathā vaḍḍhi nāma natthi khaṇikabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:504_2: Yassa panātiādinā anuddesikaṃ katvā vuttamatthaṃ purātanassa purisātisayassa paṭipattidassanena pākaṭataraṃ
tika-s0201t:504_7: Ācariyaṃ āpucchitvāti attano uddesācariyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇatthaṃ gantuṃ āpucchitvā.
tika-s0201t:504_10: Tadā kira mukhapāṭheneva bahū ekajjhaṃ uddisāpetvā manosajjhāyavasena dhammaṃ sajjhāyanti.
tika-s0201t:504_11: Tatthāyaṃ thero paññavantatāya uddesaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhorayho,
tika-s0201t:504_13: kiṃ mayhaṃ uddesenā”ti saṅkocaṃ anāpajjitvā dutiyadivase uddesakāle ācariyaṃ upasaṅkami.
tika-s0201t:504_16: Na hi paccuppannesu āsavesu maggena pahānaṃ sambhavatīti āha “ye pana…pe…
tika-s0201t:504_19: Tesaṃ paṭipattiyā pahānaṃ natthi uppajjanārahānaṃ paccayaghātena anuppādanameva tāya pahānanti.
tika-s0201t:505_5: Dassanāti idaṃ hetumhi nissakkavacananti dassanenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanena tadatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0201t:505_10: disvā pana kattabbakiccassa kilesappahānassa akaraṇato na taṃ dassananti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:505_14: tasmā dhammacakkhu punappunaṃ nibbattanena bhāvanaṃ appattaṃ dassanaṃ nāma,
tika-s0201t:505_15: dhammacakkhuñca pariññādikiccakaraṇavasena catusaccadhammadassanaṃ tadabhisamayoti nutthettha gotrabhussa dassanabhāvappatti.
tika-s0201t:505_30: Paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhe catusaccadhamme bhāvanāvasena uppajjanato bhāvanā,
tika-s0201t:505_32: Na hi taṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ kiñci passati,
tika-s0201t:507_1: Kusalākusaladhammehi ālambiyamānāpi ārammaṇadhammā āvajjanamukheneva tabbhāvaṃ gacchantīti dassento “manasikaraṇīye”ti
tika-s0201t:507_6: Yasmā kusaladhammesupi subhasukhaniccādivasena manasikāro assādanādihetutāya sāvajjo ahitadukkhāvaho
tika-s0201t:507_7: akusaladhammesupi aniccādivasena manasikāro nibbidādihetutāya anavajjo hitasukhāvaho,
tika-s0201t:507_8: tasmā “dhammato niyamo natthī”ti vatvā “ākārato pana atthī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:508_2: devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”tiādīsu vikappattho diṭṭho,
tika-s0201t:508_3: na samuccayatthoti tattha samuccayatthe payogaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:508_4: Evañca katvā samuccayatthadīpakaṃ panetaṃ suttapadaṃ samudāhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0201t:509_2: Bhavāsavaṃ pana ṭhapetvā sabbo lobho kāmāsavoti yuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0201t:509_5: “Sundaramidaṃ ṭhānaṃ niccaṃ dhuva”ntiādinā assādentassa uppajjamāno sassatucchedadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo bhave āsavoti bhavāsavo.
tika-s0201t:509_6: Evanti sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhisaṅgahato bhavāsaveneva diṭṭhāsavo gahito taṃsahagatarāgatāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:509_7: Apare pana “diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavena ca saṅgahito”ti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:509_8: Ettha ca “bhavāsavo catūsu diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppādesu uppajjatī”ti vacanato diṭṭhisampayuttarāgassa bhavāsavabhāvo vicāretabbo,
tika-s0201t:509_10: evaṃ sati bhavāsave diṭṭhāsavassa samodhānagamanaṃ kataṃ na siyā.
tika-s0201t:509_11: Na hi tampayogatabbhāvādike asati taṃsaṅgaho yutto,
tika-s0201t:509_12: tasmā yathāvuttapāḷiṃ anusārena diṭṭhigatasampayuttalobhopi kāmāsavoti yuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0201t:510_0: Abhidhamme ca kāmāsavaniddese “kāmesūti kāmarāgadiṭṭhirāgādīnaṃ ārammaṇabhūtesu tebhūmakesu vatthukāmesū”ti attho sambhavati.
tika-s0201t:510_1: Tattha hi uppajjamānā sā taṇhā sabbāpi na kāmacchandādināmaṃ na labhatīti.
tika-s0201t:510_4: tadā tena sampayutto avijjāsavo āsavavippayuttoti domanassavicikicchuddhaccasampayuttassa viya tassapi
tika-s0201t:510_5: āsavavippayuttatā vattabbā siyā “catūsu diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppādesu uppanno moho siyā
tika-s0201t:510_9: “kāmāsavaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo”ti ca vacanato diṭṭhisahagatarāgo kāmāsavo na hotīti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0201t:510_11: na abhijjhāya ca noāsavabhāvoti noāsavalobhassa sabbhāvo vicāretabbo.
tika-s0201t:510_12: Na hi atthi abhidhamme “āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā āsavassa dhammassa āsavassa ca noāsavassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayo”ti sattamo navamo ca pañho.
tika-s0201t:510_15: Diṭṭhisampayutte pana lobhe noāsave vijjamāne sattamanavamāpi pañhā vissajjanaṃ labheyyuṃ,
tika-s0201t:510_18: Diṭṭhivippayutte ca lobhe noāsave vijjamāne vattabbaṃ vuttameva.
tika-s0201t:510_21: tasmā balavakāmarāgasseva kāmāsavaṃ dassetuṃ “kāmāsavoti pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:511_0: Sāmaññena bhavāsavo diṭṭhāsavaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā idha tayo eva āsavā vuttāti tassa tadantogadhataṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ diṭṭhāsavo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:511_2: Catūsu saccesu aññāṇanti idaṃ suttantanayaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:511_9: Vuttanayapaccanīkatoti “kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā”tiādinā kāmaguṇesu ādīnavadassanapubbakanekkhammapaṭipattiyā
tika-s0201t:511_10: chandarāgaṃ vikkhambhayato samucchindantassa ca anuppanno ca kāmāsavo na uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:511_13: nissaraṇapaṭipattiyā anuppannā ca bhavāsavaavijjāsavā na uppajjanti,
tika-s0201t:511_14: uppannā ca pahīyantīti evaṃ taṇhāpakkhe vuttassa nayassa paṭipakkhato sukkapakkhe vitthāro veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:512_0: Tayo evāti abhidhamme viya “cattāro”ti avatvā kasmā tayo eva āsavā idha imissaṃ dassanāpahātabbakathāyaṃ vuttā?
tika-s0201t:512_2: Bhavesu niccaggāhānusārato yebhuyyato bhavarāgasampattito bhavāsavassa animittavimokkhapaṭipakkhatā,
tika-s0201t:513_2: Nirayādigamanīyā pana kāmāsavādayo “dassanā pahātabbe āsave”ti ettheva samāruḷhā.
tika-s0201t:513_3: Atha vā yadaggena so puggalodassanāpahātabbānaṃ āsavānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:513_5: Na hi samaññābhedena vatthubhedo atthīti dassetuṃ “ettāvatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:513_7: Kasmā panettha dassanāpahātabbesu āsavesu dassetabbesu “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinā vicikicchā dassitāti āha “vicikicchāsīsena cetthā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:514_0: Vijjamānataṃ avijjamānatañcāti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”nti atīte attano vijjamānataṃ,
tika-s0201t:514_2: tato pubbe na nu kho ahosi”nti atīte attano avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Kasmā?
tika-s0201t:514_4: Tassā pana atītavatthutāya gahitattā sassatādhiccasamuppattiākāranissayatā dassitā.
tika-s0201t:514_5: Evaṃ āsappanaparisappanāpavattikaṃ katthacipi appaṭivattihetubhūtaṃ vicikicchaṃ kasmā uppādetīti na codetabbametanti
tika-s0201t:514_8: Yadi evaṃ tassa ayonisomanasikāreneva bhavitabbanti āpannanti āha “nanu ca puthujjanopi yoniso manasi karotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:516_5: Te hi “kathaṃ nu khoti issarena vā brahmunā vā pubbakatena vā ahetuto vā nibbattoti cintetī”ti āhu.
tika-s0201t:518_0: Vijjamānataṃ avijjamānatañcāti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhāna”nti anāgate attano vijjamānataṃ,
tika-s0201t:518_2: tato paraṃ na nu kho bhavissāmī”ti anāgate attano avijjamānatañca kaṅkhatīti heṭṭhā vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:519_0: Paccuppannamaddhānanti addhāpaccuppannassa idhādhippetattā “paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:519_3: sā assa atthīti kathaṃkathīti āha “vicikiccho hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:519_5: ummattako viya hi bālaputhujjanoti paṭikacceva vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:519_7: Muṇḍesunti muṇḍena anicchantaṃ jāgaraṇakāle na sakkāti suttaṃ muṇḍesuṃ kuladhammatāya yathā taṃ ekacce kulatāpasā,
tika-s0201t:521_0: Attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati kaṇṇo viya sūtaputtasaññī.
tika-s0201t:521_1: Jātiyā vibhāviyamānāya “aha”nti tassa attano parāmasanaṃ sandhāyāha “evañhi siyā kaṅkhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:521_2: Manussāpi ca rājāno viyāti manussāpi keci ekacce rājāno viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:523_1: paramatthato pana sā attabhāvavisayāvāti āha “attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhāna”nti,
tika-s0201t:524_1: Yathā ayaṃ vicikicchā uppajjatīti ayaṃ vuttappabhedā vicikicchā yathā uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:524_4: Yathā hi vicikicchā attābhinivesaṃ nissāya pavattati,
tika-s0201t:524_6: evaṃ attābhinivesopi taṃ nissāya pavattati “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinā antogadhāhaṃkārassa kathaṃkathibhāvassa attaggāhasannissayabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:524_13: na atīte tatthapi sati atthitāya ucchedaggāhassa sabbhāvato.
tika-s0201t:525_6: sañjānitabbaṃ nīlādiārammaṇaṃ viya attānampi sañjānātīti evaṃdiṭṭhitopi diṭṭhigatito hotīti vuttaṃ “attanāva attānaṃ sañjānāmī”ti.
tika-s0201t:525_7: Svāyamattho saññaṃ tadaññataradhamme ca “attā anattā”ti ca gahaṇavasena hotīti vuttaṃ “saññākkhandhasīsenā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:525_8: Ettha ca khandhavinimutto attāti gaṇhato sassatadiṭṭhi,
tika-s0201t:525_9: khandhaṃ pana “attā”ti gaṇhato ucchedadiṭṭhīti āha “sabbāpi sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyovā”ti.
tika-s0201t:526_1: Vadatīti iminā kārakavedakasattānaṃ hitasukhāvabodhanasamatthataṃ attano dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:526_5: Īdisānañhi padānaṃ bahulā kattusādhanataṃ saddasatthavidū maññanti.
tika-s0201t:526_7: sati ca udayabbayatte neva niccatāti “nicco”ti vadantassa adhippāyaṃ vivaranto āha “uppādavayarahito”ti.
tika-s0201t:527_13: Añño pana araññapadeso duratikkamanaṭṭhena kantāro viyāti,
tika-s0201t:527_18: Andubandhanādi viya nissarituṃ appadānavasena aseribhāvakaraṇaṃ bandhanaṭṭho,
tika-s0201t:527_19: kilesakammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ paccayabhāvena dūragatampi ākaḍḍhitvā saṃyojanaṃ saṃyojanaṭṭho,
tika-s0201t:527_25: Jātiādike dukkhadhamme sarūpato dassetvāpi “na parimuccati dukkhasmā”ti vadantena bhagavatā diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ
tika-s0201t:527_26: nāma sabbānatthakaraṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ sabbassapi dukkhassa mūlabhūtanti ayamattho vibhāvitoti dassetuṃ “kiṃ
tika-s0201t:528_2: evañhi dassanena pahātabbā āsavā anavasesato dassitā hontīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:528_3: Sīlabbataparāmāso kāmāsavādiggahaṇeneva gahito hoti kāmāsavādihetukattā tassa.
tika-s0201t:528_4: Appahīnakāmarāgādiko hi kāmasukhatthaṃ vā bhavasuddhatthaṃ vā evaṃ bhavavisuddhi hotīti sīlabbatāni parāmasanti,
tika-s0201t:528_5: “imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”ti,
tika-s0201t:528_6: “tattha nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tatheva ṭhassāmī”ti,
tika-s0201t:528_7: “sīlena suddhi vatena suddhi sīlabbatena suddhī”ti ca suttevuttaṃ sīlabbataṃ parāmasanti.
tika-s0201t:528_9: Tassa gahitattāti sīlabbataparāmāsassa diṭṭhiggahaṇena gahitattā yathā “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:529_1: Tāvāti “sutavā”ti ito paṭṭhāya yāva “so idaṃ dukkha”nti padaṃ,
tika-s0201t:529_2: tāva imaṃ padaṃ avadhiṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0201t:529_7: amanasikaraṇīyapadānaṃ yathākkamaṃ mūlapariyāye idha gahetvā vuttanayena attho veditabboti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:529_10: sappurisānaṃ dassāvī”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ sabbākārena vuttaviparītato attho veditabbo,
tika-s0201t:529_12: Arahā hi nippariyāyena ariyadhamme kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto ca nāma.
tika-s0201t:529_18: Tadanurūpena atthenāti tassa puggalassa anurūpena ariyaṭṭhena,
tika-s0201t:529_21: Yathā cassa “yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano”ti ārabhitvā “sopi vuccati sikkhatīti sekkho”ti pariyāyena sekkhasutte sekkhabhāvo vutto,
tika-s0201t:529_23: Vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanālakkhaṇehi ye ariyasappurisadhammavinayasaṅkhātā bodhipakkhiyadhammā tisso sikkhā eva vā sambhavanti,
tika-s0201t:529_26: Ariyassa sāvakoti vā ariyasāvakatthena eva vutto yathā “agamā rājagahaṃ buddho”ti.
tika-s0201t:529_27: Sikhāppattavipassanāggahaṇañcettha vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā anivattipaṭipadāyaṃ ṭhitassa gahaṇatthanti
tika-s0201t:530_1: Yathā dhātumukhena vipassanaṃ abhiniviṭṭho dhātukammaṭṭhāniko āyatanādimukhena abhiniviṭṭho āyatanādikammaṭṭhāniko,
tika-s0201t:530_5: kamme vā yathāvuttanaṭṭhena ṭhānaṃ avaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvanārambhokammaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:530_6: tadeva catusaccamukhena pavattaṃ etassa atthīti catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko.
tika-s0201t:530_8: Uggahitacatusaccakammaṭṭhānoti ca catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ pāḷito atthato ca uggahetvā manasikārayoggaṃ katvā ṭhito.
tika-s0201t:530_9: Vipassanāmaggaṃ samāruḷhoti sappaccayanāmarūpadassane patiṭṭhāya tadeva nāmarūpaṃ aniccādito sammasanto.
tika-s0201t:530_13: Kathaṃ panettha “manasi karotī”ti iminā “vipassatī”ti ayamattho vutto hotīti āha “ettha…pe… vuttā”ti.
tika-s0201t:530_15: Vipassatīti ca yathā upari visesādhigamo hoti,
tika-s0201t:531_1: Tadārammaṇeti taṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatte.
tika-s0201t:531_2: Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvāti aviparītaṃ attano ārammaṇaṃ sabhāvacchedanādikiccañceva aññāṇādilakkhaṇañca asaṅkarato hadaye ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0201t:531_3: Iminā pubbe nāmarūpaparicchede katepi dhammānaṃ salakkhaṇavavatthāpanaṃ paccayapariggahena suvavatthāpitaṃ
tika-s0201t:531_4: nāma hotīti dasseti yathā “dvikkhattuṃ baddhaṃ subaddha”nti.
tika-s0201t:531_5: Evañhi ñātapariññāya kiccaṃ siddhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0201t:531_6: Paccayato paccayuppannato ca vavatthāpitattā pākaṭabhāvena siddhenapi siddhabhāvo pākaṭo hotīti vuttaṃ “ahutvā hontī”ti.
tika-s0201t:531_7: Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropetīti asato hi uppādena bhavitabbaṃ, na sato,
tika-s0201t:531_8: uppādavantato ca nesaṃ ekantena icchitabbā paccayāyattavuttibhāvato,
tika-s0201t:531_9: sati uppāde avassaṃbhāvī nirodhoti nattheva niccatāvakāsoti.
tika-s0201t:531_10: Sūpaṭṭhitāniccatāya ca udayabbayadhammehi abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanato dukkhamanaṭṭhena dukkhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:531_12: Katthacipi saṅkhāragate “mā jīri mā byādhiyī”ti alabbhanato natthi vasavattananti āha “avasavattanato anattāti anattalakkhaṇaṃ āropetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:532_6: na ito bhiyyo”ti paricchinditvā jānanameva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti pariññāpaṭivedho.
tika-s0201t:532_7: Ayaṃ yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0201t:532_11: Pahīnassa puna appahātabbatāya pakaṭṭhaṃ hānaṃ cajanaṃ samucchindanaṃ pahānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:532_13: Ayampi yena kilesena appahīyamānena maggabhāvanāya na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:532_15: tassa kilesassa padaghātaṃ karontassa anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentassa ñāṇassa tathāpavattiyā paṭighātābhāvena nissaṅgacāraṃ upādāya evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0201t:532_17: anussavākāraparivitakkādike muñcitvā sarūpato ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ idaṃ tanti yathāsabhāvato gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:532_19: Ayaṃ pana yassa āvaraṇassa asamucchindanato ñāṇaṃ nirodhaṃ ālambituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0201t:532_20: tassa samucchindanato taṃ sarūpato vibhāvitameva pavattatīti evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0201t:533_4: Paṭhamamaggopi hi yathārahaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyaṃ pavattaṃ parijānanādiṃ vaḍḍhento pavattoti tatthāpi vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0201t:533_6: sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti bhāvanā paṭivedho.
tika-s0201t:533_7: Ayampi hi yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā maggadhammānaṃ sarūpaparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0201t:533_9: tiṭṭhatu tāva yathādhigatamaggadhammaṃ yathāpavattesu phaladhammesupi ayaṃ yathādhigatasaccadhammesu viya vigatasammohova hoti.
tika-s0201t:533_11: Yato cassa dhammatāsañcoditā yathādhigatasaccadhammāvalambiniyo maggavīthito parato maggaphalapahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesanibbānānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā pavattanti.
tika-s0201t:533_14: Ekābhisamayena abhisametīti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhūtataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ “no ca kho aññamaññena ñāṇenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:534_0: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha “ariyamaggañāṇaṃ catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayavasena kiccakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:534_6: aññathā ekassa ñāṇassa ekasmiṃ khaṇe catukiccakaraṇaṃ na yujjati.
tika-s0201t:534_7: Na hidaṃ katthaci diṭṭhampi suttaṃ atthī”ti.
tika-s0201t:534_11: evaṃ sante paccekampi saccesu nānakkhaṇeneva pavatteyya,
tika-s0201t:534_13: tathā sati dukkhādīnaṃ ekadesekadesameva parijānāti pajahatīti āpajjatīti nānābhisamaye paṭhamamaggādīhi
tika-s0201t:534_15: tato eva ekadesasotāpannāditā ca āpajjati anantaraphalattā lokuttarakusalānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:534_17: Na hi kālabhedena vinā so eva sotāpanno ca asotāpanno cāti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0201t:535_0: Apicāyaṃ nānābhisamayavādī evaṃ pucchitabbo “maggañāṇaṃ saccāni paṭivijjhantaṃ kiṃ ārammaṇato paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0201t:535_3: “kiccato paṭivijjhantassa kiṃ nānābhisamayenā”ti vatvā paṭipāṭiyānidassanena saññāpetabbo.
tika-s0201t:535_5: evaṃ sante tassa ñāṇassa vipassanāñāṇassa viya dukkhasamudayānaṃ accantapariññāsamucchedā na yuttā anissaṭattā.
tika-s0201t:535_7: Na hi maggo sayameva attānaṃ ārabbha pavattatīti yuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:535_10: nirodhaṃ kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca paṭivijjhatīti evaṃ asammohato paṭivijjhantassa maggañāṇassa nattheva nānābhisamayo.
tika-s0201t:535_13: Na cetaṃ kālantaradassanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yo nu kho, āvuso,
tika-s0201t:535_19: aññathā purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādidassanamayojaniyaṃ siyā.
tika-s0201t:535_20: Na hi lokuttaramaggo lokiyamaggo viya katakārībhāvena pavattati samucchedakattā,
tika-s0201t:535_21: tathā yojanena ca sabbadassanaṃ dassanantaraparamanti dassanānuparamo siyāti evaṃ āgamato yuttito ca nānābhisamayo na yujjatīti saññāpetabbo.
tika-s0201t:536_0: Nirodhaṃ ārammaṇatoti nirodhameva ārammaṇatoti niyamo gahetabbo,
tika-s0201t:536_2: Tena nirodhe kiccatopi paṭivedho siddho hoti.
tika-s0201t:536_7: Na hi sutte katthaci cattāro āsavā āgatā atthi.
tika-s0201t:536_12: āsavā dassanā pahātabbā”ti vuttanti āha “dassanā pahātabbā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:536_13: Ettha pariyāpannattāti etena sammāsaṅkappassa viya paññākkhandhe kiccasabhāgatāya idha vicikicchāya āsavasaṅgaho katoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:537_0: Sabbo attaggāho sakkāyadiṭṭhivinimutto natthīti vuttaṃ “channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:537_2: Sā hi diṭṭhi ekasmiṃ cittuppāde santāne ca ṭhitaṃ ekaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:537_11: Tasmāti yasmā bahū evettha āsavā pahātabbā,
tika-s0201t:538_0: Dassanā pahātabbātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-s0201t:541_4: Tathā hi heṭṭhā “upakkilesavisodhanaṃ ādiṃ katvā āsavakkhayapaṭipattidassanattha”nti suttantadesanāya payojanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:541_5: Na hi sakkā ādito eva ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0201t:541_6: atha kho samādinnasīlo indriyesu guttadvāro “saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati,
tika-s0201t:541_9: saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodetī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ caturāpassenapaṭipattiṃ paṭipajjamāno sammasanavidhiṃ otaritvā anukkamena
tika-s0201t:542_6: Tañhi ayoniso manasikaroto kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato “anubyañjana”nti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:542_7: Nimittaggāhoti itthipurisanimittādikassa vā kilesavatthubhūtassa vā nimittassa gāho.
tika-s0201t:542_8: Ādittapariyāyanayenāti ādittapariyāye āgatanayena veditabbā ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhāti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:543_0: Evaṃ tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya cakkhundriye niyataṭṭhāno saṃvaro cakkhundriyasaṃvaro.
tika-s0201t:543_2: Yadipi aññattha asaṅkheyyampi bhavaṅgacittaṃ nirantaraṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:543_3: pasādaghaṭṭanāvajjanuppādānaṃ pana antare dve eva bhavaṅgacittāni uppajjantīti ayaṃ cittaniyāmoti āha bhavaṅge “dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe”ti.
tika-s0201t:544_0: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vātiādi puna avacanatthaṃ idheva sabbaṃ vuttanti chasu dvāresu yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:544_1: Na hi pañcadvāre kāyavacīduccaritasaṅkhāto dussīlyasaṃvaro atthīti so manodvāravasena,
tika-s0201t:544_3: Muṭṭhassaccādīnañhi satipaṭipakkhādilakkhaṇānaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ siyā pañcadvāre uppatti,
tika-s0201t:544_4: na tveva kāyikavācasikavītikkamabhūtassa dussīlyassa tattha uppatti pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ aviññattijanakattāti.
tika-s0201t:545_0: Yathā kinti yena pakārena javane uppajjamāno asaṃvaro “cakkhudvāre asaṃvaro”ti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:545_2: Yathātiādinā nagaradvāre asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ gharādīnaṃ asaṃvutatā viya javane asaṃvare sati
tika-s0201t:545_3: taṃsambandhānaṃ dvārādīnaṃ asaṃvutatāti aññāsaṃvare aññāsaṃvutatāsāmaññameva nidasseti,
tika-s0201t:545_6: Sambandho ca javanena dvārādīnaṃ ekasantatipariyāpannatāya eva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:545_7: Paccayabhāvena purimanipphannaṃ javanakāle asantampi bhavaṅgādi phalanipphattiyā cakkhādi viya santaṃyeva nāma.
tika-s0201t:545_9: tasmā sati dvārabhavaṅgādike pacchā uppajjamānaṃ javanaṃ bāhiraṃ viya katvā nagaradvārasamānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:545_11: Javanassa hi paramatthato asatipi bāhirabhāve itarassa ca abbhantarabhāve “pabhassaramidaṃ,
tika-s0201t:545_13: tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭha”nti ādivacanato āgantukabhūtassa kadāci kadāci uppajjamānassa javanassa bāhirabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:545_14: tabbidhurasabhāvassa itarassa abbhantarabhāvo ca pariyāyato veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:545_15: Javane vā asaṃvare uppanne tato paraṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ asaṃvarahetubhāvāpattito nagaradvārasadisena
tika-s0201t:545_16: javanena pavisitvā dussīlyādicorānaṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīsu musanaṃ kusalabhaṇḍavināsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:545_17: Uppanne hi asaṃvare dvārādīnaṃ tassa hetubhāvo paññāyati,
tika-s0201t:545_18: so ca uppajjamānoyeva dvārādīnaṃ saṃvarūpanissayabhāvaṃ paṭibāhentoyeva pavattatīti ayañhettha asaṃvarādīnaṃ pavattinayo.
tika-s0201t:545_19: Pañcadvāre rūpādiārammaṇe āpāthagate yathāpaccayaṃ akusalajavane uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe manodvārikajavanaṃ
tika-s0201t:545_21: puna tasmiṃyeva dvāre “itthī puriso”tiādinā visayaṃ vavatthapetvā javanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otarati,
tika-s0201t:545_25: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi agutta”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:546_1: Saṃvarena samannāgato puggalo saṃvutoti vuttoti āha “upetoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:546_2: Ekajjhaṃ katvāti “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti padañca atthato abhinnaṃ samānaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:546_3: Ayameva cettha attho sundarataro uparipāḷiyā saṃsandanato.
tika-s0201t:546_5: Yanti ādesoti iminā liṅgavipallāsena saddhiṃ vacanavipallāso katoti dasseti,
tika-s0201t:546_9: Yathā panettha āsavā aññe ca vighātakarā kilesavipākapariḷāhā sambhavanti,
tika-s0201t:546_16: yañca saṃvaraphalanti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0201t:546_26: Sabbatthevāti manodvāre pañcadvāre cāti sabbasmiṃ dvāre.
tika-s0201t:549_1: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvarantiādīsu “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā vuttaṃ paccavekkhaṇameva yoniso paṭisaṅkhā.
tika-s0201t:549_3: Bhavapatthanāya assādayatoti bhavapatthanāmukhena bhāvitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assādentassa.
tika-s0201t:549_8: Sītassāti dhātukkhobhato vā utupariṇāmato vā uppannasītassa.
tika-s0201t:550_1: So hi piṇḍolyena bhikkhanāya patte patanato tattha tattha laddhabhikkhāpiṇḍānaṃ pāto sannipātoti “piṇḍapāto”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:550_7: Imāni ca padāni yathākkamaṃ moha- dosa- saṇṭhāna- vaṇṇa-
tika-s0201t:550_10: Purimaṃ vā dvayaṃ attano attano saṃkilesuppattinisedhanatthaṃ,
tika-s0201t:550_14: Ṭhitiyā yāpanāyāti pabandhaṭṭhitatthañceva pavattiyā avicchedanatthañca cirakālaṭṭhitatthaṃ jīvitindriyassa pavattāpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:550_18: Purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmīti purāṇaṃ abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ paṭihanissāmi.
tika-s0201t:550_19: Navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti navaṃ bhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti.
tika-s0201t:550_20: Tassā hi anuppannāya anuppajjanatthameva āhāraṃ paribhuñjati.
tika-s0201t:550_21: Ettha ca abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā nāma yathāpavattā jighacchānimittā vedanā.
tika-s0201t:550_22: Sā hi abhuñjantassa bhiyyo bhiyyo pavaḍḍhanavasena uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:550_24: Sā hi bhuttapaccayā anuppannāva na uppajjissatīti.
tika-s0201t:551_0: Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti yāpanā ca me catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ bhavissati.
tika-s0201t:551_2: idha catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanāti ayametāsaṃ viseso.
tika-s0201t:554_0: Ettāvatā payojanapariggaho, majjhimā ca paṭipadā dīpitā hoti.
tika-s0201t:555_6: atha vā yathāvutto utu ca sīhabyagghādipākaṭaparissayo ca rāgadosādipaṭicchannaparissayo ca utuparissayo,
tika-s0201t:555_8: Idañca cīvarapaṭisevane hirikopīnapaṭicchādanaṃ viya tassa niyatapayojananti puna “yāvadevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:556_2: jīvitassa parivārasambhārabhāvehi parikkhāro cāti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro, taṃ.
tika-s0201t:556_4: Veyyābādhikānanti byābādhato dhātukkhobhato ca tannibbattarogato ca jātānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:556_8: Navavedanuppādanatopīti na kevalaṃ āyatiṃ eva vipākapariḷāhā,
tika-s0201t:556_9: atha kho atibhojanapaccayā alaṃsāṭakādīnaṃ viya navavedanuppādanatopi veditabbāti attho.
tika-s0201t:559_2: Kammaṭṭhānikassa calanaṃ nāma kammaṭṭhānapariccāgoti āha “calati kampati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:559_4: sahanto ca na naggasamaṇādayo viya sahati,
tika-s0201t:559_5: atha kho kammaṭṭhānāvijahanenāti āha “sveva thero viyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:559_10: idaṃ pana tato mudutara”nti evaṃ paccavekkhitvā.
tika-s0201t:560_0: Parisuddhasīlohamasmīti sabbathāpi “visuddhasīlohamasmī”ti maraṇaṃ aggahetvā avippaṭisāramūlikaṃ pītiṃ uppādesi.
tika-s0201t:560_2: Visaṃ nivattitvāti pītivegena ajjhotthataṃ daṭṭhamukheneva bhassitvā.
tika-s0201t:560_4: Cittekaggataṃ labhitvāti “pītimanassa kāyo passambhatī”tiādinā nayena samādhānaṃ pāpuṇitvā.
tika-s0201t:561_0: Paccayesu santoso bhāvanāya ca āramitabbaṭṭhānatāya ārāmo assāti paccayasantosabhāvanārāmo,
tika-s0201t:562_4: Muhuttena khaṇeva vāte hadayaṃ phāletuṃ āraddheyeva.
tika-s0201t:562_5: Anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyīti arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyi.
tika-s0201t:563_0: Evaṃ sabbatthāti “uṇhena phuṭṭhassa sītaṃ patthayato”tiādinā sabbattha uṇhādinimittaṃ kāmāsavuppatti veditabbā,
tika-s0201t:563_1: sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā aniṭṭhanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:563_2: Attaggāhe sati attaniyaggāhoti āha “mayhaṃ sītaṃ uṇhanti gāho diṭṭhāsavo”ti.
tika-s0201t:563_3: Sītādike upagate sahantī khamantī te attano upari vāsentī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “āropetvā vāsetiyevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:563_6: so te nirassanto vidhunanto viya hotīti.
tika-s0201t:566_2: kiṃ mama jīvitena vā maraṇena vā”ti evaṃ acintetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:567_2: Apica “caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetī”ti vacanato hatthiādiparivajjanampi bhagavato vacanānuṭṭhānanti katvā ācārasīlamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:570_2: ayonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhitattāpi lobhādisahagatattāpi kusalapaṭipakkhatopītiādīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ vitakko akusaloti attho.
tika-s0201t:570_4: Ettha ca akusalotiādinā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ kāmavitakkassa ādīnavaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:570_6: Attabyābādhāya saṃvattatītiādīsupi imināva nayena ādīnavavibhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:570_7: Uppannassa kāmavitakkassa anadhivāsanaṃ nāma puna tādisassa anuppādanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:570_8: taṃ panassa pahānaṃ vinodanaṃ byantikaraṇaṃ anabhāvagamananti ca vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti pāḷiyaṃ “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ
tika-s0201t:570_9: nādhivāsetī”ti vatvā “pajahatī”tiādi vuttanti tamatthaṃ dassento “anadhivāsento kiṃ karotīti pajahatī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:570_11: na samucchedoti dassetuṃ “vinodetī”tiādi vuttanti vikkhambhanavaseneva attho dassito.
tika-s0201t:571_0: Kāmavitakkoti sampayogato ārammaṇato ca kāmasahagato vitakko.
tika-s0201t:571_2: Kāmapaṭisaṃyuttoti hi kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmena sampayutto vatthukāmasaṅkhātena paṭibaddho ca.
tika-s0201t:571_3: Uppannuppanneti tesaṃ pāpavitakkānaṃ uppādāvatthāgahaṇaṃ vā kataṃ siyā anavasesaggahaṇaṃ vā.
tika-s0201t:571_6: Anavasesaggahaṇaṃ byāpanicchāya hotīti dassetuṃ “satakkhattumpi uppanne”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:571_7: Ñātivitakkoti “amhākaṃ ñātayo sukhajīvino sampattiyuttā”tiādinā gehassitapemavasena ñātake ārabbha uppannavitakko.
tika-s0201t:571_8: Janapadavitakkoti “amhākaṃ janapado subhikkho sampannasasso ramaṇīyo”tiādinā gehassitapemavaseneva janapadaṃ ārabbha uppannavitakko.
tika-s0201t:571_9: Ukkuṭikappadhānādīhi dukkhe nijjiṇṇe samparāye attā sukhī hoti amaroti dukkarakārikāya paṭisaṃyutto amaratthāya vitakko,
tika-s0201t:571_10: taṃ vā ārabbha amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhisahagato amaro ca so vitakko cāti amaravitakko.
tika-s0201t:571_11: Parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyuttoti paresu upaṭṭhākādīsu sahanandikādivasena pavatto anuddayatāpatirūpako gehassitapemena paṭisaṃyutto vitakko.
tika-s0201t:571_12: Lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyuttoti cīvarādilābhena ceva sakkārena ca kittisaddena ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭisaṃyutto.
tika-s0201t:571_13: Anavaññattipaṭisaṃyuttoti “aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyuṃ,
tika-s0201t:572_0: Kāmavitakko kāmasaṅkappanasabhāvattā kāmasaṅkappapavattiyā sātisayattā ca kāmanākāroti āha “kāmavitakko panettha kāmāsavo”ti.
tika-s0201t:572_3: Kāmavitakkādike vinodeti attano santānato nīharati etenāti vinodanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:575_1: “Satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiyo paripūrentī”ti vacanato vijjāvimuttīnaṃ anadhigamo
tika-s0201t:575_3: vuttavipariyāyena bhagavato orasaputtabhāvādivasena ca bhāvanāya ānisaṃso veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:575_13: Missakanayena hi bojjhaṅgesu vuccamānesu tadaṅgādivivekadassanavasena vipassanābojjhaṅgādayo vibhajitvā vuccanti,
tika-s0201t:575_14: na nibbattitalokuttarabojjhaṅgā evāti bojjhaṅgesu sammoho na hoti bojjhaṅgabhāvanāpaṭipattiyā ca sammadeva pakāsitattā.
tika-s0201t:576_0: Ādipadānanti “satisambojjhaṅga”nti evamādīnaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vākye ādibhūtānaṃ padānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:577_4: Udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ sāraṇaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ apilāpanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:580_0: Vuttesu pakāresu idha avuttānaṃ vasena veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:580_1: Yā hi ayaṃ bodhīti vuccatīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:580_3: Taṃ pana paṭibujjhanaṃ atthato catunnaṃ saccānaṃ paṭivedho,
tika-s0201t:580_5: Jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viyāti yathā aṅgāni eva jhānamaggā,
tika-s0201t:580_8: Senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viyāti etena puggalapaññattiyā avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:581_0: Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgāti idaṃ kāraṇattho aṅga-
tika-s0201t:581_3: bodhiyo eva aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ “bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti.
tika-s0201t:581_4: Anubujjhantīti vipassanādīnaṃ kāraṇānaṃ bujjhitabbānañca saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ bujjhanti.
tika-s0201t:581_5: Paṭibujjhantīti kilesaniddāya uṭṭhahanato paccakkhabhāvena vā paṭimukhaṃ bujjhanti.
tika-s0201t:581_8: saddo hi sabbavisesayuttaṃ bujjhanaṃ sāmaññena gahetvā ṭhito.
tika-s0201t:582_1: Obhāsanaṃ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvapaṭicchādakassa sammohassa viddhaṃsanaṃ yathā āloko andhakārassa.
tika-s0201t:582_2: Yasmiṃ dhamme sati vīro nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:582_5: Kosajjapakkhato patituṃ appadānavasena sampayuttānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ paggaho.
tika-s0201t:582_14: Kāyacittadarathapassambhanatoti kāyadarathassa cittadarathassa ca passambhanato vūpasamanato.
tika-s0201t:583_5: Sampiṇḍanaṃ sampayuttānaṃ avippakiṇṇabhāvāpādanaṃ nhānīyacuṇṇānaṃ udakaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:583_9: Samappavatte dhamme paṭisañcikkhati upapattito ikkhati tadākārā hutvā pavattatīti paṭisaṅkhānalakkhaṇā,
tika-s0201t:583_10: evañca katvā “paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā gahaṇe majjhattatā”ti upekkhākiccādhimattatāya saṅkhārupekkhā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:583_13: Sampayuttānaṃ asamappavattihetukapakkhapātaṃ upacchindantī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “pakkhapātupacchedarasā”ti.
tika-s0201t:584_0: Sabbasmiṃ līnapakkhe uddhaccapakkhe ca atthikā patthanīyā icchitabbāti sabbatthikā,
tika-s0201t:584_2: Samānakkhaṇapavattīsu sattasupi sambojjhaṅgesu vācāya kamappavattito paṭipāṭiyā vattabbesu yaṃ kiñci
tika-s0201t:584_3: paṭhamaṃ avatvā satisambojjhaṅgasseva paṭhamaṃ vacanassa kāraṇaṃ sabbesaṃ upakārakattanti vuttaṃ “sabbesa”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:585_0: “Kasmā satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā”ti codako saddhālobhādīnampi bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ āsaṅkati,
tika-s0201t:585_1: itaro satiādīnaṃyeva bhāvanāya upakārataṃ dassento “līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:585_2: Tattha līnassāti atisithilavīriyatādīhi bhāvanāvīthiṃ anotaritvā saṃkuṭitassa cittassa.
tika-s0201t:585_4: Tañhi etehi allatiṇādīhi viya paritto aggi dussamuṭṭhāpiyaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0201t:585_8: so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:585_10: sukkhatiṇādīhi viya paritto aggi līnaṃ cittaṃ etehi susamuṭṭhāpiyaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0201t:585_12: Tattha yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:586_2: Tañhi etehi sukkhatiṇādīhi viya aggikkhandho duvūpasamayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:586_6: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:586_8: allatiṇādīhi viya aggikkhandho uddhataṃ cittaṃ etehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:586_10: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:586_16: taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ uppādanavasena tathā manasikarontova passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma.
tika-s0201t:586_18: So hi cittaṃ līnapakkhikānaṃ passaddhiādīnaṃ vasena layāpattito,
tika-s0201t:586_20: tasmā so loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbabyañjanesu sabbakammikaamacco viya ca rājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbo.
tika-s0201t:587_1: Vaḍḍhi nāma vepullaṃ bhiyyobhāvo punappunaṃ uppādo evāti āha “punappunaṃ janetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:587_7: Tesu purimo vivecanīyato viviccamānatāya vivekasaṅkhātāya viviccanakiriyāya samaṅgī dhammasamūho tāya eva viviccanakiriyāya vasena vivekoti gahito.
tika-s0201t:587_9: Tattha yasmiṃ dhammapuñje satisambojjhaṅgo viviccanakiriyāya pavattati,
tika-s0201t:587_10: taṃ yathāvuttāya viviccamānatāya vivekasaṅkhātaṃ nissāyeva pavattati,
tika-s0201t:587_12: Yathā vā vivekavasena pavattaṃ jhānaṃ “vivekaja”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:587_14: Nissayaṭṭho ca vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena maggaphalānaṃ veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:587_15: Asatipi pubbāparabhāve “paṭiccasamuppādā”ti ettha paccayānaṃ samuppādanaṃ viya abhinnadhammādhārā nissayanabhāvanā sambhavantīti.
tika-s0201t:588_6: saṅkhāresu pana ādīnavaṃ suṭṭhu disvā tappaṭipakkhe nibbāne adhimuttatāya ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitatā
tika-s0201t:588_8: Na paṭisiddhā vipassanāpādakesu kasiṇārammaṇādijhānesu satiādīnaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyattā.
tika-s0201t:588_9: Anuddharantā pana vipassanā viya bodhiyā maggassa āsannakāraṇaṃ jhānaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0201t:588_11: na ca vipassanākiccassa viya jhānakiccassa niṭṭhānaṃ maggoti katvā na uddharanti.
tika-s0201t:588_12: Ettha ca kasiṇaggahaṇena tadāyattāni āruppānipi gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-s0201t:588_13: Tānipi hi vipassanāpādakāni nibbedhabhāgiyāni ca hontīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati tanninnabhāvasabbhāvato.
tika-s0201t:588_16: “Kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja vihareyya”nti ādivacanampetassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0201t:589_1: saddo pariccāgattho pakkhandanattho cāti vossaggassa duvidhatā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:589_14: Paripāko ca āsevanalābhena āhitasāmatthiyassa kilesassa pariccajituṃ nibbānañca pakkhandituṃ tikkhavisadasabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:589_17: sesesu dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīsupi esa nayoti evaṃ tattha netabbanti attho.
tika-s0201t:590_0: Evaṃ ādikammikānaṃ bojjhaṅgesu asammohatthaṃ missakanayaṃ vatvā idāni nibbattitalokuttarabojjhaṅgavasena atthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “idha panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:590_2: Maggo eva vossaggavipariṇāmī bhāvanāmaggassa idha adhippetattā.
tika-s0201t:591_1: Tepi anapāyagamanīyā eva veditabbā apāyagamanīyānaṃ dassaneneva pahīnattā.
tika-s0201t:591_2: Satipi sambojjhaṅgānaṃ yebhuyyena maggabhāve tattha tattha sambojjhaṅgasabhāvānaṃ maggadhammānaṃ vasena
tika-s0201t:591_3: vuttamaggattayasampayuttā bojjhaṅgāti paccekabojjhaṅge “bojjhaṅgabhāvanāyā”ti iminā gaṇhanto “maggattayasampayuttāyā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:593_1: Thomentoti āsavappahānassa sudukkarattā tāya eva dukkarakiriyāya taṃ abhitthavanto.
tika-s0201t:593_5: Ussukkaṃ janentoti evaṃ dhammassāmināpi abhitthavanīyaṃ mahānisaṃsañca āsavappahānanti tattha ādarasahitaṃ ussāhaṃ uppādento.
tika-s0201t:595_1: na tabbiparītaṃ anatthāvahattāti pītisampayuttacittataṃ sandhāyāha “attamanāti sakamanā”ti.
tika-s0201t:598_1: Tasmā taṃ dassetvāti yasmā suttantavaṇṇanā suttanikkhepaṃ dassetvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti,
tika-s0201t:598_7: Yā hi lābhasakkāranimittaṃ tadā bhikkhūsu paccayabāhullikatā jātā,
tika-s0201t:598_8: taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā bhagavā imaṃ desesīti.
tika-s0201t:598_10: Tiṭṭhanti ceva bhagavati katthaci nibaddhavāsaṃ vasante,
tika-s0201t:598_12: Bhikkhūnampi yebhuyyena kappasatasahassaṃ tato bhiyyopi pūritadānapāramisañcayattā tadā mahālābhasakkāro uppajjīti vuttaṃ “evaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassapī”ti.
tika-s0201t:599_3: Pūjitoti mālādipūjāya ceva catupaccayābhipūjāya ca pūjito.
tika-s0201t:599_5: Yassa hi cattāro paccaye sakkatvāpi abhisaṅkhate paṇītapaṇīte upanenti,
tika-s0201t:599_15: Bhagavati bhikkhusaṅghe ca loko evaṃ paṭipanno.
tika-s0201t:599_18: Lābhaggayasaggapattanti lābhassa ca yasassa ca aggaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pattaṃ.
tika-s0201t:600_2: Paccayesu giddhā gadhitā paccayānaṃ bahulabhāvāya paṭipannāti paccayabāhulikā.
tika-s0201t:600_3: Bhagavatopi pākaṭā ahosi pakaticārittavasenāti adhippāyo aññathā apākaṭasseva abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:600_5: idha pana so bhikkhūnaṃ lābhagarutādhammavasena veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:601_2: tato laddhabbaṃ arahabhāvena ādiyantīti dāyādā, puttā.
tika-s0201t:601_4: sāsane pana dhammopīti tattha yaṃ sāvajjaṃ aniyyānikañca,
tika-s0201t:601_7: tattha bhikkhū niyojento bhagavā avoca “dhammadāyādā me,
tika-s0201t:601_10: Dhammassa me dāyādāti mama dhammassa ogāhino,
tika-s0201t:601_14: Pariyāyeti sabhāvato parivattetvā ñāpeti etenāti pariyāyo, leso,
tika-s0201t:601_16: Tadabhāvato nippariyāyadhammo maggappattiyā apāyapatanādito accantameva vāraṇato.
tika-s0201t:601_17: Itaro vuttavipariyāyato pariyāyadhammo accantaṃ apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhapātanato paramparāya vāraṇato.
tika-s0201t:601_18: Yathā hi lokiyaṃ kusalaṃ dānasīlādi vivaṭṭaṃ uddissa nibbattitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:601_19: ayaṃ taṃ asampādentampi taṃ sampāpakassa dhammassa nibbattakāraṇabhāvapariyāyena pariyāyadhammo nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:601_21: yaṃ taṇhādīhi savisesaṃ āmasitabbato āmisanti loke pākaṭaṃ acchādanabhojanādi, tassa,
tika-s0201t:601_22: taṃsadisassa ca phalavisesassa nimittabhāvapariyāyena pariyāyāmisanti vuccatīti dassento āha “yaṃ panidaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:602_1: brahmacariyassa yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā”ti ādivacanato sāvakehi adhigatopi lokuttaradhammo satthuyevāti
tika-s0201t:602_3: Sāvakānañhi dhammadiṭṭhipaccayassapi yonisomanasikārassa visesapaccayo paratoghoso ca tathāgatādhīnoti
tika-s0201t:602_4: tehi paṭividdhopi dhammo dhammassāminoyevāti vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:602_6: Tattha anuppannassa maggassāti kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti yāva imasmā buddhuppādā asambodhavasena na uppannassa ariyamaggassa.
tika-s0201t:602_10: atha kho parasantānepīti dassetuṃ “asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā,
tika-s0201t:602_12: Tayidaṃ maggassa uppādanaṃ sañjānanañca atthato jānanaññeva asammohapaṭivedhabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “maggaññū maggavidū”ti.
tika-s0201t:602_14: Satthārā yathāgataṃ maggaṃ anugacchantīti maggānugā bhagavato eva taṃ maggaṃ suṭṭhu adhigamanato.
tika-s0201t:602_15: Pacchā parato sammā anu anu āgatā paṭipannāti pacchā samannāgatā.
tika-s0201t:603_0: Jānaṃ jānātīti jānitabbameva abhiññeyyādibhedaṃ jānāti ekantahitapaṭipattito.
tika-s0201t:603_2: Atha vā jānaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitabbaṃ jānātiyeva.
tika-s0201t:603_3: Na hi padesañāṇena jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ ekantato jānāti.
tika-s0201t:603_4: Passaṃ passatīti dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu dhammacakkhu buddhacakkhu samantacakkhusaṅkhātehi pañcahi cakkhūhi passitabbaṃ passatiyeva.
tika-s0201t:603_5: Atha vā jānaṃ jānātīti yathā aññe savipallāsā kāmarūpapariññāvādino jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti,
tika-s0201t:603_8: diṭṭhidassanassa ca abhāvā passanto passatiyevāti attho.
tika-s0201t:603_9: Cakkhubhūtoti paññācakkhumayattā tassa ca pattattā sattesu ca taduppādanato dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena lokassa cakkhu viya bhūto.
tika-s0201t:603_10: Ñāṇabhūtoti etassa ca evameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:603_19: Atthassa ninnetāti dhammatāsaṅkhātaṃ paramatthaṃ nibbānañca niddhāretvā dassetā,
tika-s0201t:603_21: Amatassa dātāti amataṃ sacchikiriyaṃ sattesu uppādento amataṃ dadātīti amatassa dātā.
tika-s0201t:607_0: Evamādiṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ sutvā eva bhikkhū dānādipuññānaṃ vivaṭṭasannissayataṃ jānanti,
tika-s0201t:607_3: “Edisaṃ paribhuñcitabba”nti kappiyassa ca cīvarādipaccayassa bhagavato vacanena vinā paṭiggahopi bhikkhūnaṃ na sambhavati,
tika-s0201t:608_0: Pariyāyāmisassa bhagavato santakabhāvo pariyāyadhammassa tabbhāveneva dīpito.
tika-s0201t:609_0: Paccayā cīvarādayo paramā pāpuṇitabbabhāvena uttamamariyādā etassa na uttarimanussadhammā appicchatādayo cāti paccayaparamo,
tika-s0201t:609_7: bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti evaṃ vuttesu catūsu taṇhuppattikoṭṭhāsesu.
tika-s0201t:610_3: Imasmiṃ pakkhe tatthāti tasmiṃ ovāde icceva attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:610_4: Adhippāyo āmisadāyādatāya uppajjanakaanatthānuppādassa dhammadāyādatāya uppajjanakaaṭṭhuppattiyā ca ākaṅkhā.
tika-s0201t:610_10: Āmisagaruko appagghabhāvena kūṭakahāpaṇo viya nittejo samaṇatejena anujjalato nibbutaṅgāro viya nippabho ca hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:611_0: Dhammadāyādāti ettāvatā antogadhāvadhāraṇaṃ vacananti tena avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “mā āmisadāyādā”ti paṭikkhepo dassito.
tika-s0201t:611_7: karaṇabhūtena vā ādiyaṃ vivecanaṃ viññūhi visuṃ karaṇaṃ vavatthānassa hotīti āha “visuṃ kātabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:612_1: no āmisadāyādā”ti bhikkhūsu attano karuṇāyanākittanaṃ tesaṃ mudukaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:612_2: “ahampi tenā”tiādi pana tatopi savisesaṃ mudukaraṇanti āha “atīva mudukaraṇattha”nti.
tika-s0201t:613_1: Tā pana yasmā nāḷakattherādīhi paṭipannā paramasallekhavuttibhūtā atiukkaṭṭhapaṭipattiyo,
tika-s0201t:613_3: Sakkhibhūtāti tāya paṭipattiyā vuccamānāya “kiṃ me vinā paṭipajjanako atthī”ti asaddahantānaṃ paccakkhakaraṇena sakkhibhūtā.
tika-s0201t:613_4: Imasminti “tumhe ca me bhikkhave dhammadāyādā”tiādike vākye.
tika-s0201t:613_5: Sesanti “tumhe ca me”tiādikaṃ sukkapakkhe āgataṃ pāḷipadaṃ.
tika-s0201t:613_6: Vuttanayapaccanīkenāti “tena dhammadāyādabhāvena no āmisadāyādabhāvenā”ti evaṃ kaṇhapakkhe vuttanayassa paṭipakkhena.
tika-s0201t:614_1: Thomanaṃ sutvāti paṭipajjanakassa puggalassa pasaṃsanaṃ sutvā yathā taṃ saparisassa āyasmato upasenassa paṭipattiyā sīlathomanaṃ sutvā.
tika-s0201t:614_5: Yo hi bhuñjanto bhojanena titto parivesakena upanītabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-s0201t:614_6: so tena pavāritena paṭikkhepito nāma hoti.
tika-s0201t:614_9: Pakārehi diṭṭhādīhi vāreti saṅghādike yācāpeti bhatte karoti etāyāti pavāraṇā,
tika-s0201t:614_11: Sā pana yasmā yebhuyyena vassaṃvutthehi kātabbā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:614_17: Sā pana yasmā anatirittabhojananimittāya āpattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:615_0: “Bhuttāvī”ti vacanato bhojanapāripūritā idhādhippetāti āha “paripuṇṇoti bhojanena paripuṇṇo”ti.
tika-s0201t:615_1: Pariyositoti etthāpi eseva nayo “bhojanena bhojanakiriyāya pariyosito”ti.
tika-s0201t:615_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana adhippetatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ bhojana-
tika-s0201t:615_7: bhuttāvitādiggahaṇehi vā itare bodhitā hontīti aññamaññaṃ nesaṃ ñāpakañāpetabbataṃ dassetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:615_8: Evaṃ chahipi padehi udarāvadehakaṃ bhojanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:616_1: nāpi siyā”ti ca idaṃ atthadvayampi idha sambhavatīti vuttaṃ “idha ubhayampi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:617_4: saddo “no ca kho paṭivutta”ntiādīsu vāpasamīkaraṇe dissati,
tika-s0201t:618_1: piṇḍapātabhojanaṃ pana anādaritvā dhammānudhammapaṭipattīti ettha kāraṇaṃ dassento āha “piṇḍapātaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:619_1: Nipāto ca nāma yattha yattha vākye payujjati,
tika-s0201t:619_2: tena tena vattabbatthajotako hotīti idha “piṇḍapāta”ntiādinā anuññāpasaṃsāvasena vuccamānassa atthassa
tika-s0201t:619_4: anuññāpasaṃsārambhe pana “asambhāvanatthe”ti vuttaṃ siyā purimeyeva sambhāvanāvibhāvanato adhikattānulomato ca.
tika-s0201t:620_0: Ekavāraṃ pavattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkhipanaṃ kathaṃ dīgharattaṃ appicchatādīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tassa hī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:620_15: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “santaguṇasambhāvanatā paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā,
tika-s0201t:621_0: Mahiccho puggalo yathā paccayadānavasena paccayadāyakehi bharituṃ asakkuṇeyyo,
tika-s0201t:621_1: evaṃ paccayapariyesanavasena attanāpīti vuttaṃ “attanopi upaṭṭhākānampi dubbharo hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:621_2: Saddhādeyyassa vinipātavasena pavattiyā aññassa ghare chaḍḍento.
tika-s0201t:621_4: tesaṃ sabbapacchimaṃ attano yathāladdhaṃ datvā tattha kiñci aladdhā rittapatto vihāraṃ pavisitvā nipajjati jighacchādubbalyenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:621_7: yathāladdhapaccayena avaññaṃ akatvā santosāpattiyā upaṭṭhākānaṃ subharatā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:622_7: Cetovinīvaraṇasappāyāti kusalacittuppattiyā nivārakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvakaraṇena cetovinīvaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ sappāyā.
tika-s0201t:622_8: Samathavipassanācittasseva vā vibhūtibhāvakaraṇāya sappāyā upakārikāti cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā.
tika-s0201t:622_9: Ekantanibbidāyātiādi yena nibbidādiānisaṃsena ayaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā ca nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:622_17: Etesu hi ādito tīhi vipassanā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:622_20: Tena samathavipassanā ādiṃ katvā nibbānapariyosāno ayaṃ sabbo uttarimanussadhammo dasakathāvatthulābhino sambhavatīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:622_22: Appicchatādayo hi ekavārauppannā upari tadatthāya saṃvattissanti.
tika-s0201t:623_2: Nibbānapāripūri cettha tadāvahadhammapāripūrivasena pariyāyato vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:623_8: Sarasākhāti yattha upariunnatapadesato udakaṃ āgantvā tiṭṭhati ceva sandati ca, te.
tika-s0201t:624_0: Uggahetvāti atthato byañjanato ca upadhāraṇavasena gahetvā aviparītaṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0201t:624_2: Yathā idheva cintesīti yathā imissā dhammadāyādadesanāya cintesi,
tika-s0201t:624_3: evaṃ aññatthāpi dhammathomanatthaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pavisanto cintesi.
tika-s0201t:624_6: Ayaṃ desanā aggātiādi bhagavā dhammasenāpatiṃ guṇato eva paggaṇhātīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:625_0: Cittagatiyāti cittavasena kāyassa pariṇāmanena “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti kāyassa cittena samānagatikatādhiṭṭhānena.
tika-s0201t:625_1: Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhappavattiko lahuparivattanacittena samānagatiko hotīti?
tika-s0201t:625_3: Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0201t:625_4: Na hi tadā cittaṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano khaṇena avattitvā dandhavuttikassa rūpadhammassa khaṇena vattituṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0201t:625_5: “idaṃ cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū”ti pana adhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti,
tika-s0201t:625_6: tāva kāyagatiṃ anulomentameva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatikaṃ katvā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:625_7: evaṃ “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva lahusaññāya sukhumasaññāya ca sampāditattā
tika-s0201t:625_8: abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ avattitvā yathā lahuṃ katipayacittavāreheva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti,
tika-s0201t:625_9: evaṃ pavattamāno kāyo cittagatikabhāveneva pariṇāmito nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:625_11: Evañca katvā bāhusamiñjanappasāraṇūpamāpi upacārena vinā suṭṭhutaraṃ yuttā hoti,
tika-s0201t:625_13: Na hi dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ iddhibalena kātuṃ sakkā,
tika-s0201t:626_1: Bhagavato adhippāyānurūpaṃ bhikkhūnañca ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvāti vacanaseso.
tika-s0201t:626_2: Desakāle viya bhājanampi oloketvā eva mahāthero dhammaṃ katheti.
tika-s0201t:626_3: Pakkantassāti idaṃ anādare sāmivacananti dassento “pakkantassa sato”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:626_5: Taṃ pana parimāṇaṃ yasmā parimeyyassa atthassa paricchindanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:626_8: saddo idheva pucchāyaṃ āgatoti katvā vuttaṃ. Nu-
tika-s0201t:626_14: Vivekapañcakaggahaṇe panassa sarūpena kāyaviveko gahito na siyā,
tika-s0201t:626_15: tadāyattattā vā satthārā tadā payujjamānavivekadassanavasena “tīhi vivekehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:626_17: Na hi kāyavivekamattena dhammadāyādabhāvo sijjhatīti? Na,
tika-s0201t:626_20: Na hi lokiyajjhānādhigamamattena nippariyāyato satthudhammadāyādabhāvo icchito,
tika-s0201t:626_22: tasmā sabbāpi sāsane vivekānusikkhanā nibbānapoṇā nibbānapabbhārā nibbānogadhā cāti vuttaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatarampī”ti.
tika-s0201t:626_23: Asati āloke andhakāro viya asati dhammadāyādatāya ekaṃsiyā āmisadāyādatāti āha “āmisadāyādāva hontī”ti.
tika-s0201t:626_24: Esa nayo sukkapakkhepīti kaṇhapakkhato sādhāraṇavasena labbhamānaṃ atthasāmaññaṃ atidisati,
tika-s0201t:626_27: “Tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatara”nti idaṃ idha na labbhati.
tika-s0201t:626_29: tesu eko vā itaradvayasannissayo idha labbhati.
tika-s0201t:627_4: attho pana sāmivacanavaseneva veditabboti dassento āha “āyasmatoyeva sāriputtassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:627_14: Puripucchanādinā vā atthassa citte āpādanaṃ paṭṭhapanaṃ pariyāpuṇanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:627_15: Kāraṇavacananti yathāvuttassa kāraṇabhāvena vacanaṃ “hetumhi karaṇavacana”nti katvā.
tika-s0201t:628_2: Aññathā “satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī’ti ekeneva ākārena so attho therenapi vutto.
tika-s0201t:628_3: Tīhi ākārehīti āmisadāyādapaṭipadābhūtehi tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ ananusikkhanākārehi.
tika-s0201t:629_0: Vitthārato suvibhatto hoti anavasesato sammadeva niddiṭṭhattā.
tika-s0201t:629_1: Nanu ca uddese satthunopi ādiyatā bhagavatā gahitā,
tika-s0201t:629_2: sā na niddiṭṭhāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “so ca kho”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:629_3: Sāvake anuggaṇhantassāti “āmisadāyādā satthu sāvakā”ti satthu parappavādapariharaṇatthampi “tumhehi dhammadāyādehi
tika-s0201t:629_5: Sāvakānaṃ taṃ na yuttaṃ sāmīciabhāvatoti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:629_6: Esa nayoti yadidaṃ “ettāvatāyaṃ bhagavā”tiādinā kaṇhapakkhe uddesassa atthavibhāgadassanamukhena sambandhadassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:629_9: satthārā desitāya uddesadesanāya mahātherena desitāya ca anusandhikkamena sambandhoti attho.
tika-s0201t:630_0: Accantapavivittassāti ekantaupadhiviveko viya itarepi viveko satthu ekantikāvāti.
tika-s0201t:630_1: Anusikkhanaṃ nāma anu anu pūraṇanti tappaṭikkhepena āha “na paripūrentī”ti,
tika-s0201t:630_3: na paripūrentīti vā na paripālentīti attho.
tika-s0201t:630_7: Kasmā panettha “vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti uddese viya avisesavacane kāyavivekasseva gahaṇaṃ katanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yadi panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:630_8: Pucchāyāti pucchāto aviseso siyā vibhāgassa alabbhamānattā vissajjanassa.
tika-s0201t:630_9: Nanu ca “vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti avisesavacanato pāḷiyaṃ vibhāgo na labbhatevāti? Na,
tika-s0201t:630_15: Iminā padenāti “vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti iminā padena kāyavivekaṃ aparipūriyamānaṃ dassetīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:631_0: Ettha ca nappajahantīti pahātabbadhammānaṃ pahānābhāvavacanaṃ pahānalakkhaṇavivekābhāvadīpanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:631_1: taṃ vatvā puna “viveke nikkhittadhurā”ti vacanaṃ tato sātisayavivekābhāvadīpananti tadubhayavivekābhāvadassanena
tika-s0201t:631_4: Avigatataṇhatāya taṃ taṃ parikkhārajātaṃ bahuṃ lanti ādiyantīti bahulā,
tika-s0201t:631_6: Te pana yasmā paccayabahulabhāvāya yuttappayuttā nāma honti,
tika-s0201t:631_8: Sikkhāya ādarabhāvābhāvato sithilaṃ adaḷhaṃ gaṇhantīti “sāthalikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:632_8: Upekkhānubrūhanā sattasaṅkhāresu udāsīnatāpi asaṅkhatādhigamassa upāyoti tabbipariyāyato cīvarādimaṇḍanā
tika-s0201t:633_3: Uddesavāre pana kaṇhapakkhe vuttavipariyāyena gahetabbattho “esa nayo sukkapakkhepī”ti atidesena dassito.
tika-s0201t:633_4: Vuttapaccanīkanayenāti “kāyavivekaṃ nānusikkhanti na paripūrentī”tiādinā vuttassa atthassa paccanīkanayena,
tika-s0201t:633_8: Yojanaparamparāyāti gāmantato dūrabhāvena ekaṃ dve tīṇīti evaṃ yojanānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-s0201t:633_11: Upagantuṃ yuttakālo jarājiṇṇakālo gocaragāme dūre gamanāgamanasamatthatābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:633_12: “Evaṃ guṇavantesu dinnaṃ aho sudinna”nti paccayadāyakānaṃ pasādaṃ janenti.
tika-s0201t:633_14: Ayampi mahātherotiādi ekaṃ appamādavihārinaṃ vuddhataraṃ niddisitvā vadantānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:633_21: Sabbathātiādito tāva tadaṅgavasena kilesehi cittaṃ vivecento tato vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena
tika-s0201t:634_3: Tena “lobho ca pāpako”tiādinayappavattaṃ uparidesanaṃ anavasesato pariyādiyati.
tika-s0201t:634_4: Ko anusandhīti yā sā bhagavatā saṃkilesapakkhena saha dhammadāyādapaṭipattibhāvinī “dhammadāyādā me,
tika-s0201t:634_7: taṃ “satthu pavivittassa viharato”tiādinā ārabhitvā aṭṭhārasavārapaṭimaṇḍitāya niddesadesanāya vibhajitvā
tika-s0201t:634_8: tato paraṃ “tatrāvuso lobho ca pāpako”tiādinayāya uparidesanāya sambandhaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0201t:634_15: Ime teti ettha kasmā lobhādayo eva pahātabbadhammā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:634_16: nanu ito aññepi mohadiṭṭhivicikicchādayo pahātabbadhammā santīti?
tika-s0201t:634_18: te pana lobhādīhi tadekaṭṭhatā gahitā eva hontīti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:634_19: Atha vā imesaṃyevettha gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0201t:635_1: Tattha sāvakānaṃ yassa dhammassa dāyādabhāvo satthu abhirucito,
tika-s0201t:635_4: na ca bāhulikā”tiādinā kathitattā heṭṭhā pariyāyeneva dhammo kathitoti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:635_8: “bāhulikā ca hontī”tiādinā ca āmisaṃ nippariyāyenapi kathitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:635_9: Atha vā yāyaṃ bhagavatā āmisadāyādapaṭikkhepanā dhammadāyādatā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:635_10: yañca tadatthaṃ vibhajantena mahātherena attanā vivekānusikkhanādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:636_0: Atītadesanānidassananti atītāya therena yathādesitāya desanāya ca paccāmasanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:636_3: Tatthāti yaṃ vuttaṃ visesato “yesaṃ dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāhā”ti,
tika-s0201t:636_5: Tattha hi pahātabbadhammā lobhādayo sāmaññato vuttā.
tika-s0201t:636_7: Lobhadosā hi hetuto paccayato sabhāvato phalato nissandato saṃkiliṭṭhapakatikā,
tika-s0201t:637_1: Āmisadāyādassa paccayānaṃ lābhe hotīti idaṃ lobhassa ārammaṇaggahaṇasabhāvataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:637_2: taṇhāya vasena pana anugijjhanaṃ sandhāya “aladdhaṃ patthetī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:637_3: Alābhe paccayānaṃ āmisadāyādassa hotīti ānetvā yojanā.
tika-s0201t:637_7: Lobho ca deyyadhamme hoti āmisadāyādassāti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:637_9: Deyyadhammeti ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ sattakelāyanādivasenapi tassa lobhuppattisabbhāvato.
tika-s0201t:637_11: pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho”ti evamādayo nava taṇhāmūlakā.
tika-s0201t:638_3: sayaṃ vā sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena nibbānaṃ maggatīti nippariyāyena “maggo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:638_4: Eko antoti itarena asammisso eko koṭṭhāso,
tika-s0201t:638_6: Kāmaṃ aññepi kusaladhammā ete ante asampayogato na upenti,
tika-s0201t:638_8: ayaṃ pana accantavimuttiyā na upetīti āha “vimutto etehi antehī”ti.
tika-s0201t:638_10: Etesaṃ majjhe bhavattāti idaṃ maggassa ubhayantavimuttatāya eva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:638_13: Tathāti yathā itarena asammissaṭṭhena lāmakaṭṭhena ca lobho eko anto,
tika-s0201t:638_16: Maggassa anupagamanañca nesaṃ antānaṃ sabbaso appavattikaraṇeneva daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:638_17: Purimanayenāti “ete dve ante na upetī”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena.
tika-s0201t:639_1: Dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenāti dassanassa pariññābhisamayādibhedassa parito sabbathā nayanaṭṭhena pavattanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0201t:639_3: Tayidaṃ satipi paṭipadāya dhammacakkhuto anaññatte avayavavasena sijjhamāno attho samudāyena kato nāma hotīti upacāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:639_4: Tathā hi vakkhati “maggoyeva hi maggatthāya saṃvattati maggena kātabbakiccakaraṇato”ti.
tika-s0201t:639_9: Dukkhādīnaṃ pariññeyyādibhāvo viya abhiññeyyabhāvopi maggavaseneva pākaṭo hotīti āha “catunnampi saccānaṃ abhiññeyyabhāvadassanato”ti,
tika-s0201t:639_13: Na hi maggato añño maggakiccakaro atthi.
tika-s0201t:639_15: Atha vā sammādiṭṭhi uppajjamānā sahajātādipaccayabhāvena itare uppādeti,
tika-s0201t:639_16: evaṃ sesamaggadhammāpīti evampi maggatthāya saṃvattanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:639_23: Ito aññathāti “dukkhassa pariññāya diṭṭhivisuddhiṃ karotīti cakkhukaraṇī”tiādinā atthavaṇṇanāpapañco kevalaṃ vitthāratthāya.
tika-s0201t:640_0: Ayamevāti ettha ayanti iminā attano aññesañca tassaṃ parisāyaṃ ariyānaṃ maggassa paccakkhabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:640_3: Sattāpaṭikkhepo hi idha paṭisedhanaṃ alabbhamānattā aññassa maggassa.
tika-s0201t:645_3: Arayo pāpadhammā yanti apagamanti etenāti ariyo.
tika-s0201t:645_4: Ariyena desitoti ettha ariyassa bhagavato ayanti ariyo.
tika-s0201t:645_5: Ariyabhāvappaṭilābhāyāti ettha ariyakaro ariyoti uttarapadalopena ariya-
tika-s0201t:645_8: samudāyo ca samudāyīhi samannāgato nāma hotīti āha “aṭṭhahi aṅgehi upetattā”ti,
tika-s0201t:645_9: tasmā attano avayavabhūtāni aṭṭha aṅgāni etassa santīti aṭṭhaṅgiko.
tika-s0201t:645_11: tasmā vuttaṃ “na ca aṅgavinimutto”ti yathā “chaḷaṅgo vedo”ti.
tika-s0201t:645_12: Sadisūdāharaṇaṃ pana dassento “pañcaṅgikatūriyādīni viyā”ti āha. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:645_16: Ariyamaggo hi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karonto taṃ gavesanto viya hotīti.
tika-s0201t:645_17: Maggīyati nibbānatthikehi vivaṭṭūpanissayapuññakaraṇato paṭṭhāya tadatthaṃ paṭipattito.
tika-s0201t:645_19: “Seyyathidanti nipāto”ti vatvā tassa sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanasādhāraṇatāya “katamāni tāni aṭṭhaṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:645_20: Nanu ca aṅgāni samuditāni maggo antamaso sattaṅgavikalassa ariyamaggassa abhāvatoti?
tika-s0201t:645_22: maggapaccayatāya pana yathāsakaṃ kiccakaraṇena paccekampi tāni maggoyevāti āha “ekamekañhi aṅgaṃ maggoyevā”ti,
tika-s0201t:645_23: aññathā samuditānampi nesaṃ maggakiccaṃ na sambhaveyyāti.
tika-s0201t:645_24: Idāni tamevatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ “sammādiṭṭhimaggo ceva hetu cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:646_0: Sammā aviparītaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena catunnaṃ saccānaṃ dassanaṃ paṭivijjhanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sammādassanalakkhaṇā.
tika-s0201t:646_1: Sammā aviparītaṃ sampayuttadhamme nibbānārammaṇe abhiniropanaṃ appanālakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sammāabhiniropanalakkhaṇo
tika-s0201t:646_2: musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato siniddhasabhāvattā sampayuttadhamme,
tika-s0201t:646_3: sammāvācappaccayasubhāsitasotārañca janaṃ sammadeva pariggaṇhātīti sammāvācā sammāpariggaho lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sammāpariggahalakkhaṇā.
tika-s0201t:646_4: Yathā kāyikā kiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0201t:646_7: Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:646_10: ājīvasseva vā jīvitappavattiyā suddhi vodānaṃ etenāti sammāvodānalakkhaṇo sammāājīvo.
tika-s0201t:646_11: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho.
tika-s0201t:646_16: Sammā saṅkappeti sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhiniropetīti sammāsaṅkappo.
tika-s0201t:646_23: Sammā samādhiyati cittaṃ etenāti sammāsamādhīti evaṃ sammāsaṅkappādīnaṃ nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:647_14: Pariññābhisamayo pana nānantariyatāya atthato vutto eva hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:648_0: Kathaṃ pana ekameva ñāṇaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri kiccāni sādhentaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0201t:648_2: na āgamo vā tādiso atthīti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:648_3: Yathā hi padīpo ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe vaṭṭiṃ dahati,
tika-s0201t:648_11: dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapetaṃ ñāṇanti suttapadaṃ ettha udāharitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:648_12: Yathā ca sammādiṭṭhi pubbabhāge dukkhādīsu visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe ekāva catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati,
tika-s0201t:648_13: evaṃ sammāsaṅkappādayo pubbabhāge nekkhammasaṅkappādināmakā hutvā kāmasaṅkappādīnaṃ pajahanavasena visuṃ
tika-s0201t:648_14: visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe tiṇṇaṃ catunnañca kiccaṃ sādhentā pavattanti.
tika-s0201t:648_15: Sammāsamādhi pana pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi nānāyeva hutvā pavattatīti kāmañcettha sammādiṭṭhiyā sabbepi pāpadhammā paṭipakkhā,
tika-s0201t:648_16: ujuvipaccanīkatādassanavasena pana sammādiṭṭhiyā kiccaniddese micchādiṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0201t:649_0: Yesaṃ kilesānaṃ anupacchindane sammādiṭṭhi na uppajjeyya,
tika-s0201t:649_1: te micchādiṭṭhiyā sahajekaṭṭhatāya tadekaṭṭhāva tappaccanīyakilesā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:649_5: yassa pana so samudayo taṃ dukkhasaccaṃ,
tika-s0201t:649_9: Kasmā panettha lobhadosānaṃ visuṃ ādito ca gahaṇaṃ?
tika-s0201t:649_10: Visuṃ gahaṇaṃ tāva tathābujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena,
tika-s0201t:649_13: tadanusārena catusaccayojanāya evaṃ ekekassa niyyānamukhaṃ hotīti dassanatthañca.
tika-s0201t:649_15: Ādito gahaṇaṃ pana ativiya oḷārikatāya supākaṭabhāvato vakkhamānānaṃ aññesañca pāpadhammānaṃ mūlabhāvato tadekaṭṭhatāya ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:650_4: Āghātakaraṇarasoti “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā citte āghātassa karaṇaraso.
tika-s0201t:650_5: Dussanapaccupaṭṭhānoti saparasantānassa vināsanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto.
tika-s0201t:650_6: Upanandhanaṃ nānappakārassa uparūpari nandhanaṃ viya hotīti katvā.
tika-s0201t:650_10: saddena “upanayhanā upanayhitattaṃ āṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā anusaṃsandanā anuppabandhanā daḷhīkamma”ntiādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:650_12: Upanāhasamaṅgī hi puggalo verassa anissajjanato ādittapūtialātaṃ viya jalati eva,
tika-s0201t:651_0: Paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇoti udakapuñchaniyā udakaṃ viya paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanasabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:651_1: Tathābhūto cāyaṃ attano kārakaṃ gūthena paharantaṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ makkheti evāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:651_2: Tathā hessa saparasantānesu guṇaṃ makkhetīti makkhoti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:651_5: Paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena attano guṇānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti āha “paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena upaṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti.
tika-s0201t:651_6: Tathā hesa paresaṃ guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya attano guṇehi same karotīti paḷāsoti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:653_1: Tassa pāpassa āvaraṇabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti tadāvaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā, māyā,
tika-s0201t:653_2: yāya samannāgato puggalo bhasmachanno viya aṅgāro,
tika-s0201t:653_6: yena sāṭheyyena samannāgatassa puggalassa asantaguṇasambhāvanena cittānurūpakiriyāviharato “evaṃcitto,
tika-s0201t:653_7: evaṃkiriyo”ti dubbiññeyyattā kucchiṃ vā piṭṭhiṃ vā jānituṃ na sakkā. Yato –
tika-s0201t:657_4: yena samannāgato puggalo gilitanaṅgalasīso viya ajagaro,
tika-s0201t:657_5: vātabharitabhastā viya ca thaddho hutvā garuṭṭhāniye ca disvā onamitumpi na icchati,
tika-s0201t:657_9: Parena hi kismiñci kate taddiguṇaṃ karaṇavasena sārambho pavattati.
tika-s0201t:658_1: Omānopi hi evaṃ karaṇamukhena sampaggahavaseneva pavattati.
tika-s0201t:658_4: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “pubbakāle attānaṃ hīnato dahati aparakāle seyyato”ti.
tika-s0201t:659_1: yassa vā dhammassa vasena puggalo matto nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:659_4: Mado hi attano majjanākāraṃ sampayuttadhamme gāhento viya pavattamāno taṃsamaṅgiṃ puggalampi tathā karonto viya hoti.
tika-s0201t:659_5: Ahaṅkāravasena puggalaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ karonto cittassa ummādabhāvo viya hotīti ummādapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-s0201t:659_8: Yathāvuttassa vossaggassa anuppadānaṃ punappunaṃ vissajjanaṃ vossaggānuppadānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:659_19: Thambho vā mānaviseso cittassa thaddhabhāvena gahetabbato,
tika-s0201t:659_21: Tathā hi so “māno maññanā”tiādinā vibhaṅge niddiṭṭho.
tika-s0201t:659_22: Idha pana mānātimānānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā majjanākārena pavattadhammā eva “mado”ti gahetabbā.
tika-s0201t:660_0: Kasmā panettha ete eva aṭṭha dukā gahitā,
tika-s0201t:660_3: ime pana āmisadāyādassa savisesaṃ kilesāya saṃvattantīti taṃ visesaṃ vibhāventena āmisadāyādassa lobhādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:660_11: Tathā hi sā “issati dussati padussatī”tiādinā niddiṭṭhā.
tika-s0201t:660_12: Yasmā vā issaṃ janento ekaṃsato paduṭṭhacitto eva hoti,
tika-s0201t:660_15: Evaṃ paṭipannoti evaṃ asantaguṇappakāsanaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno.
tika-s0201t:660_16: Ovadituṃ asakkuṇeyyoti etena thambho nāma dovacassakaraṇo dhammoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:660_19: maññantoti iminā ca thambhassa mānavisesabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:660_22: pamajjatīti etena madavasena ekaṃsato pamādamāpajjatīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:661_0: Evanti iminā āmisadāyādassa lobhādīnaṃ uppattikkamadassaneneva idha pāḷiyaṃ nesaṃ desanākkamopi dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:661_2: atha kho aññehi ca evarūpehi pāpakehi dhammehi aparimutto hotīti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:661_5: Evaṃ mahādīnavā āmisadāyādatāti tato balavataro saṃvego janetabboti ayamettha ovādo veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:661_8: Nibbisesoyevāti eteneva paṭhamataraṃ idha dassitasaccayojanānayena sabbavāresu yojetabboti veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:662_0: Ñāṇaparicayapāṭavatthanti maggassa aṭṭhaṅgasattaṅgatādivisesavibhāvanāya ñāṇassa āsevanaṭṭhena paricayo ñāṇaparicayo,
tika-s0201t:662_7: kadāci sattaṅgiko”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto puna “ayaṃ hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:662_9: Ettha ca keci jhānadhammā maggasabhāvāti ekantato jhānaṃ maggato visuṃ katvā vattuṃ na sakkāti “lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānasahito”ti
tika-s0201t:662_11: Atha vā lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānavasenāti lokuttarā hutvā paṭhamajjhānassa vasenāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:662_13: sammasitassa vā paṭhamajjhānassa vasena aṭṭhaṅgiko hoti.
tika-s0201t:662_16: pakiṇṇakasaṅkhārānaṃ vā sammasane uppanno ariyamaggo aṭṭhaṅgiko hoti,
tika-s0201t:663_3: evaṃ bojjhaṅgavasena sattaṅgikachaḷaṅgikabhedo veditabbo appītikajjhānavasena chaḷaṅgikattā,
tika-s0201t:663_4: maggavasena pana desanā āgatāti svāyaṃ bhedo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na uddhaṭo.
tika-s0201t:663_5: Ito paranti ito aṭṭhaṅgato paraṃ ukkaṃsato,
tika-s0201t:663_6: avakaṃsato pana sattaṅgato paraṃ maggaṅgaṃ nāma natthīti.
tika-s0201t:663_7: Nanu maggavibhaṅge pañcaṅgikavāre pañceva maggaṅgāni uddhaṭāni,
tika-s0201t:663_13: svāssa hoti sammāsamādhī”ti vatvā pubbabhāgavasena pana “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti sammāvācādayo āgatāti?
tika-s0201t:663_15: taṃ pana sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ kārāpakaṅgānaṃ atirekakiccadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:663_16: tasmā na ariyamaggo sammāvācādivirahito atthīti “ito parañhi maggaṅgaṃ natthī”ti suvuttametanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:664_3: Tassā seṭṭhabhāvena hi “paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:664_12: Tappabhavābhinibbattānipi “tadabhinibbattānī”ti vuccanti kāraṇakāraṇepi kāraṇūpacāratoti āha “tappabhavābhinibbattāni sesaṅgānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:664_20: tasmā “purimaṃ purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa visesapaccayo hotī”ti iminā visesapaccayabhāvadassanatthena
tika-s0201t:664_21: kamena etāni sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṅgāni vuttānīti dassitāni.
tika-s0201t:665_2: Tassa pana pubbabhāge bhāvanānayo kassaci samathapubbaṅgamo hoti,
tika-s0201t:665_13: tatthāpi jhānamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ karontīti katvā vutto.
tika-s0201t:665_14: Vipassanaṃ bhāvayatoti paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ ārabhitvā yathādhigataṃ taruṇavipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa.
tika-s0201t:666_2: Na hi khaṇikasamādhiṃ vinā vipassanā sambhavati.
tika-s0201t:666_4: Tatthajātānanti tasmiṃ ariyamaggakkhaṇe uppannānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:666_7: Vavassaggo vossaggo paṭinissaggoti ca apavaggoti ca atthato ekaṃ,
tika-s0201t:666_11: Ariyamaggo hi ekanta samāhito asamādhānahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchedanato.
tika-s0201t:667_0: Yuganaddhāva honti tadā samādhipaññānaṃ samarasatāya icchitabbato.
tika-s0201t:667_1: Maggakkhaṇe hi na samathabhāvanāyaṃ viya samādhi,
tika-s0201t:667_2: vipassanābhāvanāyaṃ viya ca paññā kiccato adhikā icchitabbā,
tika-s0201t:667_3: samarasatāya pana aññamaññassa anativattanaṭṭhena dvepi yuganaddhā viya pavattanti.
tika-s0201t:670_5: Tattha yassā desanāya nimittabhūto ñātuṃ icchito attho kiṃ-
tika-s0201t:670_7: sā pākaṭā pucchā yathā “kiṃsūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”nti evamādi.
tika-s0201t:670_8: Yassā pana desanāya nimittabhūto ñātuṃ icchito attho kiṃ-
tika-s0201t:670_13: tasmāyeva idha “ye me bho gotamā”tiādikā apākaṭāti “pucchāvasiko nikkhepo”ti.
tika-s0201t:670_15: yasmā so brāhmaṇo “yeme bho gotamā”tiādīni vadanto na tattha kaṅkhī vicikicchī saṃsayamāpanno avoca,
tika-s0201t:670_16: atha kho attanā yathānicchitamatthaṃ bhagavati pasādabhāvabahumānaṃ pavedento kathesi.
tika-s0201t:670_31: Idameva hīti avadhāraṇena “brahmato jātā”tiādikaṃ niruttiṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0201t:671_0: Yena vā kāraṇenāti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:671_3: tasmā nānappakāraguṇavisesādhigamatthā idha upasaṅkamanakiriyāti “annena vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthamevetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:671_4: na karaṇatthaṃ tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ “yena vā kāraṇenā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:672_1: Sampattukāmatāya hi kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃtaṃpadesātikkamanena upasaṅkami,
tika-s0201t:672_8: Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchantoti yathā bhagavā “kacci te brāhmaṇa khamanīyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:672_9: kacci yāpanīya”ntiādinā khamanīyādīni pucchanto tena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi pubbabhāsitāya,
tika-s0201t:672_10: tadanukaraṇena evaṃ sopi brāhmaṇo bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:672_11: Taṃ pana samappavattamodataṃ upamāya dassetuṃ “sītodakaṃ viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:672_14: Khamanīyanti “idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ khaṇabhaṅguratāya sabhāvato dussahaṃ,
tika-s0201t:672_16: Yāpanīyanti paccayāyattavuttikaṃ cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:672_21: Sukhavihārasabbhāvena kacci phāsuvihāro atthīti tattha tattha kacci-
tika-s0201t:673_4: Sammoditabbato sammodanīyanti imaṃ pana atthaṃ dassento “sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:674_1: taṃ pana avakaṃsato ubhinnaṃ pasāritahatthasaṅghaṭṭanena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:675_0: Yemeti ettha sandhivasena ikāralopoti dassento “ye ime”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:675_6: Tena brāhmaṇena adhippetā bhikkhūsu duvidhāpi saṃvijjantīti āha “idha pana dvīhipi kāraṇehi kulaputtāyevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:676_7: Bhikkhanasīlatādilakkhaṇo bhikkhubhāvo pabbajjāsahacaritāya saddhiṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ anvācinantoti āha “pabbajjaṃ bhikkhubhāvañcā”ti.
tika-s0201t:676_8: Kammavācālakkhaṇe pana bhikkhubhāve adhippete samuccayattho ca-
tika-s0201t:676_10: Anagārassa bhāvoti etena pabbajjānissito suvisuddho sīlācāraguṇaviseso gahito,
tika-s0201t:676_21: Diṭṭhānugatinti diṭṭhiyā anugamananti dassento “dassanānugati”nti vatvā sikkhāttayasaṅgahaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ tena diṭṭhattā diṭṭhi,
tika-s0201t:677_1: Devaputte viyātiādi kassaci pārijuññassa abhāvadīpanato “saddhāyā”tiādinā vuttassa pabbajitabhāvassa pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:677_2: Saddhāya gharā nikkhamma pabbajitvāti idaṃ haṭṭhapahaṭṭhādibhāvassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:677_3: Ghāsacchādanaparamatāya santuṭṭheti idaṃ anussaṅkitāparisaṅkitatāya kāraṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:678_5: nipātapadaṃ vā etaṃ “ma”nti iminā samānatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:678_7: saddena najīvikāpakatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti īdisānaṃyevāti saddhāpabbajjāya vibhāvitaanabhijjhāluādisabhāvānaṃyeva,
tika-s0201t:679_2: bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pade padaṃ nikkhipanto,
tika-s0201t:679_3: so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākaṭindriyo,
tika-s0201t:679_4: atha kho ārakāva mama ahañca tassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:680_0: Ajjhogāhetvā adhippetatthaṃ sambhavituṃ sādhetuṃ dukkhānīti durabhisambhavāni.
