tika-s0201t:680_1: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tattha nivāsoyeva dukkhoti dassetuṃ “sambhavituṃ dukkhāni dussahānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:680_4: saddo hi saṇḍabhūte rukkhasamūhepi vattatīti araññaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:680_14: Nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlāti indakhīlato bahi nikkhamitvā,
tika-s0201t:680_16: Bahi indakhīlāti yattha dve tīṇi indakhīlāni,
tika-s0201t:680_20: Yasmā bahi indakhīlato paṭṭhāya manussūpacāre bhayabheravaṃ natthi,
tika-s0201t:681_3: Pantānīti iminā “pariyantāna”nti imassa pariyāyassa idha pāḷiyaṃ gahitattā vuttaṃ “pariyantānanti imamekaṃ pariyāyaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:681_4: Dūrānanti pana ayaṃ pariyāyo ṭhapetabbo siyā tassāpi “pantānī”ti imināva atthato gahitattā,
tika-s0201t:681_5: tathā sati “na manussūpacārāna”nti edisānampi ṭhapetabbatā āpajjati,
tika-s0201t:681_9: rūpādiputhuttārammaṇe pakārato gamanādiiriyāpathappakārehi attano kāyassa vivecanaṃ gacchatopi tiṭṭhatopi nisajjatopi ekasseva pavattati.
tika-s0201t:681_10: Teneva hi vivecetabbānaṃ vivecanākārassa ca bhedato bahuvidhattā te ekattena gahetvā “paviveka”nti ekavacanena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:681_11: Dukkaraṃ pavivekanti vā pavivekaṃ kattuṃ na sukhanti attho.
tika-s0201t:681_16: bhayasantāsuppādanena khādituṃ āgatā yakkharakkhasapisācādayo viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:681_18: Tiṇapaṇṇamigādisaddehīti vāteritānaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādīnaṃ migapakkhiādīnañca bhiṃsanakehi bheravehi saddehi
tika-s0201t:681_19: vividhehi ca aññehi khāṇuādīhi yakkhādiākārehi upaṭṭhitehi bhiṃsanakehi.
tika-s0201t:681_20: Evaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ nāma karonto aho acchariyā eteti vimhito.
tika-s0201t:683_1: Soḷasasu ṭhānesūti “ye kho kecī”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ vakkhamānesu soḷasasu kāraṇesu.
tika-s0201t:683_2: Aparisuddhakāyakammantatādayo araññe viharantānaṃ cittutrāsanimittatāya visesato vikkhepāvahā,
tika-s0201t:683_7: Ārammaṇapariggaharahitānanti aparisuddhakāyakammantādikassa araññe diṭṭhassa tassa ārammaṇassa “ye kho
tika-s0201t:684_7: Niyatabhāvappattito paṭṭhāya mahāsattā yathā mahābodhiyānapaṭipadā hānabhāgiyā,
tika-s0201t:684_9: atha kho visesabhāgiyā nibbedhabhāgiyā ca hoti,
tika-s0201t:684_10: tathā paṭipajjanato bodhiyaṃ ninnagoṇapabbhārā evāti āha “bodhiyā vā sattasseva laggassevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:687_0: Imesaṃ abhinīhārassa aṅgabhūtānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ dhammānaṃ samodhānena samavadhānena.
tika-s0201t:688_3: Jātimattena idha brāhmaṇāti adhippetāti āha “bhovādino vā”ti.
tika-s0201t:688_11: Na hi pāṇātipātādiko tassa pubbabhāgapayogo ca koci parisuddho nāma atthi.
tika-s0201t:688_23: Sayaṃ parikappitabhayānakārammaṇanimittaṃ cittutrāsasamuppādanavasena ānentā bhayabheravaṃ avhāyanti viya hontīti vuttaṃ “avhāyantīti pakkosantī”ti.
tika-s0201t:688_30: Baddhā vadhitā viyāti baddhā hutvā tāḷiyamānā viya.
tika-s0201t:689_0: “Na kho panāti ettha khoti avadhāraṇatthe nipāto,
tika-s0201t:689_2: Tenetaṃ dasseti “aññe samaṇabrāhmaṇā viya ahaṃ aparisuddhakāyakammanto hutvā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni na kho pana paṭisevāmi,
tika-s0201t:689_6: Tesamahaṃ aññataroti tāya parisuddhakāyakammatāya tesaṃ ariyānaṃ ahaṃ aññataroti kāyakammapārisuddhiyā mahāsatto attānaṃ ariyesu pakkhipati.
tika-s0201t:689_9: yato māro randhagavesī hutvā chabbassāni nirantaraṃ anubandho antaraṃ na labhati. Tenāha –
tika-s0201t:692_3: abhītātasitā pana bhayūpaddavābhāvato ahaṭṭhalomā khemena sotthinā tiṭṭhantīti tesaṃ khemappatti sotthibhāvo
tika-s0201t:692_4: vā pannalomatāya pākaṭo hotīti pāḷiyaṃ “palloma”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:692_6: Ettha ca bhiyyo pallomamāpādiṃ araññe vihārāyāti paṭiññāniddeso.
tika-s0201t:692_9: Ye kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vāti visadisūdāharaṇadassanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:695_3: saddena pana saṅgahitaṃ tesañca musāvādādīnaṃ pavattibhedaṃ bhayabheravāvhānamukhena dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:696_1: Uppādetvāti attano pariṇāmavasena abhijjhāsaṅkhātaṃ visamalobhaṃ uppādetvā.
tika-s0201t:696_4: te idāni anubandhitvā”tiādinā pacchā āsaṅkuppatti siyā.
tika-s0201t:696_6: vināsaṃ kātukāmā maññe”ti yathā pare parato tesaṃ abhijjhābyāpādappavattiṃ pariggaṇhanti,
tika-s0201t:696_7: tādisaṃ manokammantaṃ sandhāya “te paresa”ntiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:696_9: tadā pana te cetanāpakkhikā vā abbohārikā vāti manokammantavāre eva abhijjhādivasena yojanā katā.
tika-s0201t:696_10: Atha vā dvārantare pavattānampi pāṇātipātādīnaṃ vacīkammādibhāvābhāvo viya dvārantare pavattānampi abhijjhādīnaṃ kāyakammādibhāvābhāvo,
tika-s0201t:696_11: manokammabhāvo eva pana siddhoti katvā manokammantavāre eva abhijjhādayo uddhaṭā.
tika-s0201t:699_0: Kiñcāpi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sāsane pabbajitavasena ājīvavāre bhayabheravāvhānaṃ yojitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:699_1: “ye kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā”ti pana vacanato bāhirakavasena gahaṭṭhavasena ca yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:699_3: tāya eva ca ājīvavipattiyā aññathā vā nesaṃ araññavāso sambhaveyyāti.
tika-s0201t:700_1: Evaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlavasena bhayabheravaṃ dassetvā tato paraṃ nīvaraṇappahānādivasena taṃ dassetuṃ desanā
tika-s0201t:700_4: evaṃ sīlavisuddhimattampi araññe viharato bhayabheravābhāvaṃ āvahati,
tika-s0201t:700_6: upacārasamādhimeva vā sampādayatoti samādhisampadāya bhayabheravābhāvahetukaṃ dassetuṃ upari desanā vaḍḍhitāti
tika-s0201t:700_7: akusalamanokammantabhāvena gahitāpi abhijjhābyāpādā nīvaraṇavasena puna vuttāti adhippāyo. Abhi-
tika-s0201t:700_14: Te hi lobhābhibhūtā puggalā attani tibbasāpekkhatāya eva lobhābhibhūtatāya avavatthitārammaṇā avinicchitavisayā
tika-s0201t:700_15: araññe taṃ taṃ visayaṃ anupadhāritvā viharanti,
tika-s0201t:700_22: evaṃ taṃ bhayabheravaṃ attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti pakkosantīti yojanaṃ sandhāyāha “sesaṃ tādisamevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:700_23: “Anabhijjhāluhamasmī”ti pāḷipade ciraparicitaalobhajjhāsayatāya kamaladale jalabindu viya alaggamānasattā sabbattha anapekkhohamasmīti attho.
tika-s0201t:701_2: Sāvajjadhammasamuppattiyā hi cittassa anavajjabhāvo jahito hotīti.
tika-s0201t:701_10: Sabbatthāti heṭṭhā upari cāti sabbattha ṭhānesu vaṇṇetabbā.
tika-s0201t:702_1: “Yā cittassa akallatā akammaññatā”ti vacanato thinaṃ cittassa gelaññabhāvena gahaṇaṃ gacchatīti āha “cittagelaññabhūtena thinenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:702_2: Tathā “yā kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā”ti vacanato middhaṃ visesato nāmakāyassa gelaññabhāvena gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:702_5: Idañca middhaṃ rūpakāyassapi gelaññāvahanti daṭṭhabbaṃ niddāya hetubhāvato.
tika-s0201t:703_5: Kukkuccaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati saṃvaṇṇanāvasena pacchānutāpassapi cittassa avūpasamakarattā.
tika-s0201t:704_1: Ekamevidaṃ pañcamaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ yadidaṃ kaṅkhā vicikicchāti ca.
tika-s0201t:704_2: Yadi evaṃ kasmā dvidhā katvā vuttanti āha “kiṃ nu kho”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:705_1: Evaṃ nīvaraṇābhāvakittanamukhena samādhisampadāya bhayabheravābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni attukkaṃsanādiabhāvakittanamukhena
tika-s0201t:705_2: paññāsampadāya bhayabheravābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “ye kho kecī”tiādinā upari desanā vaḍḍhitā,
tika-s0201t:705_7: attukkaṃsakavāre kiñci visadisaṃ atthīti taṃ dassetuṃ “te katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:706_7: citte ca kāye ca thaddhabhāvassa uppādanavasena “chambho bhīrutā”ti ca vuccatīti taṃsamaṅgino samaṇabrāhmaṇā “chambhī bhīrukajātikā”ti vuttā,
tika-s0201t:707_3: Tadatthadīpakanti lābhādiṃ pahāya araññe vasato bhayabheravāvhāyanaṃ natthīti dīpakaṃ.
tika-s0201t:707_4: So kira lābhagarutāyeva piyo gāmo etassāti “piyagāmiko”ti nāmaṃ labhati.
tika-s0201t:707_5: Kammamuttoti jarājiṇṇattā kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti sāmikehi vissaṭṭho.
tika-s0201t:708_1: Alasabhāvena sammāvāyāmassa akaraṇato kucchitaṃ sīdantīti kusītā.
tika-s0201t:708_9: Nisajja sayitvā ca kammaṭṭhānamanasikāravasena pavattavīriyaṃ cetasikavīriyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:708_12: Te hi hīnavīriyā alasatāyeva ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṃ na sakkonti.
tika-s0201t:709_2: paccayavekallena vijjamānāyapi satiyā satikiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:709_9: tattha kasmā saṃkilesapakkhe paññā gahitāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “imassa cā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:709_12: paññā panettha cuddasame vāre kevalā sati dubbalāti satidubbalyadīpanatthaṃ “asampajānā”ti paṭikkhepamukhena vuttā.
tika-s0201t:709_13: Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “duvidhā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:710_7: idha samādhānābhāvena uddhaccahetuko cittavibbhamo vutto “asamāhitā vibbhantacittā”ti,
tika-s0201t:710_9: Pubbe vuttanayenāti pubbe “uddhaccena hi ekārammaṇe cittaṃ vipphandati dhajayaṭṭhiyaṃ vātena paṭākā viyā”ti vuttanayena.
tika-s0201t:710_10: Sabbaṃ pubbasadisamevāti bhayabheravāvhāyanassa abhijjhāluvāre vuttasadisataṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0201t:711_4: duppaṭipanno”tiādīsu viya garahatthoti dassetuṃ “nippaññānametaṃ adhivacana”nti vatvā “paññā pana duṭṭhā nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:711_10: Duppaññā ca kathentā sadosameva kathaṃ kathenti apaṇḍitabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:711_12: Tasmā elasabbhāvato elaṃ mukhaṃ etesanti elamūgāti vuttāti evampi vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:711_14: taṃ byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ “no ca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:711_15: Nanu ca bodhisattā bahulavipassanāpaññāya samannāgatā hontīti? Honti,
tika-s0201t:711_16: tadā pana bodhisattena na vipassanārambho kato,
tika-s0201t:711_17: no ca vipassanāpaññā adhippetāti vuttaṃ “no ca kho vipassanāpaññāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:712_0: Keci panettha “saddhāvirahitā aparisuddhakāyakammantādayo viya bhayabheravāvhāyanassa visesakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:712_1: nāpi saddhālutā pallomatāyāti saddhāvāro anuddhaṭo”ti vadanti,
tika-s0201t:712_3: Kammaphale hi saddahanto kammapaṭisaraṇataṃyeva nissāya bhayabheravaṃ tiṇāyapi amaññamāno pallomatamāpajjeyya.
tika-s0201t:712_4: Yasmā pana vīriyādayo saddhāya vinā nappavattantīti tesaṃ upanissayabhūtā sahajātā ca sā taggahaṇeneva gahitā hotīti visuṃ na uddhaṭā.
tika-s0201t:712_5: Tathā hi sā jhānassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāyampi na uddhaṭā,
tika-s0201t:712_7: addhā sā imasmiṃ ārammaṇapariggahaṭṭhāne na gahetabbāva,
tika-s0201t:712_9: evaṃ aññesupi edisesu ṭhānesu nicchayo kātabbo.
tika-s0201t:716_2: Evarūpāsu rattīsūti cātuddasīādikā upari vakkhamānā rattiyo sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0201t:716_4: Yāti aniyamato uddiṭṭhānaṃ puna “tā”ti vacanaṃ niddeso viya hotīti vuttaṃ “yā tāti ubhayametaṃ rattīnaṃyeva uddesaniddesavacana”nti.
tika-s0201t:716_5: Abhīti lakkhaṇatthe “aññe ca abhiññātā brāhmaṇamahāsālā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0201t:717_1: Yasmā codako bhagavato kāle anabhilakkhitāpi aparabhāge abhilakkhitā jātā,
tika-s0201t:717_2: tasmā taṃ abhilakkhaṇīyataṃ upādāya “sabbadassinā bhagavatā pañcamī kasmā na gahitā”ti codeti,
tika-s0201t:717_3: itaro sabbakālikāsu cātuddasīādīsu gayhamānāsu asabbakālikāya kathaṃ gahaṇanti adhippāyena “asabbakālikattā”ti pariharati.
tika-s0201t:718_3: Manussā yebhuyyena gāmādīnaṃ dvāresu tathārūpe rukkhe cetiyaṭṭhāniye katvā voharantīti āha “gāmanigamādidvāresū”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:718_4: Dassanamattenapi savanamattenapi bhayuppādanena pākatikasatte bhiṃsentīti bhiṃsanakāni.
tika-s0201t:719_9: Moraggahaṇañcettha upalakkhaṇanti dassento āha “idha sabbapakkhigahaṇaṃ adhippeta”nti.
tika-s0201t:719_10: Esa nayoti idaṃ yathā “moro vā”ti ettha vā-
tika-s0201t:719_12: evaṃ “migo vā”ti etthāpīti migasaddassa visesatthavuttitaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0201t:719_13: Ito pabhūtīti “yaṃnūnāhaṃ yā tā rattiyo”tiādinā bhayabheravassa gavesanacintanato pabhuti,
tika-s0201t:719_15: “Appeva nāmāhaṃ bhayabheravaṃ passeyya”nti etthāpi hi ārammaṇameva bhayabheravaṃ.
tika-s0201t:719_16: Sukhārammaṇaṃ rūpaṃ sukhamiva “rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkanta”ntiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:719_17: Kathaṃ bhayaggahaṇena ca rūpārammaṇaggahaṇanti āha “parittassa cā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:719_18: “Āgacchatī”ti vacanato gavesanārambhato pabhuti “etaṃ bhaya”nti ārammaṇaṃ adhippetanti keci “taṃ na passeyya”nti cakkhunā dassanassa adhippetattā,
tika-s0201t:719_20: Bhayaṃ ākaṅkhamānoti upaparikkhanavasena ahaṃ bhayavatthuṃ ākaṅkhanto viharāmi,
tika-s0201t:720_1: so panettha pakāro iriyāpathavasena yutto pāḷiyaṃ tathā āgatattāti āha “yena yena iriyāpathena bhūtassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:720_2: Bhavitassāti idaṃ “bhūtassā”ti iminā samānatthaṃ padanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:720_3: “Samaṅgībhūtassā”ti padaṃ purimapadalopena bhūtassāti vuttanti dassento “samaṅgībhūtassa vā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:720_5: Neva mahāsatto tiṭṭhatītiādi “tathābhūto ca taṃ paṭivineyya”nti yathā cintitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:720_21: Bhikkhussa pana iriyāpathā sampattapaṭipāṭiyā viya aparāparuppattivasena vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:723_1: Ayañca me sabbaso bhayabheravābhāvo visesato asammohadhammattāti dassetuṃ “santi kho panā”tiādinā upari desanā vaḍḍhitāti ayaṃ vā ettha anusandhi.
tika-s0201t:723_2: Jhāyīnaṃ sammohaṭṭhānesūti iminā ajjhāyīnaṃ sammohaṭṭhānesu vattabbameva natthīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:723_3: Atthīti idaṃ nipātapadaṃ puthuvacanampi hoti “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”tiādīsu viyāti “santī”ti padassa atthadassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:723_6: mahati lokasannivāse edisāpi saṃvijjanti ñāṇena gahetabbatāya upalabbhantīti.
tika-s0201t:723_8: Evaṃ hissa samantato āloko viya upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0201t:723_11: no ca kho addhānaparicchede kusalo hoti,
tika-s0201t:725_0: Pākaṭo bodhisattassa rattindivaparicchedo antamaso lavatuṭikhaṇassapi upādāya suvavatthitattā,
tika-s0201t:725_1: tathā rattidivasakoṭṭhāsaparicchedo attanā kātabbakiccavasena kālañāṇavasena ca.
tika-s0201t:726_3: Yāmayantaṃ patati aññehi bhikkhūhi yojitanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:727_0: Yaṃ kho tanti ettha yanti aniyamuddeso,
tika-s0201t:727_7: Paññāsampattiyāti yāthāvato hitassa jānanasamatthena attano paññāguṇena,
tika-s0201t:727_11: Upakaraṇehi vinā na kadāci bhogasukhaṃ upakaraṇadānañca cāgasampattihetukanti āha “cāgasampattiyā…pe…
tika-s0201t:727_16: atha kasmā puna taṃ gahitanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “idha devamanussaggahaṇenā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:727_18: idāni visesato saha payojanena tāni dassitānīti dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:727_19: Nibbānato paro paramo attho nāma natthīti āha “paramatthattāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:727_21: Ukkaṃsato sukhatthaṃ ariyaphalanti āha “tato uttari sukhābhāvato”ti.
tika-s0201t:731_3: Paggahitanti ārambhaṃ sithilaṃ akatvā daḷhaparakkamasaṅkhātussahanabhāvena gahitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:732_0: Upaṭṭhitāti ogāhanasaṅkhātena apilāpanabhāvena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0201t:732_2: Sammosassa viddhaṃsanavasena pavattiyā na sammuṭṭhāti asammuṭṭhā.
tika-s0201t:732_3: Kiñcāpi cittamiva cittapassaddhivasena kāyapassaddhivaseneva kāyo passaddho hoti,
tika-s0201t:732_4: tathāpi yasmā kāyapassaddhi uppajjamānā cittapassaddhiyā saheva uppajjati, na vinā,
tika-s0201t:732_6: Rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hoti kāyapassaddhiyā ubhayesampi kāyānaṃ passambhanāvahattā.
tika-s0201t:732_9: Nāmakāye hi vigatadarathe rūpakāyopi vūpasantadarathapariḷāho hoti.
tika-s0201t:732_10: Sammā āhitanti nānārammaṇesu vidhāvanasaṅkhātavikkhepaṃ vicchinditvā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe avikkhittabhāvāpādānena sammadeva āhitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:732_13: sā sati ekaggatāya na hotīti āha “ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandana”nti.
tika-s0201t:732_15: Nanu ca saddhāpaññānampi kiccasiddhi jhānassa pubbapaṭipadāya icchitabbāti?
tika-s0201t:732_17: sā pana nānantariyabhāvena avuttasiddhāti na gahitā.
tika-s0201t:732_19: paññāpariggahe ca nesaṃ asati paññāyārambhādibhāvo na siyā.
tika-s0201t:732_20: Tathā asallīnāsammosatādayo vīriyādīnanti asallīnatādiggahaṇenevettha paññākiccasiddhi gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:732_21: Jhānabhāvanāyaṃ vā samādhikiccaṃ adhikaṃ icchitabbanti dassetuṃ samādhipariyosānāva jhānassa pubbapaṭipadā kathitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:733_2: Visuddhimaggo hi imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya ekadesabhūtoti vuttovāyamatthoti.
tika-s0201t:733_6: Rūpavirāgabhāvanāvasena pavatto catubbidhopi arūpajjhānaviseso catutthajjhānasaṅgaho evāti āha “cattāri jhānānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:733_7: Yuttaṃ tāva cittekaggatā bhavokkamanatthatā viya vipassanāpādakatāpi catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ sādhāraṇāti tesaṃ vasena “cattāri jhānānī”ti vacanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:733_8: abhiññāpādakatā pana nirodhapādakatā ca catutthasseva jhānassa āveṇikā,
tika-s0201t:733_9: sā kathaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ sādhāraṇā vuttāti?
tika-s0201t:733_13: evañca katvā payojananiddese aṭṭhasamāpattiggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:734_0: Yasmā bodhisattena bodhimaṇḍūpasaṅkamanato pubbepi carimabhave catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattitapubbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:734_6: Buddhānañhi paṭhamārambhe eva pādakajjhānena payojanaṃ ahosi,
tika-s0201t:734_8: Abhisambodhisamadhigamato paṭṭhāya hi sabbaṃ ñāṇasamādhikiccaṃ ākaṅkhamattapaṭibaddhamevāti.
tika-s0201t:734_10: Sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇadāyakanti ettha vipassanābhiññāpādakattā eva catutthassa jhānassa bhagavato sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇadāyakatā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:734_13: tadadhigamasamakālameva bhagavato sabbe buddhaguṇā hatthagatā ahesuṃ,
tika-s0201t:737_7: saddena ānetvā vuccamāne tadattho pākaṭo hotīti “so aha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:737_8: Abhinīharinti cittaṃ jhānārammaṇato apanetvā pubbenivāsābhimukhaṃ pesesiṃ,
tika-s0201t:738_1: Nivutthāti ca ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā,
tika-s0201t:738_6: Paṭinivattantassāti pubbenivāsaṃ anussaraṇavasena yāvadicchakaṃ gantvā paccāgacchantassa.
tika-s0201t:738_15: Mahābodhisattānaṃ santānassa pariyosānāvatthāya devalokūpapattijanakaṃ nāma akusalena kammunā anupaddutameva
tika-s0201t:738_17: Mahāpuññānampi pana devaputtānaṃ pubbanimittuppattikālādīsu aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogo hotiyevāti “kadāci
tika-s0201t:738_18: dukkhadukkhassapi sambhavo natthī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0201t:739_0: Atītabhave khandhā tappaṭibaddhanāmagottāni ca sabbaṃ pubbenivāsanteva saṅgahitanti āha “kiṃ viditaṃ karoti?
tika-s0201t:739_7: Avijjā vihatāti etena vijjanaṭṭhena vijjāti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:739_8: Yasmā vijjā uppannāti etena vijjāpaṭipakkhā avijjā,
tika-s0201t:739_9: paṭipakkhatā cassā pahātabbabhāvena vijjāya ca pahāyakabhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:739_10: Esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvayeti iminā tamo vihato vinaṭṭho. Kasmā?
tika-s0201t:739_13: Yathā appamattassāti aññassapi kassaci mādisassāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:742_5: kasiṇārammaṇaṃ abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ sabbākārena abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā”tiādinā ca vuttena parikammena kiccaṃ payojanaṃ natthi.
tika-s0201t:742_6: Na tena idha atthoti tena bhāvanānayena idha pāḷiyā atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ attho natthi tathābhāvanāya idha anadhippetattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:745_5: sā “ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ avasesarūpārūpajjhānānaṃ aññatarato vuṭṭhāyā”tiādinā anekadhā arūpamukhavasena
tika-s0201t:745_6: catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānaṃ aññataramukhavasena anekadhāva visuddhimagge
tika-s0201t:745_8: Mahābodhisattānaṃ pana catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena pabhedagamanato nānānayaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasannissayassa
tika-s0201t:745_9: ariyamaggañāṇassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pubbabhāgañāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ paramagambhīrasaṇhasukhumataraṃ
tika-s0201t:745_12: Yassa ca pavattivibhāgena catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassappabhedassa pādakabhāvena samāpajjiyamānā catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā
tika-s0201t:745_14: svāyaṃ buddhānaṃ vipassanācāro paramatthamañjūsāya visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāya uddesato dassito,
tika-s0201t:746_3: Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇanti dassento “tatra cetaṃ ñāṇa”nti vatvā khayeti ca ādhāre bhummaṃ,
tika-s0201t:746_5: Idaṃ dukkhanti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa tadā paccakkhato gahitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:746_6: Ettakaṃ dukkhanti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa tadā paccakkhato gahitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:746_11: Asammohapaṭivedhoti ca yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0201t:746_14: Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvāti yaṃ nibbānaṃ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma.
tika-s0201t:746_15: Tadubhayavato hi puggalassa patti tadubhayassa pattīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:746_18: Te vā nappavattanti etthāti appavatti, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:747_7: Tathā hi āsavavimutti sīseneva sabbasaṃkilesavimutti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:747_8: “Idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsi”ntiādinā missakamaggo idha kathitoti “saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ kathetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:747_9: Ettha ca saccapaṭivedhassa tadā atītakālikattā “yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsi”nti vatvāpi abhisamayakāle tassa
tika-s0201t:747_10: paccuppannataṃ upādāya “evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato”ti vattamānakālena niddeso kato.
tika-s0201t:747_11: So ca kāmaṃ maggakkhaṇato paraṃ yāvajjatanā atītakāliko eva,
tika-s0201t:747_12: sabbapaṭhamaṃ panassa atītakālikattaṃ phalakkhaṇena veditabbanti āha “vimuccitthāti iminā phalakkhaṇaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:747_14: Jānanahetu dassanahetu kāmāsavā cittaṃ vimuccitthāti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:747_15: Bhavāsavaggahaṇeneva cettha bhavarāgassa viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi samavarodhoti diṭṭhāsavassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:748_3: Na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā maggabhāvanāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:748_6: Na anāgatāti ca anāgatattasāmaññaṃ gahetvā lesena codeti.
tika-s0201t:748_11: Ekacatupañcavokārabhavesūti bhavattayaggahaṇaṃ vuttanayena anavasesato jātiyā khīṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:749_0: Brahmacariyavāso nāma idha maggabrahmacariyassa nibbattanamevāti āha “niṭṭhita”nti.
tika-s0201t:749_1: Sammādiṭṭhiyā catūsu saccesu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena pavattamānāya sammā saṅkappādīnampi dukkhasacce pariññābhisamayānuguṇā pavatti,
tika-s0201t:749_2: itarasaccesu ca nesaṃ pahānābhisamayādivasena pavatti pākaṭā eva.
tika-s0201t:749_7: Te pana pakārā ariyamaggabyāpārabhūtā pariññādayo idhādhippetāti āha “evaṃsoḷasakiccabhāvāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:749_8: Te hi maggaṃ paccavekkhato maggānubhāvena pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0201t:749_9: pariññādīsu ca pahānameva padhānaṃ tadatthattā itaresanti āha “kilesakkhayāyavā”ti.
tika-s0201t:749_14: Pariññātā tiṭṭhantīti etena tesaṃ appatiṭṭhataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:749_18: āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā,
tika-s0201t:750_4: Pubbenivāsañāṇena atītārammaṇasabhāgatāya tabbhāvībhāvato ca atītaṃsañāṇaṃ saṅgahetvāti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:750_5: Tattha atītaṃsañāṇanti atītakhandhāyatanadhātusaṅkhāte atītakoṭṭhāse appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:750_9: Sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇanti etena sabbaṃ lokaṃ uttaritvā abhibhuyya ṭhitattā sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya
tika-s0201t:750_10: sesāsādhāraṇañāṇassa balañāṇaāveṇikabuddhadhammādīnampi anaññasādhāraṇānaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:753_1: Siyā kho pana te brāhmaṇāti ettha siyāti “appevā”ti iminā samānattho nipāto,
tika-s0201t:753_3: appeva kho pana te evamassā’ti attho.
tika-s0201t:753_5: tampi imamevatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ akāraṇaṃ brāhmaṇena parikappitamatthaṃ paṭipakkhipitvā attano adhippetaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento.
tika-s0201t:753_6: Atthova phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti atthavaso,
tika-s0201t:753_7: hetūti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:753_8: Attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti etena satthā attano vivekābhiratiṃ pakāsetīti dassento “diṭṭhadhammo nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:753_10: Tappavattiyo hi ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe uppannadukkhaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā haraṇato vihārāti vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:753_11: Pacchimañca janataṃ anukampamānoti etena yo ādito brāhmaṇena “bhavaṃ tesaṃ gotamo pubbaṅgamo…pe…
tika-s0201t:753_13: yo ca tathā “evametaṃ brāhmaṇā”tiādinā attanā sampaṭicchito,
tika-s0201t:753_14: tameva atthaṃ nigamanavasena dassento yathānusandhināva satthā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
tika-s0201t:756_1: Evaṃ niṭṭhāpitāya desanāya brāhmaṇo tattha bhagavati pasādaṃ pavedento “abhikkanta”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:756_6: Tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha “sundare dissatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:757_8: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti dasapi disā obhāsento pabhāsento,
tika-s0201t:757_9: cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti gāthāya attho.
tika-s0201t:759_3: taṃ pana bhagavato vacanaṃ dhammassa desanāti katvā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:759_10: tesu padhānabhūtā dassetabbāti te padhānabhūte tāva dassetuṃ “saddhājananato paññājananato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:760_4: uttarābhimukho vā gacchā”tiādīni avatvā hatthe gahetvā “nissandehaṃ esa maggo,
tika-s0201t:761_0: Nikujjitaṃ ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ bhājanaṃ ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ukkujjeyya.
tika-s0201t:761_2: adhomukhaṭṭhapitatāya asaddhamme patitanti evaṃ padadvayaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:761_10: Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha micchattadhammā micchāmaggo.
tika-s0201t:761_11: Teneva hi tadubhayapaṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya “saggamokkhamaggaṃ ācikkhantenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:764_3: Parāyaṇabhāvo ca anatthanisedhanena atthasampaṭipādanena ca hotīti āha “aghassa tātā hitassa ca vidhātā”ti.
tika-s0201t:764_7: Ettha ca nāyaṃ gami- saddo nī-
tika-s0201t:764_10: evaṃ “gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vattuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0201t:764_15: tathā jānanaṃ vāti dassento “iti iminā adhippāyenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:764_16: Tattha bhajāmītiādīsu purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ atthavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:764_19: payirupāsanaṃ vattapaṭivattakaraṇena upaṭṭhānanti evaṃ sabbathāpi anaññasaraṇataṃyeva dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:765_2: na maggaṭṭhāti te dassento “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne cā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:765_3: Nanu ca kalyāṇaputhujjanopi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjatīti vuccatīti?
tika-s0201t:765_5: nippariyāyena pana maggaṭṭhā eva tathā vattabbā,
tika-s0201t:765_7: Tathā hi te eva “apāyesu apatamāne dhāretī”ti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:765_18: nibbānaṃ tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyāti ubhayamevettha nippariyāyena dhammoti vutto.
tika-s0201t:765_20: ariyaphalānaṃ “yasmā tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā”tiādivacanato maggena samucchinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānakiccatāya
tika-s0201t:765_22: Pariyattidhammassa pana niyyānadhammasamadhigamahetutāyāti iminā pariyāyena dhammabhāvo labbhati eva,
tika-s0201t:766_0: Kāmarāgo bhavarāgoti evamādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati pahīyati etenāti rāgavirāgoti maggo kathito.
tika-s0201t:766_1: Ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa sokassa ca taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā anejamasokanti phalaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:767_0: Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātenāti “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya,
tika-s0201t:767_1: tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā,
tika-s0201t:767_2: “yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni,
tika-s0201t:767_3: tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ sīlānañca saṃhatabhāvena,
tika-s0201t:767_6: Ariyapuggalā hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano guṇasāmaggiyā saṃhatā eva.
tika-s0201t:767_7: Aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā teti te purisayugavasena cattāropi puggalavasena aṭṭheva ariyadhammassa paccakkhadassāvitāya dhammadasā.
tika-s0201t:767_8: Tīṇi vatthūni saraṇanti gamanena tikkhattuṃ gamanena ca tīṇi saraṇagamanāni.
tika-s0201t:770_0: Saraṇagamanassa visayapabhedaphalasaṃkilesabhedānaṃ viya kattu ca vibhāvanā tattha kosallāya hotīti “saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṃ saraṇaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:770_1: veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ tena vinā saraṇagamanasseva asambhavato.
tika-s0201t:770_5: taṃ pana saṃkilesaggahaṇeneva atthato dīpitaṃ hotīti na gahitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:770_10: saddassa vasenetaṃ padaṃ daṭṭhabbanti “hiṃsatīti saraṇa”nti vatvā taṃ pana hiṃsanaṃ kesaṃ, kathaṃ,
tika-s0201t:770_14: Teneva cetasikadukkhassa gahitattā dukkhanti idha kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:770_16: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ parato phalakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0201t:771_0: Evaṃ avisesato saraṇasaddassa atthaṃ dassetvā idāni visesato dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:771_4: Ahitā ca nivattanenāti “pāṇātipātassa kho pāpako vipāko pāpakaṃ abhisamparāya”ntiādinā ādīnavadassanādimukhena anatthato vinivattanena.
tika-s0201t:771_5: Bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti hitāhitesu appavattipavattihetukaṃ byasanaṃ appavattikaraṇena vināseti.
tika-s0201t:771_7: itaro assāsadānena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:771_8: Kārānanti dānavasena pūjāvasena ca upanītānaṃ sakkārānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:771_9: Vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:771_10: Imināpi pariyāyenāti imināpi vibhajitvā vuttena kāraṇena.
tika-s0201t:772_2: suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti evaṃ pavatto tattha ratanattaye pasādo tappasādo,
tika-s0201t:772_5: tappasādo ca taggarutā ca tappasādataggarutā, tāhi.
tika-s0201t:772_7: “Tadeva ratanattayaṃ parāyaṇaṃ gati tāṇaṃ leṇa”nti evaṃ ākārena pavattiyā tapparāyaṇatākārapavatto cittuppādo
tika-s0201t:772_10: Evaṃ upetīti evaṃ bhajati sevati payirupāsati,
tika-s0201t:772_11: evaṃ vā jānāti bujjhatīti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:772_16: Ariyā hi ratanattayaṃ guṇābhiññātāya pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garuṃ katvā passanti,
tika-s0201t:772_17: tasmā tappasādena vikkhambhanavasena vihatakileso taggarutāya samucchedavasenāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:772_18: Tapparāyaṇatā panettha taggatikatāti tāya catubbidhampi vakkhamānaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:772_19: Avisesena vā pasādagarutā jotitāti pasādaggahaṇena aveccappasādassa itarassa ca gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:772_20: tathā garutāgahaṇenāti ubhayenapi ubhayaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:773_1: Nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvāti etena atthato catusaccādhigamoyeva lokuttaraṃ saraṇagamananti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:773_8: na lokiyaṃ viya paṭipāṭiyā asammohapaṭivedhena paṭividdhattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:773_9: Ye pana vadanti “na saraṇagamanaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā pavattati,
tika-s0201t:773_10: maggassa adhigatattā pana adhigatameva hoti ekaccānaṃ tevijjādīnaṃ lokiyavijjādayo viyā”ti,
tika-s0201t:773_16: Saddhāmūlikāti yathāvuttasaddhāpubbaṅgamā sammādiṭṭhi buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipatiñca
tika-s0201t:773_18: “Saddhāmūlikā sammādiṭṭhī”ti etena saddhūpanissayā yathāvuttalakkhaṇā paññā lokiyasaraṇagamananti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:773_19: Tenāha “diṭṭhijukammanti vuccatī”ti “diṭṭhi eva attano paccayehi ujuṃ karīyatī”ti katvā.
tika-s0201t:773_20: Diṭṭhi vā ujuṃ karīyati etenāti diṭṭhijukammaṃ,
tika-s0201t:773_22: Evañca katvā “tapparāyaṇatākārapavatto cittuppādo”ti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:773_24: “Saddhāpaṭilābho”ti iminā mātādīhi ussāhitadārakādīnaṃ viya ñāṇavippayuttasaraṇagamanaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:774_1: Attā sanniyyātīyati appīyati pariccajīyati etenāti attasanniyyātanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:774_3: Taṃ ratanattayaṃ parāyaṇaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ etassāti tapparāyaṇo, puggalo,
tika-s0201t:774_7: Saraṇanti adhippāyena sissabhāvaṃ antevāsikabhāvaṃ upagacchati etenāti sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:774_12: Buddhādīnaṃyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ itaresupi saraṇagamanavisesesu yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:775_0: Evaṃ attasanniyātanādīni ekena pakārena dassetvā idāni aparehipi pakārehi dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:775_1: Tena pariyāyantarehipi attasanniyyātanādi katameva hoti atthassa abhinnattāti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:775_6: Maggenāgatasaraṇagamanehipi “so ahaṃ vicarissāmi gāmā gāma”ntiādinā tehi tapparāyaṇatākārassa paveditattā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:776_1: vasenāti ettha ñātivasena bhayavasena ācariyavasena dakkhiṇeyyavasenāti paccekaṃ “vasenā”ti padaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:776_6: Itarehītiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:776_9: Samparāyikañhi niyyānikaṃ vā anusāsanaṃ paccāsīsanto dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātameva karotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:778_8: Sukhato upagaccheyyāti “ekantasukhī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā”ti evaṃ attadiṭṭhivasena sukhato gāhaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:778_9: Diṭṭhivippayuttacittena pana ariyasāvako pariḷāhavūpasamanatthaṃ mattahatthiparittāsito viya cokkhabrāhmaṇo
tika-s0201t:778_12: Imesupi vāresu catubhūmakavaseneva paricchedo veditabbo tebhūmakavaseneva vā.
tika-s0201t:778_18: Kiṃ pana ariyasāvako aññaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti?
tika-s0201t:778_20: puthujjanabhāvassa pana mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ ariyasāvakassa phaladīpanatthañcevaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:778_22: Lohitaṃ uppādeyyāti jīvamānakasarīre khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeyya.
tika-s0201t:778_23: Saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti samānasaṃvāsakaṃ samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitaṃ saṅghaṃ ‘kammena uddesena voharanto anussāvanena
tika-s0201t:778_24: salākaggāhenā”ti evaṃ vuttehi pañcahi kāraṇehi bhindeyya.
tika-s0201t:778_25: Aññaṃ satthāranti aññaṃ titthakaraṃ “ayaṃ me satthā”ti evaṃ gaṇheyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:779_0: Na te gamissanti apāyabhūminti te buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā tannimittaṃ apāyabhūmiṃ na gamissanti,
tika-s0201t:780_4: hatthisahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā assasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā rathasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā dhenusahassānaṃ
tika-s0201t:780_5: caturāsītiyā kaññāsahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā pallaṅkasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā vatthakoṭisahassānaṃ aparimāṇassa
tika-s0201t:780_6: ca khajjabhojjādibhedassa āhārassa pariccajanavasena sattamāsādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni nirantaraṃ
tika-s0201t:780_8: tato sataṃ sotāpannānaṃ dinnadānato ekassa sakadāgāmissa,
tika-s0201t:780_15: tato saraṇagamanaṃ mahapphalatara”nti imamatthaṃ dīpentassa velāmasuttassa vasena.
tika-s0201t:781_0: Aññāṇaṃ vatthuttayassa guṇānaṃ ajānanaṃ tattha sammoho,
tika-s0201t:781_2: na nu kho buddho”tiādinā vicikicchā saṃsayo,
tika-s0201t:781_3: micchāñāṇaṃ tassa guṇānaṃ aguṇabhāvaparikappanena viparītaggāho. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:781_9: Lokiyaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ sikkhāsamādānaṃ viya aggahitakālaparicchedaṃ jīvitapariyantameva hoti,
tika-s0201t:781_10: tasmā tassa khandhabhedena bhedoti āha “anavajjo kālakiriyāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:781_12: Satipi anavajjatte iṭṭhaphalopi na hotīti āha “aphalo”ti.
tika-s0201t:784_3: Tena kena pavattinimittena upāsakasaddo tasmiṃ puggale niruḷhoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:784_4: Kimassa sīlanti kīdisaṃ assa upāsakassa sīlaṃ,
tika-s0201t:784_5: kittakena sīlenāyaṃ sīlasampanno nāma hotīti attho.
tika-s0201t:784_7: so pana micchājīvassa parivajjanena hotīti sopi vibhajīyatīti.
tika-s0201t:784_10: Anantarassa hi vidhi vā paṭisedho vā.
tika-s0201t:785_3: Upāsanatoti teneva saraṇagamanena tattha ca sakkaccakāritāya ādaragāravabahumānādiyogena payirupāsanato.
tika-s0201t:786_5: Tena kāyavisamādiduccaritaṃ vajjetvā kāyasamādinā sucaritena jīvanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:786_6: Satthavaṇijjāti āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ katvā vā kāretvā vā yathākataṃ vā paṭilabhitvā tassa vikkayo.
tika-s0201t:786_8: Maṃsavaṇijjāti sūnakārādayo viya migasūkarādike posetvā maṃsaṃ sampādetvā vikkayo.
tika-s0201t:786_9: Majjavaṇijjāti yaṃ kiñci majjaṃ yojetvā tassa vikkayo.
tika-s0201t:787_0: Tassevāti pañcaveramaṇilakkhaṇassa sīlassa ceva pañcamicchāvaṇijjālakkhaṇassa ājīvassa ca.
tika-s0201t:787_6: Buddhādīsu kammakammaphalesu ca saddhāvipariyāyo assaddhiyaṃ micchādhimokkho.
tika-s0201t:787_9: “Iminā diṭṭhādinā idaṃ nāma maṅgalaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ bālajanaparikappitakotūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena samannāgato kotūhalamaṅgaliko.
tika-s0201t:787_12: Ito bahiddhāti ito sabbaññubuddhasāsanato bahiddhā bāhirakasamaye.
tika-s0201t:787_14: Pubbakāraṃ karotīti dānamānanādikaṃ kusalakiriyaṃ paṭhamaṃ karoti.
tika-s0201t:787_15: Ettha ca dakkhiṇeyyapariyesanapubbakāre ekaṃ katvā pañca dhammā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:788_2: catunnampi parisānaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena upāsakova ratanaṃ upāsakaratanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:789_3: “imasmiṃ gabbhe vasantānaṃ idaṃ nāma panasaphalaṃ pāpuṇātī”tiādinā taṃtaṃvasanaṭṭhānakoṭṭhāsenāti attho.
tika-s0201t:790_0: Pāṇehi upetanti iminā tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikataṃ dassento “yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattatī”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:790_1: vatvā puna jīvitena taṃ vatthuttayaṃ paṭipūjento “saraṇagamanaṃ rakkhāmī”ti uppannaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa
tika-s0201t:790_3: Pāṇehi upetanti hi yāva me pāṇā dharanti,
tika-s0201t:790_7: atha kho pāṇe pariccajitvāpi yāvajīvaṃ upetanti evamettha attho veditabboti.
tika-s0201t:794_8: Parehi anajjhiṭṭhoyeva hi mahāthero imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
tika-s0201t:794_9: Keci panāhu “ekacce bhikkhū saṃkiliṭṭhacitte disvā tesaṃ cittasaṃkilesappahānāya ceva ekaccānaṃ āyatiṃ anuppādanāya ca ayaṃ desanā āraddhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:794_11: evaṃ ito paresūti sabbesupi suttesu anuttānaapubbapadavaṇṇanā eva karīyati.
tika-s0201t:794_14: Idañhi apparajakkhamahārajakkhatāvasena duvidhe satte paccekaṃ atthaññutānatthaññutāvasena dvidhā katvā “cattāro”ti anavasesapariyādānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:794_15: Vajjīputtakādayo viya puggalavādīti na gahetabbaṃ lokasamaññānusārena atthaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthānaṃ vasena desanāya āraddhattā,
tika-s0201t:794_16: ayañca desanānayo satthu nissāya evāti dassento “ayañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:796_8: buddhiyā avayavavinibbhoge vā kate na taṃsamaññā,
tika-s0201t:796_11: Na hi kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve ayaṃ nayo labbhati,
tika-s0201t:796_12: tattha rūpādidhammaṃ samūhasantānavasena pavattamānaṃ upādāya puggalavohāroti āha “puggaloti sammutidesanā”ti.
tika-s0201t:796_14: Uppādavayavanto sabhāvadhammā na niccāti āha “aniccanti paramatthadesanā”ti.
tika-s0201t:796_20: ayaṃ pana khandhasamaññā phassādīsu tajjāpaññatti viya paramatthasannissayā tassa āsannatarā,
tika-s0201t:796_21: puggalasamaññādayo viya na dūreti paramatthasaṅgahatā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:796_22: khandhasīsena vā tadupādānā sabhāvadhammā eva gahitā.
tika-s0201t:796_23: Nanu ca sabhāvadhammā sabbepi sammutimukheneva desanaṃ ārohanti,
tika-s0201t:796_24: na samukhenāti sabbāpi desanā sammutidesanāva siyāti?
tika-s0201t:796_26: na ca saddo kenaci pavattinimittena vinā atthaṃ pakāsetīti.
tika-s0201t:797_0: Sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvāti “idhekacco puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitāpānuyogamanuyutto”tiādinā sammutimukhena
tika-s0201t:797_2: Atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvāti tadanusārena catusaccasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ saha vipassanāya maggena paṭivijjhitvā.
tika-s0201t:797_3: Mohaṃ pahāyāti tadekaṭṭhehi kilesehi saddhiṃ anavasesaṃ mohaṃ pajahitvā.
tika-s0201t:797_10: Tatthāti tassaṃ sammutivasena paramatthavasena ca desanāyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:797_13: tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ sippaganthānampīti adhippāyo sippuggahaṇañhi parato vakkhati.
tika-s0201t:797_14: Sippāni vā vedantogadhe katvā “tiṇṇaṃ vedāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:797_16: na katthaci sannihitabhāvenāti vedānampi kathetabbabhāveneva avaṭṭhānaṃ dīpento “guyhā tayī nihitā gayhatī”ti micchāvādaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0201t:798_5: Lokasamaññāya hi abhinivesena vinā ñāpanā ekaccassa sutassa sāvanā viya na musā anatidhāvitabbato tassā.
tika-s0201t:799_1: Tesañhi kiccaṃ sattasantāneyeva pākaṭaṃ hotīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya taṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:799_4: taṃsantāne eva tassa phalassa uppatti kammassakatā.
tika-s0201t:799_5: Evañhi kataviññāṇanāso akatāgamo vā natthīti sā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva kathāya dīpetabbā.
tika-s0201t:799_6: Tehi sattehi kātabbā puññādikiriyā paccattapurisakāropi santānavasena nipphādetabbato puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva kathāya dīpetabbo.
tika-s0201t:800_6: Tānipi hi santānavasena nipphādetabbato “mātaraṃ jīvitā voropetī”tiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva kathāya dīpetabbāni,
tika-s0201t:800_7: tathā “so mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā “so anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati
tika-s0201t:800_9: no paṭiggāhakato”tiādinā ca pavattā brahmavihārapubbenivāsadakkhiṇāvisuddhikathā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva kathāya dīpetabbā sattasantānavisayattā.
tika-s0201t:800_11: na samayavimutto puggalo”tiādinā ca paramatthaṃ kathentopi lokasammutiyā appahānatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0201t:800_12: Etena vuttāvasesāya kathāya puggalādhiṭṭhānabhāve payojanaṃ sāmaññavasena saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:800_14: pariññātavatthukānampi pana evaṃ desanā sukhāvahā hoti.
tika-s0201t:802_1: Samaññāgahaṇavasena lokena ñāyati samaññāyati voharīyatīti lokasamaññā,
tika-s0201t:802_3: Tassa tassa atthassa vibhāvane lokena nicchitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:803_0: Santoti ettha santasaddo “dīghaṃ santassa yojana”ntiādīsu kilantabhāve āgato,
tika-s0201t:803_1: “ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā”tiādīsu niruddhabhāve āgato,
tika-s0201t:803_2: “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto”tiādīsu santañāṇagocaratāya,
tika-s0201t:803_8: So ca puggalasambandhena vuttattā lokasamaññāvasenāti dassento “lokasaṅketavasena atthī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:803_9: Atthīti cetaṃ nipātapadaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0201t:803_13: Aṅganti etehi taṃsamaṅgipuggalā nihīnabhāvaṃ gacchantīti aṅgaṇāni, rāgādayo.
tika-s0201t:803_15: Añjeti tattha ṭhitaṃ ahundaratāya abhibyañjetīti aṅgaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:803_21: Saha aṅgaṇenāti aṅgaṇanti laddhanāmena yathāvuttakilesena saha vattati.
tika-s0201t:804_0: Atthītipi na jānāti tādisassa yonisomanasikārassa abhāvā.
tika-s0201t:804_2: tesaṃ sappaṭibhayatā visesato jānitabbāti dassetuṃ “ime kilesā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:804_8: Yena vā tena vāti navakammesu vā pariyattidhutaṅgādīsu vā yena vā tena vā.
tika-s0201t:804_10: Taṃ pana niddhāraṇaṃ saṅgaṇānaṅgaṇasamudāyatoti dassento “catūsu puggalesū”ti vatvā puna tadekadesato dassento “tesu vā dvīsu sāṅgaṇesū”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:804_11: Tañhi dvayaṃ paṭhamaṃ hīnaseṭṭhabhāvena niddhārīyati paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhattā.
tika-s0201t:805_12: cattāro mahābhūtā paccayā rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”tiādīsu viya hetupaccayasaddā samānatthāti dassetuṃ “ubhayenapi kāraṇameva pucchatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:805_17: Samānepi dvinnaṃ sāṅgaṇabhāve tassā pajānanāppajānanahetukataṃ tesaṃ seṭṭhahīnataṃ.
tika-s0201t:805_19: Therassa vicittapaṭibhānatāya nānāhetūpamāhi alaṅkatvā yathāpucchitassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:806_1: Tanti tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ hīnaseṭṭhatāya kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:806_3: Etanti sutte anantaraṃ vuccamānaṃ vīriyārambhābhāvena aṅgaṇassa appahānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:806_8: Kusalo vāyāmo nāma chandato balavāti āha “tato balavataraṃ vāyāmaṃ na karissatī”ti,
tika-s0201t:806_9: chandampi anuppādento kathaṃ tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ karissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:806_11: Sāṅgaṇaggahaṇeneva aṅgaṇānaṃ kilesavatthutāya cittassa saṃkiliṭṭhatāya saddhāya puna saṃkiliṭṭhaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:806_14: Ukkhalipucchanacoḷakassa viya vasāpītapilotikā viya ca dummocanīyabhāvena malaggahaṇaṃ malīnatā,
tika-s0201t:806_15: pīḷanaṃ hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ vibādhanaṃ darathapariḷāhuppādanena paridahanaṃ upatāpanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:806_20: Tathābhūto ca pāṇaṃ cajissati nāmāti āha “marissatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:807_6: “Abhirūpāya kaññā dātabbā”tiādīsu viya antarenapi atisayatthabodhakasaddena atisayattho ñāyatīti āha “malaggahitatarāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:807_10: Opammaṃ sampaṭipādentoti yathūpanītaṃ upamaṃ upameyyatthena samaṃ katvā paṭipādento,
tika-s0201t:807_12: Sāṅgaṇo puggaloti sāṅgaṇo tasmiṃ attabhāve asujjhanakapuggalo.
tika-s0201t:807_13: Āpaṇādito kulagharaṃ ānītassa malaggahitakaṃsabhājanassa tattha laddhabbāya visuddhiyā alābhato yathā anukkamena saṃkiliṭṭhatarabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:807_14: evaṃ gharato nikkhantassa puggalassa pabbajjāya laddhabbāya visuddhiyā alābhato anukkamena saṃkiliṭṭhatarabhāvoti
tika-s0201t:807_16: Saṃkiliṭṭhatarabhāvo ca nāma pabbajitassa ājīvavipattivasena vā siyā ācāradiṭṭhisīlavipattīsu aññataravasena
tika-s0201t:807_17: vāti taṃ sabbaṃ saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “tassa puggalassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:807_24: Avisodhetvāti yathā attano sīle vā diṭṭhiyā vā visuddhi hoti,
tika-s0201t:808_1: Ādiṃ katvāti iminā dhovanaghaṃsanādīhi pariyodapanaṃ ādimantaṃ katvā vadati.
tika-s0201t:808_2: Suddhaṭṭhānaṃ yattha vā na rajena okirīyati.
tika-s0201t:808_8: Tathā hissā saṃkiliṭṭhakaṃsapātiyā parisuddhapariyodātabhāvo upamābhāvena vutto.
tika-s0201t:808_11: arahattasacchikiriyāti sattasupi ṭhānesu “parisuddhapariyodātabhāvo viyā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:808_12: Pabbajitassa hi visuddhi nāma heṭṭhimantena sīlavisuddhiyā vā siyā kammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena vivekavāsena
tika-s0201t:808_13: jhānassādhigamena vā vipassanābhāvanāya vā sāmaññaphalādhigamena vāti.
tika-s0201t:811_1: Aṅgaṇanti tattha tattha nāmato eva vibhāvitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:811_3: pabhedato vāti sabhāvādito vibhāvanaṃ sandhāyāha “nānappakārato pākaṭaṃ kārāpetukāmenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:811_6: Te pana tattha paccayavasena nibbattattā pavattā nāma hontīti āha “pavattāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:811_10: atha kho puññavantatā sakkatagarukatā ca ettha kāraṇabhāvena gahetabbāti dassento “pakatiyāpi cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:811_11: Tena lābhatthikopi na yo koci evaṃ cittaṃ uppādeti puññavā sambhāvanīyoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:811_14: navakā pana attano navakabhāvena vighāsādādīnaṃ ārocenti “passatha tumhākaṃ therassa kamma”nti.
tika-s0201t:811_15: Vighāsādādayo nāma “īdisassa santike ovādatthaṃ tumhe āgatā”ti bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocenti.
tika-s0201t:811_16: Na ca maṃ bhikkhū jāneyyunti na ca vata maṃ bhikkhū jāneyyuṃ,
tika-s0201t:811_17: aho vata maṃ bhikkhū na jāneyyunti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:811_22: saddo idha āsannakāraṇatthoti taṃ dassento “iminā kāraṇenā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:812_2: Purimasadisamevāti “lābhatthiko hī”tiādinā vuttena purimena yojanānayena sadisameva.
tika-s0201t:813_1: codanā ca āpattiyāti cuditakena codakassa samānabhāvo āpattiāpannatāyāti āha “samānoti sāpattiko”ti.
tika-s0201t:813_3: Na cāyaṃ sāpattikatāya eva samānataṃ icchati,
tika-s0201t:813_6: Ayañhi “sappaṭipuggalova maṃ codeyyā”ti icchati “evāhaṃ tassa paṭipuggalehi saddhiṃ ekajjhāsayo hutvā
tika-s0201t:813_7: tassa upari kiñci vattuṃ kātuṃ vā labhissāmī”ti maññamāno.
tika-s0201t:813_8: Imasmiṃ pana pakkhe no appaṭipuggaloti natthi etassa paṭipuggaloti appaṭipuggaloti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:814_1: imassa puggalassa icchācāre ṭhitattā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyāti vacanato “tañca kho anumatipucchāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:814_2: Na hesa “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhū”tiādinā kiñci vītikkamaṃ uddissa bhagavatā pucchitabbataṃ icchati.
tika-s0201t:814_3: No maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā antaraṃ katvāti maggabhāvanaṃ vā phalasacchikiriyaṃ vā sikhāppattavipassanānuyogaṃ
tika-s0201t:814_4: vā nirodhasamāpajjanaṃ vā jhānasamāpajjanameva vā antaraṃ kāraṇaṃ katvā bhagavatā attānaṃ paṭipucchitabbaṃ
tika-s0201t:815_0: Taṃ sampattinti parivārasampattiñceva bhikkhūhi kariyamānaṃ sakkāragarukārasampattiñca.
tika-s0201t:815_2: Sayameva paññāyatīti sayameva gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ purato attānaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:815_3: purato vasantaṃ pana bhikkhu purakkhatvā gacchantiyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:816_0: Dakkhiṇodakanti aggato upanīyamānaṃ dakkhiṇodakaṃ. Yato eva- kāro,
tika-s0201t:816_3: kāraggahaṇanti katvā ahameva labheyyanti ahaṃ labheyyamevāti evametaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyenāha
tika-s0201t:816_5: aññathā yathārutavasena avadhāraṇe gayhamāne “na aññe labheyyu”nti ayamevettha attho siyāti.
tika-s0201t:816_6: Pāsādiko hotīti idaṃ tassa aggāsanādipaccāsīsanāya kāraṇadassanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:818_0: Tādisesu ṭhānesūti tādisesu pesalānaṃ bahussutānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānesu.
tika-s0201t:818_2: Vinicchayakusalānanti anekavihitesu kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyesu kaṅkhāvinayanāya taṃ taṃ pañhānaṃ vinicchaye kusalānaṃ chekānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:818_3: Tesu tesu dhammakathikesu ajjhiṭṭhesu vārena dhammaṃ kathentesu “ayaṃ byatto”ti dhammajjhesakena ajjhiṭṭhattā okāsaṃ alabhamāno.
tika-s0201t:819_0: Sakkaccañca kareyyunti bhikkhū yaṃ mama abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānañjalikammasāmīcikammādiṃ karonti.
tika-s0201t:819_3: tampi sundaraṃ sammadeva abhisaṅkhataṃ kareyyunti attho.
tika-s0201t:819_9: Evaṃ kareyyunti evaṃ “sakkareyyu”ntiādinā vuttappakāraṃ sakkārādiṃ kareyyuṃ.
tika-s0201t:820_0: Ahameva lābhī assanti etthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva avadhāraṇaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:820_2: Mañcapīṭhādīnanti nidassanamattaṃ utusappāyānaṃ nivātānaṃ phassitatalānaṃ pihitadvārakavāḷavātapānādīnampi paṇītasenāsanabhāvato. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:821_1: Kāyakammaṃ disvāti idaṃ na kāyakammaṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:821_2: kāyakammunā pana saha pavattaṃ oṭṭhaparipphandanaṃ bhākuṭikaraṇaṃ kāyaṅgādidassanaṃ kāyakammadassanaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:821_6: Tato eva ca te paccakkhakāle sammukhakāle dissanti nāma.
tika-s0201t:821_12: Pantaṃ pariyantaṃ dūrataraṃ senāsanaṃ assāti pantasenāsano.
tika-s0201t:821_13: Taṃ pana atthamattena dassentena “pantasenāsane vasatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:821_16: Piṇḍāya patituṃ carituṃ vatametassāti vā piṇḍapāti,
tika-s0201t:821_23: paṃsu viya vā kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlaṃ,
tika-s0201t:822_0: Tīhi kāraṇehi lūkhaṃ veditabbaṃ agghaphassavaṇṇaparihānito apaṃsukūlampi,
tika-s0201t:822_5: Kasmā pana pāḷiyaṃ āraññikādiggahaṇena cattārova dhutaguṇā vuttāti?
tika-s0201t:822_7: taggahaṇeneva ca ito paresampi sukhaparibhogatāya gahaṇasambhavato.
tika-s0201t:822_19: āraññaṃ paṃsukūlika”ntiādinā tattha tattha āraññikādayo eva gayhanti.
tika-s0201t:822_21: na ettakā sabbepi ekassa ekaṃsato sambhavanti,
tika-s0201t:822_23: Na hi makkhapaḷāsādīnaṃ appahīnabhāvepi sabrahmacārī neva sakkaronti…pe…
tika-s0201t:823_1: Upamāya pākaṭaṃ karontoti anvayato byatirekato ca udāharaṇena vibhāvento.
tika-s0201t:823_7: Taṃ pana vaḍḍhitaṃ tena ca bhājanaṃ pūritaṃ hotīti āha “vaḍḍhetvā paripūretvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:823_11: Sā pana puttalābhayogyataṃ upādāya maṅgalavacanena “janī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:823_12: tassā niyyamānaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ janiyā haratīti jaññaṃ.
tika-s0201t:823_21: So pana tesaṃ appahīnatāyāti āha “icchāvacarānaṃ appahāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:824_1: “Tena gāmantavihāraṃ anuggaṇhātī”ti vattabbe “āraññikatta”nti pana potthake likhitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:824_2: Na hi sukkapakkhe pāḷiyaṃ āraññikaggahaṇaṃ atthi,
tika-s0201t:824_3: sati ca icchāvacarappahāne gāmantavihāro ekantena na paṭikkhipitabbo,
tika-s0201t:824_6: Sālivarabhattaracanaṃ viya icchāvacarappahānaṃ manuññabhāvato tittihetuto ca.
tika-s0201t:825_3: attho pana sampadānamevāti āha “mayhaṃ tuyha”nti ca.
tika-s0201t:825_6: Rājagaheti samīpatthe bhummavacananti āha “taṃ nissāya viharāmī”ti.
tika-s0201t:826_0: Purāṇayānakāraputtoti purāṇe pabbajitato pubbe yānakāraputto tathāpaññāto.
tika-s0201t:826_7: atha kho attano suttānusārena tacchanto yānakāraputto.
tika-s0201t:826_8: Cittanti attano cittena mama cittaṃ jānitvā viya.
tika-s0201t:827_0: “Na saddhāya pabbajito”ti imināva kammaphalasaddhāya abhāvo nesaṃ pakāsitoti āha “assaddhāti buddhadhammasaṅghesu saddhāvirahitā”ti.
tika-s0201t:827_11: Asaṃvutakammadvārāti idaṃ kammadvārādīnaṃ asaṃvutabhāvo uppattidvārānaṃ asaṃvutatāya eva hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:827_12: Atha vā chasu indriyesūti nimitte bhummaṃ,
tika-s0201t:827_20: Jāgareti rattindivaṃ āvaraṇiyehi dhammehi cittaparisodhanasaṅkhāte jāgare.
tika-s0201t:827_21: Tesaṃ jāgaritāya adhisīlasikkhāya gāravarahitānaṃ itarasikkhāsu patiṭṭhā eva natthīti dassento “sikkhāpadesu
tika-s0201t:827_22: bahulagāravā na hontī”ti vatvā tameva gāravābhāvaṃ sarūpena vibhāvento “āpattivītikkamabahulā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:828_0: Pakatiyāpi siddhāya ratanattayasaddhāya kammaphalasaddhāya ca saddhā.
tika-s0201t:828_1: Pivanti maññe yathā taṃ dravabhūtaṃ amataṃ laddhā.
tika-s0201t:828_2: Ghasanti maññe yathā taṃ bahalapiṇḍikasudhābhojanaṃ laddhā.
tika-s0201t:828_4: Tameva pana sādhukāraṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā abbhanumodantā.
tika-s0201t:828_5: Ettha ca attamanavācānicchāraṇaṃ pivanasadisaṃ katvā vuttaṃ bahiddhābhāvato,
tika-s0201t:828_6: manasā abbhanumodanaṃ pana abbhantarabhāvato ghasanasadisaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:828_8: Rassañca ekavacanaṃ hotīti āha “rasse sati sāriputtassa upari hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:828_9: Dīghañca bahuvacanaṃ hotīti āha “dīghe sati sabrahmacārīna”nti.
tika-s0201t:828_15: na āguṃ karontīti nāgā”ti yo vividho vacanattho icchito,
tika-s0201t:829_0: Sayameva āguṃ na karoti sabbathā maggena pahīnaāguttā.
tika-s0201t:829_1: So kāmayogādike sabbasaṃyoge dasavidhasaṃyojanappabhedāni ca sabbabandhanāni visajja jahitvā sabbattha yakkhādīsu,
tika-s0201t:829_2: sabbesu vā bhavesu kenaci saṅgena na sajjati tīhi ca vimuttīhi vimutto,
tika-s0201t:829_4: so vuttalakkhaṇena tathattā taṃsabhāvattā nāgo pavuccateti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:829_6: Aññehi khīṇāsavanāgehi aggasāvakattā guṇavisesayogato pujjatarā ca pāsaṃsatarā ca.
tika-s0201t:829_7: Samaṃ anumodisunti aññamaññassa subhāsitato sampaṭicchanena samappavattamodatāya samaṃ sadisaṃ abbhanumodiṃsu.
tika-s0201t:833_8: Sā panettha rasasampatti adhippetā sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0201t:833_15: cetanādīnaṃ pana sīlanalakkhaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ pavattikkhaṇe vattabbameva natthi.
tika-s0201t:833_17: tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva vitthārakathā veditabbāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:834_0: Khettapāripūrīti nissitapāripūriyā nissayapāripūrimāha nissitakammavipattisampattivisayattā yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti.
tika-s0201t:834_2: Khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hotīti aparipūraṃ hoti sassapāripūriyā abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:834_6: Evamevanti yathā khittaṃ bījaṃ khaṇḍādicatudosavasena aparipuṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:834_13: Svāyaṃ ānisaṃso idha pāḷiyaṃ nānappakārena vitthārīyati.
tika-s0201t:835_8: Idha niddese viya uddesepi pātimokkhasaṃvaro bhagavatā vutto “sampannasīlā”ti vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:835_11: Tattha avadhāraṇena itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:835_12: Tathā hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu chasikkhāpadavītikkame gilānapaccayassa apaccavekkhitaparibhoge ca āpatti vihitāti.
tika-s0201t:835_14: Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthīti sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma kiṃ atthi yathā
tika-s0201t:835_15: pātimokkhasaṃvaroti ācariyassa sammukhattā apaṭikkhipantova upacārena pucchanto viya vadati.
tika-s0201t:835_21: Idamatthanti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:835_22: Nippariyāyenāti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānassa sīlassa parivāravasena pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:836_0: Idāni pātimokkhasaṃvarasseva padhānabhāvaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:836_3: Tassevāti “sampannasīlā”ti ettha yaṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ, tasseva.
tika-s0201t:836_4: Sampannapātimokkhāti ettha pātimokkhaggahaṇena vevacanaṃ vatvā taṃ vitthāretvā…pe… ādimāha.
tika-s0201t:836_5: Yathā aññathāpi “idha bhikkhu sīlavā hotī”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya uddiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī”ti niddiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:837_1: taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti “pātimokkha”nti laddhanāmena sikkhāpadasīlena pihitakāyavacīdvārā.
tika-s0201t:837_2: Te pana yasmā evaṃbhūtā tena samannāgatā nāma honti,
tika-s0201t:838_3: puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī,
tika-s0201t:838_5: Aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭīyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti pātī,
tika-s0201t:838_6: maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīloti pātī,
tika-s0201t:838_10: Cittassa hi vimokkhena satto vimuttoti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:839_0: Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pātī.
tika-s0201t:839_1: “Avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:839_2: Tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho.
tika-s0201t:840_0: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:840_4: Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pātī,
tika-s0201t:841_5: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro.
tika-s0201t:841_7: Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā “patī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:841_11: Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttatthena mokkho cāti pātimokkho.
tika-s0201t:841_13: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhantiādimetaṃ mukhametaṃ pamukhameta”nti vitthāro.
tika-s0201t:842_6: samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkho.
tika-s0201t:842_8: tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho.
tika-s0201t:842_12: Sīlasaṃvaro hi nibbedhabhāgiyo sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo viya hoti yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanatoti pātimokkho.
tika-s0201t:842_14: Atha vā mokkhaṃ pati vattati mokkhābhimukhanti vā pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:842_15: Pātimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evamettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:843_0: Ācāragocarasampannāti kāyikavācasikaavītikkamasaṅkhātena ācārena ceva navesiyagocaratādisaṅkhātena gocarena ca sampannā,
tika-s0201t:843_5: Te pana ekantato akusalasabhāvā hontīti āha “akusaladhammesū”ti.
tika-s0201t:843_7: paramāṇumattampi vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā bhāyanasīlā.
tika-s0201t:843_8: Sammā ādiyitvāti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbaso ca ādiyitvā.
tika-s0201t:843_9: Sikkhāpadesūti niddhāraṇe bhummanti samudāyato avayavaniddhāraṇaṃ dassento “sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhathā”ti atthamāha.
tika-s0201t:843_12: yaṃ kiñci sikkhitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ sīlaṃ.
tika-s0201t:843_13: Taṃ pana dvāravasena duvidhamevāti āha “kāyikaṃ vācasikañcā”ti.
tika-s0201t:843_14: Imasmiṃ atthavikappe sikkhāpadesūti ādhāre bhummaṃ sikkhābhāgesu kassaci visuṃ aggahaṇato.
tika-s0201t:844_3: Ko attho kva attho kva nipātitāti?
tika-s0201t:844_5: Sīlānisaṃsadassanatthanti hi ettha byatirekato yaṃ sīlānisaṃsassa adassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:844_6: taṃ imissā desanāya kāraṇanti kasmā āraddhanti vineyyānaṃ sīlānisaṃsassa adassanatoti atthato āpanno eva hotīti.
tika-s0201t:844_8: Sīlānisaṃsadassanatthanti pana imassa atthaṃ vivarituṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:844_10: “Sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggalokaṃ upapajjatī”tiādīsu pana vipākaphalampi “ānisaṃso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:844_13: Vijjamānopi guṇo yāthāvato vibhāvito eva abhiruciṃ uppādeti,
tika-s0201t:844_15: tasmā ekantato ānisaṃsakittanaṃ icchitabbamevāti dassetuṃ visakaṇṭakavāṇijo udāhaṭo.
tika-s0201t:845_0: Tattha guḷo nāma ucchurasaṃ pacitvā cuṇṇādīhi missitvā sampiṇḍane piṇḍībhūtaṃ.
tika-s0201t:845_6: Tasmiṃ kāle guḷādīsu visakaṇṭakavohāro apaccantadese pacuroti “paccantagāmaṃ gantvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:846_1: Piyassa nāma dassanaṃ ekantato abhinanditabbaṃ hotīti āha “viyacakkhūhi sampassitabbo”ti.
tika-s0201t:846_4: Manavaḍḍhanakoti pītimanassa paribrūhanato uparūpari pīticittassa uppādako.
tika-s0201t:846_7: Yathā vā aññe ajānantāpi jānantā viya pavattanti,
tika-s0201t:846_10: Passaṃ passatīti dassanabhūtena paññācakkhunā passitabbaṃ passati,
tika-s0201t:846_12: Evaṃ sambhāvanīyoti evaṃ viññutāya paṇḍitabhāvena sambhāvetabbo.
tika-s0201t:847_0: Sīlesvevassa paripūrakārīti sīlesu paripūrakārī eva bhaveyyāti evaṃ uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:847_1: Evañhi iminā padena uparisikkhādvayaṃ anivattitameva hoti.
tika-s0201t:847_2: Yathā pana sīlesu paripūrakārī nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:847_8: Evañca katvā upari sikkhādvayaṃ sīlassa sambhārabhāvena gahitanti sīlassevettha padhānaggahaṇaṃ siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:847_11: taṃ itarāsampi sikkhānaṃ idha gahitatāmattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:847_18: Tathā hi tattha na nippadesato sīlaṃ vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:847_19: evaṃ katvā tattha sīlamattakanti mattaggahaṇaṃ samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:847_29: Yo pana īdiso ahutvā jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati,
tika-s0201t:848_7: Suññāgāragato bhikkhu tattha laddhakāyavivekatāya samathavipassanāvasena cittavivekaṃ paribrūhento yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0201t:848_8: paṭipattiyā lokaṃ sāsanañca attano visesādhigamaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ suññāgārañca upasobhayamāno guṇavisesādhiṭṭhānabhāvāpādanena
tika-s0201t:848_9: viññūnaṃ atthato taṃ brūhento nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:848_14: Suññāgāraggahaṇena cettha araññarukkhamūlādi sabbaṃ padhānānuyogakkhamaṃ senāsanaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:849_3: Mānadiṭṭhiyo osaritvāti dassetabbatāya mānadiṭṭhiyo ogāhetvāti attho.
tika-s0201t:849_5: Taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo papañcattayaṃ sattasantānassa saṃsāre papañcanato anuppabandhanavasena vitthāraṇato.
tika-s0201t:850_4: Yadi evamayaṃ sikkhattayadesanā jātāti sikkhattayānisaṃsappakāsanī siyāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “ettha cā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:850_7: Indriyasaṃvaro viya pātimokkhasaṃvarassa catupārisuddhisīlassa ārakkhabhūtā cittekaggatā vipassanā ca idha gahitāti tadubhayaṃ appadhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:851_3: tena daḷhaattasinehena viluttahadayo kusaladhamme chaḍḍento so tathārūpesu…pe…
tika-s0201t:851_5: Balavamamattaṃ vā sineho na hoti “suddho saṅkhārapuñjo”ti yāthāvadassanena ahaṃkāramamaṃkārābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:851_6: Dubbhikkhabhaye khudābhibhavaṃ sandhāyāha “sacepissa antāni bahi nikkhamantī”ti.
tika-s0201t:851_11: suññāgārāna”nti imehi visesanibbedhabhāgiyabhāvāpādanena sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ samatthā eva cittekaggatāvipassanā gahitā.
tika-s0201t:851_13: tasmā tassa bhiyyopi sambhārabhūtā eva cittekaggatā vipassanā tattha tattha gahitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:852_2: sīlassa vā mūlakāraṇabhūtaṃ sabbaṃ kammassakatañāṇañca saṅgaṇhāti kammapathasammādiṭṭhiṃ vā.
tika-s0201t:852_3: Sīlañhi tadaññampi puññakiriyāvatthu teneva parisodhitaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsanti.
tika-s0201t:852_4: Lābhī assanti lābhā sāya saṃvaraṇasīlaparipūraṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ kimīdisaṃ bhagavā anujānātīti?
tika-s0201t:852_6: mahākāruṇikatāya pana puggalajjhāsayena evaṃ vuttanti dassento “na cetthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:852_7: Tattha ghāsesanaṃ chinnakatho na vācaṃ payuttaṃ bhaṇeti chinnakatho mūgo viya hutvā obhāsaparikathānimittaviññattipayuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:852_8: ghāsesanaṃ vācaṃ na bhaṇe na katheyyāti attho.
tika-s0201t:853_2: “Pañcime gahapatayo ānisaṃsā”tiādīsu anisaṃsasaddo phalapariyāyopi hotīti āha “ubhayametaṃ atthato eka”nti.
tika-s0201t:854_5: Te pana yasmā idha katakālakiriyā kālena katajīvitupacchedā honti,
tika-s0201t:854_8: Kālakato pitā vā mātā vā petayoniṃ upapannoti adhikārato viññāyatīti vuttaṃ “mahānisaṃsameva hotī”ti,
tika-s0201t:855_3: Sīlavā bhikkhu attano sīlakhaṇḍabhayena samāhito vipassako ca paccayaghātena aratiyā ratiyā ca sahitā
tika-s0201t:856_2: Purimavārasadisattā vuttanayamevāti atidisitvāpi puna taṃ dassetuṃ “sīlādiguṇayutto hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:856_3: Therassa heṭṭhā nisinnattā devatāya dārakā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ sukhena vattituṃ asakkontā asamatthā.
tika-s0201t:857_2: Tassa pana adhikatā pākatikakāmāvacaracittehi sundaratāya sapaṭipakkhato visuddhiyā cāti āha “abhikkantaṃ visuddhicitta”nti.
tika-s0201t:857_8: satipārisuddhijaṃ jhānasukhanti catubbidhampi jhānasukhaṃ paṭipakkhato nikkhantataṃ upādāya “nekkhammasukha”nti
tika-s0201t:857_10: Icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjituṃ samatthoti iminā tesu jhānesu samāpajjanavasībhāvamāha,
tika-s0201t:857_11: “nikāmalābhī”ti pana vacanato āvajjanādhiṭṭhānapaccavekkhaṇavasiyopi vuttā evāti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:857_12: Sukheneva paccanīkadhamme vikkhambhetvāti etena tesaṃ jhānasukhakhippābhiññatañca dasseti.
tika-s0201t:857_15: sā ca paricchedānurūpāva icchitabbbāti “vipulāna”nti vatvā “yathāparicchedeyeva vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:857_16: Paricchedakālañhi appatvāva vuṭṭhahanto akasiralābhī na hoti yāvadicchakaṃ pavattetuṃ asamatthattā.
tika-s0201t:857_17: Idāni teyeva yathāvutte samāpajjanādivasībhāve byatirekavasena vibhāvetuṃ “ekacco hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:857_18: Tattha lābhīyeva hotīti idaṃ paṭiladdhamattassa jhānassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:857_24: Kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhi kāmacchandādīnaṃ viya aññesampi samādhipāribandhikānaṃ dūrasamussāraṇaṃ idha vikkhambhanaṃ visodhanañcāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:858_0: Visesena rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ sabbaso vasībhāvāpāditaṃ abhiññāpādakanti adhippāyenāha “abhiññāpādake jhāne vutte”ti.
tika-s0201t:858_1: Arūpajjhānampi pana adhiṭṭhānatāya pādakameva cuddasadhā cittaparidamanena vinā tadabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:858_2: “Evamabhiññāpādake rūpāvacarajjhāne vutte rūpāvacaratāya kiñcāpi abhiññānaṃ lokiyavāro āgato”ti ayañhettha adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:859_0: Aṅgasantatāyāti nīvaraṇādīnaṃ paccanīkadhammānaṃ sudūratarabhāvena jhānaṅgānaṃ vūpasantatāya,
tika-s0201t:859_8: Ye hi jhānadhammā tathāpavattapubbabhāgabhāvanāhi tabbisesatāya sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhadhammehi vimuttivasena pavattanti,
tika-s0201t:859_9: tato eva tathāvimuttatāya pitu aṅke vissaṭṭhaaṅgapaccaṅgo viya kumāro nirāsaṅkabhāvena ārammaṇe adhimuttā ca pavattanti,
tika-s0201t:859_11: Tenāha “vimokkhāti paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā ārammaṇe ca adhimuttattā”ti.
tika-s0201t:859_14: tathāpi yasmā ārammaṇe avirattassa jhānasamatikkamo na hoti,
tika-s0201t:859_15: samatikkantesu ca jhānesu ārammaṇaṃ samatikkantameva hoti,
tika-s0201t:859_16: tasmā ārammaṇasamatikkamaṃ avatvā “rūpāvacarajjhāne atikkamitvā”ti icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:859_19: asutaparikappanena pana payojanaṃ natthīti “santāti padasambandho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:859_20: Evañca katvā tena virāgabhāvena tesaṃ santatāti ayampi attho vibhāvito hoti.
tika-s0201t:859_21: Rūpajjhānādīnaṃ viya natthi etesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ vā phalabhūtaṃ vā rūpanti arūpā.
tika-s0201t:860_3: Asamucchinnarāgādikassa hi khandhādīnaṃ āyatiṃ khandhādīhi sambandho,
tika-s0201t:860_4: samucchinnarāgādikassa pana taṃ natthi katānampi kammānaṃ asamatthabhāvāpattitoti.
tika-s0201t:860_5: Rāgādīnaṃ anvayato ca saṃyojanaṭṭho siddhoti āha “khandhagati…pe…
tika-s0201t:860_10: Taṃ sotaṃ ādito panno adhigacchīti sotāpanno,
tika-s0201t:860_15: saddo “phalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno”tiādīsu viya vattamānakālikoti āha “maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinna”nti.
tika-s0201t:860_25: So pana paṭhamamaggassa adhigatattā avasiṭṭho eva adhigandhabbabhāvena icchitabboti āha “uparimaggattaya”nti.
tika-s0201t:861_1: Oḷārikānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ samucchindanavasena pavattamāno dutiyamaggo avasiṭṭhānaṃ tesaṃ tanubhāvāpattiyā
tika-s0201t:861_5: Abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti tajjassa ayonisomanasikārassa anibaddhabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:861_6: Mandamandā uppajjanti vipallāsānaṃ tappaccayānañca mohamānādīnaṃ mudutarabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:862_2: āgantvāti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekoyeva gahitoti dassento “yopi hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:862_3: Tattha yvāyaṃ pañcamako sakadāgāmī “idha maggaṃ bhāvetvā devaloke nibbatto,
tika-s0201t:862_4: tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyatī”ti vutto,
tika-s0201t:862_7: sakadāgāmissa dve paṭisandhiyoti idaṃ tesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:863_4: Tathā hesa dūratopi āvattidhammo evāti dassetuṃ gilabaḷisamacchādayo upamābhāvena vuttā.
tika-s0201t:863_7: Tattha parinibbānatā cassa kāmaloke khandhabījassa apunārohavasenevāti dassetuṃ “anāvattidhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:864_5: Āsavānaṃ anavasesappahānato arahattamaggoyeva visesato “āsavakkhayo”ti vattabbataṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ “āsavakkhaye kathite”ti,
tika-s0201t:864_8: Yathā purisassa muṇḍitaṃ sīsaṃ sikhāvirahitattā na sobhati,
tika-s0201t:864_9: evaṃ desanāya sīsabhūtāpi aggamaggakathā lokiyābhiññārahitā na sobhatīti āha “ayaṃ kathā muṇḍābhiññākathā nāma bhaveyyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:864_13: Yuttaṭṭhāneyevāti lokiyābhiññānaṃ nibbattanassa viya desanāya yuttaṭṭhāneyeva.
tika-s0201t:865_1: Āsavānaṃ khayāti heṭṭhimamaggena khepitāvasiṭṭhānaṃ āsavānaṃ arahattamaggena samucchindanato.
tika-s0201t:865_2: Yasmā arahattamaggo na kevalaṃ āsaveyeva khepeti,
tika-s0201t:865_7: Yasmā pana tattha āsavānaṃ lesopi natthi,
tika-s0201t:865_9: Samādhi vutto cetosīsena yathā “cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:865_10: Rāgato vimuttattā avijjāya vimuttattāti idaṃ ujuvipaccanīkapaṭippassaddhidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:865_12: Idāni tameva samādhipaññānaṃ rāgāvijjāpaṭipakkhataṃ āgamena dassetuṃ “vuttaṃ ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:865_13: Samathaphalanti samathassa phalaṃ lokiyasamathabhāvanāya hi vipassanāgatāya āhitaphalassa lokuttarasamathassa sarikkhakaphalo cetovimutti.
tika-s0201t:865_15: Attanoyevāti sutamayañāṇādinā viya parapaccayataṃ nayaggāhañca muñcitvā paratoghosānugatabhāvanādhigamabhūtatāya
tika-s0201t:865_16: attanoyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā sayambhuñāṇabhūtāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:866_0: Sabbampi tanti sabbampi sattarasavidhaṃ taṃ yathāvuttaṃ sīlānisaṃsaṃ.
tika-s0201t:866_1: Yathā ānisaṃsavante sammadeva sampādite tadānisaṃsā dassitā eva honti tadāyattabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:866_2: evaṃ ānisaṃsapadhānayogyabhāvena dassite tadānisaṃsā dassitā eva hontīti āha “sampiṇḍetvā dassento”ti.
tika-s0201t:866_3: Vuttasseva atthassa punavacanaṃ nigamananti vuttaṃ “nigamanaṃ āhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:866_7: Etaṃ paṭiccāti etaṃ sampannasīlassa bhikkhuno yathāvuttasattarasavidhānisaṃsabhāgitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:866_9: idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti vacanaṃ sandhāya “sabbampi taṃ sīlānisaṃsaṃ sampiṇḍetvā dassento”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:866_10: Etthaādito chahi ānisaṃsehi parittabhūmikā sampatti gahitā,
tika-s0201t:866_12: itarehi lokuttarabhūmikāti evaṃ catubhūmikasampadānisaṃsasīlaṃ nāmetaṃ mahantaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ,
tika-s0201t:869_2: Yaṃ samānaṃ viya na sabbaso minoti,
tika-s0201t:869_9: Paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ atthaṃ vatvā puna upamaṃ vadanto “upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dassetī”ti vutto.
tika-s0201t:869_10: Atthena upamaṃ parivāretvāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0201t:869_11: Idāni te cattāropi pakāre sutte āgatanayeneva dassento “seyyathāpissu,
tika-s0201t:870_0: Svāyanti so ayaṃ evaṃ upamādassanavasenapi nānānayenapi dhammadesako bhagavā.
tika-s0201t:870_1: Ekaccānaṃ veneyyānaṃ atthassa sukhāvabodho paṭhamaṃ upamādassane hetu,
tika-s0201t:870_4: atthena upamāparivāraṇe cā”ti imamatthaṃ dasseti “esa nayo sabbatthā”ti iminā.
tika-s0201t:870_6: Tañhi dhammadhātupariyāpannattā yathāvuttadhamme ca sabbepi ñeyyadhamme ca padahati yathāsabhāvato bujjhati bodheti cāti dhātu,
tika-s0201t:870_7: dhīyanti vā dhammā etāya sabbākārato ñāyanti ñāpiyanti cāti dhammadhātu.
tika-s0201t:870_8: Tassā pana suṭṭhu saccasampaṭivedhavasena laddhattā suppaṭividdhattāti,
tika-s0201t:871_0: Pakatipariyodātassa cittassa āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhabhāvadassanatthaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhavatthadassananti
tika-s0201t:871_4: Sabbaso kilissati vinassati visuddhi etenāti saṃkileso,
tika-s0201t:871_5: tena saṃkilesena paṃsurajādinā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vaṇṇavināsanena vidūsitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:871_7: Jallikā vuccati loṇapaṭalādi chaviyā upari ṭhitaṃ sarīramalaṃ.
tika-s0201t:871_22: Tasmiṃ vatthe raṅgajātaṃ sayaṃ suparisuddhaṃ samānaṃ kissa hetu kena rattavaṇṇaṃ aparisuddhaṃ hotīti raṅgajātassa niddosataṃ vadati.
tika-s0201t:872_0: Saṃkilesapakkhaṃ dassentena asaṃkiliṭṭhameva vatthaṃ udāharitabbanti pākaṭoyamattho,
tika-s0201t:872_1: saṃkiliṭṭhavatthanidassanena pana “siyā nu kho aññopi koci viseso”ti adhippāyena pucchati “kasmā panā”tiādinā.
tika-s0201t:872_3: Ettha ca saṃkiliṭṭhacittavisodhanavidhāne saṃkiliṭṭhavatthaṃ nidassatabbanti paṭiññā,
tika-s0201t:872_21: Upakkiliṭṭhanti panetaṃ upakkilesanārahassa cittassa vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:872_25: Tañca khoti pana sakasantatipariyāpannatāya nesaṃ kevalaṃ ekattanayavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:872_27: Atha vā upakkiliṭṭhanti iminā upakkilesahetu tattha vijjamānaṃ visesādhānamāha,
tika-s0201t:873_12: gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:873_15: Vejjakammanti ananuññāte ṭhāne lābhāsāya gahaṭṭhānaṃ bhesajjaṃ karoti.
tika-s0201t:873_19: atthi agocaro”tiādinā vibhaṅge āgataṃ sabbampi anācāraṃ agocarañca caraṇavasena paripūreti.
tika-s0201t:874_1: pettivisayampi gacchatī”ti vatvā tattha pettivisayagamanaṃ dassento “samaṇayakkho nāma hotī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:875_4: Parisuddhavaṇṇamevassāti nīlavaṇṇopissa parisuddho ca bhaveyyāti evamādiṃ sandhāyāha “kaṇhapakkhe vuttapaccanīkeneva veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:875_9: Dasa kusalakammapathe paripūretīti idaṃ kaṇhapakkhe “dasa akusalakammapathe paripūretī”ti vuttassa paṭipakkhadassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:875_10: Yathā hi tattha abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiggahaṇena kammapathasaṃsandananayena kammapathaṃ appattāya
tika-s0201t:875_11: ca agāriyassa tathārūpāya micchāpaṭipattiyā saṅgaho icchito,
tika-s0201t:875_12: evaṃ idhāpi anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhiggahaṇena alobhādosāmohavasena pavattā agāriyassa sammāpaṭipatti saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:875_15: Dasahi ṭhānehi aññesaṃ devānaṃ abhibhavo devamahantatā.
tika-s0201t:875_16: Paṭipatti sugatiyā bhājiyamānattā “anāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetī”ti tathā anāgāmibhāvanaṃ pāpetvā ṭhapitā.
tika-s0201t:875_17: Gahitaggahaṇena sukhānubhavaṭṭhānassa adhippetattā tadabhāvato asaññibhavaṃ anādiyanto “dasasu vā brahmabhavanesū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:876_4: Evampi abhijjhāvisamalobhānaṃ viseso hotīti dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:876_16: Sopi imasmiṃyeva sutte vinibbhogo na labbhati cittasaṃkilesassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0201t:876_18: Ayonisomanasikāravasena uppajjanato sampatti āyatiñca dukkhasseva uppādanato na koci lobho avisamo nāma.
tika-s0201t:876_19: Abhijjhāyanaṭṭhenāti yassa kassaci ārammaṇassa yuttassa ayuttassa appattassa ca abhijjāyanavasena abhipatthanāvasena
tika-s0201t:876_20: ca pavattā taṇhā abhijjhāti lobhato nibbisesanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:876_22: Dūsetīti sabhāvasantaṃ asaṃkilesaṃ vināseti avisuddhaṃ karoti.
tika-s0201t:876_24: “Ime sattā ucchijjantu vinassantū”ti sattesu byāpajjanākārappavattiyā byāpādo navavidhaāghātavatthusambhavo vutto.
tika-s0201t:876_25: Kodho pana saṅkhāresupi pavattanato dasavidhaāghātavatthusambhavo vutto.
tika-s0201t:877_1: tassa pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa guṇassa vināsano udakapuñchaniyā viya sarīrānugataṃ udakaṃ puñchanto makkho.
tika-s0201t:877_2: Tathā hi so paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanaṭṭhena “makkho”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:877_3: Idāni anagāriyassa vātiādinā saṅkhepena vuttatthaṃ vitthārena dassetuṃ “anagāriyopī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:877_8: saddena vinayakkame catūsu mahānikāyesu ca kosallaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:877_10: Yathā cāyanti iminā yathāyaṃ makkho cittaṃ dūseti,
tika-s0201t:877_14: saddena “rattaññū cirapabbajite puggale ajjhottharitvā ‘tvampi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajito,
tika-s0201t:877_16: tvampi sīlamatte ṭhito ahampī’ti” evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-s0201t:877_17: Yugaggāhagāhīti “tava vā mama vā ko viseso”ti asamampi samaṃ katvā samadhuraggāhagaṇhanako.
tika-s0201t:877_19: Attano sampattiyā nigūhanaṃ tassa parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanena hotīti “parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahamānaṃ”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:877_20: Kāraṇe hi gahite phalampi gahitameva hotīti.
tika-s0201t:878_0: Sabbaso amadditasabhāvena vā tabharitabhattasadisassa thaddhabhāvassa anonamitadaṇḍasadisatāya paggahitasiraanivātavuttikārassa
tika-s0201t:878_2: Taduttarikaraṇoti yaṃ yena kataṃ duccaritaṃ vā sucaritaṃ vā,
tika-s0201t:878_6: Pariyāpuṇāti vā katheti vā attano balānurūpaṃ.
tika-s0201t:879_1: Pubbe kenaci attānaṃ sadisaṃ katvā pacchā tato adhikato dahanato uppajjanako atimāno.
tika-s0201t:880_0: Tasmā lobhamādiṃ katvā dassetīti lobhassa ādito gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetukāmo pucchati.
tika-s0201t:880_1: Paṭhamuppattitoti tattha tattha bhave sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppajjanato.
tika-s0201t:880_2: Sattānañhi yathādhigataṃ jhānādivisesaṃ ārabbha paccavekkhaṇā viya yathāladdhaṃ upapatibhavaṃ ārabbha nikanti eva.
tika-s0201t:880_4: Yathāsambhavaṃ itareti itare byāpādādayo yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjanti,
tika-s0201t:880_5: lobhassa viya ādito asukassa anantaraṃ asukoti vā na nesaṃ niyamo atthīti attho.
tika-s0201t:880_6: Kiṃ pana ete soḷaseva cittassa upakkilesā,
tika-s0201t:880_7: udāhu aññepi santīti anuyogaṃ sandhāya aññepi santīti dassento “na ca ete”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:880_8: Yadi evaṃ kasmā ettakā eva idha vuttāti.
tika-s0201t:881_1: Saṃkilesaṃ dassetvāti saṃkiliṭṭhavattanidassanena saṅkhepena vuttaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vibhāgena dassetvā.
tika-s0201t:881_3: Evaṃ jānitvāti “abhijjhā visamalobho ekanteneva cittassa uppakkileso”ti sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato
tika-s0201t:881_4: nirodhūpāyato ca pubbabhāgapaññāya ceva heṭṭhimamaggadvayapaññāya ca jānitvā.
tika-s0201t:881_5: Pajahatīti ettha accantappahānameva adhippetanti dassento “samucchedappahānavasena ariyamaggena pajahatī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:881_7: Tena hi pahānaṃ idha sabbavāresu adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0201t:881_9: Maggapaṭipāṭipana catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ desanākkamopi tāya desanāya paṭipajjanakkamopi tāya paṭipattiyā uppattikkamopi.
tika-s0201t:881_10: Tattha ye ye kilesā yena yena maggena pahīyanti,
tika-s0201t:881_11: maggapaṭipāṭiṃ anoloketvā tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ tena tena maggena pahānadassanaṃ kilesapaṭipāṭi na kilesānaṃ
tika-s0201t:881_12: uppattikkamo idha desanākkamo cāti dassento “abhijjhā visamalobho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:881_13: Yena yena pana maggena ye ye kilesā pahīyanti maggānupubbiyā,
tika-s0201t:881_14: tena tena maggena tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānadassanaṃ maggapaṭipāṭiyā pahānadassananti dassento “sotāpattimaggenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:882_4: Sotāpattimaggavajjhā vā hontu sesamaggavajjhā vāheṭṭhā dassitamaggapaṭipāṭivasena.
tika-s0201t:882_7: yesaṃ panettha heṭṭhimamaggavajjhānaṃ idha saṅgahe kāraṇaṃ pacchā vattukāmena aggamaggavajjhānaṃ anādiyitvā
tika-s0201t:882_8: kasmā tatiyamaggavajjhānameva gahaṇaṃ katanti āha “ayamettha paveṇimaggāgato sambhavo”ti,
tika-s0201t:882_9: ayaṃ imassa suttassa etasmiṃ ṭhāne ācariyapaveṇiyā kathāmaggo tato āgato atthasambhavo atthatatvanti attho.
tika-s0201t:882_10: Tattha heṭṭhimamaggavajjhānaṃ idha saṅgahe kāraṇaṃ pacchā vattukāmo aggamaggavajjhānaṃ aggahaṇe yuttiṃ dassento “so cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:882_18: visesato pañcakāmaguṇalobhena saṭho māyāvī ca hoti,
tika-s0201t:882_22: Tanti paṭhamamaggeneva pahānaṃ pubbāparena na sandhiyati “yathodhi kho”ti ettha odhivacanassa maggattayavācakattā.
tika-s0201t:882_23: Ratanattaye aveccappasādo nāma ariyakantasīlaṃ viya sotāpannassa aṅgāni,
tika-s0201t:882_25: tasmā idha vuttappahānaṃ vikkhambhanapahānamevāti keci vadanti.
tika-s0201t:882_26: Tesaṃ icchāmattameva yathāvuttapahānasseva vasena aveccappasādānaṃ odhiso pahānassa vibhāvitattā,
tika-s0201t:883_2: yato ekamekassapi upakkilesassa sabhāvādito dassanaṃ niyyānamukhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:883_4: Anāgāmimaggavasena pahānaṃ vatvā pasādassa uddhaṭattā vuttaṃ “anāgāmimaggena lokuttarappasādo āgato”ti.
tika-s0201t:883_10: Avecca ratanattayaguṇe yāthāvato ñatvā pasādo aveccappasādo.
tika-s0201t:883_11: So pana yasmā maggenāgatattā kenaci akampaniyo appadhaṃsiyo ca hoti,
tika-s0201t:883_13: Tattha lokuttaro sabbaso buddhaguṇādīsu sammohaṃ viddhaṃsento tattha kiccato pavattati,
tika-s0201t:884_4: Paccavekkhatoti “asukasmiñca ṭhāne ime cime corā evañca evañca vināsitā”ti paccavekkhato rañño viya.
tika-s0201t:885_2: kho saddo avadhāraṇeti dassento “sakasakaodhivasena cattameva hotī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:885_4: Sakasakaodhivasenāti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “dve odhī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:885_5: Tattha yaṃmaggavajjhāti yena maggena anavasesato pahātabbā.
tika-s0201t:885_6: Anavasesappahānavasena hi taṃtaṃmaggavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ tadaññamaggavajjhehi asammissatā,
tika-s0201t:885_8: te heṭṭhimamaggehi pahīnāpāyagamanīyādisabhāvā eva tehi pahīyantīti pahānavasena sammissā siyuṃ.
tika-s0201t:885_9: Tena teyeva pahīnā hontīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0201t:885_11: Paṭipakkhesu odhiso pavattikiccattā odhīti heṭṭhā tayo maggā vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:886_8: Muttampi kiñci muttabandhanā viya phalaṃ kuhiñci tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0201t:886_11: Yathā kiñci dunnissaṭṭhaṃ puna ādāya sammadeva nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhanti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:886_12: evaṃ vipassanāya nissaṭṭhaṃ ādinnasadisaṃ maggena pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti dassanatthaṃ “paṭinissaṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:886_15: atha kho abhimukheneva nissaṭṭhanti dassanatthaṃ “paṭinissaṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:886_17: Upagantabbatoti attano hitasukhaṃ paccāsīsantena ekantena adhigantabbato.
tika-s0201t:887_5: Idha dhammatthasaddā hetuphalapariyāyāti imamatthaṃ pāḷiyā eva dassetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:887_6: Tameva atthañca dhammañcāti attho dhammoti ca vuttaṃ aveccappasādanimittaṃ yathāvuttaṃ kilesappahānañca.
tika-s0201t:887_9: Paccavekkhaṇākārappavattenāti etena paccavekkhaṇā evettha anavajjasabhāvatāya dhammoti vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:887_14: Paccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ cittassa samādhānaṃ idha adhippetanti āha “appitaṃ viya acalaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:888_2: dhamme saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgatomhī”ti idampi tassā paccavekkhaṇāya pavattiākārapakāsanameva,
tika-s0201t:888_4: “Yathodhi kho panā”ti idampi savisesaṃ paccavekkhaṇākārappakāsanapadanti adhippāyena “idāni yathodhi…pe…
tika-s0201t:888_6: Cattāropi pana vārā paccavekkhaṇākārappakāsanavasena ceva somanassādiānisaṃsadassanavasena ca vuttāti sakkā viññātuṃ ubhayatthāpi ubhayassa vuttattā.
tika-s0201t:888_7: Yadipi ariyamaggo ekacittakkhaṇiko na puna uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:888_8: paṭipakkhassa pana tena suppahīnattā taṃsamaṅgī aparihānadhammo taṃsīlādibhāveneva vuccatīti āha “tassa
tika-s0201t:888_10: “Evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto ahesu”ntiādīsu viya idha dhamma-
tika-s0201t:888_12: Tathā hi so sampayuttadhamme ekārammaṇe avikkhipamāne avippakiṇṇe avisaṭe katvā samaṃ,
tika-s0201t:888_13: sammā ca ādahanto tathā te dhāretīti ca vattabbataṃ arahatīti dhammoti ca vuccati.
tika-s0201t:888_18: Nevassa taṃ hoti antarāyāyāti tassa anāgāmino piṇḍapātabhojanaṃ neva hoti antarāyāya ukkaṃsagatāya paccavekkhaṇāya paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanato.
tika-s0201t:888_19: Tañcassā ukkaṃsagamanaṃ hatapaṭipakkhattāti dassento “maggena visuddhacittattā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:889_2: Ettha ca “nevassa taṃ hoti antarāyāyā”ti iminā heṭṭhā vuttappahānaṃ anāgāmimaggenevāti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:889_3: Anāgāmino hi sabbaso kāmarāgo pahīno hoti,
tika-s0201t:889_4: rasataṇhāya abhāvato tādisapiṇḍapātaparibhogo aggamaggādhigame kathañcipi antarāyāya na hotīti.
tika-s0201t:889_7: vattha”nti vadanto bhagavāādimhi attanā upanītavatthūpamaṃ anusandheti.
tika-s0201t:889_11: taṃ pariyodātanti vattabbataṃ labhatīti āha “pariyodātaṃ pabhassaratāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:889_12: Ukkaṃ bandheyyāti aṅgārakapallaṃ yathā dārughaṭikaṅgārādikena na bhijjati,
tika-s0201t:889_14: Meghapaṭalato verambhavātadhārāsaṅghaṭṭanato vijjutā viya kevalaṃ vātadhārāsaṅghaṭṭanajanitā pabhā ukkāpabhā,
tika-s0201t:889_15: sā pana yasmā dvinnaṃ vātadhārānaṃ vegasambhūtasaṅghaṭṭanahetukā,
