tika-s0201t:1128_12: saddo “jātidhammāna”ntiādīsu viyāti kāyassa paccayasamavāye uppajjanapakatikānupassī “samudayadhammānupassī”ti vutto. Tenāha –
tika-s0201t:1128_14: Evañca katvā kāyasminti bhummavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1128_15: Vayadhammānupassīti ettha ahetukattepi vināsassa yesaṃ hetudhammānaṃ abhāve yaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1128_16: tadabhāvo tassa abhāvassa hotu viya voharīyatīti upacārato karajakāyādiabhāvo assāsapassāsakāyassa vayakāraṇaṃ vutto.
tika-s0201t:1128_19: Dutiyavikappavasena pana upacārena vināyeva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1128_20: Ajjhattabahiddhānupassanā viya bhinnavatthuvisayatāya samudayavayadhammānupassanāpi ekakāle na labbhatīti
tika-s0201t:1129_1: saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti “kāyova atthī”ti vatvā avadhāraṇena nivatthitaṃ dassento “na satto”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1129_5: Tassa sattanikāyassa pūraṇato ca cavanupapajjanadhammatāya galanato ca “puggalo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1129_14: kevalaṃ kāyo eva atthīti attattaniyasuññatameva kāyassa vibhāveti.
tika-s0201t:1129_18: Imassa hi vuttanayena “atthi kāyo”ti aparāparuppattivasena paccupaṭṭhitā sati bhiyyoso mattāya tattha ñāṇassa satiyā ca paribrūhanāya hoti.
tika-s0201t:1130_2: Tathābhūto ca loke kiñci “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā gahetabbaṃ na passati,
tika-s0201t:1130_6: saddo heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhassa tādisassa atthassa abhāvato avuttasamuccayatthoti dassento “upari atthaṃ upādāyā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1130_7: “Eva”nti pana niddiṭṭhākārassa paccāmasanaṃ nigamanavasena katanti āha “iminā pana…pe…
tika-s0201t:1130_11: tassa samuṭṭhāpikā taṇhā tassāpi samuṭṭhāpikā eva nāma hoti tadabhāve abhāvatoti āha “tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1133_5: Gacchanto vā hi satto kāyena kattabbakiriyaṃ kareyya ṭhito vā nisinno vā nipanno vāti.
tika-s0201t:1133_11: Gacchanto vātiādi gamanādimattajānanassa gamanādigatavisesajānanassa ca sādhāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1133_13: gamanādigatavisesajānanaṃ pana adhippetanti taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tattha kāma”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1133_14: Sattūpaladdhinti satto atthīti upaladdhiṃ sattaggāhaṃ na jahati na pariccajati “ahaṃ gacchāmi,
tika-s0201t:1133_16: Tato eva attasaññaṃ “atthi attā kārako vedako”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ na ugghāṭeti nāpaneti apaṭipakkhabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1133_18: Evaṃ bhūtassa cassa kuto kammaṭṭhānādibhāvoti āha “kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1133_20: Tameva hi atthaṃ vivarituṃ “idaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1133_24: Kiṃkāraṇāti pana paṭikkhittakattukāya gamanakiriyāya aviparītakāraṇapucchā “gamananti attā manasā saṃyujjati,
tika-s0201t:1134_0: Na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhito tabbinimuttassa ca kassaci abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1134_2: Tattha cittakiriyā ca sā vāyodhātuyā vipphāro vipphandanañcāti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāro, tena.
tika-s0201t:1134_6: “Gacchatī”ti vatvā yathā pavattamāne kāye “gacchatī”ti vohāro hoti,
tika-s0201t:1135_0: “Eseva nayo”ti atidesavasena saṅkhepato vatvā tamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ “tatrāpi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1136_0: Evaṃ pajānatoti evaṃ cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva gamanādibhāvo hotīti pajānato tassa evaṃ pajānanāya
tika-s0201t:1136_1: nicchayagamanatthaṃ “evaṃ hotī”ti vicāraṇā vuccati loke yathābhūtaṃ ajānantehi micchābhinivesavasena,
tika-s0201t:1136_3: Atthi panāti attano eva vīmaṃsanavasena pucchāvacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1137_0: Nāvā mālutavegenāti yathā acetanā nāvā vātavegena desantaraṃ yāti,
tika-s0201t:1137_1: yathā ca acetano tejanaṃ kaṇḍo jiyāvegena desantaraṃ yāti,
tika-s0201t:1137_2: tathā acetano kāyo vātāhato yathāvuttavāyunā nīto desantaraṃ yātīti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1137_3: Sace pana koci vadeyya “yathā nāvāya tejanassa ca pellakassa purisassa vasena desantaragamanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1137_6: Yathā hi nāvā tejanānaṃ saṃhatalakkhaṇasseva purisassa vasena gamanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1138_0: Tattha payuttanti heṭṭhā vuttanayena gamanādikiriyāvasena payojitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1138_8: Vajeti vajeyya gaccheyya ko nāmāti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:1138_10: saddoti hetupaccayavirahena ṭhānagamanapaṭikkhepamukhena sabbāyapi dhammappavattiyā paccayādhīnavuttitāvibhāvanena
tika-s0201t:1139_0: Paṇihitoti yathā yathā paccayehi pakārato nihito ṭhapito.
tika-s0201t:1139_2: pubbe visuṃ visuṃ iriyāpathānaṃ vuttattā idaṃ tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vacananti attho.
tika-s0201t:1139_3: Purimanayo vā iriyāpathappadhāno vuttoti tattha kāyo appadhāno anunipphādīti idha kāyaṃ padhānaṃ appadhānañca
tika-s0201t:1139_4: iriyāpathaṃ anunipphādaṃ katvā dassetuṃ dutiyanayo vuttoti evampettha dvinnaṃ nayānaṃ viseso veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1140_0: Iriyāpathapariggaṇhanampi iriyāpathavato kāyasseva pariggaṇhanaṃ tassa avatthāvisesabhāvatoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:1140_5: saddena yathā “taṇhāsamudayā kammasamudayā āhārasamudayā”ti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rupakkhandhassa
tika-s0201t:1140_6: udayaṃ passatīti ime cattāro āhārā saṅgayhanti,
tika-s0201t:1140_7: evaṃ “avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhā”tiādayopi pañca ākārā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1143_8: Tathā paṭikkamanaṃ paṭikkantanti āha “paṭikkantaṃ vuccati nivattana”nti.
tika-s0201t:1144_1: tena attanā kātabbassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti āha “sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1144_3: Sampajaññaṃ karotevāti abhikkantādīsu asammohaṃ uppādeti eva.
tika-s0201t:1144_4: Sampajānassa vā kāro etassa atthīti sampajānakārī.
tika-s0201t:1144_5: Dhammato vaḍḍhisaṅkhātena saha atthena pavattatīti sātthakaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1144_8: Sappāyassa attano upakārāvahassa hitassa sampajānanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ abhikkamādīsu bhikkhācāragocare,
tika-s0201t:1144_9: aññatthāpi ca pavattesu avijahite kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1145_1: Attho nāma dhammato vaḍḍhīti yaṃ sātthakanti adhippetaṃ gamanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1145_2: taṃ sappāyamevāti siyā kassaci āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ “cetiyadassanaṃ tāvā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1145_6: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1146_1: ananuvattanakathā pana tassā dutiyā nāma hotīti āha “dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1147_2: Yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti vuccatīti āha “kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocara”nti.
tika-s0201t:1147_7: Na paccāharatīti āhārūpabhogato yāva divāṭṭhānupasaṅkamanā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paṭineti.
tika-s0201t:1148_1: Dve tayo pallaṅketi dve tayo nisajjāvāre,
tika-s0201t:1148_8: “Paribhogacetiyato sarīracetiyaṃ garutara”nti katvā “cetiyaṃ vanditvā”ti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1148_9: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “cetiyaṃ bādhayamānā bodhisākhā haritabbā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1149_0: Janasaṅgahatthanti “mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī”ti dhammānuggahena janasaṅgahatthaṃ. Tasmāti.
tika-s0201t:1149_2: yasmā ca dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā.
tika-s0201t:1151_5: yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati,
tika-s0201t:1151_6: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti evaṃ vutta pañcavidhacetokhilavinibandhacitto.
tika-s0201t:1152_4: Atha vā viññūnaṃ nibbisesattā attabhāvapariyāpannattā ca attā nāma dhammo,
tika-s0201t:1152_9: Soyeva nayoti “ayaṃ bhikkhū”tiādiko yo ṭhāne vutto,
tika-s0201t:1153_0: Bahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmīti amhākaṃ atthāya lokanāthena cha vassāni kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ evāhaṃ yathāsatti pūjessāmīti.
tika-s0201t:1154_0: Vīthiṃ otaritvā ito cito ca anoloketvā paṭhamameva vīthiyo sallakkhetabbāti āha “vīthiyo sallakkhetvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1155_3: Tattha paccekabodhiyā upanissayasampadā kappānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca tajjaṃ puññañāṇasambharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1155_6: itaresaṃ atītāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭasannissayavasena nibbattitaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ kusalaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1155_7: Bāhiyo dārucīriyoti bahi visaye sañjātasaṃvaḍḍhatāya bāhiyo,
tika-s0201t:1156_1: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute… mute…
tika-s0201t:1157_2: Attā abhikkamatīti iminā andhaputhujjanassa diṭṭhiggāhavasena abhikkame sammuyhanaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:1157_4: tadubhayaṃ pana taṇhāya vinā na hotīti taṇhāggāhavasenapi sammuyhanaṃ dassitameva hoti.
tika-s0201t:1157_5: “Tathā asammuyhanto”ti vatvā taṃ asammuyhanaṃ yena ghanavinibbhogena hoti,
tika-s0201t:1157_7: Tattha yasmā vāyodhātuyā anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa paccayo.
tika-s0201t:1157_8: Uddharaṇagatikā hi tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1157_12: Yasmā pana tejodhātuyā anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ paccayo.
tika-s0201t:1157_13: Tiriyagatikāya hi vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1157_21: ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā purato haraṇaṃ atiharaṇaṃ khāṇuādipariharaṇatthaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1157_25: tato paraṃ haraṇaṃ vītiharaṇanti ayaṃ vā etesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0201t:1158_0: Yasmā pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātu vossajjanassa paccayo.
tika-s0201t:1158_1: Garutarasabhāvā hi āpodhātūti vossajjane pathavīdhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1158_5: Yasmā pana āpodhātuyā anugatā pathavīdhātu sannikkhepanassa paccayo,
tika-s0201t:1158_6: patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi tassā sātisayakiccattā āpodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1158_7: tathā ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuyā vasena sannirumbhanassa sijjhanato tatthāpi pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuanugatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1158_10: tesu vā vuttesu uddharaṇādīsu chasu koṭṭhāsesu.
tika-s0201t:1158_13: taṃsamuṭṭhāpakā arūpadhammā ca atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0201t:1158_19: Atiittaro hi rūpadhammānampi pavattikkhaṇo gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1158_21: Yathā tilānaṃ bhajjiyamānānaṃ paṭapaṭāyanena bhedo lakkhīyati,
tika-s0201t:1159_0: Saddhiṃ rūpenāti idaṃ tassa tassa cittassa nirodhena saddhiṃ nirujjhanakarūpadhammānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1159_9: Cittacetasikā hi sārammaṇasabhāvā yathābalaṃ attano ārammaṇapaccayabhūtamatthaṃ vibhāvento eva uppajjantīti
tika-s0201t:1159_12: evaṃ tesaṃ pakāsetabbabhāvanivatti soḷasahi cittehi hotīti taṅkhaṇāyukatā tesaṃ icchitā,
tika-s0201t:1159_18: pacchājātapaccayo ca tassevāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ samānakkhaṇatā na yujjateva,
tika-s0201t:1160_1: aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti yaṃ purimuppannaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1160_3: taṃ pana nirujjhantaṃ aparassa anantarādipaccayabhāveneva nirujjhatīti tato laddhapaccayaṃ aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1160_4: Yadi evaṃ tesaṃ antaro labbheyyāti noti āha “avīcimanusambandho”ti,
tika-s0201t:1160_7: evaṃ anu anu sambandho cittasantāno rūpasantāno ca nadīsotova nadiyaṃ udakappavāho viya vattati.
tika-s0201t:1161_1: Yasmā yaṃdisābhimukho gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati vā,
tika-s0201t:1161_3: tasmā tadanugataṃ vidisālokanaṃ vilokitanti āha “vilokitaṃ nāma anudisāpekkhana”nti.
tika-s0201t:1161_6: pacchato āgacchantaparissayassa parivajjanādīsu apalokitassa siyā sambhavoti āha “iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1162_2: So hi āyasmā vipassanākāle eva “yamevāhaṃ indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ nissāya sāsane anabhiratiādivippakāraṃ patto,
tika-s0201t:1162_7: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
tika-s0201t:1163_0: Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca ālokitavilokitassa veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1163_3: khandhādikammaṭṭhānā añño upāyo na gavesitabboti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1163_5: tasmā tassa yāthāvato jānanaṃ asammohasampajaññanti dassetuṃ “abbhantare”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1164_1: na hotī”ti idaṃ pañcadvāraviññāṇavīthiyaṃ “itthī puriso”ti rajjanādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1164_2: Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobho,
tika-s0201t:1164_8: Āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena ittarabhāvavasena ca vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1164_9: Heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesūti heṭṭhimassa uparimassa ca aparāparaṃ bhaṅgappattimāha.
tika-s0201t:1165_1: Tatthāti pañcakkhandhavasena ālokanavilokane paññāyamāne tabbinimutto ko eko āloketi,
tika-s0201t:1166_0: Maṇisappo nāma ekā sappajātīti vadanti. Laḷananti kampananti vadanti, līḷākaraṇaṃ vā laḷanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1167_1: Sīlassa vidūsanena ahitāvahattā micchājīvavasena uppannaṃ asappāyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1167_2: Cīvarampi acetanantiādinā cīvarassa viya “kāyopi acetano”ti kāyassa attasuññatāvibhāvanena “abbhantare”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:1168_1: Pathavīsandhārakajalassa taṃsandhārakavāyunā viya paribhuttassa āhārassa vāyodhātunāva āsaye avaṭṭhānanti āha “vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1168_8: Ettha ca āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasaṃcuṇṇanavisosanāni pathavīdhātusahitā eva vāyodhātu karoti,
tika-s0201t:1168_9: na kevalāti tāni pathavīdhātuyāpi kiccabhāvena vuttāni.
tika-s0201t:1168_10: Allattañca anupāletīti vāyuādīhi atisosanaṃ yathā na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1168_11: tathā anupāleti allaādīhi atisosanaṃ yathā na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1168_14: Sā hi anto paviṭṭhaṃ āhāraṃ paripāceti.
tika-s0201t:1168_15: Añjaso hotīti āhārassa pavesanādīnaṃ maggo hoti.
tika-s0201t:1168_21: Atha vā sammāpayogaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ anvāya āgamma ābhujati samannāharati.
tika-s0201t:1168_22: Ābhogapubbako hi sabbopi viññāṇabyāpāroti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1169_4: Āsayati ettha ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti āsayo,
tika-s0201t:1169_7: Nidheti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo.
tika-s0201t:1170_2: Nissaṭṭhattā neva attano kassaci anissajjitattā jigucchanīyattā ca na parassa.
tika-s0201t:1171_2: Cuṇṇikairiyāpathā vihāre aññatthāpi ito cito ca parivattanādivasena pavattāti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1171_3: “Gateti gamane”ti pubbe abhikkamapaṭikkamaggahaṇena gamanenapi purato pacchato ca kāyassa atiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahitanti keci.
tika-s0201t:1172_0: Yasmā mahāsīvattheravāde anantare anantare iriyāpathe pavattarūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā gahitā,
tika-s0201t:1172_2: tasmā vuttaṃ “tayidaṃ mahāsīvattherena vuttaṃ asammohadhuraṃ imasmiṃ satipaṭṭhānabhutte adhippeta”nti.
tika-s0201t:1172_3: Sāmaññaphale pana sabbampi catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ labbhati yāvadeva sāmaññaphalavisesadassanaparattā tassā desanāya.
tika-s0201t:1172_7: Na hi kadāci satirahitā ñāṇappavatti atthi.
tika-s0201t:1172_10: Imināpi sampajaññassa viya satiyāpi padhānataṃyeva vibhāveti.
tika-s0201t:1173_1: eko bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento gacchati,
tika-s0201t:1173_3: tathā eko tiṭṭhanto nisīdanto sayanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento sayati,
tika-s0201t:1173_5: etthakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamanena dīpenti.
tika-s0201t:1173_6: Yo hi bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti “pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattā
tika-s0201t:1173_8: pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddā,
tika-s0201t:1173_9: caṅkamanamajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0201t:1173_10: caṅkame pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0201t:1173_13: evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti,
tika-s0201t:1173_15: ayaṃ bhikkhu gatādīsu sampajānakārī nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:1173_18: tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā sayati “kāyo acetano,
tika-s0201t:1174_2: tasmiṃ sati jāgaritaṃ nāma hotīti pariggaṇhanto jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0201t:1174_3: Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
tika-s0201t:1174_4: Vimuttāyatanasīsena dhammaṃ desentopi bāttiṃsatiracchānakathaṃ pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ sappāyakathaṃ kathentopi bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0201t:1174_5: Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ manasikāraṃ pavattentopi dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannopi tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0201t:1174_6: Dutiyañhi jhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhāravirahato visesato tuṇhībhāvo nāma.
tika-s0201t:1174_7: Rūpadhammasseva pavattiākāravisesā abhikkamādayoti vuttaṃ “rūpakkhandhasseva samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1177_4: Antarenapi hi bhāvavācinaṃ saddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā “paṭassa sukka”nti.
tika-s0201t:1177_7: Vatthādīhi pasibbakākārena bandhitvā kataṃ āvaṭanaṃ putoḷi.
tika-s0201t:1177_8: Vibhūtākāroti paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamitvā asubhabhāvassa upaṭṭhitākāro. Iti-
tika-s0201t:1177_9: saddassa ākāratthataṃ dassento “eva”nti vatvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sarūpato dassento “kesādipariggahaṇenā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1180_1: Dhātumanasikāravasenāti pathavīdhātuādikā catasso dhātuyo ārabbha pavattabhāvanāmanasikāravasena,
tika-s0201t:1180_3: Dhātumanasikāro dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ catudhātuvavatthānanti hi atthato ekaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1180_7: saddassa vā gativinivattiatthatāya aññattha ṭhapetvā gamanaṃ sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya bodhako,
tika-s0201t:1180_8: idha pana yathā tathā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārabodhako adhippetoti āha “catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhita”nti.
tika-s0201t:1180_10: Ṭhānādayo hi iriyāpathasaṅkhātāya kāyikakiriyāya patho pavattimaggoti “iriyāpatho”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:1180_15: Ṭhitanti vā kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccavasena avaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1180_16: Paṇihitanti paccayakiccavasena tehi tehi paccayehi pakārato nihitaṃ paṇihitanti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1181_0: Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ bhāvatthavibhāvanavasena dassetuṃ “yathā goghātakassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1181_5: Gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati yāni aṅgapaccaṅgāni yathāsanniviṭṭhāni upādāya gāvīsamaññā matamattāyapi gāviyā,
tika-s0201t:1181_7: Vilīyanti bhijjanti vibhujjantīti bīlā bhāgā va-
tika-s0201t:1181_17: Dhātuso paccavekkhatoti ghanavinibbhogakaraṇena dhātuṃ dhātuṃ pathavīādidhātuṃ visuṃ visuṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa.
tika-s0201t:1181_19: vohāravasena pavattasattasaññāyapi tadā antaradhānaṃ yuttameva yāthāvato ghanavinibbhogassa sampādanato.
tika-s0201t:1181_20: Evañhi sati yathāvuttaopammatthena upameyyattho aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti.
tika-s0201t:1181_23: yathājāte sūnasmiṃ naṅguṭṭhakhuravisāṇādivante aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamudāye avibhatte gāvīsamaññā,
tika-s0201t:1181_26: Catumahāpatho viya catuiriyāpathoti gāviyā ṭhitacatumahāpatho viya kāyassa pavattimaggabhūto catubbidho iriyāpatho.
tika-s0201t:1184_1: Sivathikāya apaviddhauddhumātakādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ odhiso pavattānaṃ kathānaṃ tadabhidheyyānañca uddhumātakādiasubhabhāgānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1184_4: Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānāti jīvitakkhayato upari maraṇato paraṃ.
tika-s0201t:1184_12: Kucchitaṃ vinīlaṃ vinīlakanti kucchanattho vā ayaṃ ka-
tika-s0201t:1184_13: kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā “pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1185_0: So bhikkhūti yo “passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍita”nti vutto,
tika-s0201t:1185_8: na āyuādīnaṃ avigame viya mattasoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1186_1: Sesāvasesamaṃsalohitayuttanti sabbaso akhāditattā tahaṃ tahaṃ sesena appāvasesena maṃsalohitena yuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1186_2: Aññena hatthaṭṭhikanti avisesena hatthaṭṭhikānaṃ vippakiṇṇatā jotitāti anavasesato tesaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ dassento “catusaṭṭhibhedampī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1186_4: Tāni pana saṃvaccharaṃ vītivattāni hontīti āha “atikkantasaṃvaccharānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1186_5: Purāṇatāya ghanabhāvavigamena vicuṇṇatā idha pūtibhāvoti so yathā hoti,
tika-s0201t:1186_7: Khajjamānatādivasena dutiyasivathikapabbādīnaṃ vavatthitatthā vuttaṃ “khajjamānādīnaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1188_0: Imāneva dveti avadhāraṇena appanākammaṭṭhānaṃ tattha niyameti aññapabbesu tadabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1188_3: tena pabbadvayassa vipassanākammaṭṭhānatāpi appaṭisiddhāti daṭṭhabbā aniccādidassanato.
tika-s0201t:1188_4: Saṅkhāresu ādīnavavibhāvanāni sivathikapabbānīti āha “sivathikānaṃ ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttattā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1188_5: Iriyāpathapabbādīnaṃ anappanāvahatā pākaṭā evāti “sesāni dvādasāpī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1191_4: khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca ābādhanti sukhā.
tika-s0201t:1192_0: “Vohāramattaṃ hotī”ti etena “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti idaṃ vohāramattanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1192_4: Dhammavinimuttassa aññassa kattu abhāvato dhammasseva kattubhāvaṃ dassento “vedanāva vedayatī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1192_6: Balavato vedanāvegassa nirodhane ādīnavaṃ disvā tassa avasaradānavasena nitthunanto.
tika-s0201t:1192_7: Vīriyasamataṃ yojetvāti adhivāsanavīriyassa adhimattattā tassa hāpanavasena samādhinā samarasatāpādanena vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā.
tika-s0201t:1192_9: Lokiyānampi vā sati uppattikāle tattha samatthataṃ sandhāyāha “saha paṭisambhidāhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1193_1: evaṃ dukkhanti yathā “sukhaṃ vedayatī”tiādinā sampajānavediyanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1193_6: khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sātanti dukkhā.
tika-s0201t:1193_13: Catudhātuvavatthānaṃ kathesīti etthāpi “yebhuyyenā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1194_0: Yebhuyyaggahaṇena tadaññadhammavasenapi arūpakammaṭṭhānakathāya atthitā dīpitāti taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tividho hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1194_4: sammasanaṃ pana anavasesatova dhamme pariggahetvā vattati.
tika-s0201t:1194_5: Pariggahite rūpakammaṭṭhāneti idaṃ rūpamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1194_6: arūpamukhena pana vipassanābhiniveso yebhūyyena samathayānikassa icchitabbo,
tika-s0201t:1194_7: so ca paṭhamaṃ jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvā tato paraṃ sesadhamme pariggaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1194_8: Paṭhamābhinipātoti sabbe cetasikā cittāyattā cittakiriyabhāvena vuccantīti phasso cittassa paṭhamābhinipāto vutto,
tika-s0201t:1194_10: cittacetasikarāsi vā ārammaṇena phuṭṭho phassasahajātāya vedanāya taṃsamakālameva vedeti,
tika-s0201t:1194_11: phasso pana obhāsassa viya padīpo vedanādīnaṃ paccayaviseso hotīti purimakālo viya vuccati,
tika-s0201t:1194_14: Ayañhi arūpadhammatā ekadesena anallīyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhu,
tika-s0201t:1194_15: saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇañca phusanto viya saṅghaṭṭento viya ca pavattati.
tika-s0201t:1195_0: Ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantīti issaravatāya visavitāya sāmibhāvena ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavantī.
tika-s0201t:1195_1: Phassādīnañhi sampayuttadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe ekadeseneva pavatti phusanādimattabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1195_2: vedanāya pana iṭṭhākārasambhogādivasena pavattanato ārammaṇe nippadesato pavatti.
tika-s0201t:1195_4: vedayitābhāvena gahaṇaṃ yathākāmaṃ sabbānubhavanaṃ evasabhāvāneva tāni gahaṇānīti na vedanāya viya phassādīnampi
tika-s0201t:1195_7: Viññāṇañhi minitabbavatthuṃ nāḷiyā minanto puriso viya ārammaṇaṃ paricchijja vibhāventaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0201t:1195_9: Tathā hi anena kadāci lakkhaṇattayavibhāvanāpi hoti.
tika-s0201t:1195_10: Imesaṃ pana phassādīnaṃ tassa tassa pākaṭabhāvo paccayavisesasiddhassa pubbābhogassa vasena veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1196_4: abhijāna”nti ca evamādivacanato sabbe sammasanupagā dhammā pariggahetabbāti dassento “tattha yassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1196_5: Tattha phassapañcamakeyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ tadantogadhattā taggahaṇeneva gahitattā catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1196_7: tattha ca phassacetanāggahaṇena sabbasaṅkhārakkhandhadhammasaṅgaho cetanāpadhānattā tesaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1196_8: Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhavibhaṅge “cakkhusamphassajā cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva vibhattā,
tika-s0201t:1197_1: saddo karajakāyavisayoti kathamidaṃ viññāyatīti āha “yaṃ sandhāya vutta”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:1197_5: Pañcakkhandhavinimuttaṃ nāmarūpaṃ natthīti idaṃ adhikāravasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1197_9: vicaratīti iminā balavavipassanaṃ vatvā puna tassa ussukkāpanaṃ visesādhigamanañca dassento “so”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1198_1: tassā pana vedanānupassanāvasena kathetabbattā bhagavā vedanāvasena kathesi.
tika-s0201t:1198_2: Yathāvuttesu ca tīsu kammaṭṭhānābhinivesesu vedanāvasena kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso sukaro vedanānaṃ vibhūtabhāvatoti
tika-s0201t:1198_4: Na pākaṭaṃ hotīti idaṃ tādise puggale sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1198_5: yesaṃ ādito vedanāva vibhūtatarā hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0201t:1198_9: Vedanānaṃ uppattipākaṭatāyāti ca idaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1198_12: Tadubhayaggahaṇamukhena vā gahetabbattā itarāyapi pavatti viññūnaṃ pākaṭā evāti “vedanāna”nti avisesaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1198_14: Neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedetīti tasmiṃ sukhavedanāsamaṅgisamaye neva dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti niruddhattā,
tika-s0201t:1199_0: Kilesehi āmasitabbato āmisaṃ nāma pañca kāmaguṇā,
tika-s0201t:1199_3: Ito paranti “atthi vedanā”ti evamādipāḷiṃ sandhāyāha “kāyānupassanāyaṃ vuttanayamevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1202_5: sammasanacārassa pana idhādhippetattā tebhūmakasseva gahaṇanti “lokiyakusalābyākata”nti vatvā “idaṃ panā”tiādinā tameva adhippāyaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0201t:1202_9: tannimittakatāya pana siyā taṃsahitatālesoti nattheva vītarāgatāpīti dukavinimuttatā evettha labbhatīti āha “neva purimapadaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1202_13: Akusalamūlesu saha moheneva vattatīti samohanti āha “vicikicchāsahagatañceva uddhaccasahagatañcā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1202_14: Yasmā cettha saheva mohenāti samohanti purimapadāvadhāraṇampi labbhatiyeva,
tika-s0201t:1202_16: Yathā pana atimūḷhatāya pāṭipuggalikanayena savisesaṃ mohavantatāya momūhacittanti vattabbato vicikicchuddhaccasahagatadvayaṃ
tika-s0201t:1202_19: Sampayogavasena thinamiddhena anupatitaṃ anugatanti thinamiddhānupatitaṃ pañcavidhaṃ sasaṅkhārikākusalacittaṃ saṅkuṭitacittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1202_21: Paccayavisesavasena thāmajātena uddhaccena sahagataṃ pavattaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti uddhaccasahagataṃ,
tika-s0201t:1203_0: Kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāya vipulaphalatāya dīghasantānatāya ca mahantabhāvaṃ gataṃ,
tika-s0201t:1203_1: mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gataṃ paṭipannanti mahaggataṃ.
tika-s0201t:1203_2: Taṃ pana rūpārūpabhūmikaṃ tato mahantassa loke abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1203_4: Tassa cettha paṭiyogī parittamevāti āha “amahaggatanti kāmāvacara”nti.
tika-s0201t:1203_5: Attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi saha uttarehīti sauttaraṃ,
tika-s0201t:1203_18: taṃ ubhayavimuttirahitanti gayhamāne lokuttaracittepi siyā āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ “samuccheda…pe…
tika-s0201t:1207_1: Pahātabbādidhammavibhāgadassanavasena pañcadhā dhammānupassanā niddiṭṭhāti ayamattho pāḷito eva viññāyatīti
tika-s0201t:1207_5: Yesañhi veneyyānaṃ pahātabbadhammesu paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇāni vibhāgena vattabbāni,
tika-s0201t:1207_6: tesaṃ vasenettha bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇesu dhammānupassanā kathitā.
tika-s0201t:1207_9: bhāvetabbesu bojjhaṅgesu pariññeyādivibhāgesu saccesu ca uttarā desanā desitā,
tika-s0201t:1207_10: tasmā cettha samathabhāvanāpi yāvadeva vipassanatthaṃ icchitā,
tika-s0201t:1207_11: vipassanāpadhānā vipassanābahulā ca satipaṭṭhānadesanāti tassā vipassanābhinivesavibhāgena desitabhāvaṃ vibhāvento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1207_17: So pana “kāmacchandassa uppādo hotī”ti vuttattā kāmacchandassa kāraṇākārova,
tika-s0201t:1208_3: tenākārena pavattanakassa aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā “subhanimitta”nti ca. Iṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1208_7: Tatthāti nipphādetabbe ārammaṇabhūte ca duvidhepi subhanimitte.
tika-s0201t:1209_3: Kesādīsu hi saññā asubhasaññāti girimānandasutte vuttāti.
tika-s0201t:1209_4: Ettha ca catubbidhassa ayonisomanasikārassa yonisomanasikārassa ca gahaṇaṃ niravasesadassanatthaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1210_4: Bhojane mattaññuno thinamiddhābhibhavābhāvā otāraṃ alabhamāno kāmacchando pahīyatīti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1211_0: Paṭighampi purimuppannaṃ paṭighanimittaṃ parato uppajjanakapaṭighassa kāraṇanti katvā.
tika-s0201t:1212_0: Mettāyanassa sattesu hitapharaṇassa uppādanaṃ pavattanaṃ mettānimittassa uggaho.
tika-s0201t:1212_5: vihārādiuddesarahitaṃ puratthimādidisāvasena anodhisakadisāpharaṇanti evaṃ vā dvidhā uggahaṇaṃ sandhāya “odhisakaanodhisakadisāpharaṇāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1212_12: sukhī attānaṃ pariharantū”ti catudhā pavattito vīsatividhā anodhisakapharaṇā mettā,
tika-s0201t:1212_13: “sabbā itthiyo, purisā, ariyā, anariyā, devā, manussā,
tika-s0201t:1212_14: vinipātikā”ti sattodhikaraṇavasena pavattā sattavidhā aṭṭhavīsatividhā vā,
tika-s0201t:1212_15: dasahi disāhi disodhikaraṇavasena pavattā dasavidhā ca,
tika-s0201t:1212_16: ekekāya vā disāya sattādiitthādiaverādibhedena asītādhikacatusatappabhedā ca odhibhopharaṇā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1213_4: Ukkaṇṭhitā pantasenāsanesu adhikusalesu dhammesu ca uppajjanabhāvariñcanā.
tika-s0201t:1214_1: tappaṭipakkhānaṃ visosanasabhāvatāya ca ārambhadhātuādito pavattavīriyanti āha “paṭhamārambhavīriya”nti.
tika-s0201t:1214_4: Yasmā pana aparāparuppattiyā laddhāsevanaṃ uparūparivisesaṃ āvahantaṃ ativiya thāmagatameva hoti,
tika-s0201t:1214_5: tasmā vuttaṃ “paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavatara”nti.
tika-s0201t:1215_2: ettake na hotī”ti thinamiddhassa kāraṇākāraṇaggāho hotīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1215_3: Divā sūriyālokanti divā gahitanimittaṃ sūriyālokaṃ rattiyaṃ manasikarontassapīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1216_0: Kukkuccampi katākatānusocanavasena pavattamānaṃ cetaso avūpasamāvahatāya uddhaccena samānalakkhaṇamevāti “avūpasamo nāma avūpasantākāro,
tika-s0201t:1217_0: Bahussutassa ganthato atthato ca suttādīni vicārentassa atthavedādipaṭilābhasabbhāvato vikkhepo na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1217_1: yathāvidhipaṭipattiyā yathānurūpapaṭikārappavattiyā ca katākatānusocanañca na hotīti “bāhusaccenapi…pe…
tika-s0201t:1217_5: Buddhasevitā ca buddhasīlitaṃ āvahatīti cetaso vūpasamakarattā uddhaccakukkuccapahānakārī vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1217_6: Buddhattaṃ pana anapekkhitvā vinayadharā kukkuccavinodakā kalyāṇamittā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1217_7: Vikkhepo ca bhikkhuno yebhuyyena kukkuccahetuko hotīti “kappiyākappiyaparipucchāmahulassā”tiādinā vinayanayeneva paripucchakatādayo niddiṭṭhā.
tika-s0201t:1217_9: Kukkuccassa domanassasahagatattā anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo vutto.
tika-s0201t:1218_6: Sā hi purimuppannā parato uppajjanakavicikicchāya sabhāgahetutāya asādhāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1219_6: Kusalāpi vā hīnehi chandādīhi āraddhā hīnā,
tika-s0201t:1219_17: Atha vā kaṇhasukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā ca kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā.
tika-s0201t:1219_19: dukkhā ca vedanā sukhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgāti.
tika-s0201t:1220_1: tathāpi ratanattayavicikicchāmūlikā sesavicikicchāti katvā āha “tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1220_3: Vinaye pakataññutā “sikkhāya kaṅkhatī”ti vuttāya vicikicchāya pahānaṃ karotīti āha “vinaye ciṇṇavasībhāvassapī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1224_1: Upādānehi ārammaṇakaraṇādivasena upādātabbā vā khandhā upādānakkhandā.
tika-s0201t:1224_9: tasmā “iti rūpa”nti iminā bhūtupādādivasena yattako rūpassa bhedo,
tika-s0201t:1224_10: tena saddhiṃ rūpaṃ anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1224_14: na ito paraṃ vedanā atthīti sabhāvato vedanaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā,
tika-s0201t:1224_15: sabhāvatoti ca anubhavanasabhāvato sātādisabhāvato cāti evamādinā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1227_1: Chasu ajjhattikabāhiresūti “chasu ajjhattikesu chasu bāhiresu”ti “chasū”ti padaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1227_4: Cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā pariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṃ,
tika-s0201t:1227_17: Rūpayati vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti rūpaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1227_18: Sappati attano paccayehi harīyati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ gamīyatīti saddo.
tika-s0201t:1227_25: vitthāro pana visuddhimagge taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya ca vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1228_0: Cakkhuñca pajānātīti ettha cakkhu nāma pasādacakkhu,
tika-s0201t:1228_3: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo”ti. Ca-
tika-s0201t:1228_5: Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasenāti aviparītassa attano rasassa ceva lakkhaṇassa ca vasena,
tika-s0201t:1228_6: rūpesu āviñchanakiccassa ceva rūpābhighātārahabhūtapasādalakkhaṇassa ca vasenāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1228_7: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”tiādīsu samuditāniyeva rūpāyatanāni cakkhuviññāṇuppattihetu,
tika-s0201t:1228_8: na visuṃ visunti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ “rūpe cā”ti puthuvacanaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1228_9: tāya eva ca desanāgatiyā kāmaṃ idhāpi “rūpe ca pajānātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1228_10: rūpabhāvasāmaññena pana sabbaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “bahiddhā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpañcā”ti ekavacanavasena attho vutto.
tika-s0201t:1228_11: Sarasalakkhaṇavasenāti cakkhuviññāṇassa visayabhāvakiccassa ceva cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇassa ca vasenāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1229_3: nippariyāyakathā nāma abhidhammasannissitā evāti abhidhammanayeneva saṃyojanāni dassento “kāmarāga…pe…
tika-s0201t:1229_6: kāmo ca so rāgo cāti kāmarāgo,
tika-s0201t:1229_12: kammunā vā vipākaṃ saṃyojeti bandhatīti saṃyojanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1229_14: Sarasalakkhaṇavasenāti ettha pana sattassa vaṭṭato anissajjanasaṅkhātassa attano kiccassa ceva yathāvuttabandhanasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0201t:1230_5: Padadvayenapi balavato kāmarāgassa paccayabhūtā kāmarāguppatti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1230_7: Etaṃ ārammaṇanti etaṃ evaṃsukhumaṃ evaṃdubbibhāgaṃ ārammaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1230_10: Bhavaṃ patthentassāti “īdise sampattibhave yasmā amhākaṃ idaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ sulabhaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1230_11: tasmā āyatimpi sampattibhavo bhaveyyā”ti bhavaṃ nikāmentassa.
tika-s0201t:1230_14: Aññassa maccharāyatoti aññena asādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇena macchariyaṃ karoto.
tika-s0201t:1231_0: Tañca kāraṇanti subhanimittapaṭighanimittādivibhāvaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādirūpārammaṇañceva tajjāyonisomanasikārañcāti tassa tassa saṃyojanassa kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1231_4: Tañhi tassa tadaṅgavasena ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca pahānakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1231_6: Yadi evaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hotī”ti suttapadaṃ kathanti?
tika-s0201t:1231_9: ayaṃ pana abhidhammanayena saṃvaṇṇanāti nāyaṃ doso.
tika-s0201t:1231_15: tappaccayānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ uppādādipajānanā ca vuttanayeneva veditabbāti dassento “eseva nayo”ti atidisati.
tika-s0201t:1232_3: evañca anavasesato saparasantānesu āyatanānaṃ pariggaho siddho hoti.
tika-s0201t:1232_4: Parassa vā dhammesūti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0201t:1232_12: Khandhapabbe viya āyatanapabbepi lokuttaranivattanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ gahitaṃ natthīti āha “lokuttaradhammā na gahetabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1235_5: Udayabbayañāṇuppādato paṭṭhāya sambodhipaṭipadāyaṃ ṭhito nāma hotīti āha “āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti sambodhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1237_2: Taṃ sabbattha satokāribhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hoti.
tika-s0201t:1237_3: Yathā paccanīkadhammānaṃ pahānaṃ anurūpadhammasevanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti,
tika-s0201t:1237_6: tattha ca yuttapayuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “satisampajañña”ntiādinā.
tika-s0201t:1238_6: Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāroti kusalādīsu taṃtaṃsabhāvarasalakkhaṇādikassa yāthāvato avabujjhanavasena uppanno ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādo.
tika-s0201t:1239_1: Ācariye payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1239_3: imassa ko attho”ti khandhāyatanādiatthaṃ pucchantassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
tika-s0201t:1240_6: Sedamalamakkhitanti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena ca makkhitaṃ. Ca-
tika-s0201t:1240_14: Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0201t:1240_19: atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotīti nissayāparisuddhiyā taṃnissitāparisuddhi viya
tika-s0201t:1241_1: Yathāpaccayaṃ saddheyyavatthusmiṃ adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena paññāya avisadatāya vīriyādīnañca sithilatādinā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1241_3: Tatoti tasmā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvato itaresañca mandattā.
tika-s0201t:1241_4: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho,
tika-s0201t:1241_12: Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati,
tika-s0201t:1241_13: taṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena abhibhūtattā.
tika-s0201t:1241_14: Sahajātadhammesu indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi,
tika-s0201t:1242_2: Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenāti yassa saddheyyavatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1242_4: Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti “ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1242_6: Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0201t:1242_7: evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hoti.
tika-s0201t:1242_10: Tathā amanasikārenāti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1242_12: Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesavasena kiccuttariyato vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya.
tika-s0201t:1242_14: dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasikaroto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1242_16: vīriyādīnaṃ paṭukiccabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1243_0: Vakkalittheravatthūti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttāya katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassanapasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā “kiṃ te, vakkali,
tika-s0201t:1243_1: iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali,
tika-s0201t:1243_3: so maṃ passatī”tiādinā ovaditvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi.
tika-s0201t:1243_4: Atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsagissajjanena atthānaṃ dassetvā –
tika-s0201t:1246_1: So tena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
tika-s0201t:1246_2: saddhāya pana balavabhāvato vipassanāvīthiṃ na otarati.
tika-s0201t:1246_3: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā tassa indriyasamattapaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi.
tika-s0201t:1246_4: So satthārā dinnanayena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0201t:1247_3: Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati,
tika-s0201t:1247_4: evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhiyattā tassā.
tika-s0201t:1247_5: Tathāhi sā samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa
tika-s0201t:1247_10: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto “mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1247_11: na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ,
tika-s0201t:1247_12: kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo”ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu
tika-s0201t:1247_13: phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhavīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0201t:1247_14: Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato.
tika-s0201t:1247_15: Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā bhāvento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0201t:1248_2: Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññānātivattanaṃ visesato icchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1248_4: evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ samarasatāya sati aññamaññūpatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1248_11: Tathā hi so avatthusmiṃ pasīdati seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā.
tika-s0201t:1248_13: Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī”tiādīni parikappeti hetupatirūpakehi vañcito,
tika-s0201t:1248_14: evaṃbhūto ca sukkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati,
tika-s0201t:1248_17: Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho,
tika-s0201t:1249_3: Saddahantoti “pathavīti manasikāramattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī”ti acintetvā “addhā sammāsambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhissatī”ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento.
tika-s0201t:1249_4: Okappentoti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto.
tika-s0201t:1249_7: Samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha “samatāyapī”ti,
tika-s0201t:1249_13: Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samatā icchitā,
tika-s0201t:1249_14: kathaṃ satīti āha “sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1249_25: sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhiyena bojjhaṅgena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā,
tika-s0201t:1249_28: Tassa hi sati paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya.
tika-s0201t:1250_2: Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha “samapaññāsa…pe…
tika-s0201t:1250_4: Ñeyyadhammassa gambhīrabhāvavasena tapparicchedakañāṇassa gambhīrabhāvaggahaṇanti āha “gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1250_5: Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1250_6: tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā,
tika-s0201t:1250_9: evaṃ so eva paññāvepullappattopīti āha “arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1251_0: “Tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamentī”tiādinā pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇaṃ niraye nibbattasattassa yebhuyyena
tika-s0201t:1251_1: sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti devadūtasuttādīsu tassā ādito vuttattā ca āha “pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇato
tika-s0201t:1251_4: saddena tadaññaṃ manussehi tiracchānehi ca vibādhiyamānakālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1251_5: Ekaṃ buddhantaranti idaṃ aparāparaṃ petesuyeva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1251_6: ekaccānaṃ vā petānaṃ ekaccatiracchānānaṃ viya tathā dīghāyukabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1251_7: Tathā hi kāḷo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ adhigatarūpadassano.
tika-s0201t:1252_0: Evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinoti vīriyāyatto eva sabbo lokuttaro lokiyo ca visesādhigamoti evaṃ vīriye ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa.
tika-s0201t:1252_2: Sā hi bhikkhuno vaṭṭanissaraṇāya gantabbā paṭipajjitabbā paṭipadāti katvā gamanavīthi nāma.
tika-s0201t:1252_5: Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍassa bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā piṇḍāpacāyanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1253_1: Taṃ saddaṃ sutvāti taṃ upāsikāya vacanaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvā.
tika-s0201t:1253_2: Manussasampatti dibbasampatti ante nibbānasampattīti tisso sampattiyo.
tika-s0201t:1253_3: Dātuṃ sakkhissasīti “tayi katena dānamayena veyyāvaccamayena ca puññakammena khettavisesabhāvūpagamanena
tika-s0201t:1253_4: aparāparaṃ devamanussasampattiyo ante nibbānasampattiñca dātuṃ sakkhissasī”ti thero attānaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0201t:1253_5: Sitaṃ karontovāti “akiccheneva mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta”nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto eva.
tika-s0201t:1254_1: Evaṃ yathā asammāpaṭipanno putto tāya eva asammāpaṭipattiyā kulasantānato bāhiro hutvā pitu santikā dāyajjassa na bhāgī,
tika-s0201t:1254_2: evaṃ kusītopi teneva kusītabhāvena asammāpaṭipanno satthu santikā laddhabbaariyadhanadāyajjassa na bhāgī.
tika-s0201t:1255_0: Mahāti sīlādīhi guṇehi mahanto vipulo anaññasādhāraṇo.
tika-s0201t:1255_1: Taṃ panassa guṇamahattaṃ dasasahassilokadhātukampanena loke pākaṭanti dassento “satthuno hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1256_0: Yasmā satthusāsane pabbajitassa pabbajjupagamena sakyaputtiyabhāvo sampajāyati,
tika-s0201t:1257_0: Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhādianuyuñjanakānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1257_2: “Divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāyā”tiādinā bhāvanārambhavasena āraddhavīriyānaṃ daḷhaparakkamānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanā āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanā. Tenāha –
tika-s0201t:1257_4: Visuddhimagge pana jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti idaṃ dvayaṃ na gahitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1257_6: Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā hoti lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1258_0: Purimuppannā pīti parato uppajjanakapītiyā kāraṇabhāvato “pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā”ti vuttā,
tika-s0201t:1258_1: tassā pana bahuso pavattiyā puthuttaṃ upādāya bahuvacananiddeso,
tika-s0201t:1259_1: Sakalasarīraṃ pharamānoti pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno.
tika-s0201t:1259_2: Dhammaguṇe anussarantassapi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti.
tika-s0201t:1259_3: Evaṃ sesaanussatīsu pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāyañca yojetabbaṃ tassāpi vimuttāyatanabhāvena taggatikattā.
tika-s0201t:1259_6: Saṅkhārānañhi sappadesavūpasamepi nippadesavūpasame viya tathā paññāya pavattito bhāvanāmanasikāro kilesavikkhambhanasamattho
tika-s0201t:1259_7: hutvā upacārasamādhiṃ āvahanto tathārūpapītisomanassasamannāgato pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti.
tika-s0201t:1259_9: sā tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti āha “asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsūcitalūkhabhāve”ti.
tika-s0201t:1261_2: Tañhi tividhaṃ sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṃ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1261_3: Ahetukaṃ sattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhanti ayameko anto,
tika-s0201t:1261_5: ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā paṭipatti.
tika-s0201t:1261_8: Ayañhi pahāya sāraddhakāyataṃ passaddhakāyatāya kāraṇaṃ hontī passaddhidvayaṃ āvahati,
tika-s0201t:1262_0: Yathāsamāhitākārasallakkhaṇavasena gayhamāno purimuppanno samatho eva samathanimittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1262_1: Nānārammaṇe paribbhamanena vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo.
tika-s0201t:1262_2: Tathā hi so anavaṭṭhānaraso bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca vutto.
tika-s0201t:1262_4: So eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1263_1: samādhānāvahāpi tā honti samādhānāvahabhāveneva paññāvahabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “vatthuvisada…pe…
tika-s0201t:1264_1: rakkhaṇakosallassa ca tammūlakattā “nimittakusalatā nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1264_3: Asubhanimittassādikassapi hi yassa kassaci jhānuppattinimittassa uggahaṇakosallaṃ nimittakusalatā evāti.
tika-s0201t:1265_2: Tassa paggahaṇanti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena layāpattito samuddharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1266_12: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0201t:1266_17: bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti?
tika-s0201t:1267_0: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1268_2: Tassa niggahaṇanti tassa uddhatacittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena uddhatāpattito nisedhanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1269_14: bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti?
tika-s0201t:1270_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1271_4: Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
tika-s0201t:1271_5: tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1271_6: anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa yogino cittassa abhiruciṃ na janeti,
tika-s0201t:1271_8: tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva avīthipaṭipattiyā upasamasukhaṃ na vindati,
tika-s0201t:1271_12: Tassa saṃveguppādanaṃ pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti taṃ dassento “aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūnī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1271_13: Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva pañcavidhabandhanādi-
tika-s0201t:1271_16: tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni.
tika-s0201t:1271_19: tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvikadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1271_20: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanatāti ayaṃ sampahaṃsitabbasamaye vuttanayena tena saṃvejanavasena ceva pasāduppādanavasena ca sammadeva pahaṃsanā,
tika-s0201t:1272_0: Sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgammāti līnuddhaccavirahena samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammā avisamaṃ sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma.
tika-s0201t:1272_12: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatāti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye bhāvanācittassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
tika-s0201t:1273_0: Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvūpagamanato ca upacārajjhānampi samādānakiccanipphattiyā
tika-s0201t:1273_1: puggalassa samāhitabhāvasādhanamevāti tattha samadhurabhāvenāha “upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1274_0: Upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttānusārena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1275_0: Anurodhavirodhavippahānavasena majjhattabhāvo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ sati sijjhanato,
tika-s0201t:1275_2: so ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti āha “sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1275_3: Tadubhaye ca virujjhanaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgabhāvanāya eva dūrīkatanti anurujjhanasseva pahānavidhiṃ dassentena “sattamajjhattatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1276_0: Dvīhākārehīti kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇaṃ attasuññatāpaccavekkhaṇanti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0201t:1276_3: Sati hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṃ aññañca kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā,
tika-s0201t:1278_0: Ayaṃ satipaṭṭhānadesanā pubbabhāgamaggavasena desitāti pubbabhāgiyabojjhaṅge sandhāyāha “bojjhaṅgapariggāhikā sati dukkhasacca”nti.
tika-s0201t:1281_2: yo yo vā sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo, tato,
tika-s0201t:1281_4: Janikaṃ samuṭṭhāpikanti pavattalakkhaṇassa dukkhassa janikaṃ nimittalakkhaṇassa samuṭṭhāpikaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1282_0: Sasantatipariyāpannānaṃ dukkhasamudayānaṃ appavattibhāvena pariggayhamāno nirodhopi sasantatipariyāpanno
tika-s0201t:1282_1: viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “attano vā cattāri saccānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1282_4: “imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi,
tika-s0201t:1282_10: evañca katvā lokuttarabojjhaṅge uddissapi pariggaho na virujjhati.
tika-s0201t:1282_12: ṭhapetvā nirodhasaccaṃ sesasaccavasena samudayavayā veditabbāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1284_0: “Aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ samaṃsa”ntiādikā satta sivathikā aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānatāya itarāsaṃ uddhumātakādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1284_6: Iriyāpathā ālokitādayo ca rūpadhammānaṃ avatthāvisesamattatāya na sammasanupagā viññattiādayo viya.
tika-s0201t:1284_9: Kesādiapadesena tadupādānadhammā viya iriyāpathādiapadesena tadavatthā rūpadhammā pariggayhanti,
tika-s0201t:1284_10: nīvaraṇādimukhena ca taṃ sampayuttā taṃnissayadhammāti adhippāyena mahāsīvatthero “iriyāpathādīsupi abhiniveso jāyatī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1284_11: Atthi nu kho metiādi pana sabhāvato iriyāpathādīnaṃ ādikammikassa anicchitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1285_3: bhikkhū”tiādinā uddesaniddesesu tattha tattha bhikkhuggahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0201t:1285_5: desanā pana sabbasādhāraṇāti dassetuṃ “yo hi koci,
tika-s0201t:1285_9: Dassanamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānantī sikhāppattā aggamaggapaññā aññā nāma,
tika-s0201t:1285_11: Appatarepi kāle sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassentoti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1299_6: Titthiyaparideviteti titthiyānaṃ “kiṃ bho samaṇoyeva gotamo samaṇo”tiādinā vippalapanimittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1299_7: “Mahālābhasakkāro uppajjī”ti vatvā samantapāsādikatthaṃ tassa uppattikāraṇaṃ dassento “catuppamāṇiko hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1299_12: Pamināti uḷāratādivisesaṃ etenāti pamāṇaṃ rūpaṃ rūpakāyo pamāṇaṃ etassāti rūpappamāṇo.
tika-s0201t:1300_2: Sā ca kho tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle pamāṇayuttā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1300_6: Tattha pamāṇaṃ gahetvāti tasmiṃ rūpe rūpasampattiyaṃ pamāṇabhāvaṃ upādāya.
tika-s0201t:1301_0: Paravaṇṇanāyāti “amuko ediso ca ediso cā”ti yasaguṇavacanena.
tika-s0201t:1302_2: Vividhaṃ vā dukkarakārikanti dhutaṅgasevanādivasena pavattaṃ nānāvidhaṃ dukkaracariyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1303_0: Sīlaṃ vā passitvāti sīlapāripūrivasena visuddhaṃ kāyavacīsucaritaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā passitvā.
tika-s0201t:1304_3: yassā rucirabhāvo visuddhe vigatavalāhake deve puṇṇamāsiyaṃ paripuṇṇakalābhāgamaṇḍalaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ abhibhavitvā atirocati,
tika-s0201t:1304_5: sommakiraṇarasasamujjalabhāvehi tadubhayehi abhibhuyya vattamānaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
tika-s0201t:1304_6: vijjotanasamatthaṃ mahābrahmuno pabhāsamudayaṃ abhivihacca bhāsate tapate virocati ca.
tika-s0201t:1305_0: Satipi aṅgapariccāgādīnaṃ dānapāramibhāve pariccāgavisesabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca aṅgapariccāgādiggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1305_6: “so dhammaṃ desetī”tiādinā vuttāya sattupakārakiriyāya ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1305_7: Sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati yathāvuttaguṇānaṃ anaññasādhāraṇabhāvato acchariyabbhutabhāvato ca.
tika-s0201t:1306_0: “Cīvaralūkhaṃ disvā”ti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ “sace bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1306_1: Sāṇapaṃsukūlacīvarenāti matakaḷevaraṃ paliveṭhetvā chaḍḍitena tumbamatte kimī papphoṭetvā gahitena sāṇapaṃsukūlacīvarena.
tika-s0201t:1307_5: Tena brahmassaratākaravīkabhāṇitādassanena lakkhaṇahāranayena avasesalakkhaṇapāripūriṃ viya tadavinābhāvato buddhānaṃ desanāvilāsañca vibhāveti.
tika-s0201t:1309_4: Loke uppajjamāneyeva uppannāti attano diṭṭhivādassa purātanabhāvaṃ dīpenti.
tika-s0201t:1310_0: Sesapadesupīti “idha dutiyo samaṇo”tiādīsu sesavāresupi yathā hi “vivicceva kāmehī”ti ettha kato niyamo
tika-s0201t:1310_1: “vivicca akusalehī”ti etthāpi katoyeva hoti sāvadhāraṇasseva atthassa icchitabbattā,
tika-s0201t:1310_4: Sāmaññaphalādhigamavasena nippariyāyato samaṇabhāvoti tesaṃ vasenettha cattāro samaṇā desitāti tamatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1310_6: Paṭipattikkamena desanākkamena ca sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ dutiyāditā vuttāti sotāpannassa paṭhamatā avuttasiddhāti na coditā.
tika-s0201t:1310_8: Kasmā panettha mahāparinibbāne viya maggaṭṭhā tadatthāya paṭipannā ca na gahitāti?
tika-s0201t:1310_10: Tattha hi maggādhigamatthāya vipassanāpi ito bahiddhā natthi,
tika-s0201t:1310_11: kuto maggaphalānīti dassentena bhagavatā “ñāyassa dhammassa padesavattī,
tika-s0201t:1310_13: Idha pana niṭṭhānappattameva taṃtaṃsamaṇabhāvaṃ gaṇhantena phalaṭṭhakasamaṇāva gahitā “maggaṭṭhato phalaṭṭho savisesaṃ dakkhiṇeyyo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1312_3: Tena hi nibbānaṃ ñāyati gammati paṭivijjhatīti.
tika-s0201t:1312_4: So eva nibbānasampāpakahetutāya dhammoti āha “ñāyassa dhammassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1313_0: Tesaṃ parappavādasāsanānaṃ akhettatā khettatā ca ariyamaggassa abhāvabhāvā suparisuddhassa sīlassa suparisuddhāya
tika-s0201t:1313_3: so ca asammāsambuddhasammāsambuddhapaveditatāyāti parājikāya satthu vipattihetutāya sāsanassa aniyyānabhāvoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1314_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pariyāyato ca pāḷiyā ca samatthetuṃ “tenāha bhagavā”tiādinā pāḷiṃ dassetvā upamāpadesena
tika-s0201t:1314_2: Tattha yasmā ekaccānaṃ visesato sīhānaṃ purimaṃ pādadvayaṃ hatthakiccampi karoti,
tika-s0201t:1314_8: Sineruparibhaṇḍe simbalirukkhehi sañchādito paññāsayojano daho simbalidaho,
tika-s0201t:1314_11: Aññatitthāvāsabhūmiyaṃ imesu samaṇesu ekacco na uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:1314_13: sabbena sabbaṃ na uppajjantevāti dassento “ekasamaṇopī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1315_1: Suṭṭhu nadanaṃ nāma hetuyuttaṃ suṭṭhu katvā kathananti āha “hetunā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1315_2: So ca hetu aviparīto eva icchitabboti āha “nayenā”ti,
tika-s0201t:1315_4: Evaṃbhūto ca so yathādhippetatthaṃ karoti sādhetīti dassento āha “kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1315_5: Yadi tiracchānasīhassa nādo sabbatiracchānaekaccamanussāmanussanādato seṭṭhattā seṭṭhanādo,
tika-s0201t:1315_7: Yadi tiracchānasīhanādassa seṭṭhanādatā nibbhayatāya appaṭisattutāya icchitā,
tika-s0201t:1315_11: Tattha atthitāyāti iminā sīhanādassa uttamatthataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1315_13: Tāya eva bhūtaṭṭhatāya abhītanādatāti dassento “ime samaṇā…pe…
tika-s0201t:1315_15: Abhūtañhi vadato kutoci bhayaṃ vā āsaṅkā vā siyāti “idhevā”ti niyamassa aviparītataṃ dassento “amhākampi…pe…
tika-s0201t:1316_4: Titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo tabbinimuttassa kassaci diṭṭhivipphanditassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1316_5: Pāragamanasaṅkhātaṃ taraṇaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ tattha tattheva aparāparaṃ ummujjananimujjanavasena pilavananti āha “taranti uppalavantī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1316_8: yathāvuttaṃ vā diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ titthaṃ etesaṃ atthīti titthikā,
tika-s0201t:1317_1: saddoti tassa “bhagavatā”tiādīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttassa yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato satthubhāvena adhigato supākaṭo ca,
tika-s0201t:1317_2: taṃ abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ āgamanapaṭipadāya atthabhāvena dassento “yo so…pe…
tika-s0201t:1317_4: Satipi ñāṇadassanasaddānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena visesena nesaṃ savisaye visesappavattidassanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1317_10: Anaññasādhāraṇapuññānubhāvanibbatto anuttarañāṇādhigamaladdhapurāvattako ca bhagavato rūpakāyo atikkammeva
tika-s0201t:1317_14: Tāya hi sabbaso ñeyyadhammesu sammohassa vidhamitattā pacchā pavattajānanaṃ tassa jānanaṃ viya vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1318_2: tesaṃ hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanaṃ appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ ajjhupekkhanaṃ vā.
tika-s0201t:1318_8: Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya jānatā,
tika-s0201t:1319_2: Kāmaṃ asekkhāpi asekkhāya samasikkhatāya sahadhammikā eva,
tika-s0201t:1319_3: ciṇṇabrahmacariyatāya pana sahadhammaṃ carantīti na vattabbāti asekkhavāro na gahito.
tika-s0201t:1319_4: Sabbepeteti ete yathāvuttā bhikkhuādayo sotāpannādayo ca puthujjanā ariyā cāti sabbepi ete taṃtaṃsikkhāhi
tika-s0201t:1319_14: Tattha piyamanāpaggahaṇena sīlesu paripūrakāritāpadesena ekadesena gahitaṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1319_17: Ettāvatāti “atthi kho no āvuso”tiādinayappavattena ratanattayapasādajotanena akkhātā tesu tesu suttapadesesu.
tika-s0201t:1320_1: Satthari pasādoti pasādaggahaṇena “bhagavatā”tiādinā vā pasādanīyā dhammā gahitā.
tika-s0201t:1320_5: Yena cittena aññattha anupalabbhamānena sāsaneyeva samaṇo ito bahiddhā natthīti ayamattho,
tika-s0201t:1320_12: sammāsambuddhattā cassa svākhāto dhammoti atthi dhamme pasādo,
tika-s0201t:1320_13: tato eva ca atthi sīlesu paripūrakāritāti sahadhammikā…pe…
tika-s0201t:1320_14: pabbajitā cāti evamettha satthari pasādena dhamme pasādo,
tika-s0201t:1320_15: tena saṅghasuppaṭipattīti ayañca nayo lesenapi parappavādesu natthīti idheva samaṇo…pe…
tika-s0201t:1321_0: Paṭividdhasaccānaṃ pahīnānurodhānaṃ gehassitapemassa asambhavo evāti “idānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1321_6: Na hi bhagavā bhikkhū saṃkilese niyojeti.
tika-s0201t:1321_7: Evarūpaṃ pemaṃ sandhāyāti pasādāvahaguṇāvahato pūraṇādīsu bhatti pasādo na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1321_13: Visuṃ katvāti aññehi vivecetvā attano āveṇikaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:1321_14: “Amhākaṃ satthā”ti byāvadantānaṃ aññesaṃ satthā na hotīti atthato āpannameva hoti,
tika-s0201t:1321_15: tathā ca padesavattiniṃ tassa satthutaṃ paṭijānantā paripuṇṇalakkhaṇasatthutaṃ icchantānampi tato viruddhā satthubhāvapariyesanena parājitā honti.
tika-s0201t:1321_18: kukkurasīlādīsūti idaṃ yebhuyyena aññatitthiyānaṃ tādisaṃ vatasamādānasabbhāvato vuttaṃ, ādi-
tika-s0201t:1321_20: Adhippayāsoti adhikaṃ payasati payujjati etenāti adhippayāso,
tika-s0201t:1322_0: Tassa pasādassa pariyosānabhūtāti tassa satthari dhamme ca pasādassa niṭṭhānabhūtā.
tika-s0201t:1322_2: Samayavādīnañhi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye tadupadesake ca pasādo yāvadeva mokkhādhigamanaṭṭho.
tika-s0201t:1322_3: Diṭṭhigatikā tathā tathā attano laddhivasena niṭṭhaṃ parikappenti yevāti āha “niṭṭhaṃ apaññapento nāma natthī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1322_5: Tesaṃ ekacce brahmunā salokatā niṭṭhāti vadanti,
tika-s0201t:1322_12: Tattha hi nesaṃ niccābhiniveso yathā taṃ bakassa brahmuno.
tika-s0201t:1322_16: Mahābrahmā viya paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ ābhassaresu eko sabbaseṭṭho natthīti “ābhassarā”ti puthuvacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1322_18: Anto ca mano ca etassa natthīti anantamānaso.
tika-s0201t:1323_3: Yathā pañcasu ṭhānesu ekova kileso lobho āgato,
tika-s0201t:1323_4: evaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu tayo kilesā āgatā “doso moho diṭṭhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1324_1: Padantarena rāgavisesassa vuccamānattāādito vuttaṃ sarāgavacanaṃ oḷārikaṃ rāgavisayanti āha “pañcakāmaguṇikarāgavasenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1324_3: “Anuruddhapaṭiviruddhassā”ti ekapadavasena pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā ekajjhaṃ paduddhāro kato.
tika-s0201t:1324_6: Papañcuppattidassanavasenāti kilesakammavipākānaṃ aparāparuppattipaccayatāya saṃsārassa papañcanaṃ papañco,
tika-s0201t:1324_13: Evaṃ viddhaṃsethāti kāmarāgabhavataṇhādivasena lobhaṃ kasmā evaṃ vippakiretha.
tika-s0201t:1324_15: Subhanti hi ārammaṇe pavatto rāgo “subha”nti vutto.
tika-s0201t:1325_3: Diṭṭhivasena hi “sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0201t:1325_4: asassato attā ca loko cā”ti ca diṭṭhigatikā paññapenti.
tika-s0201t:1325_8: Taṇhārahitāya diṭṭhiyā abhāvato taṇhāvaseneva ca attano sassatabhāvābhinivesoti katvā vuttaṃ “taṇhādiṭṭhivasenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1325_11: Ajjhositāti tāya diṭṭhiyā gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpitā viya tadantogadhā.
tika-s0201t:1325_14: evaṃ pabbajitānaṃ diṭṭhajjhosānanti āha “vibhavadiṭṭhiyā te paṭiviruddhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1326_1: Diṭṭhinibbattiggahaṇeneva cettha yathā diṭṭhīnaṃ paṭiccasamuppannatā vibhāvitā,
tika-s0201t:1326_2: evaṃ diṭṭhivatthunopīti ubhayesampi aniccatā dukkhatā anattatā ca vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1326_5: Tattha khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇaṭṭhena “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādivacanato.
tika-s0201t:1326_18: saccaṃ musāti dvayadhammamāhū”ti “takkī hoti vīmaṃsī”ti ca ādi.
tika-s0201t:1326_20: Yathāha bhagavā “tasseva ayoniso manasikaroto channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:1326_21: atthi me attāti assa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjatī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1326_28: Cattāro hi ariyamaggā yathārahaṃ tassa tassa saṅkhāragatassa accantanirodhahetu,
tika-s0201t:1327_2: Tattha samparāyiko duggatiparikilesatāyaādīnavapakkhiko evāti itaraṃ dassento “yaṃ sandhāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1327_7: Nissarati etenāti nissaraṇanti vuccamāne dassanamaggo eva diṭṭhīnaṃ nissaraṇaṃ siyā,
tika-s0201t:1327_8: tassa pana atthaṅgamapariyāyena gahitattā sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ diṭṭhīhipi nissaṭanti katvā vuttaṃ “diṭṭhīnaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma nibbāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:1328_1: Diṭṭhicchedanaṃ dassentoti sabbupādānapariññādassanena sabbaso diṭṭhīnaṃ samucchedavidhiṃ dassento.
tika-s0201t:1331_1: Kāmaṃ ito bāhirakānaṃ “imāni upādānāni ettakāni cattāri,
tika-s0201t:1331_2: na ito bhiyyo”ti īdisaṃ ñāṇaṃ natthi,
tika-s0201t:1331_8: attadiṭṭhiyā pana micchābhāvaṃ sabbaso na jānanti eva.
tika-s0201t:1331_11: tathāpi sabbassa pariññeyyassa pariññeyyaṃ paññapemaicceva tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0201t:1331_12: Evaṃbhūtānaṃ pana nesaṃ tattha yādisī paṭipatti,
tika-s0201t:1331_16: Tena tesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vijjamānatāya avicchedataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1331_23: Idāni taṃ atthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “kecī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1331_25: paramahaṃsa- kājaka- tidaṇḍa- monavata- seva- pārupaka-
tika-s0201t:1331_28: mugabbata- carabāka- tāpasa- niganthā- jīvaka- isi-
tika-s0201t:1331_45: Vatthupaṭisevanaṃ kāmanti byāpārassa vatthuno paṭisevanasaṅkhātaṃ kāmaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1331_46: Theyyena sevantīti paṭihatthaādisamaññāya lokassa vacanavasena sevanti.
tika-s0201t:1333_0: Yo titthiyānaṃ attano satthari dhamme sahadhammikesu ca pasādo vutto,
tika-s0201t:1333_6: Titthiyā hi kohaññe ṭhatvā lokaṃ vañcentā dhammaṃ kathemāti “sattime kāyā akaṭā akaṭavidhā”tiādinā yaṃ
tika-s0201t:1333_7: kiñci kathetvā tathā “vinayaṃ paññapemā”ti gosīlavaggulivatādīni paññapetvā tādisaṃ sāvake sikkhāpetvā
tika-s0201t:1333_11: Parittampi nāma puññaṃ kātukāmaṃ maccheramalābhibhūtatāya nivārentassa antarāyaṃ tassa karoto diṭṭheva
tika-s0201t:1333_12: dhamme viññūhi garahitabbatā samparāye ca duggati pāṭikaṅkhā,
tika-s0201t:1333_13: kimaṅgaṃ pana sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāvahe jinacakke pahāradāyino titthakarassa tadovādakarassa cāti
tika-s0201t:1333_15: Yathā so pasādo samparāye na sammaggato attano pavattivasenāti dassento “kañci kālaṃ gantvāpi pacchā vinassati yevā”ti āha,
tika-s0201t:1333_16: aveccappasādo viya accantiko na hotīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1334_2: Sabbampi kāraṇabhedanti sabbampi yathāvuttaṃ titthakarānaṃ sāvakānaṃ apāyadukkhāvahaṃ micchāpaṭipattisaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇavisesaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1334_3: So panesa pasādo na niyyāti micchattapakkhikattā surāpītasiṅgāle pasādo viya.
tika-s0201t:1335_2: Sabbopi lobho kāmupādānanteva vuccatīti āha “arahattamaggena kāmupādānassa pahānapariñña”nti.
tika-s0201t:1335_4: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamānānaṃ apāyesu apatanavasena dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhamme.
tika-s0201t:1336_0: Namassamāno aṭṭhāsi dve asaṅkhyeyyāni paccekabodhipāramīnaṃ pūraṇena tattha buddhasāsane paricayena ca bhagavati pasannacittatāya ca.
tika-s0201t:1336_3: Duggateso na gacchatīti duggatiṃ eso na gamissati.
tika-s0201t:1337_1: Kiṃ pana vattabbanti dhammepi paramatthe nimittaṃ gahetvā suṇantānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1337_2: Sāmaṇeravatthūti pabbajitadivaseyeva sappena daṭṭho hutvā kālaṃ katvā devalokaṃ upapannasāmaṇeravatthu.
tika-s0201t:1339_0: Vuttanayānusārenevāti yasmā idhāpi yathāvuttaṃ sabbampi kāraṇabhedaṃ ekato katvā dassento satthā “taṃ kissa hetū”ntiādimāha,
tika-s0201t:1339_1: tasmā tattha aniyyānikasāsane vuttanayassa anussaraṇavasena yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1340_2: Tesaṃ paccayaṃ dassetunti upādānānaṃ pariññā nāma pahānapariññā.
tika-s0201t:1340_4: so ca paccayanirodhena hotīti tesaṃ paccayaṃ mūlakāraṇato pabhuti dassetuṃ.
tika-s0201t:1340_5: Ayanti idāni vuccamāno ettha “ime cā”tiādipāṭhe “kiṃ nidānā”tiādisamāsapadānaṃ attho.
tika-s0201t:1340_7: Iminā eva ca sabbaggahaṇena “phassanidānā”tiādīnampi padānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1340_8: Ime aññatitthiyā upādānānampi samudayaṃ na jānanti,
tika-s0201t:1340_10: tathāgato pana tesaṃ tappaccayapaccayānampi samudayañca atthaṅgamañca yāthāvato jānāti, tasmā – “idheva,
tika-s0201t:1340_13: suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti yathāraddhasīhanādaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassento “ime ca,
tika-s0201t:1340_15: cattāro upādānā”tiādinā nayena desanaṃ paṭiccasamuppādamukhena otārento vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā “yato ca kho”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:1340_16: vivaṭṭaṃ dassento arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi,
tika-s0201t:1344_7: usmā ca nāma īdisassa saviññāṇakatāya bhaveyyāti “siyā gabbho”ti cintesi.
tika-s0201t:1344_11: Dārakānaṃ puññūpanissayato aṅguṭṭhakato cassa khīraṃ nibbatti,
tika-s0201t:1344_13: Carimakabhave bodhisatte kucchigate bodhisattamātu viya udaracchaviyā acchavippasannatāya nicchavi viyāti katvā āha “nicchavī ahesu”nti.
tika-s0201t:1344_16: Abhisiñcitvā rājānaṃ akaṃsu rajjasampattiyā dāyakassa kammassa katattā,
tika-s0201t:1345_0: Purassa apareti purassa aparadisāya gāvutamatte ṭhāne jīvakambavanaṃ viya sapākāramandirake.
tika-s0201t:1345_7: Bhāvanāmanasikārena vinā pakatiyāva manussehi nibbattetabbo dhammoti manussadhammo,
tika-s0201t:1347_1: rūpāyatanaṃ jānāti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1347_3: Sammasanupage ca pana dhamme lakkhaṇattayañca tathā jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1347_5: cattāri vā saccāni asammohapaṭivedhato jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ, maggo.
tika-s0201t:1347_7: Paccavekkhaṇā maggādhigatassa atthassa paccakkhato jānanaṭṭhena ñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1347_10: tasmiñhi paṭisiddhe sabbesampi buddhaguṇānaṃ asambhavoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1348_0: Sukhumaṃ dhammantaraṃ nāma jhānavipassanādikaṃ ācariyānuggahena gahitaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-s0201t:1348_2: evaṃ bhavissatī”ti taṃtaṃdassetabbamatthatakkanena vitakkanamattena parito āhataṃ parivattitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:1348_12: Aphusitatte hi sukhena vacīghoso na niccharati.
tika-s0201t:1348_14: Jivhāpi thaddhatāya sukhena vacīghoso na niccharatīti āha “mudukā jivhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1349_0: Pañca dhammāti gambhīrañāṇacariyabhūtānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ uggahaṇa- savana- dhāraṇa- paricaya-
tika-s0201t:1349_3: saddo ubhayatthāpi yojetabbo “sammā takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1349_7: tassa niyyānaṃ atthato dhammasseva niyyānanti āha “so dhammo…pe…
tika-s0201t:1350_2: Yasmā pana sunakkhatto kodhavasena kurūro pharusavacano ca,
tika-s0201t:1350_4: Tasmiṃ attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthīti tasmiṃ attabhāve uppajjanārahānaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthi.
tika-s0201t:1350_5: Taṃ buddhā “moghapuriso”ti vadanti yathā taṃ sudinnalāḷudāyiādike.
tika-s0201t:1350_6: Upanissaye satipi tasmiṃ khaṇe magge vā phale vā asati “moghapuriso”ti vadanti yathā taṃ dhaniyūpasenattherādike.
tika-s0201t:1350_8: Yathā “makkhali moghapuriso manussakhippaṃ maññe”ti tathā sunakkhattopīti āha “imassa panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1351_2: Saddaṃ sotukāmoti so kira dibbacakkhunā tāvatiṃsabhavane devatānaṃ rūpaṃ passanto oṭṭhacalanaṃ passati,
tika-s0201t:1351_7: So ca atīte ekaṃ sīlavantaṃ bhikkhuṃ kaṇṇasakkhaliyaṃ paharitvā badhiramakāsi,
tika-s0201t:1351_9: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “upanissayo natthīti ñatvā parikammaṃ na kathesī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1351_10: Cintesīti attano micchāparivitakkitena ayoniso ummujjanto cintesi.
tika-s0201t:1352_1: Niyyāno vā ariyamaggo bodhetabbo etassa atthīti niyyāniko desanādhammo.
tika-s0201t:1352_2: Attani atthitaṃ dasseti kiccasiddhidassanena tattha tattha pākaṭīkatattā,
tika-s0201t:1352_4: Tathā hi yathāparādhaṃ taṃtaṃsikkhāpadapaññattiyā yathādhammaṃ veneyyajjhāsayānurūpañca aviparītadhammadesanāya
tika-s0201t:1352_5: devamanussehi yathābhisaṅkhatapañhānaṃ tadajjhāsayānukūlaṃ ṭhānaso vissajjanena ca bhagavato sabbattha
tika-s0201t:1352_9: Anveti yathāgahitasaṅketassa anugamanavasena eti jānātīti anvayo.
tika-s0201t:1352_12: Evaṃ yojanā veditabbāti yathā sabbaññutaññāṇena yojanā katā,
tika-s0201t:1352_13: evaṃ “evarūpampi nāma mayhaṃ iddhividhañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ uttarimanussadhamma”ntiādinā tattha tattha yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1355_1: Yadipi ādito abhiññāttayavasena desanāya āgatattā cetopariyañāṇānantaraṃ upari tisso abhiññā vattabbā siyunti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-s0201t:1355_2: atthato pana vijjāttayaṃ yathāvuttaabhiññāttayamevāti katvā “tisso vijjā vattabbā siyu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1355_3: Kasmā panettha “tāsu vuttāsu upari dasabalañāṇaṃ na paripūratī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1355_4: nanu imāni ñāṇāni sesābhiññā viya attano visayassa abhijānanaṭṭhaṃ upādāya abhiññāsu vattabbāni,
tika-s0201t:1355_5: akampiyaṭṭhaṃ pana upatthambhanaṭṭhañca upādāya balañāṇesu yathā sammāsatiādayo indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgesūti?
tika-s0201t:1355_7: Tattha hi dhammānaṃ dhammakiccavisesavibhāvanaparāya desanāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1355_8: idha pana satthu guṇavisesavibhāvanaparāya desanāya tathā vattuṃ na sakkā atthato anaññattā,
tika-s0201t:1355_9: ekaccānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ uppajjeyya “kimidaṃ bhagavā heṭṭhā vuttaguṇe punapi gaṇhanto guṇādhikadassanaṃ karotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1356_4: na tādisāni tadaññesaṃ kadācipi uppajjantīti aññehi asādhāraṇānīti.
tika-s0201t:1356_6: Imameva hi yathāvuttalesaṃ apekkhitvā tadabhāvato āsayānusayañāṇādīsu eva asādhāraṇaguṇasamaññā niruḷhā.
tika-s0201t:1357_0: Pakatihatthikulanti giricaranadīcaravanacarādippabhedā gocariyakālāvakanāmā sabbāpi balena pākatikā hatthijāti.
tika-s0201t:1357_3: Ekassāti ca tathā heṭṭhākathāyaṃ āgatattā desanāsotena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1357_5: tā bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ,
tika-s0201t:1357_9: “Saṃyuttake āgatāni tesattati ñāṇāni sattasattati ñāṇānī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1357_10: tattha pana nidānavagge sattasattati āgatāni catucattārīsañca,
tika-s0201t:1357_11: tesattati pana paṭisambhidāmagge sutamayādīni āgatāni dissanti,
tika-s0201t:1357_14: aññattha ca “pubbante ñāṇa”ntiādinā brahmajālādīsu ca “tayidaṃ tathāgato pajānāti,
tika-s0201t:1357_15: imāni diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni evaṃ gahitānī”tiādinā vuttāni anekāni ñāṇappabhedāni saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1357_16: Yāthāvapaṭivedhato sayañca akampiyaṃ puggalañca taṃsamaṅgiṃ neyyesu adhibalaṃ karotīti āha “akampiyaṭṭhena upatthambhanaṭṭhena cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1358_5: Idaṃ panāti buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbaññutameva vadati.
tika-s0201t:1358_6: Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1359_3: tatra vata maṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā okkamissatīti nimittametaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1359_6: Abhītanādaṃ nadatīti parato dassitañāṇayogena dasabalohanti abhītanādaṃ nadati.
tika-s0201t:1360_1: purimasappurisūpassayādiṃ upanissāya pacchimasappurisūpassayādīnaṃ sampattipavatti vā vuttāti ādi-
tika-s0201t:1360_10: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1360_11: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa bujjhanamattena hotīti “aññātakoṇḍaññassa sotāpatti…pe…
tika-s0201t:1360_13: Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ
tika-s0201t:1361_4: na gatinivattīti āha “uppajjati ceva pavattati cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1362_1: tāni pana samādiyitvā katāni hontīti āha “samādiyitvā katāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:1362_2: Kammameva vā kammasamādānanti etena samādānasaddassa apubbatthābhāvaṃ dasseti muttagatasadde gatasaddassa viya.
tika-s0201t:1363_4: Bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu kāmaṃ sabbesaṃ cetanā tassevekassa jīvitindriyārammaṇā,
tika-s0201t:1363_6: Tesu hi eko ādarena chandajāto karoti,
tika-s0201t:1363_7: eko “ehi tvampi karohī”ti parehi nippīḷito karoti,
tika-s0201t:1363_8: eko samānacchando viya hutvā appaṭibāhamāno vicarati.
tika-s0201t:1363_9: Tesu eko teneva kammena niraye nibbattati,
tika-s0201t:1363_30: idaṃ aññena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0201t:1364_0: Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu ekato piṇḍapātaṃ dadamānesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā piṇḍapātārammaṇāva,
tika-s0201t:1364_2: Tesu hi eko ādarena karotīti sesaṃ purimasadisaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1364_18: esa bhummadevesū”tiādinā tattha tattha hīnapaṇītasuvaṇṇadubbaṇṇaappaparivāramahāparivāratādibhedaṃ taṃ taṃ visesaṃ āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva jānāti.
tika-s0201t:1365_1: “iminā nīhārena esa kiñci sallakkhetuṃ na sakkhissati,
tika-s0201t:1365_16: esa jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0201t:1366_2: kāmapaṭisaṃyuttato ca kāmo dhātu kāmadhātu. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:1366_7: Khandhāyatanadhātulokanti anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ khandhalokaṃ āyatanalokaṃ dhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1366_27: dve cātubhūmakā”tiādinā dhātulokassa anekasabhāvaṃ nānāsabhāvañca pajānāti.
tika-s0201t:1366_30: “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa khandho seto,
tika-s0201t:1366_37: imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1366_38: imassa phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ rassaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ dussaṇṭhānaṃ mudukaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ
tika-s0201t:1366_39: duggandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ kaṭukaṃ ambilaṃ kasāvaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1366_40: imassa kaṇṭako tikhiṇo kuṇṭho ujuko kuṭilo tambo kāḷo odāto hotī”tiādinā pajānāti.
tika-s0201t:1367_2: So pana hīnapaṇītatāsāmaññena pāḷiyaṃ dvidhāva vuttopi hīnapaṇītādibhedena anekavidhoti āha “hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāva”nti.
tika-s0201t:1367_3: Tattha tattha ye ye sattā yaṃyaṃadhimuttikā,
tika-s0201t:1367_4: te te taṃtadadhimuttike eva sevanti bhajanti payirupāsanti dhātusabhāgato.
tika-s0201t:1367_8: yaṃ) hīnajjhāsayā dussīlādīhi eva saṃsandanti samenti,
tika-s0201t:1367_10: Taṃ nesaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ bhagavā yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti.
tika-s0201t:1368_0: Vuddhiñca hāniñcāti paccayavisesena sāmatthiyato adhikataṃ anadhikatañca.
tika-s0201t:1368_1: Indriyaparopariyattañāṇaniddese “āsayaṃ jānāti anusayaṃ jānātī”ti āsayādijānanaṃ kasmā niddiṭṭhanti?
tika-s0201t:1368_2: Āsayajānanādinā yehi indriyehi paroparehi sattā kalyāṇapāpāsayādikā honti,
tika-s0201t:1368_7: taṃ tesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ vā yathābhūtañāṇaṃ vā āsayo.
tika-s0201t:1368_9: Taṃ pana bhagavā sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānanto tesaṃ tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1369_0: “Kāmaṃ sevantaṃyeva bhagavā jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti.
tika-s0201t:1369_1: Kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti.
tika-s0201t:1369_5: ālokasaññaṃ sevantaṃyeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo thinamiddhagaruko thinamiddhāsayo thinamiddhādhimutto’ti”.
tika-s0201t:1370_0: Paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānanti rūpāvacarānaṃ paṭhamādīnaṃ paccanīkajhāpanaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṭṭhena ca jhānānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1370_2: Aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānanti ettha paṭipāṭiyā satta appitappitakkhaṇe paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanato ārammaṇe ca adhimuccanato vimokkhā nāma,
tika-s0201t:1370_3: aṭṭhamo pana sabbaso saññāvedayitehi vimuttattā apagamavimokkho nāma.
tika-s0201t:1370_6: nayadvayepi upari tīsu jhānesu samādhi avitakkaavicāro,
tika-s0201t:1370_10: Hānabhāgiyadhammanti appaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādianupakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1370_11: Visesabhāgiyadhammanti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ dutiyajjhānādipakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1370_17: Tañhi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyajjhānādiadhigamassa paccayattā “vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1370_18: Ye pana “nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānanti pāḷi natthī”ti vadanti,
tika-s0201t:1370_19: te “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti imāya pāḷiyā paṭisedhetabbā.
tika-s0201t:1370_21: kammaṭṭhānaṃ samānaṃ eva “na kammaṭṭhāna”nti saññī hoti,
tika-s0201t:1371_2: Na tathā daṭṭhabbanti yathā paravādinā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1371_4: Sakasakakiccameva jānātīti ṭhānāṭṭhānajānanādiṃ sakaṃ sakaṃyeva kiccaṃ kātuṃ jānāti,
tika-s0201t:1371_11: “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā”tiādinā tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1371_13: Appetuṃ na sakkoti aṭṭhamanavamabalāni viya taṃsadisaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ viya vikubbituṃ.
tika-s0201t:1371_16: Yadipi hi “jhānādipaccavekkhaṇāñāṇaṃ sattamabala”nti tassa savitakkasavicāratā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:1371_17: tathāpi “jhānādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthī”ti jhānādisahagataṃ ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1371_18: Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti dassetuṃ “jhānaṃ hutvā
tika-s0201t:1371_19: appetuṃ na sakkoti iddhi hutvā vikubbituṃ na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1371_20: na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1371_21: Evaṃ kiccavisesavasenapi dasabalañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ visesaṃ dassetvā idāni vitakkattikabhūmantaravasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1372_4: anadhigamassa pana tadubhayaṃ yathākkamaṃ aṭṭhānañca ṭhānañcāti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “lokiya…pe…
tika-s0201t:1372_6: Tattha lokiyasammādiṭṭhiyā ṭhiti āsavakkhayādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ kilesāvaraṇābhāvassa kāraṇattā.
tika-s0201t:1372_7: Sā hi tasmiṃ sati na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1372_9: Etena tassā aṭṭhitiyā tassa aṭṭhānatā vuttā eva.
tika-s0201t:1372_21: buddhānaṃ pana yadipi āsavakkhayañāṇādhigamato pageva dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamo,
tika-s0201t:1372_22: tathāpi tathā parikammakaraṇaṃ natthi vijjāttayasiddhiyā sijjhanato.
tika-s0201t:1372_23: Sesābhiññāttaye cetopariyañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamena pattanti ca vattabbataṃ labhatīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1373_0: Puna evarūpiṃ vācaṃ na vakkhāmīti cittaṃ uppādento taṃ vācaṃ pajahati nāma.
tika-s0201t:1373_1: Vācāya pana so attho pākaṭo hotīti “vadanto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1373_5: nāssa nirayūpapattiyā koci vibandho ekaṃsiko ayamatthoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1374_2: tadatthāya vipassanāya ca vinā aññārādhanassa asambhavato “lokiyalokuttarā sīlasamādhipaññā veditabbā”ti
tika-s0201t:1374_3: vatvā puna āsannatare sīlādike dassento “lokuttaravaseneva vinivattetumpi vaṭṭatī”ti āha,
tika-s0201t:1374_5: Aggamaggaṭṭhassa hi diṭṭheva dhamme ekaṃsikā aññārādhanā,
tika-s0201t:1374_12: Tatrāyaṃ yuttiniddhāraṇā “nirayūpago ariyūpavādī tadādāyassa avijjamānato seyyathāpi micchādiṭṭhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1374_13: Ettha ca “taṃ vācaṃ appahāyā”tiādivacanena tadādāyassa appahānena ca ariyūpavādo antarāyiko anatthāvaho ca,
tika-s0201t:1374_14: pahānena pana accayaṃ desetvā khamāpanena anantarāyiko atthāvaho ca yathā taṃ vuṭṭhitā desitā ca āpattīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1377_5: Taṃ pana ñāṇasampadaṃ pahānasampadaṃ desanāvisesasampadaṃ khemaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ catubbidhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1377_9: na pana dassanaṃ tādisasseva dhammassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1377_10: Bhagavatā eva vā “ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti parassa vacanavasena dassitadhammesu.
tika-s0201t:1378_2: Evaṃbhūtā pana te yasmā antarāyakarā nāma honti,
tika-s0201t:1378_4: Asañcicca vītikkamo na tathā sāvajjoti katvā vuttaṃ “sañcicca vītikkantā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1378_5: Satta āpattikkhandhātiādi nidassanamattaṃ itaresampi catunnaṃ “antarāyikā”ti vuttadhammānaṃ tabbhāve byabhicārābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1378_6: Idha pana methunadhammo adhippetoti idaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena vuttaṃ ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:1378_7: Yasmā taṅkhaṇampi kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā viratto hoti ce,
tika-s0201t:1378_12: Tattha yassa kassacīti na kevalaṃ pabbajitasseva,
tika-s0201t:1381_1: Purisassa sūratarabhāvo nāma saṅgāme pākaṭo hoti,
tika-s0201t:1381_3: evaṃ vesārajjañāṇassa ānubhāvo paṇḍitaparisāsu yattha katthacīti dassento “vesārajjañāṇassa baladassanattha”nti āha.
tika-s0201t:1381_5: Eseva nayo sabbatthāti atidesena āvibhāvitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “mārakāyikāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ sadisatthavisayattā atidesassa.
tika-s0201t:1381_6: Yathā hi khattiyānaṃ samūho khattiyaparisāti ayamattho labbhati,
tika-s0201t:1381_8: mārassa parisāti pana māraparisāti ayamattho adhippeto.
tika-s0201t:1381_13: evaṃ uggā khattiyā attano puññatejenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1381_14: Brāhmaṇā tīsu vedesūti idaṃ itaresaṃ avisayadassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1381_15: Vede sajjhāyantāpi hi khattiyā vessā ca tadatthavicāraṇāya yebhuyyena asamatthā evāti.
tika-s0201t:1381_18: Yāmādayo hi uḷāruḷāre kāme paṭisevantā tatthābhigiddhatāya dhammassavanāya sabhāvena cittampi na uppādenti,
tika-s0201t:1381_19: mahābodhisattānaṃ pana buddhānañca ānubhāvena ākaḍḍhiyamānā kadāci tesaṃ payirupāsanādīni karonti tādise mahāsamaye.
tika-s0201t:1381_20: Teneva hi vimānavatthudesanāpi tannimittā bahulā nāhosi.
