tika-s0201t:1382_0: Paracakkavāḷesu ca manussānaṃ visesādhigamo natthīti pucchati “kiṃ pana bhagavā aññāni cakkavāḷānipi gacchatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1382_2: vāsanāya pana tattha gantvā dhammaṃ desetīti dassento “āmagacchatī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1382_6: Chinnassarāti dvidhābhūtassarā gaggarassarāti gaggarikāya viya gaggarāyamānakharassarā.
tika-s0201t:1382_8: “Vīmaṃsā uppajjatī”ti saṅkhepato vuttaṃ vivarituṃ “idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1386_1: Yavanti tāya sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā viya hontīti yoni.
tika-s0201t:1386_2: Sā pana atthato aṇḍādiuppattiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho khandhānaṃ bhāgaso pavattivisesoti āha “khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni nāmā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1386_3: Aṇḍe jātāti paṭhamāya jātiyā vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1386_5: aṇḍe vā bhijjamāne jātāti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1386_10: te eva idha opapātikāti vuttā. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:1386_14: jālavantatāya na tāsaṃ kucchiyaṃ gabbho saṇṭhāti,
tika-s0201t:1386_16: Nerayikā viyāti nidassanāpadesena tesampi opapātikattaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:1386_18: Yakkhānaṃ cātumahārājikatāya opapātikabhāve eva āpanne taṃ nivattetuṃ “evaṃ yakkhāpī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1386_19: Tathā hi te na bhummadevā na ca vinipātikāti.
tika-s0201t:1389_2: Yathā hi kammabhavo paramatthato asatipi kārake paccayasāmaggiyā siddho taṃsamaṅginā santānalakkhaṇena sattena katoti voharīyati,
tika-s0201t:1389_3: tathā upapattibhavalakkhaṇā gatiyo paramatthato asatipi gamake taṃtaṃkammavasena yesaṃ tāni kammāni,
tika-s0201t:1389_5: Evaṃ saddatthato gatiṃ dassetvā atthuddhāranayenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1389_21: Teneva nibbānaṃ arahato gatīti anupādisesanibbānaṃ arahato gati vigamo vibhavoti anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1389_22: Dveyeva gatiyoti dveva nipphattiyoti atthoti āha “ayaṃ nipphattigati nāmā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1390_1: taṃ brūhento eva uppajjatīti ayo, sukhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1390_3: Tato eva ramitabbaṃ assādetabbaṃ tattha natthīti dassento āha “niratiatthena nirassādaṭṭhena nirayo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1390_4: Tiriyaṃ añcitāti devamanussādayo viya uddhaṃ dīghā ahutvā tiriyaṃ dīghābhi attho.
tika-s0201t:1390_6: taṃ peccabhāvaṃ pattānaṃ visayoti petayonimeva vadati.
tika-s0201t:1390_8: Ayaṃ panattho nippariyāyato jambudīpavāsīvasena veditabbo. Yathāha – “tīhi,
tika-s0201t:1390_10: ṭhānehi jambudīpikā manussā uttarakuruke manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse.
tika-s0201t:1390_13: Tehi pana samānarūpāditāya saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi manussāteva paññāyiṃsu.
tika-s0201t:1390_16: vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyaṃ vimānavatthusaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena gahetabbo.
tika-s0201t:1390_18: Tattha kāmā devā kāmaguṇehi ceva iddhivisesehi ca itare iddhiviseseheva dibbanti kīḷanti jotanti,
tika-s0201t:1391_0: Tiracchānayoniñcātiādīsūti ettha tiracchānayonipettivisayaggahaṇena khandhānaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ tesaṃ tādisassa paricchinnassa okāsassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1391_1: Yattha vā te araññasamuddapabbatādike nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanti,
tika-s0201t:1391_3: Nirayūpagādīhi sattehi maggitabbato maggo paṭipajjitabbā paṭipadā cāti taṃ taṃ kammameva vuttanti āha “ubhayenapī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1391_4: Yathā ca paṭipannoti iminā tassa kammassa katūpacitākāramāha.
tika-s0201t:1391_5: Ettha ca nirayagāmiñca maggaṃ nirayagāminiñca paṭipadanti iminā sādhāraṇato nirayasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ
tika-s0201t:1391_6: vatvā puna taṃ taṃ santānapatitatāya asādhāraṇataṃ dassetuṃ “yathāpaṭipanno”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1391_9: Kasmā panettha pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ dassento bhagavā “nibbānañcāha”ntiādimāhāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “idaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1391_10: Na hi bhagavā attano buddhasubuddhataṃ vibhāvento sāvasesaṃ katvā desanaṃ deseti.
tika-s0201t:1394_4: Tā pana sabbakālaṃ dukkhā sukhālayenapi asammissāti dassento āha “niccadukkhā nirantaradukkhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1394_12: Phunantīti dvīhi hatthehi aṅgārāni ukkhipitvā paṭivātaṃ ophunanti,
tika-s0201t:1395_1: tena kathaṃ rūpantarasamaṅgiṃ niraye nibbattasattaṃ “ayaṃ so”ti jānātīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1395_3: tassa pana dibbacakkhuānubhāvena pattabbattā “dibbacakkhubalaṃ nāma etanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1396_0: Purimanayenevāti “gūthakūpo viya tiracchānayoni daṭṭhabbā”tiādinā aṅgārakāsupamāyaṃ vuttanayeneva.
tika-s0201t:1396_3: Sukhaparibhogaṃ mahāpāsādaṃ dassetuṃ “dīghapāsādo”ti vuttaṃ caturassapāsādādīnaṃ khuddakattā.
tika-s0201t:1397_0: Aparabhāgayojanāti pāḷiyaṃ “aparena samayenā”ti vuttassa aparabhāgassa yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1397_1: Sā pana ekadesena purimabhāge vutte eva suviññeyyā hotīti “yathā so”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1398_1: “Dibbacakkhunāpi passissatī”ti idaṃ na anuttarasukhānubhavanassa dibbacakkhugocarattā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1398_2: anāgatassa pana tassa dibbacakkhuparibhaṇḍabhūtena anāgataṃsañāṇena dassanamevāti kāraṇūpacārena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1398_3: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi”cceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1398_4: “Atthato pana nānā hotī”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “devalokasukhaṃ hī”tiādiṃ vatvā yathādassitaupamāhipi
tika-s0201t:1398_6: Gotrabhuñāṇuppādato paṭṭhāya nirodhaṃ passitvā uppannamaggaphalapaccavekkhaṇavasena ceva parato phalasamāpattisamāpajjanavasena
tika-s0201t:1398_7: ca ariyasāvako nirodhe sayito viya hoti tadapassayeneva pavattanatoti āha “nirodhasayanavaragata”nti.
tika-s0201t:1401_2: Na kevalaṃ “dukkarakārikāya suddhi hotī”ti evaṃladdhiko eva,
tika-s0201t:1401_3: atha kho dukkaracārīsu abhippasannoti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1401_4: Catukuṇḍikoti dvīhi pādehi hatthehīti catūhi aṅgehi kuṇḍanako āhiṇḍanako.
tika-s0201t:1402_0: Macchariyamalādipāpadhammavigamanato mettādiguṇānubrūhanato ca brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ cariyanti brahmacariyaṃ, dānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1402_1: Tathā hi taṃ bhagavatā paṇḍitapaññattaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1402_2: Evaṃ sesesupi yathārahaṃ brahmacariyapariyāyo niddhāretvā vattabbo.
tika-s0201t:1402_8: Balavīriyūpapattīti kāyabalena ceva ussāhena ca samannāgamo.
tika-s0201t:1403_0: Tena pāṇi kāmadadoti tena addhikānaṃ upagacchantānaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā asayhaseṭṭhino dānaṭṭhānadassanamayena
tika-s0201t:1403_1: puññena idāni mayhaṃ hattho kapparukkho viya kāmadado icchiticchitadāyī,
tika-s0201t:1403_2: kāmadado honto ca madhussavo iṭṭhavatthuvissajjanako jāto.
tika-s0201t:1403_3: Tena me brahmacariyenāti tena mama yathāvuttakāyaveyyāvaṭiyakammasaṅkhātena seṭṭhacariyena.
tika-s0201t:1404_3: Sā hi vineyyānaṃ brahmabhāvāvahanato brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ cariyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1404_4: brahmuno vā bhagavato vācasikaṃ cariyanti “brahmacariya”nti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1405_0: Sahassaṃ maccuhāyinanti sahassamattā arahattasamadhigamena maccuvisayātikkamena maccupahāyino jātā.
tika-s0201t:1405_1: Brahmacārī bhavissāmāti ettha yena brahmacariyena te brahmacārinoti vuccanti,
tika-s0201t:1405_2: taṃ brahmacariyaṃ niddhāretvā āha “methunavirati brahmacariyanti vuttā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1406_0: Nātikkamāmāti na aticarāma agamanīyaṭṭhānepi itaratthāpi na vītikkamāma.
tika-s0201t:1408_1: Phalāsāva samijjhatīti sudullabhaphalepi āsā sammāpayogamanvāya samijjhati eva.
tika-s0201t:1409_0: Idameva suttaṃ āgataṭṭhānanti adhippāyo tepiṭake buddhavacane idameva suttapadaṃ “vīriyaṃ brahmacariya”nti āgataṭṭhānanti attho.
tika-s0201t:1409_1: Vīriyañhi tasmiṃ visaye uttamaṃ paramukkaṃsagataṃ tādisacariyāhetu cāti brahmacariyanti idha vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1409_2: Caturaṅgasamannāgatanti catubbidhadukkarakiriyāya sādhakassa catubbidhassa attano pavattiākārassa vasena caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ.
tika-s0201t:1410_0: Koci chinnabhinnapaṭapilotikadharo dasantayuttassa vatthassa abhāvato nicceloti vattabbataṃ labheyyāti taṃ nivattento āha “naggo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1410_8: Idha pana bhattasaṃkitti adhippetāti āha “saṃkittetvā katabhattesū”ti.
tika-s0201t:1410_13: “Ekāhika”ntiādinā vuttavidhimeva paṭipāṭiyā pavattabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ puna vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1411_0: Erakatiṇādīni vāti erakatiṇādīni ganthitvā katanivāsanāni chavadussāni,
tika-s0201t:1412_4: tadubhayaṃ ekasmiṃ kathaṃ sambhavatīti āha “idaṃ attano rajojallakavatasamādānakālaṃ sandhāya vadatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1412_9: paṭiññā ca aviruddhāti daṭṭhabbā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle tathā tathā paṭipannattā.
tika-s0201t:1412_13: Sīlavā nāma natthi “anabhisandhikampi pāpaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ laddhikattā.
tika-s0201t:1412_14: Sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāyāti idaṃ paṭikkamanakiriyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1414_1: Bhiṃsanakatasminti bhāvasādhanabhāvī idaṃ padanti āha “bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ bhiṃsanakakiriyāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1415_2: kāraṃ katvā pāḷiyaṃ “sotatto”ti vuttanti tadatthaṃ vivaranto “sutatto”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1416_0: Vihārasminti paccatte bhummavacananti āha “vihāro eva hi ‘vihārasmi’nti vutto”ti.
tika-s0201t:1416_2: Evaṃ atthoti ayaṃ evaṃ liṅgavipallāsavasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1420_4: Unnatunnatānīti maṃse milāte dvinnaṃ sandhīnaṃ antare vātenuddhumātadhamanījālatāya unnatāni unnatānīti.
tika-s0201t:1420_12: sarīraghaṃsanatthaṃ kata kuruvindagoḷakānaṃ vā āvaḷi vaṭṭanāhāro.
tika-s0201t:1420_14: Maṇḍaleti bhittipādānaṃ matthake ṭhapitamaṇḍalake sīsaggena patiṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0201t:1420_15: Na evaṃ phāsuḷiyoti yathā yathā vuttagopānasiyo papatā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0201t:1420_16: na evaṃ bodhisattassa phāsukāpi papatā ṭhitā.
tika-s0201t:1421_4: Yāva piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ allīnā hotīti mayhaṃ udaracchavi yāva piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1421_5: tāva taṃ āhacca ṭhitattā allīnā hoti udariyassa parikkhayena antānañca suṭṭhumilātatāya.
tika-s0201t:1421_10: Pūtimūlānīti lomamūlānaṃ paribrūhanake maṃse lohite ca parikkhīṇe tāni sukkhāni ṭhānato bhaṭṭhāni abhāveneva “pūtimūlānī”ti vuttāni.
tika-s0201t:1422_1: Yathā etarahi vipassanāpaññāya adhigatattāti iminā kiñcāpi mahābodhisattā paripākagatañāṇā vasībhūtajjhānābhiññā vipassanāya parikammaṃ karonti,
tika-s0201t:1422_5: etadeva ettha etasmiṃ pāṭhapadese yuttaṃ pubbenāparaṃ avirujjhanato.
tika-s0201t:1422_6: Itarathāti bhikkhūhi vuttappakārena ananurūpo siyā “imissā”ti vuttāya aññatte.
tika-s0201t:1425_0: 160. Saṃsārenāti aparāparaṃ cavanupapajjanavasena bhavesu saṃsaraṇena. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
tika-s0201t:1428_2: Āvāsenāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattāvāse āvasanena nibbattitvā jīvanena.
tika-s0201t:1428_3: Khandhāyeva vuttā tesaṃyeva pavattivisesassa tena tena pariyāyena vuttattā.
tika-s0201t:1428_5: Bahuaggīti vācāpeyyādivasena antamaso pākayaññādivasena ca bahukepi aggī paricaraṇena.
tika-s0201t:1429_2: Atikkantapaṭhamavayā sattā sabhāvena palitasirā hontīti paṭhamavaye ṭhitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “susukāḷakeso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1429_14: samatthatāti padasatampi padasahassampi sotapathamāgacchantameva uggahaṇasamatthatā pariggahetuṃ samatthatā.
tika-s0201t:1429_15: Ayañca gatiyā byāpāroti sakkā viññātuṃ gahaṇamattabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1429_20: Ayaṃ pana satiyā byāpāroti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0201t:1429_21: Pāḷiyañca “paramāya gatiyā ca satiyā ca dhitiyā cā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1429_23: Samatthavīriyaṃ dhiti nāmāti visiṭṭhavisayaṃ dassento yathāvuttasatisamāyogaṃ tassa dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:1429_24: Tassāti yathāvuttagatisatidhitīhi subhadhātavacīparicitassa pariyattidhammassa āgamavasena atthadassanasamatthatā yuttivasena kāraṇadassanasamatthatā.
tika-s0201t:1430_3: so eva usuṃ saraṃ asati khipatīti issāsoti āha “dhanuṃ gahetvā ṭhito issāso”ti.
tika-s0201t:1430_7: Yāva kaṇḍappamāṇāti dīghato yattakaṃ kaṇḍassa pamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1430_8: tattake dhanudaṇḍe ukkhittamatte āropito ceva hoti jiyādaṇḍo,
tika-s0201t:1430_13: Īdiso pana tattha vasībhūto katahattho nāma hotīti āha “ciṇṇavasībhāvo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1430_14: Kataṃ rājakulādīsu upecca asanaṃ etena so katūpāsanoti āha “rājakulādīsu dassitasippo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1430_15: Evaṃ katanti evaṃ antosusirakaraṇādinā sallahukaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0201t:1431_1: Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ vāro paññāyatīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ pucchati,
tika-s0201t:1431_2: ayaṃ dutiya”ntiādinā pucchanavāro tādisassa paññavato paññāyati sukhumassa antarassa labbhanato.
tika-s0201t:1431_3: Buddhānaṃ pana vāroti īdise ṭhāne buddhānaṃ desanāvāro aññesaṃ napaññāyanato buddhānaṃyeva paññāyati.
tika-s0201t:1431_8: kathetī”ti vatvā tato lahutarāpi satthu desanāpavatti atthevāti dassento “tiṭṭhantu vā tāva ete”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1431_10: Soḷasa padāni kathetīti etena lokiyajanassa ekapaduccāraṇakkhaṇe bhagavā aṭṭhavīsasatapadāni kathetīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1432_3: Tañhi padavākyakkharabhāvehi paricchijjamānaṃ taṃ taṃ atthaṃ byañjeti pakāseti.
tika-s0201t:1432_6: Etena aparāparehi padabyañjanehi sucirampi kālaṃ kathentassa tathāgatassa na kadāci tesaṃ pariyādānaṃ atthīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1432_12: Tathā āsannaparinibbānassapi bhagavato desanāya itarāya ca visesātāvoti paṭhamabuddhavacanampi majjhimabuddhavacanampi
tika-s0201t:1433_1: Kāmañcettha bhagavatā nāgasamālattherassa acchariyaabbhutapavedanamukhena attano lomānaṃ haṭṭhabhāvassa
tika-s0201t:1433_5: vibhāvanādivasena soḷasasamūhato sīhanādassa nadanena desanāya pavattitattā “mahāsīhanādo”tveva saṅgītikāramahātherehi nāmaṃ ṭhapitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1436_1: Tato paranti tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ upari saṅgho catuvaggakaraṇīyādikammehi paṭikammappattattā.
tika-s0201t:1436_2: Gāmaṃ gatoti vuccati gāmaṃ uddissa gatattā,
tika-s0201t:1436_3: evaṃ sāvatthiṃ pavisituṃ vihārato nikkhantā “pavisiṃsū”ti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1436_8: Kāmaṃ sabbesaṃ titthiyānaṃ kāmādipariññāpaññāpanahetubhūto samayo natthi,
tika-s0201t:1436_11: “Yato yato kho bho ayaṃ bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
tika-s0201t:1436_13: ettāvatā kho bho kāmānaṃ pariññā hotī”ti evaṃ sarūpato paṭhamajjhānaṃ vibhāvetuṃ asakkontāpi kevalaṃ
tika-s0201t:1436_14: accantappahānasaññāya kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapeyyuṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ vadamānā.
tika-s0201t:1437_1: Na ceva sampāyissantīti na ceva sammadeva pakārehi gamessanti ñāpessanti.
tika-s0201t:1437_14: Aññathā ārādhanaṃ nāma natthīti iminā kāmarūpavedanāsu assādādīnaṃ yāthāvato avabodho eva ito bāhirakānaṃ natthi,
tika-s0201t:1438_2: Bandhanaṭṭhena guṇāti kāmarāgasaṃyojanassa paccayabhāvena vatthukāmesupi bandhanaṭṭho vutto,
tika-s0201t:1438_5: Atītādibhinnapaṭhamādivayā eva cittatā rāsibhāvena vayoguṇāti gahitāti āha “rāsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho”ti.
tika-s0201t:1438_14: Kāmūpasaṃhitāti kāmarāgena upecca sandhāniyā sambaddhā kātabbāti āha “ārammaṇaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1439_1: Saññaṃ ṭhapetvāti “imasmiṃ aṅgulikādipabbe gahite sataṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:1439_6: Kasanaṃ kasīti kasiggahaṇena sabbo kasipaṭibaddho jīvikūpāyo gahitoti āha “kasīti kasikamma”nti.
tika-s0201t:1439_20: Yo hi sītakāle jīvikāhetu sītalapadesaṃ pakkhandati,
tika-s0201t:1439_21: so vāḷamigādīhi viya sītena paripātiyamāno tena purato kato viya hoti.
tika-s0201t:1439_28: Kāmahetunti vā bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso yathā “visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1439_32: tathā uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ kāmānaṃ kadāci ahetubhāvassapi sambhavato,
tika-s0201t:1440_2: Pubbenāparaṃ ghaṭentassāti ārambhato paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ pavattentassa.
tika-s0201t:1440_3: Citte uppannabalavasokena socatīti cittasantāpena anto nijjhāyati.
tika-s0201t:1440_4: Kāye uppannadukkhenāti tasseva sokassa vasena kāye uppannadukkhena.
tika-s0201t:1440_5: Sokuddesena taṃ taṃ vippalapento vā paridevati.
tika-s0201t:1440_8: Meti vatvā puna noti puthuvacanaṃ attano ubhayathāpi voharitabbato,
tika-s0201t:1441_1: Idha kāmaggahaṇena visesato vatthukāmā gahitāti kāmādiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0201t:1441_3: Asicammanti ettha cammaggahaṇena na kevalaṃ cammamayassa,
tika-s0201t:1441_5: atha kho sabbassapi āvudhabādhakassa gahaṇanti dassento “kheṭakaphalakādīnī”ti āha. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:1442_4: Atibhāratāya dasavīsamattāpi janā ukkhipituṃ na sakkonti,
tika-s0201t:1443_3: ekaṃ parittaṃ gāmaṃ parivāretvā tattha kiñcipi gayhūpagaṃ asesetvā karamaraggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1444_7: Taṃ karontā yathā gīvato paṭṭhāya baddhe kantitvā kaṭiyameva ṭhapenti,
tika-s0201t:1444_8: evaṃ gopphakato paṭṭhāya kantitvā kaṭiyameva ṭhapenti.
tika-s0201t:1444_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “kaṭito paṭṭhāya kantitvā gopphakesu ṭhapentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1445_8: Palālavaṭṭiṃ viya katvāti yathā palālapīṭhaṃ karontā palālavaṭṭiṃ katvā saṃvellanavasena naṃ veṭhenti,
tika-s0201t:1445_11: Balavanto hi te javayoggā sūrā ca honti.
tika-s0201t:1446_1: Chandarāgo vinīyati ceva pahīyati ca etthāti nibbānaṃ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānañcāti.
tika-s0201t:1446_3: Tattha āgammāti idaṃ yo chandarāgaṃ vineti pajahati,
tika-s0201t:1446_5: Tīhi pariññāhīti iminā ñātatīraṇapariññāhi parijānissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
tika-s0201t:1447_4: vaṇṇadasakaṃ kasmā na gahitanti āha “mātugāmassa hī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1447_6: Thokaṃ thokaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ pasīdati maṃsassa paribrūhanato thanamaṃsāni vaḍḍhanti jāyanti.
tika-s0201t:1447_7: Vaṇṇeti hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsento viya hotīti vaṇṇo.
tika-s0201t:1448_1: Tādisaṃ pana sarīraṃ bhaggaṃ viya hotīti āha “bhagga”nti.
tika-s0201t:1448_3: Dantānaṃ chinnabhinnatāya ekaccānaṃ patanena ca khaṇḍitadantaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1448_5: Kesānaṃ mattaso siyane khallāṭavohāroti bahuso siyanaṃ sandhāyāha “mahākhallāṭasīsa”nti.
tika-s0201t:1448_7: Tāni pana kānici setāni honti kānici kāḷānīti āha “setakāḷatilakehī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1449_1: Tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇasamaye.
tika-s0201t:1450_0: 174. Aniccādiākāroti aniccākāro dukkhākāro vipariṇāmākāro calādiākāro ca.
tika-s0201t:1453_2: taṃ satipaṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti taṃ ekadesena dassento “so hī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1453_3: Tattha yena rājakumārā sakyā nāma jātā,
tika-s0201t:1453_4: yato tesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānatāya janapado tathā vuccati,
tika-s0201t:1453_5: taṃ vattabbanti āha “sakyānaṃ pana uppatti ambaṭṭhasutte āgatāvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1454_1: Lobho hi tena tena avatthāvisesena pavattiākārabhedena “chando rāgotaṇhā āsatti apekkhā”tiādinā anekappabhedo,
tika-s0201t:1454_5: “muyhanaṃ asamapekkhanaṃ apaccavekkhaṇā dummejjhaṃ bālya”ntiādinā ca dosamohānaṃ nānappakārataṃ sandhāyāha “itaresupi dvīsu eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1455_3: aññathā dutiyamaggena kiṃ kataṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1455_4: Samudācārappattaṃ pana disvā “appahīnaṃ me atthī”tipi jānāti.
tika-s0201t:1455_7: Evaṃ paṭhamamaggeneva samucchinnasaṃsayassa “ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīnoti evaṃ sandheho
tika-s0201t:1455_9: Vinayakukkuccaṃ viya hi paṇṇattiyaṃ akusalatāya ariyānampi katthaci vimatimattaṃ uppajjati yathā taṃ sabbaso appahīnasammohānanti.
tika-s0201t:1455_10: Attano avisaye anabhijānanaṃ paṇṇattikosallena kimettha payojanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1455_11: paccavekkhaṇāmattena ayamattho sijjhatīti dassento “kiṃ tassa paccavekkhaṇā natthī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1455_12: Itaro “natthī”ti na sakkā vattunti katvā “atthī”ti vatvā tattha labbhamānavibhāgaṃ dassento “sā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1455_16: na evaṃ sabbaso na hotīti āha “imāsu panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1457_4: Pariyesanadukkhādihetukaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ tattha duccaritacaraṇena samparāyikañca dukkhamettha kāmesu bahukanti bahudukkhā.
tika-s0201t:1457_6: Te pana parikkilesā vakkhamānanayena bahūyevettha diṭṭhadhammikāpīti āha “diṭṭhadhammika…pe… bahū”ti.
tika-s0201t:1457_7: Te ca parikkilesā yasmā taṃsamaṅgino hitapaṭipattiyā antarāyakarā idha ceva paraloke ca ādīnavakāraṇañca pavattanti,
tika-s0201t:1457_14: Sā cattāripi saccāni visesato passatīti vipassanāti adhippetā.
tika-s0201t:1457_18: Āvaṭṭanasīlo ābhujanasīlo na hotīti anāvaṭṭī neva hoti sabbaso appahīnakāmarāgachando.
tika-s0201t:1458_3: taṃ sabbaṃ anavasesato pariggahetvā cassa parittabhāvo dassitoti ādīnavopi kathito saṅkhepeneva sesassaādīnavassa dassitattā.
tika-s0201t:1458_4: Taṃ kathetunti taṃ nissaraṇaṃ “ekantasukhapaṭisaṃvedī”ti iminā kathetuṃ.
tika-s0201t:1458_7: attakilamathānuyogañca dassetvā imehi dvīhi antehi muttaṃ mama sāsananti,
tika-s0201t:1458_10: Dutiye panettha gijjhavantatāya gijjhā kūṭe etassāti gijjhakūṭo.
tika-s0201t:1458_11: Uddhaṃyeva tiṭṭhanakā nisajjāya vuṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya ekaṭṭhāneneva tiṭṭhanakā.
tika-s0201t:1458_18: Tena nirantarappavattiṃ dassetīti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1459_2: taṃ jānātīti dukkhassa nijjaraṇakhepanaṃ nāma viññūnaṃ kiccaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1459_4: tasmā tumhehi purāṇānaṃ kammānaṃ byantibhāvaṃ karontehi paṭhamaṃ tāva ettakāni purāṇāni kammānīti jānitabbāni,
tika-s0201t:1459_5: tato “ettakaṃ kālaṃ katena tapasā ettakāni tāni byantikatāni,
tika-s0201t:1459_6: idāni ettakāni kātabbānī”tiādinā ayaṃ vidhi purisena viya attanā kātabbakiccaṃ paricchinditabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1459_11: Suddhantaṃ patto atthīti pucchatīti iminā akusalānaṃ pahānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1459_12: kusalānaṃ bhāvanā ca sabbena sabbaṃ nigaṇṭhasamaye natthi sabbaso visuddhibhāvanāya abhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1460_0: Evaṃ ajānanabhāve satīti “ahuvamheva maya”ntiādinā vuttappakārassa ajānane sati,
tika-s0201t:1460_3: Te pana yasmā kāyavācāhi nihīnameva karonti,
tika-s0201t:1460_8: Te nigaṇṭhesu pabbajantīti pubbe mahādukkhasaṃvattaniyakammassa katattā hi tumhe etarahi īdisaṃ mahādukkhaṃ paccanubhavathāti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1461_5: idha loke sukhaṃ adhigacchantā kasivaṇijjādidukkhapaṭipattiyāva adhigacchanti,
tika-s0201t:1461_10: na pana bhagavato accantasantapaṇītaṃ nibbānasukhapaṭivedanaṃ jānanti.
tika-s0201t:1462_0: Aññāhi vedanāhi avomissaṃ ekantaṃ sukhaṃ ekantasukhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1462_5: Sukhaṃ pucchituṃ hotīti “yadi satta rattindivāni nappahoti,
tika-s0201t:1462_6: kiṃ cha rattindivāni pahotī”tiādinā pucchanasukhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1462_7: “Ahaṃ kho”tiādinā pavatto suddhavāro suddhanissandassa phalasamāpattisukhassa vasena āgatattā.
tika-s0201t:1462_9: satta rattindivāni pahontassa ekasmiṃ rattindive kiṃ vattabbanti.
tika-s0201t:1465_3: “bhaggā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā”tiādinā nayena vacanattho veditabboti attho.
tika-s0201t:1465_6: Nagare nimmiteti tattha anantarāyena nagare māpite.
tika-s0201t:1465_7: Tameva susumāragiraṇaṃ subhanimittaṃ katvā “susumāragiri”tvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-s0201t:1465_10: tasmā taṃ susumāragiri etassa atthīti “susumāragirī”ti vuccatīti keci.
tika-s0201t:1465_13: tesaṃ bahulatāya pana taṃ vanaṃ bhesakaḷāvananteva paññāyittha.
tika-s0201t:1465_15: tassa tato gaḷitaṭṭhānatāya taṃ vanaṃ bhesagaḷāvanaṃ nāma jātanti keci.
tika-s0201t:1466_0: Icchāpetīti yaṃ kiñci attani garahitabbaṃ vattuṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ icchaṃ uppādeti,
tika-s0201t:1466_8: So cāti evaṃ pavāretā so bhikkhu.
tika-s0201t:1466_9: Dukkhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ vippaṭikūlaggāhe vipaccanīkasāte anādare puggaleti dubbaco.
tika-s0201t:1466_11: Upari āgatehīti “pāpiccho hotī”tiādinā āgatehi soḷasahi pāpadhammehi.
tika-s0201t:1467_0: Asantasambhāvanapatthanānanti asantehi avijjamānehi guṇehi sambhāvanassa patthanābhūtānaṃ. Paṭi-
tika-s0201t:1467_2: pharaṇaṃ vāyamanaṃ idha tathāvaṭṭhānanti āha “paṭippharatīti paṭiviruddho paccanīko hutvā tiṭṭhatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1467_4: Tathābhūto ca paraṃ ghaṭṭento nāma hotīti āha “ghaṭṭetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1467_6: tassa paṭibhāgabhūtaṃ dosaṃ codakassa upari āropeti.
tika-s0201t:1468_4: Tattha aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vāti yaṃ codakena cuditakassa dosavibhāvanaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1468_10: Ko āpannotiādinā codanaṃ avissajjetvā vikkhepāpajjanaṃ aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇanti dasseti,
tika-s0201t:1468_11: bahiddhā kathāapanāmanaṃ vissajjetvāti ayameva tesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0201t:1470_2: Attānaṃ anuminitabbanti ca idaṃ paccatte upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1470_4: Attānaṃ anuminitabbanti vā attani anumānañāṇaṃ pavattetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1470_6: appiyabhāvāvahā mayi pavattā pāpicchatā pāpicchābhāvato parasmiṃ pavattapāpicchatā viya.
tika-s0201t:1470_9: sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyabhāvaṃ icchantena pāpicchatā pahātabbā sīlavisuddhihetubhāvato attukkaṃsanādippahānaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:1471_2: na pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gato”tiādinā pati pati divasassa tikkhattuṃ vā ñāṇacakkhunā avekkhitabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1471_7: kammatthatāvasena pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “attāna”nti paccatte upayogavacanaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1472_6: na upasampannānaṃ eva na pabbajitānaṃ evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1475_1: Ceto tehi khilayati thaddhabhāvaṃ āpajjatīti cetokhilā.
tika-s0201t:1475_3: Yasmā tehi uppannehi cittaṃ uklāpījātaṃ ṭhānaṃ viya amanuññaṃ khettaṃ viya ca khāṇukanicitaṃ amahapphalaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1475_6: Cittaṃ bandhitvāti taṇhāpavattibhāvato kusalacārassa avasaracajanavasena cittaṃ baddhaṃ viya samorodhetvā.
tika-s0201t:1475_8: Saddatthato pana ceto virūpaṃ nibandhīyati saṃyamīyati etehīti cetaso vinibandhā yassa catubbidhaṃ sīlaṃ
tika-s0201t:1475_9: akhaṇḍādibhāvappattiyā suparisuddhaṃ visesabhāgiyattā appakasireneva maggaphalāvahaṃ mahāsaṅgharakkhitattherassa viya,
tika-s0201t:1475_10: so tādisena sīlena imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ āpajjissatīti āha “sīlena vuddhi”nti.
tika-s0201t:1475_11: Yassa pana ariyamaggo uppajjanto virūḷhamūlo viya pādapo suppatiṭṭhito,
tika-s0201t:1475_12: so sāsane virūḷhiṃ āpannoti āha “maggena virūḷhi”nti.
tika-s0201t:1475_14: so arahā sīlādidhammakkhandhapāripūriyā sativepullappatto hotīti āha “nibbānena vepulla”nti.
tika-s0201t:1476_0: Buddhānaṃ dhammakāyo viya rūpakāyopi anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttaraguṇādhiṭṭhānatāya ca apaccakkhakārīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1476_1: saṃsayavatthu hotiyevāti “sarīre vā guṇe vā kaṅkhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1476_2: Tattha yathā mahāpurisalakkhaṇena anubyañjanādayo rūpakāyaguṇā gahitā eva honti avinābhāvatoti “dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍita”micceva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1476_3: evaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇena sabbepi anantāparimeyyabhedā dhammakāyaguṇā gahitā eva hontīti sabbaññutaññāṇaggahaṇameva kataṃ nānantariyabhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1476_4: Kaṅkhahīti “aho vata te guṇā na bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0201t:1476_8: Vicinantoti vicayabhūtāya paññāya te vivecetukāmo tadabhāvato kicchaṃ dukkhaṃ āpajjati,
tika-s0201t:1476_9: kicchappatti ca tattha nicchetuṃ asamatthatāyevāti āha “vinicchetuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1476_11: Adhimokkhaṃ na paṭilabhatīti “evameta”nti okappanavasena guṇesu vinicchayaṃ nādhigacchati.
tika-s0201t:1476_18: “na sampasīdatī”ti iminā tividhāyapi vimatiyā vasena uppannacittakālussiyaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1477_3: Anuyogāyāti yathā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ avasaro na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1477_9: tathā satatassa nirantarapavattassa anuyogassa bhāvo sātaccaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1477_12: Padhānāyāti santamevaṃ tividhadhātusaṃvaḍḍhitānubhāvaṃ sabbakilesaviddhaṃsanasamatthaṃ padhānasaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1477_14: Ettha ca ātappāya cittaṃ na namati yathāvuttakaṅkhāvasena,
tika-s0201t:1477_15: pageva anuyogādiatthanti dassetuṃ cattāripi padāni gahitāni,
tika-s0201t:1477_18: Ettāvatā bhagavā satthari kaṅkhāya cittassa thaddhakacavarakhāṇukabhāvena akusalabhāvādiāpādanato cetokhilabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1478_0: Sikkhāggahaṇena paṭipattisaddhammassa gahitattā vuttaṃ “pariyattidhamme ca paṭivedhadhamme cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1478_3: Tayidaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ paramparāya paṭivedhāvahabhāvādivasenapi ekaccānaṃ tattha saṃsayuppattito.
tika-s0201t:1478_6: Tathā hi ekacce “kasiṇādibhāvanāya jhānāni ijjhantī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1478_9: Ettha ca navalokuttaresu paññattiyaṃyeva kaṅkhāpavatti veditabbā asaṃkilesikattā lokuttaradhammānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1479_6: Evañhi maggaphalasikkhāhi imāsaṃ viseso siddho hoti.
tika-s0201t:1479_8: Ettha ca yathā vicikicchā vatthuttayassa sikkhāya ca guṇesu anadhimuccanaasampasīdanavasena appaṭipattibhāvato
tika-s0201t:1479_9: cittassa thaddhabhāvo āsappanaparisappanavasena pavattiyā kacavarakhāṇukabhāvo ca,
tika-s0201t:1479_10: evaṃ sabrahmacārīsu āghātacaṇḍikkādivasena cittassa thaddhabhāvo ca upahananavirujjhanādivasena kacavarakhāṇukabhāvo ca veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1479_13: sāsanikavasena cāyaṃ cetokhiladesanāti sabrahmacārīvisayova kopo gahito.
tika-s0201t:1480_6: Kāmaniddese sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena “kāmā”ti vuttā,
tika-s0201t:1480_8: Vinibaddhavatthubhāvena yathā visuṃ attano kāyo gahito,
tika-s0201t:1480_9: tathā paresaṃ tathārūpā rūpadhammā samūhaṭṭhenāti āha “rūpeti bahiddhārūpe”ti.
tika-s0201t:1480_10: Yathā hi pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo jhānādivisesādhigamassa vinibaddhāya saṃvattati,
tika-s0201t:1480_11: evaṃ attano kāye apekkhā bahiddhā ca sakaparikkhārañātimittādīsu apekkhāti.
tika-s0201t:1480_13: Tadayuttaṃ jhānādhigamavinibaddhānaṃ sīlassa ca saṃkilesabhūtānaṃ cetovinibaddhabhāvena gahitattā.
tika-s0201t:1482_3: So hi kilesānaṃ tapanaṭṭhena niggaṇhanaṭṭhena tapacaraṇanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1483_3: chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pavattivasena chandaṃ nissāya.
tika-s0201t:1483_6: Tehi dhammehīti chandanissayena pavattasamādhinā ceva “padhānasaṅkhāro”ti vuttavīriyena ca.
tika-s0201t:1483_11: Atha vā ijjhanti tāya iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi,
tika-s0201t:1483_19: Tesaṃ tesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppādanakiriyāya uppannānaṃ paribrūhanakiriyāya ussahanato ussoḷhī,
tika-s0201t:1483_21: Sā pana catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ visesapaccayabhūtā te upādāya “pañcamī”ti vuttā,
tika-s0201t:1483_22: sā ca yasmā samathavipassanābhāvanāsu tattha caādimajjhapariyosānesu sādhetabbaṃ vīriyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1483_24: Pubbabhāgiyasamathavipassanāsādhanaṃ pahātabbadhammavibhāgena bhinditvā āha “pañca cetokhilappahānāni pañca vinibandhappahānānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1484_1: Evaṃ hīti evaṃ ekameva saṅkhyaṃ avatvā aparāya saṅkhyāya saddhiṃ vacanaṃ loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hoti yathā “dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1484_2: Sammā adhisayitānīti pādādīhi attanā nesaṃ kiñci upaghātaṃ akarontiyā bahivātādiparissayapariharaṇatthaṃ sammadeva upari sayitāni.
tika-s0201t:1484_3: Utuṃ gāhāpentiyāti tesaṃ allasinehapariyādānatthaṃ attano kāyusmāvasena utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā.
tika-s0201t:1484_5: Sammā paribhāvitānīti sammadeva sabbaso kukkuṭavāsanāya vāsitāni.
tika-s0201t:1484_9: Kiñcāpi na evaṃ “aho vatime”tiādinā icchā uppajjeyya,
tika-s0201t:1484_10: kāraṇassa pana sampāditattā atha kho bhabbāva abhinibbhijjitunti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1484_11: Kasmā bhabbāti āha “te hi yasmā tāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1484_12: Ettha yathā kapālassa tanutā ālokassa anto paññāyamānassa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1484_13: tathā kapālassa tanutāya nakhasikhāmukhatuṇḍakānaṃ kharatāya ca allasinehassa pariyādānaṃ kāraṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1485_2: Yathā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyāya karaṇaṃ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1485_3: evaṃ bhikkhuno ussoḷhīpannarasāni aṅgāni avijjaṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇanti āha “tassā kukkuṭiyā…pe…
tika-s0201t:1485_5: Paṭicchādanasāmaññena avijjāya aṇḍakosasadisatāya balavavipassanāvasena avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1485_7: tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ dhārentī viya hotīti āha “gabbhaggahaṇakālo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1485_10: Gāthāya avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharatīti desanāvilāsena vineyyasantānagataṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
tika-s0201t:1486_1: Pubbabhāgiyā iddhipādā pāḷiyaṃ gahitāti “iddhipādehi vikkhambhanappahāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1486_2: “Ussoḷhipannarasaṅgasamannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo abhinibbidāyā”tiādivacanato lokuttariddhipādā pana sambodhaggahaṇeneva gahitā.
tika-s0201t:1486_3: Magge āgateti ussoḷhīpannarasaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhuno vipassanaṃ ussukkāpayato magge āgate uppanne,
tika-s0201t:1486_5: Phale āgateti etthāpi vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1486_6: Nibbānassa pana pāḷiyaṃ anāgatattā nissaraṇappahānaṃ na gahitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1489_2: vanute vā te attasampattiyā vasanatthāya yācanto viya hotīti vanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1489_5: Pariyāyati attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā vattatīti pariyāyo,
tika-s0201t:1489_10: Vanapatthaṃ ārabbha pavattā desanā vanapatthadesanā, taṃ,
tika-s0201t:1490_6: Samudānetabbāti sammā ñāyena anavajjauñchācariyādinā uddhaṃ uddhaṃ ānetabbā pāpuṇitabbā.
tika-s0201t:1490_7: Te pana tathā samudānitā samāhaṭā nāma hontīti āha “samāharitabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1490_10: Rattibhāgaṃ vā divasabhāgaṃ vāti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “rattikoṭṭhāse vā divasakoṭṭhāse vā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1492_5: Taṃ puggalanti “so puggalo”ti paccattavacanaṃ upayogavasena pariṇāmetvā taṃ puggalaṃ anāpucchā pakkamitabbanti attho.
tika-s0201t:1492_7: Taṃ āpucchā pakkamitabbanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0201t:1493_1: Evarūpoti yaṃ nissāya bhikkhuno guṇehi vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā,
tika-s0201t:1496_4: puthuttārammaṇato vā cittaṃ paṭinivattetvā accantasante nibbāne phalasamāpattivasena allīyāpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1496_9: So hi daṇḍapasuto daṇḍasippe ca sukusalo tattha pākaṭo paññāto,
tika-s0201t:1498_0: Atthaṃ na jānātīti atthaṃ ce ekadesena jāneyya,
tika-s0201t:1498_2: Tassa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyāti tadassa atthājānanaṃ bhagavatā icchitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1498_5: Nanu bhagavatā saddhiṃ loke puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇā nānāvādā santīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tathāgato hī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1498_6: Na vivadati vivādahetukānaṃ kāmadiṭṭhijjhosānānaṃ maggeneva samugghātitattā,
tika-s0201t:1498_8: Dhammavādī yathābhūtavādī dhammavādīhi na vivadati tesaṃ vivaditukāmatāya eva abhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1498_9: adhammavādī pana tiṇāyapi namaññamāno tehi kiñci vivadati.
tika-s0201t:1499_1: saddo “yathā ca anuppannassa kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti,
tika-s0201t:1499_2: tañca pajānātī”tiādīsu viya kāraṇatthoti āha “yena kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1499_5: so pana atthato kāraṇamevāti vuttaṃ “yena kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1499_14: Saṃvarāsaṃvaro phalāphalaṃ viya khuddakamahanto bhavo “bhavābhavo”ti vuttoti āha “hīnapaṇīte vā bhave”ti.
tika-s0201t:1499_17: Kilesā eva vā saññānāmena vuttā “saññā pahāya amataṃ eva pāpuṇātī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0201t:1499_18: Attano khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ dīpetīti imināva paresañca tathattāya dhammaṃ desetīti ayampi attho vibhāvitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1499_19: Nīharitvā kīḷāpetvāti nīharitvā ceva kīḷāpetvā ca,
tika-s0201t:1499_21: Tivisākhanti tibhaṅgabhākuṭi viya nalāṭe jātattā nalāṭikaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1500_1: Kinti nu khoti kiṃ kāraṇenāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1500_5: Purimapade hi vibhatti alopaṃ katvā niddeso,
tika-s0201t:1500_7: Saṅkhāyanti saṅkhābhāvena ñāyantīti saṅkhāti āha “saṅkhāti koṭṭhāsā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1500_11: Samudācarantīti sabbaso uddhaṃ uddhaṃ pariyādāya pavattanti.
tika-s0201t:1500_13: tena ca yogena purisanti upayogavacanaṃ yathā “tathāgataṃ,
tika-s0201t:1500_16: Taṇhādayo ca yathāsakaṃ pavattiākāraṃ avilaṅghantiyo āsevanavasena uparūpari pavattanti.
tika-s0201t:1501_2: natthīti cakkhāyatanādi ekampi āyatanaṃ abhinanditabbaṃ abhivaditabbaṃ ajjhositabbañca natthi ce,
tika-s0201t:1501_6: appahīnābhinandanābhivadanaajjhosānānaṃ pana puthujjanānaṃ abhinanditabbādippakārāni āyatanāni hontīti tesaṃ na sakkā natthīti vattu,
tika-s0201t:1501_7: pahīnābhinandanādīnaṃ pana sabbathā natthīti “natthi ce”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1501_8: Ahaṃ mamanti abhinanditabbanti diṭṭhābhinandanāya “aha”nti taṇhābhinandanāya “mama”nti rocetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1501_11: Ajjhositvāti diṭṭhi taṇhā vatthuṃ anupavisitvā gāhadvayaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ viya katvā.
tika-s0201t:1501_15: Taṇhādīnaṃ avatthubhāvadassanamukhena taṇhādīnaṃyeva appavattiṃ kilesaparinibbānaṃ kathitanti.
tika-s0201t:1501_19: taṃnissaraṇaṃ vā nibbānaṃ rāgānusayādīnaṃ anto avasānaṃ appavattīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1502_1: Matthakappattaṃ kalahanti bhaṇḍanādimatte aṭṭhatvā mukhasattīhi vitudanādivasena matthakappattaṃ kalahaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1502_6: Evaṃ pavattanti garukātabbesupi gāravaṃ akatvā “tuvaṃ tuva”nti evaṃ pavattaṃ sārambhakathaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1502_11: Kilesānaṃ uppattinimittatā tāva āyatanānaṃ hotu tabbhāve bhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1502_13: Na hettha lokuttaradhammānaṃ saṅgaho lokiyānaṃyeva adhippetattāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “nirujjhamānāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1502_15: tattheva niruddhā hontī”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ suttantarena sādhento “svāyamattho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1503_1: So hi “kattha uppajjamānā”tiādinā pucchāvasena pavattattā pañhoti vutto.
tika-s0201t:1503_3: na sabbakilesānanti īdisī codanā anavakāsāti dassento “yatheva cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1503_4: Laddhavohāreti iminā rāgādīnaṃ appavattinimittatāya antoti samaññā nibbānassāti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1503_5: Eteneva abhinandanādīnaṃ abhāvoti ca idaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1503_6: Kathaṃ pana sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭe nibbāne akusaladhammānaṃ nirodhasambhavoti āha “yañhi yattha natthi,
tika-s0201t:1503_10: Na hi tattha uppajjitvā niruddhā vitakkavicārā paṭippassaddhāti vuttā,
tika-s0201t:1504_1: Evaṃsampadanti evaṃsampajjanakaṃ evaṃ passitabbaṃ idaṃ mama ajjhesanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1504_3: Jānaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti.
tika-s0201t:1504_4: Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena hi avisesaggahaṇena ca “jāna”nti iminā niravasesaṃ ñeyyajātaṃ pariggaṇhātīti tabbisayāya
tika-s0201t:1504_6: Atha vā pakaraṇavasena “bhagavā”ti saddantarasannidhānena cāyamattho vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0201t:1504_13: Atha vā jānaṃ jānātīti yathā aññe savipallāsā kāmarūpapariññāvādino jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti,
tika-s0201t:1504_15: Bhagavā pana pahīnavipallāsattā jānanto jānāti eva,
tika-s0201t:1504_16: diṭṭhidassanassa ca abhāvā passanto passatiyevāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1504_17: Dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenāti yathā cakkhu sattānaṃ dassanatthaṃ pariṇeti,
tika-s0201t:1504_19: paññācakkhumayattā vā sayambhuñāṇena paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti vā cakkhubhūto.
tika-s0201t:1504_20: Ñāṇabhūtoti etassa ca evameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1504_21: Dhammā vā bodhipakkhiyā tehi uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato,
tika-s0201t:1504_23: Brahmā vuccati maggo tena uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanattā,
tika-s0201t:1504_27: Atthaṃ nīharitvāti dukkhādiatthaṃ tatthāpi pīḷanādiatthaṃ uddharitvā.
tika-s0201t:1504_29: amatasacchikiriyaṃ sattesu uppādento amataṃ dadātīti amatassa dātā.
tika-s0201t:1505_1: So vā uddeso attanopi hotīti thero “yaṃ kho no”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1505_3: Idāni yehi dvārārammaṇehi purisaṃ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti,
tika-s0201t:1505_4: tāni tāva dassento papañcasaññāsaṅkhā dassetuṃ yena saḷāyatanavibhaṅgena niddeso kato,
tika-s0201t:1505_11: Ārammaṇapaccayo ca catusamuṭṭhānikarūpesu yaṃ kiñci hotīti āha “catusamuṭṭhānikarūpe ca paṭiccā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1506_0: Ettha cakkhu ekampi viññāṇassa paccayo hoti,
tika-s0201t:1506_1: rūpāyatanaṃ pana anekameva saṃhatanti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ nissayabhāvena “cakkhupasādañca ārammaṇabhāvena
tika-s0201t:1506_3: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ cakkhu ekampi viññāṇassa paccayo hoti,
tika-s0201t:1506_6: Cakkhu hi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttapaccayehi paccayo hontaṃ atthibhāveneva hoti tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1506_8: yato taṃ atthiavigatapaccayehissa paccayo hotīti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:1506_9: tannissitatā cassa na ekadesena allīyanavasena icchitabbā arūpabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1506_10: Atha kho garurājādīsu sissarājapurisādīnaṃ viya tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya,
tika-s0201t:1506_11: itare pana paccayā tena tena visesena veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1507_0: Sacāyaṃ paccayabhāvo na ekasmiṃ na sambhavatīti ekampi cakkhu cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo hotīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “cakkhuñcāvuso,
tika-s0201t:1507_2: Rūpaṃ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātaatthi-
tika-s0201t:1507_3: avigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti puretaraṃ uppannaṃ hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇe eva upakārakattā tathāpi anekameva saṃhataṃ hutvā paccayo hoti ārammaṇabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1507_6: tadaññesañca satipi paccayabhāve so tassa sārammaṇasabhāvatāya yaṃ kiñci anālambhitvā pavattituṃ asamatthassa
tika-s0201t:1507_8: tassa yasmā yathā tathā sabhāvūpaladdhi viññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayalābho,
tika-s0201t:1507_9: tasmā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ tassa sabhāvaṃ vibhāventameva pavattati.
tika-s0201t:1507_10: Sā cassa indriyādhīnavuttikassa ārammaṇasabhāvūpaladdhi na ekadvikalāpagatavaṇṇavasena hoti,
tika-s0201t:1507_12: atha kho ābhogānurūpaṃ āpāthagatavaṇṇavasenāti anekameva rūpaṃ saṃhaccakāritāya viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti
tika-s0201t:1508_0: Yaṃ pana paṭṭhāne “rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1508_5: Evañca katvā yadeke vadanti “āyatanasallakkhaṇavasena cakkhuviññāṇādayo sallakkhaṇavisayā,
tika-s0201t:1508_8: Na cettha samudāyārammaṇatā āsaṅkitabbā samudāyābhogasseva abhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1508_10: Kathaṃ pana paccekaṃ asamatthā samuditā ārammaṇapaccayā honti.
tika-s0201t:1508_11: Na hi paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontā andhā samuditā passantīti?
tika-s0201t:1508_12: Nayidamekantikaṃ visuṃ visuṃ asamatthānampi sivikāvahanādīsu samatthatāya dassanato.
tika-s0201t:1508_13: Kesādīnañca yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitānaṃ paccekaṃ vaṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0201t:1508_14: tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne samuditānaṃ taṃ gahetuṃ sakkāti bhiyyopi tesaṃ saṃhaccakāritā paribyattā.
tika-s0201t:1508_16: udāhu taṃsamudāyotiādikā codanā paṭikkhittāti veditabbā. “Sotañca, āvuso,
tika-s0201t:1508_18: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāmāti cakkhunissitarūpavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāma uppajjati.
tika-s0201t:1509_2: Phasso nāmāti arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattanato phusanalakkhaṇo phasso nāma dhammo uppajjati.
tika-s0201t:1509_5: itarāya upanissayavasena paccayabhāvato phassapaccayā phassakāraṇā vedanā uppajjati.
tika-s0201t:1509_6: Anubhavanasamakālameva ārammaṇassa sañjānanaṃ hotīti “tāya vedanāya yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vedeti,
tika-s0201t:1509_8: Cakkhudvārikā dhammā idhādhippetāti tadanusārena pana aparāparuppannānaṃ vedanādīnaṃ gahaṇe sati,
tika-s0201t:1509_12: Na hi asati vedayite kadāci saññuppatti atthi.
tika-s0201t:1509_16: yathāparikappitañca taṃ diṭṭhitaṇhāmānamaññanāhi maññamāno papañcetīti vutto.
tika-s0201t:1510_6: Sahajātā hontīti ettha “cakkhusamphassapaccayā vedanākkhandho atthi kusalo’tiādivacanato vedanāsaññā asahajātāpi gahetabbā.
tika-s0201t:1510_7: Yadi evanti “papañcetī”ti ettha yadi pañcadvārajavanasahajātā papañcasaṅkhā adhippetā tāsaṃ paccuppannavisayattā,
tika-s0201t:1510_11: evaṃ atītakāle anāgatakāle ca cakkhudvāre papañcasaṅkhānaṃ uppajjanato atītānāgataggahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0201t:1510_13: anāgatesu vā cakkhurūpesu cakkhudvārikānaṃ tāsaṃ uppajjanato.
tika-s0201t:1511_1: paṭiccāti ettha duvidhaṃ manaṃ kevalaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1511_4: Uppattidvārakathāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ calitaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ manodvāraṃ nāma,
tika-s0201t:1511_5: cakkhādi viya rūpādinā yena taṃ ghaṭṭitaṃ tattha upari viññāṇuppattiyā dvārabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1511_10: Dhammeti tebhūmakadhammārammaṇanti iminā sabhāvadhammesu eva kilesuppattīti keci,
tika-s0201t:1511_12: Idha pana tebhūmakāpi dhammā labbhantīti dassanatthaṃ “tebhūmakadhammārammaṇa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1511_16: Uppattidvārakathāyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādi viya āvajjanampi dvārapakkhikamevāti vuttaṃ “manoviññāṇanti āvajjanaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1511_17: Paccayakathāyaṃ pana āvajjanaṃ gahitanti “javanaṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1511_18: Nayadvaye dhammānaṃ sahajātavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “āvajjane gahite”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1512_1: tāva paññattimukheneva sabhāvadhammā paññāyanti paccekaṃ apaññāpaneti āha “phasso nāma eko dhammo uppajjatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1512_2: Evaṃ phassapaññattiṃ paññapessatīti paññapetvā tabbisayadassanaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppādessati.
tika-s0201t:1512_3: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti imasmiṃ cakkhuādike paccaye sati idaṃ phassādikaṃ paccayuppannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1512_4: Dvādasāyatanavasenāti dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ vasena āgatena paṭiccasamuppādanayavasena.
tika-s0201t:1512_5: Dvādasāyatanapaṭikkhepavasenāti “imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hotī”ti paccayābhāvapaccayuppannābhāvadassanakkame dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ paṭikkhepavasena.
tika-s0201t:1513_0: Sāvakena pañho kathitoti ayaṃ pañho sāvakena kathito,
tika-s0201t:1513_1: iti iminā kāraṇena mā nikkaṅkhā ahuvattha.
tika-s0201t:1513_2: Atha vā saṃkhittena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārena vibhajantena etadagge ṭhapitena mahāsāvakena pañho kathitoti
tika-s0201t:1513_3: iminā kāraṇena etasmiṃ pañhe mā nikkaṅkhā ahuvattha,
tika-s0201t:1513_4: heraññike sati kahāpaṇaṃ sayaṃ nicchinantā viya ahutvā bhagavato eva santike nikkaṅkhā hotha.
tika-s0201t:1514_1: Ākaronti phalaṃ tāya tāya mariyādāya nibbattentīti ākārā, kāraṇāni.
tika-s0201t:1514_2: Pāṭiyekkakāraṇehīti channaṃ dvārānaṃ vasena visuṃ visuṃ papañcakāraṇassa niddiṭṭhattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1514_3: Atha vā yadipi yattakehi dhammehi yaṃ phalaṃ nibbattati,
tika-s0201t:1514_5: tathāpi paccekaṃ tassa kāraṇamevāti katvā vuttaṃ “pāṭiyekkakāraṇehī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1514_6: Padehīti nāmādipadehi ceva taṃsamudāyabhūtehi vākyehi ca.
tika-s0201t:1514_8: Akkharāniyeva hi atthesu yathāvaccaṃ padavākyabhāvena paricchijjanti.
tika-s0201t:1514_10: Tāni pana yasmā pariyāyassa akkharaṇato “akkharānī”ti vuccanti,
tika-s0201t:1514_12: Ettha ca imehi ākārehi imehi padabyañjanehi papañcasamudācārassa vaṭṭassa ca vivaṭṭassa ca dassanaattho vibhattoti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1514_16: Yato kho bhikkhu dhātukusalo ca hotī”ti ādisuttapadavasena paṇḍitalakkhaṇaṃ dassento “catūhi vā kāraṇehī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1514_17: Saccapaṭivedhavasena paṇḍiccaṃ dassitanti paṭisambhidāvasena mahāpaññataṃ dassetuṃ “mahante atthe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1515_4: Sabbaññutaññāṇenevassāti sabbaññutaññāṇeneva assa suttassa guṇaṃ paricchindāpetvā nāmaṃ gaṇhāpessāmi.
tika-s0201t:1518_1: Dve dve bhāgeti dve dve koṭṭhāse katvā.
tika-s0201t:1518_3: imaṃ dutiyabhāgamakāsi”nti vacanato sabbepi vitakkā saṃkilesavodānavibhāgena dveva bhāgā katā,
tika-s0201t:1518_4: aparāparuppattiyā panetesaṃ abhiṇhācāraṃ upādāya pāḷiyaṃ “dvidhā katvā”ti āmeḍitavacananti “dve dve bhāge katvā”ti āmeḍitavacanavaseneva vutto.
tika-s0201t:1518_5: Atha vā bhāgadvayassa sappaṭibhāgatāya tattha yaṃ yaṃ dvayampi kho ujuvipaccanīkaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1518_6: taṃ taṃ visuṃ visuṃ gahetukāmo bhagavā āha “dvidhā katvā vitakke vihareyya”nti.
tika-s0201t:1518_7: Evaṃ pana cintetvā tattha micchāvitakkānaṃ sammāvitakkānañca anavasesaṃ asaṅkarato ca gahitabhāvaṃ dassento “imaṃ ekaṃ bhāgamakāsiṃ,
tika-s0201t:1518_16: paresaṃ viheṭhanākārena pavattassa karuṇāpaṭipakkhassa pāpadhammassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1518_21: Vitakko akusalapakkhikoyevāti iminā vitakkabhāvasāmaññena tatthāpi akusalabhāvasāmaññena ekabhāgakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1519_2: Idha pana kāmavitakkapaṭipakkhassa adhippetattā āha “kāmehi nissaṭo nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko”ti.
tika-s0201t:1519_4: Yāva paṭhamajjhānāti paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānaṃ etthuppanno vitakko nekkhammavitakkoyeva.
tika-s0201t:1519_5: Paṭhamajjhānanti ca idaṃ tato paraṃ vitakkābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1520_0: Mahābodhisattānaṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya laddhāvasarā sammāsaṅkappā uparūpari savisesaṃ pavattantīti āha “chabbassāni…pe…
tika-s0201t:1520_2: Ñāṇassa aparipakkattā pubbavāsanāvasena satisammosato kadāci micchāvitakkalesopi hotiyevāti taṃ dassetuṃ “satisammosena…pe…
tika-s0201t:1520_4: Yathā niccapihitepi gehe kadāci vātapāne vivaṭamatte laddhāvasaro vāto anto paviseyya,
tika-s0201t:1520_5: evaṃ guttindriyepi bodhisattasantāne satisammosavasena laddhāvasaro akusalavitakko uppajji,
tika-s0201t:1520_7: atha mahāsatto taṃmuhuttuppannameva paṭivinodetvā tesaṃ āyatiṃ anuppādāya “ime micchāvitakkā,
tika-s0201t:1520_8: ime sammāvitakkā”ti yāthāvato te paricchinditvā micchāvitakkānaṃ avasaraṃ adento sammāvitakke parivaḍḍhesi.
tika-s0201t:1521_1: Pamādo nāma sativippavāsoti āha “appamattassāti satiyā avippavāse ṭhitassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1521_3: Pesitacittassāti bhavavimokkhāya vissaṭṭhacittassa kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhassa.
tika-s0201t:1521_4: “Evaṃ paṭipākatiko jāto”ti attano attabhāvaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ somanassākāraṃ gehassitasomanassapakkhikaṃ akāsi,
tika-s0201t:1522_3: etāni tīṇi nāmāni labhatīti tādisassa uppanno micchāvitakko yathārahaṃ attabyābādhako ubhayabyābādhako
tika-s0201t:1522_4: ca na hotīti na vattabbo taṃ sabhāvānativattanatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1522_9: Vigatantantiādīhi pana samūlaṃ uddhaṭaṃ viya tadā appavattanakaṃ akāsinti vadati.
tika-s0201t:1523_3: Tattha vitakkena cittaṃ vihaññamānaṃ viya hotīti āha “taṃ gahetvā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ akāsī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1523_7: Nti karuṇāyanavasena pavattacittapakampanaṃ sandhāya “uppajjati vihiṃsāvitakko”ti āha,
tika-s0201t:1524_0: Tena tena cassākārenāti yena yena ākārena bhikkhunā anuvitakkitaṃ anuvicāritaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1524_1: tena tena ākārenassa cetaso nati hoti.
tika-s0201t:1524_4: Pahānaṃ panassa siddhameva paṭipakkhassa siddhattāti dassetuṃ “pahāsī”ti vuttaṃ yathā “asāmibhoge gāmikāādīyiṃsū”ti.
tika-s0201t:1524_10: tannibbattattā pana kāraṇūpacārena sassaṃ “kiṭṭha”nti vuttanti āha “sassasambādhe”ti.
tika-s0201t:1524_17: sā eva vodānanti āha “vodānapakkhanti idaṃ tasseva vevacana”nti.
tika-s0201t:1525_2: Nibbānameva nekkhammaṃ sabbakilesato sabbasaṅkhatato ca nissaṭattā.
tika-s0201t:1525_3: Kiṭṭhasambādhaṃ viya rūpādiārammaṇaṃ pamāde sati anatthuppattiṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1525_13: Ugghātīyeyyāti uddhataṃ siyā vikkhittañca bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1525_15: Yathā pana ṭhapitaṃ saṇṭhapitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:1525_17: Sannisīdāpemīti samādhipaṭipakkhe kilese sannisīdāpento cittaṃ gocarajjhatte sannisīdāpemi.
tika-s0201t:1525_20: evaṃ sammā sammadeva ādahāmi samāhitaṃ karomi,
tika-s0201t:1525_21: yasmā tathāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ suṭṭhu ārammaṇe āropitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:1526_2: vuttoti iminā kiñcāpi ekaṃyeva kusalavitakkaṃ maggakkhaṇe viya tividhattasambhavato tividhanāmikaṃ katvā dassitaṃ viya hoti,
tika-s0201t:1526_5: Ekajātiyesu hi kusalacittesu uppanno vitakko samānākāratāya so evāti vattabbataṃ labhati yathā “sā eva tittirī,
tika-s0201t:1526_7: Na hi tadā mahāpurisassa asubhamettākaruṇāsannissayā te vitakkā evaṃ vuttāti.
tika-s0201t:1527_3: Kāyo kilamati samathavipassanānaṃ taruṇatāya bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesassa alabbhamānattā.
tika-s0201t:1528_1: tathā parissamavinodanatthaṃ phalakehi kātabbaṃ vissamaṭṭhānaṃ phalakakoṭṭhako,
tika-s0201t:1528_8: itarītarasannissayāpi kiccasiddhi loke labbhatīti dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1529_1: Etāgāvoti sati uppādanamattameva kātabbaṃ yathā gāvo rakkhitabbā,
tika-s0201t:1529_4: Anupassanānaṃ lahuṃ lahuṃ uppattiṃ sandhāya “ekappahāreneva āruḷhova hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1530_2: tāya ca laddhaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ visesaṃ dassento hetusampattiyā saddhiṃ phalasampattiṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-s0201t:1530_3: sattūpakārasampattiṃ dassetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādimāhāti evaṃ ettha anusandhi veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1530_18: Araññe mige disvā tehi saddhiṃ palāyeyyāti dīgharajjubandhanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1531_2: Ettha carantīti etasmiṃ ṭhāne gocaraṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-s0201t:1531_3: Ettha pivantīti etasmiṃ nipānatitthe udakaṃ pivanti.
tika-s0201t:1531_4: Iminā maggena pavisantīti iminā maggena nipānatitthaṃ pavisanti.
tika-s0201t:1531_6: Na tāva kiñci karoti anavasese vanamige ghātetukāmo.
tika-s0201t:1532_0: Avijjāya aññāṇā hutvāti avijjāya nivutattā ñāṇarahitā hutvā,
tika-s0201t:1533_0: Buddhānaṃ khemamaggavicaraṇaṃ kummaggapidhānañca sabbalokasādhāraṇampi atthato veneyyapuggalāpekkhamevāti
tika-s0201t:1533_2: Ūhatoti samūhato nīhatoti āha “dvedhā chetvā pātito”ti.
tika-s0201t:1533_3: Nāsitāti adassanaṃ gamitāti āha “sabbena sabbaṃ samugghāṭitā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1536_1: Dasakusalakammapathavasenāti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ vaṭṭapādakasamāpatticittassapi idha adhicittabhāvena anicchitattā.
tika-s0201t:1536_3: Atha vā anuttarimanussadhammasaṅgahitameva kevalaṃ “pakaticitta”nti vattabbanti dassento “dasakusalakammapathavasena
tika-s0201t:1536_4: uppannaṃ cittaṃ cittamevā”ti vatvā yadettha adhicittanti adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1536_6: Itarassa panettha vidhi na paṭisedhetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1536_12: Bhāvanāya appanaṃ appattopi adhicittamanuyuttoyeva tadatthepi taṃsaddavohārato.
tika-s0201t:1537_0: Yehi phalaṃ nāma yathā uppajjanaṭṭhāne pakappiyamānaṃ viya hoti,
tika-s0201t:1537_3: Kālena kālanti ettha kālenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacananti āha “samaye samaye”ti.
tika-s0201t:1537_6: nanu ca bhāvanāya vīthipaṭipannattā abbudanīharaṇavidhiṃ dassentena bhagavatā “pañca nimittāni kālena kālaṃ manasi kātabbānī”ti ayaṃ desanā āraddhāti?
tika-s0201t:1537_7: “Adhicittamanuyuttenā”ti vuttattā avicchedavasena bhāvanāya yuttappayutto adhicittamanuyutto nāmāti codakassa adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1537_8: Itaro bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassaādikammikassa kadāci bhāvanupakkilesā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0201t:1537_9: tato cittassa visodhanatthāya yathākālaṃ imāni nimittāni manasi kātabbānīti “kālena kāla”nti satthā avocāti dassento “pāḷiyañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1537_10: Tattha imānīti imāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni pañca nimittāni.
tika-s0201t:1538_6: “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1538_8: Tato nimittato aññanti tato chandūpasaṃhitādiakusalavitakkuppattikāraṇato aññaṃ navaṃ nimittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1538_12: Kusalanissitaṃ nimittanti kusalacittappavattikāraṇaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ citte ṭhapetabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1538_16: Saṅkhāresu uppanne chandūpasaṃhite vitakketi ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1538_17: Evaṃ “dosūpasañhite”tiādīsu yathārahaṃ taṃ taṃ padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1539_0: Evaṃ “chandūpasañhite”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “imassa hatthā vā sobhanā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1539_1: Tattha “asubhato upasaṃharitabba”nti vatvā upasaṃharaṇākārassa dassanaṃ “kimhi sārattosī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1540_0: Assāmikatāvakālikabhāvavasenāti idaṃ pattaṃ anukkamena vaṇṇavikārañceva jiṇṇabhāvañca patvā chiddāvachiddaṃ bhinnaṃ vā hutvā kapālaniṭṭhaṃ bhavissati.
tika-s0201t:1540_1: Idaṃ cīvaraṃ anupubbena vaṇṇavikāraṃ jiṇṇatañca upagantvā pādapuñchanacoḷakaṃ hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiyā chaḍḍanīyaṃ bhavissati.
tika-s0201t:1540_3: na nesaṃ evaṃ vinassituṃ dadeyyāti evaṃ assāmikabhāvavasena,
tika-s0201t:1540_4: “anaddhaniyaṃ idaṃ tāvakālika”nti evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvavasena ca manasikaroto.
tika-s0201t:1541_4: Yattha hi bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo”tiādinā nayena āgatassa āghātavinayasuttassa
tika-s0201t:1541_5: ceva kakacūpamovāda chavālātūpamādīnañca vasena āghātaṃ paṭivinodetvā mettā bhāvetabbā.
tika-s0201t:1542_3: Pañca dhammūpanissāyāti garusaṃvāsādike pañca dhamme paṭicca.
tika-s0201t:1543_2: Yattappaṭiyattoti yatto ca gāmappavesanāpucchākaraṇesu ussukkaṃ āpanno sajjito ca hotīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1543_3: Athassa moho pahīyatīti assa bhikkhuno evaṃ tattha yuttappayuttassa pacchā so moho vigacchati.
tika-s0201t:1543_6: Tesu tesu ṭhānesu attho pākaṭo hotīti suyyamānassa dhammassa tesu tesu padesu “idha sīlaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1543_8: idha paññā”ti so so attho vibhūto hoti.
tika-s0201t:1543_11: Idaṃ na kāraṇanti tadeva cakkhurūpālokādi sotaviññāṇassa,
tika-s0201t:1543_12: tadeva sālibījādi kudrusakaṅkurassa na kāraṇanti ṭhānāṭṭhānavinicchaye cheko hoti.
tika-s0201t:1544_2: Sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbākusalapaṭipakkhāti katvā “pahīyantī”ti vattabbe na sabbe sabbesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtāti “pahīyanti evā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati.
tika-s0201t:1546_4: Imināpi kāraṇenāti akosallasambhūtatāya kusalapaṭipakkhatāya gehassitarogena sarogatāya ca ete akusalā
tika-s0201t:1546_5: viññugarahitabbatāya jigucchanīyatāya ca sāvajjā aniṭṭhaphalatāya nirassādasaṃvattaniyatāya ca dukkhavipākāti
tika-s0201t:1546_6: evaṃ tena tena kāraṇena akusalādibhāvaṃ upaparikkhato.
tika-s0201t:1553_14: Thero tassa āsayaṃ kasiṇañca savisesaṃ jānitvā “imasmiṃ vihāre”tiādimavoca.
tika-s0201t:1554_1: Vitakkamūlabhedaṃ pabbanti vitakkamūlassa tammūlassa ca bhedavibhāvanaṃ vitakkamūlabhedaṃ pabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1554_4: So pana vitakkasaṅkhāro saṃtiṭṭhati etthāti vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1554_7: Vitakkānaṃ mūlamūlaṃ gacchantassāti upaparikkhanavasena micchāvitakkānaṃ mūlaṃ uppattikāraṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā gacchantassa.
tika-s0201t:1554_8: Yāthāvato jānantassa pubbe viya vitakkā abhiṇhaṃ nappavattantīti āha “vitakkacāro sithilo hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1554_9: Tasmiṃ sithilībhūte matthakaṃ gacchanteti vuttanayena vitakkacāro sithilabhūto,
tika-s0201t:1554_10: tasmiṃ vitakkānaṃ mūlagamane anukkamena thirabhāvappattiyā matthakaṃ gacchante.
tika-s0201t:1554_11: Vitakkā sabbaso nirujjhantīti micchāvitakkā sabbepi gacchanti na samudācaranti,
tika-s0201t:1555_0: Kaṇṇamūle patitanti sasakassa kaṇṇasamīpe kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ paharantaṃ viya upapatitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1555_1: Tassa kira sasakassa heṭṭhā mahāmūsikāhi khatamahāvāṭaṃ umaṅgasadisaṃ ahosi,
tika-s0201t:1555_4: Mūlamūlaṃ gantvā anuvijjeyyanti “pathavī bhijjatī”ti yatthāyaṃ saso uṭṭhito,
tika-s0201t:1555_5: tattha gantvā tassa mūlakāraṇaṃ yaṃnūna vīmaṃseyyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1555_7: kiṃ bhavissatī”ti saso “na sakkomi sāmī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1555_16: Evanti yathā sasakassa mahāpathavībhedanaṃ ravanāya micchāgāhasamuṭṭhānaṃ amūlaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1556_4: So hi itaraṃ musalaṃ viya udukkhalaṃ visesato kassaci khādanakāle abhibhuyya vattati.
tika-s0201t:1556_7: Abhiniggaṇhitabbanti yathā tassa āyatiṃ samudācāro na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1556_10: Ke ca tumhe satipi cirakālabhāvanāya evaṃ adubbalā ko cāhaṃ mama santike laddhappatiṭṭhe viya ṭhitepi
tika-s0201t:1556_11: idāneva appatiṭṭhe karonto iti evaṃ abhibhavitvā.
tika-s0201t:1556_12: Taṃ pana abhibhavanākāraṃ dassento “kāmaṃ taco cā”tiādinā caturaṅgasamannāgatavīriyapaggaṇhanamāha.
tika-s0201t:1557_1: Pariyādānabhājanīyanti yaṃ taṃ ādito “adhicittamanuyuttena bhikkhunā pañca nimittāni kālena kālaṃ manasi kātabbānī”ti niddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1557_2: tattha tassa nimittassa manasikaraṇakālapariyādānassa vasena vibhajanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1557_6: Yathāvuttassa hi atthassa puna vacanaṃ nigamananti.
tika-s0201t:1557_10: Yathā hi sasanato asatthampi satthaggahaṇeneva saṅgayhati,
tika-s0201t:1567_2: Adhikaraṇampi karotīti ettha yathā so adhikaraṇāya parisakkati,
tika-s0201t:1567_4: Adhikaraṇaṃ ākaḍḍhatīti adhikaraṇaṃ uddissa te bhikkhū ākaḍḍhati,
tika-s0201t:1567_7: Neva piyakamyatāyāti neva attani satthuno piyabhāvakāmatāya.
tika-s0201t:1567_8: Na bhedādhippāyenāti na satthuno tena bhikkhunā bhedādhippāyena.
tika-s0201t:1568_2: Chandādīnaṃ vatthubhāvato kāmaguṇā gehaṃ viya gehaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1568_3: te ca te sitā nissitāti gehassitāti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1568_6: Phalikamaṇi viya pakatipabhassarassa cittasantānassa upasaṅgo viya vipariṇāmakāraṇaṃ rāgādayoti āha “rattampi cittaṃ vipariṇata”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:1569_1: Dubbacatāya ovādaṃ asampaṭicchanto citteneva paṭiviruddho aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0201t:1569_8: Tañca kho pubbaṇhe evāti āha “ekaṃ purebhattabhojana”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:1569_9: Sattakkhattuṃ bhuttabhojanampi imasmiṃ sutte ekāsanabhojananteva adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1569_10: na ekāsanikatāya ekāya eva nisajjāya bhojanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1569_18: Dve bhojanānīti “aparaṇhe rattiya”nti kālavasena dve bhojanāni.
tika-s0201t:1570_1: yattha parisiñcanena vinā sassāni kiṭṭhāni sampajjanti.
tika-s0201t:1570_6: Catūsu maggesu yena yena maggena icchati.
tika-s0201t:1570_11: Gamanamevāti ime yuttā mama icchānurūpaṃ mandaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0201t:1570_13: sīghaṃ gacchantīti khuresu nimittaggahaṇaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sārathinā tesaṃ gamanameva passitabbaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:1570_18: Aññā ca valliyo sālarukkhe vinandhitvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0201t:1572_1: Evaṃ akkhantiyā dosaṃ dassetvāti “guṇavanto”ti loke patthaṭakittisaddānampi akkhantinimittaṃ ayasuppattiguṇaparihāniādiṃ
tika-s0201t:1572_4: Saṇhābhāvopi hi vacanassa pavattiākāroti katvā “vacanapatho” tveva vutto.
tika-s0201t:1572_9: bhikkhave”tiādi pāḷi dhammasabhāvadassanavasena pavattā “paraṃ codanāvasena vadantā nāma imehi ākārehi vadantī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1572_10: Adhimuñcitvāti abhirativasena tasmiṃ puggale bhāvanācittaṃ muñcitvā vissajjetvā.
tika-s0201t:1572_13: Yadi evaṃ padesavisayaṃ taṃ kathaṃ nippadesavisayaṃ viya hotīti codento “kathaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ karotī”ti āha,
tika-s0201t:1572_15: Idha tadārammaṇañcāti tasseva mettacittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvāti pāḷiyaṃ vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1572_17: Sabbā sattakāyasaṅkhātā pajā etassa atthīti sabbāvantoti imamatthaṃ dassento “sabbāvanta”nti āha.
tika-s0201t:1572_22: Tañca puggalanti pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1572_24: Ettha ca mettāsahagatena cetasā viharissāmāti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:1572_25: Tattha kathanti āha “tañca puggalaṃ sabbañca lokaṃ tassa cittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā adhimuccitvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1573_1: Tadatthadīpikanti yā mettaṃ cetovimuttiṃ sammadeva bhāvetvā ṭhitassa nibbikārato kenaci vikāraṃ na āpādetabbatā,
tika-s0201t:1573_6: nanu cakkavāḷapabbatehi taṃ taṃ cakkavāḷaṃ paricchindati? Na,
tika-s0201t:1573_8: Tiṇṇañhi cakkānaṃ antarasadise tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ lokadhātūnaṃ antareyeva pathavī natthi lokantaranirayabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1573_10: Vivaṭṭakāle hi saṇṭhahamānāpi pathavī yathāsaṇṭhitapathaviyā ekābaddhāva saṇṭhahati.
tika-s0201t:1573_12: Imināva gambhīrabhāvena vuttaparimāṇato paraṃ natthīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1574_1: Haliddīti haliddivaṇṇaṃ adhippetanti āha “yaṃ kiñci pītakavaṇṇa”nti.
tika-s0201t:1575_1: Pañca yojanasatānīti himavantato samuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1575_3: Aññā nadiyo upādāya labbhamānaṃ gambhīrataṃ appameyyaudakatañca gahetvā “gambhīrā appameyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1575_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tiṇukkāya tāpetabbattābhāvadassanaparametanti vuttaṃ “etena payogenā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1576_7: yathā mahāpathavī kenaci purisena apathaviṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0201t:1576_8: yathā ākāse kiñci rūpaṃ paṭṭhapetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0201t:1576_9: yathā gaṅgāya udakaṃ tiṇukkāya tāpetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0201t:1576_10: yathā ca biḷārabhastaṃ thaddhaṃ pharusañca samphassaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0201t:1576_11: evamevaṃ mettāya cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapurisena
tika-s0201t:1576_12: kenaci pariyāyena cittassa aññathattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkāti.
tika-s0201t:1577_4: Mayhaṃ ovādakaro na hotīti paramhi anatthakārimhi cittapadosanena āghātuppādanena mama sāsane sammāpaṭipajjamāno nāma na hoti.
tika-s0201t:1578_3: Vacanapathassa pana adhippetattā taṃ sāvajjavibhāgena gahetabbanti āha “appasāvajjaṃ vā mahāsāvajjaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1578_4: Khantiyā idaṃ bhāriyaṃ na hotīti avocuṃ “anadhi…pe…
tika-s0201t:1578_8: Accantañca hitasukhaṃ nāma aññādhigamenevāti āha “arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto”ti.
tika-s0201t:1581_2: Taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo,
tika-s0201t:1581_24: abhibhavitvā pana pavattiyaṃ saggantarāyikatāpi na sakkā nivāretunti.
tika-s0201t:1582_1: Rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvāti anavajjena paccayaparibhuñjanarasena sāvajjaṃ kāmaguṇaparibhogarasaṃ samānetvā.
tika-s0201t:1582_4: Upasaṃharanto viyāti sadisataṃ upasaṃharanto viya ekantasāvajje anavajjabhāvapakkhepena.
tika-s0201t:1582_9: Kāmakaṇṭakehi ariyamaggasammāpaṭipatti na upakkilissatīti vadanto “ariyamagge khāṇukaṇṭakādīni pakkhipanto”ti vutto.
tika-s0201t:1583_2: Tenādhigatāya laddhiyā anuvajjanatthaṃ paccanubhāsanena puna paṭijānāpanaṃ patiṭṭhāpanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1583_3: taṃ panassa ādāya samādāpanaṃ viya hotīti āha “samanugāhanti nāmā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1583_4: Tassā pana laddhiyā anuyuñjitāya vuccamānampi kāraṇaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakamevāti tassa pucchanaṃ samanubhāsanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1583_11: Avaṇe vaṇaṃ uppādetvā anto anupavisanasabhāvatāya vinivijjhanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0201t:1583_15: Diṭṭhiyeva hi dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasanena parāmāso.
tika-s0201t:1583_17: Yasmā hi abhinivesanaṃ tattha abhiniviṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti.Tasmā āha “adhiṭṭhahitvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1584_1: Natthīti vattukāmopīti attano laddhiṃ niguhetukāmatāya avajānitukāmopi.
tika-s0201t:1584_4: Abhūtakathā hi pubbe pavattā bhūtakathāya vasena dve kathāti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1585_1: Kassa kho nāmāti iminā satthā “na mama tuyhaṃ tādisassa atthāya dhammadesanā nāma bhūtapubbā”ti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1586_1: tathārūpehi paccayehi anusmīkato tasmiṃ attabhāve paṭivedhagabbhoapi usmīkatoti vikatabhāvato paññābījamassa
tika-s0201t:1586_2: imasmiṃ dhammavinaye api nu atthīti bhagavā bhikkhū pucchati.
tika-s0201t:1586_3: Te paṭikkhipantā vadanti ṭhānagatena duccaritena ñāṇupahatabhāvaṃ sampassantā.
tika-s0201t:1586_5: Tato eva bhikkhūnampi sammukhā oloketuṃ asamatthatāya pattakkhandho adhomukho.
tika-s0201t:1587_5: Na hi kadāci buddhānaṃ sahasā kiriyā nāma atthi.
tika-s0201t:1587_7: Sutvāpi tuṇhībhāvaṃ āpajjeyyāti athāpi siyāti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:1587_8: Taṃ sabbanti “sace hī”tiādinā vuttaṃ sabbaṃ parikappanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1587_9: Na karissantīti parisāya laddhiṃ sodhetīti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:1587_15: “apica kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ parimaddanaṃ nahāpanaṃ sambāhanaṃ sādiyatī”tiādinā āgataṃ visabhāgavatthuvisayaṃ āmisaparibhogaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1587_16: “Aññatreva kāmehi aññatra kāmasaññāhi aññatra kāmavitakkehi samācarissatī”ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
tika-s0201t:1588_1: Yoniso paccavekkhaṇena natthi ettha chandarāgoti nicchandarāgo,
tika-s0201t:1588_3: Kadāci uposathikabhāvena samādinnasīlāpi honti kadāci noti anibaddhasīlānaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1588_8: Ayaṃ ariṭṭho duggahitāya pariyattiyā vasena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati,
tika-s0201t:1588_10: bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavatīti evaṃ saññā mā hontūti duggahitāya pariyattiyā dosaṃ dassento āha.
tika-s0201t:1588_11: Uggaṇhantīti sajjhāyanti ceva vācuggataṃ karontā dhārenti cāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1589_6: maṅgalasuttādīnañca suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṃ viya,
tika-s0201t:1589_7: geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā sagāthakattā sagāthāvaggassa viya,
tika-s0201t:1592_0: Sabbassapi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi.
tika-s0201t:1592_3: sakavāde pañca suttasatānī”ti evamādi ca etassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1592_4: Tadekadesesu pana geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā.
tika-s0201t:1592_6: Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ vā cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ “geyya”nti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1592_7: Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1593_0: Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti?
tika-s0201t:1593_6: abbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttesu ca suttavisesesu yathākkamaṃ gāthā- udāna-
tika-s0201t:1593_10: tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā,
tika-s0201t:1593_11: satipi pañhavissajjanabhāve sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti
tika-s0201t:1593_12: evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo
tika-s0201t:1593_17: niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṃ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthā evāti?
tika-s0201t:1593_19: Sodhitañhi pubbe “gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimitta”nti.
tika-s0201t:1594_0: Yañca vuttaṃ “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, taṃ na,
tika-s0201t:1594_3: Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni,
tika-s0201t:1594_10: sahabhāvo ca nāma atthato aññena hoti,
tika-s0201t:1594_11: na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttapadeso atthi,
tika-s0201t:1594_13: na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi.
tika-s0201t:1594_16: Aññā eva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā,
tika-s0201t:1595_1: Anatthampi keci vipallāsavasena “attho”ti gaṇhantīti “atthattha”nti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1595_4: samādhi vipassanāyāti evaṃ tassa tassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ atthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1595_12: vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ yāvadeva vivaṭṭādhigamatthanti jānituṃ na sakkontīti.
tika-s0201t:1595_13: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “attha”nti iminā bhāsitatthapayojanatthānaṃ gahitatā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1595_16: nijjhāyitvā paññāya rocetvā gahetabbā na hontīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1595_17: Iti evaṃ etāya pariyattiyā vādappamokkhānisaṃsā attano upari parehi āropitavādassa niggahassa mokkhapayojanā hutvā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti.
tika-s0201t:1595_19: Yassa cāti yassa ca sīlādipūraṇena pattabbassa,
tika-s0201t:1595_26: Tesaṃ te dhammā duggahitā upārambhamānadappamakkhapaḷāsādihetubhāvena dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0201t:1596_1: Alaṃ pariyatto gado assāti alagaddo anunāsikalopaṃ da-
tika-s0201t:1596_7: Aññaṃ atthaṃ anapekkhitvā bhaṇḍāgārikasseva sato pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti.
tika-s0201t:1596_8: “Vaṃsānurakkhakovā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ sīhāvalokanañāyena tantidhārakova paveṇipālakovāti purimapadadvayepi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1597_2: nanu ekaccassa puthujjanassapi ayaṃ nayo labbhatīti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “yo panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1597_5: Attano pana bhavakantārato anittiṇṇattā tassa sā pariyatti nittharaṇapariyatti eva nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1598_1: Tattha tattha āgate sīlādidhamme nijjhāyitvā paññāya rocetvā yāthāvato gahetabbā honti.
tika-s0201t:1598_3: Na kevalaṃ suggahitaṃ pariyattiṃ nissāya maggabhāvanāphalasacchikiriyā,
tika-s0201t:1598_8: Ahitāya dukkhāya asaṃvattanampi tadabhāve uppajjanakahitasukhassa kāraṇameva tasmiṃ sati bhāvatoti.
tika-s0201t:1599_3: uttaro ca so setu cāti uttarasetu.
tika-s0201t:1599_5: Kalāpaṃ katvā baddhoti veḷunaḷādīhi kalāpavasena baddho.
tika-s0201t:1599_6: Aṇunti idaṃ aṭṭhasamāpattiārammaṇaṃ saññojanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0201t:1599_10: Evaṃ parisuddhaṃ evaṃ pariyodātanti tebhūmakesu dhammesu ñātaṃ “netaṃ mama,
tika-s0201t:1599_17: Na dhanāyethāti dhanaṃ drabyaṃ na kayirātha.
tika-s0201t:1600_5: “Dhammāpi vo pahātabbā”ti imināpi ovādena bhikkhū uddissa kathentopi ariṭṭhaṃyeva niggaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1601_2: Yadi evaṃ “ahaṃ mamāti gaṇhātī”ti gāhadvayameva kasmā vuttanti?
tika-s0201t:1601_5: Diṭṭhipi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ purimuppannāya diṭṭhiyā uttaradiṭṭhiyā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā sassatadiṭṭhiyā ca kāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1601_8: Diṭṭhiyā paccayo avijjā- phassa- saññā- vitakka-
tika-s0201t:1601_11: Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “katamāni aṭṭha diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni avijjāpi phassopi saññāpi vitakkopi ayonisomanasikāropi
tika-s0201t:1601_14: Rūpaṃ pana attāti na vattabbaṃ idha “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti imassa gāhassa anadhippetattā.
tika-s0201t:1601_15: So hi “yampi taṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhāna”ntiādinā parato vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1601_18: rūpasmiṃ attāna”nti ime tayo gāhā adhippetāti keci,
tika-s0201t:1601_22: attasabhāveyeva vā rūpādidhamme ārabbha attadiṭṭhi uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:1601_25: rūpaṃ pana “attā”ti na vattabbanti ayamettha attho.
tika-s0201t:1601_26: “Yampi taṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhāna”ntiādinā pana vipassanāpaṭivipassanā viya diṭṭhianupassanā nāma dassitā.
tika-s0201t:1602_1: Tañhi tassa attano visayaṃ paribhutvā sambandhaṃ hutvā gaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1602_2: Avasesāni sattāyatanāni viññātaṃ nāma manasā viññātabbato.
tika-s0201t:1602_9: ekajjhaṃ paṭikkhepassa ca vasena catukkoṭikaṃ dassetvā pattapariyesitehi anuvicaritassa bhedaṃ dassetuṃ “lokasmiñhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1602_10: Pariyesitvā pattaṃ paṭhamaṃ cetasā pacchā kāyena pattattā pattaṃ nāma.
tika-s0201t:1602_11: Pariyesitvā nopattaṃ pariyesitaṃ nāma kevalaṃ pariyesitabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1602_12: Apariyesitvā pattañca nopattañca manasā anuvicaritabbato manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma.
tika-s0201t:1603_0: Ayañca vikappo ākulo viyāti “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1603_2: Apariyesitvā nopattaṃ manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma pattiyā pariyesanāya ca abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1603_3: Sabbaṃ vā etanti “pariyesitvā pattampī”tiādinā vuttaṃ catubbidhampi.
tika-s0201t:1603_7: Yesaṃ vineyyānaṃ desetabbadhammassa sarūpaṃ anāmasitvā ārammaṇakicca-
tika-s0201t:1603_12: yesaṃ pana yena ekeneva pakārena sarūpeneva vā vibhāvane kate paṭivedho hoti,
tika-s0201t:1603_13: tesaṃ taṃ vatvā dhammissarattā tadaññaṃ niravasesākāravibhāvanañca desanāvilāso.
tika-s0201t:1604_2: Yaṃ rūpaṃ esā diṭṭhi “loko ca attā cā”ti gaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1604_3: Taṃ rūpaṃ sandhāya “so loko so attā”ti vacanaṃ vuttanti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1604_4: So pecca bhavissāmīti uddhamāghātanikavādavasenāyaṃ diṭṭhīti āha “so ahaṃ paralokaṃ gantvā nicco bhavissāmī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1604_9: Tampi dassananti tampi tathāvuttaṃ diṭṭhidassanaṃ attānaṃ viya taṇhādiṭṭhiggāhavisesena gaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1604_12: Kathaṃ pana diṭṭhi diṭṭhivisayā hotīti āha “vipassanāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1604_15: vedajjhāyīnaṃ vedasatthe viya ca diṭṭhiyaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ diṭṭhiggāhappavatti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1605_0: Samanupassatīti padassa ca tasso samanupassanā atthoti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1605_2: Tattha ñāṇaṃ tāva samavisamaṃ sammā yāthāvato anupassatīti samanupassanā.
tika-s0201t:1605_3: Itarā pana saṃkilesavasena anu anu passantīti samanupassanā.
tika-s0201t:1605_4: Yadi evaṃ hotu tāva diṭṭhisamanupassanā micchādassanabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1605_6: Taṇhāyapi sattānaṃ pāpakaraṇe upāyadassanavasena paññāpatirūpikā pavatti labbhateva,
tika-s0201t:1605_8: Mānopi seyyādinā dassanavaseneva tathā attānaṃ ūhatīti taṇhāmānānaṃ samanupassanāpatirūpikā pavatti labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1605_9: Avijjamāneti “etaṃ mamā”ti evaṃ gahetabbe taṇhāvatthusmiṃ ajjhattakhandhapañcake anupalabbhamāne vinaṭṭhe.
tika-s0201t:1606_1: Catūhi kāraṇehīti “asati na paritassatī”ti vuttampi itarehi tīhi saha gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1606_4: Sā panassa avijjamānatā laddhavināsena vā aladdhālābhena vāti pāḷiyaṃ –
tika-s0201t:1606_8: taṃ vatāhaṃ na labhāmī”ti vuttanti tadubhayaṃ parikkhāravasena vibhajitvā tattha paritassanaṃ dassetuṃ “bahiddhā parikkhāravināse”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1607_1: Evaṃ bhaveyyāti evaṃ “ahu vata me”tiādinā codanādi bhaveyya.
tika-s0201t:1607_2: Diṭṭhiṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānapariyuṭṭhānābhinivesānusayānanti ettha aparāparaṃ pavattāsu diṭṭhīsu yā parato uppannā diṭṭhiyo,
tika-s0201t:1607_7: Appahīnabhāvena santāne sayantīti anusayāti evaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānādīnaṃ padānaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1607_13: Tadeva ca āgamma taṇhā khīyati virajjati nirujjhatīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1607_16: Tāsoti attaniyābhāvaṃ paṭicca taṇhāparittāso ceva bhayaparittāso ca.
tika-s0201t:1607_19: no ca me siyāti “aha”nti kira koci no cassaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1608_5: Sāpi hi ajjhattakhandhavināse paritassanakaṃ dassetvā aparitassanakaṃ dassentī pavattāti tassanakassa
tika-s0201t:1608_6: suññatādassanaṃ akiccasādhakampi suññatādassanamevāti imesaṃ vasena “catukkoṭikā suññatā kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1608_7: Bahiddhā parikkhāranti bāhiraṃ saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakañca sattopakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1608_9: Pariggahaṃ nāma katvāti “mama ida”nti pariggahetabbatāya pariggahitaṃ nāma katvā.
tika-s0201t:1608_11: attā ucchijjati vinassatī”tiādinā attadiṭṭhisannissayoyevāti vuttaṃ “sakkāyadiṭṭhipamukhā dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1608_12: Ayāthāvaggāhinā abhinivesanapaññāpanānaṃ upatthambhabhāvato diṭṭhi eva nissayoti diṭṭhinissayo.
tika-s0201t:1609_1: Attani vā satīti yassa attano santakabhāvena kiñci attaniyanti vucceyya,
tika-s0201t:1609_3: so eva pana attā paramatthato natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1609_5: Siyā khandhapañcakaṃ ñeyyasabhāvattā yathā taṃ ghaṭo,
tika-s0201t:1609_6: yadi pana tadaññaṃ nāma kiñci abhavissa,
tika-s0201t:1609_8: Na ca so paramatthato atthi pamāṇehi anupalabbhamānattā turaṅgamavisāṇaṃ viyāti.
tika-s0201t:1609_9: Attaniye vā parikkhāre satīti “idaṃ nāma attano santaka”nti tassa kiñcanabhāvena nicchite kismiñci vatthusmiṃ sati.
tika-s0201t:1609_11: Ahanti satīti “ahaṃ nāmāya”nti ahaṃkāravatthubhūte paramatthato niddhāritasarūpe kismiñci sati tassa
tika-s0201t:1609_12: santakabhāvena mamāti kiñci gahetuṃ yuttaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-s0201t:1609_14: Iti paramatthato attano anupalabbhamānattā attaniyaṃ kiñci paramatthato natthevāti sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ anattatāya anattaniyataṃ,
tika-s0201t:1610_0: Yasmā hutvā na hotīti yasmā pubbe asantaṃ paccayasamavāyena hutvā uppajjitvā puna bhaṅgupagamena na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1610_3: Tato eva uppādavayavattitoti uppajjanavasena nirujjhanavasena ca pavattanato.
tika-s0201t:1610_7: Aniccadhammā hi teneva attano aniccabhāvena atthato niccataṃ paṭikkhipanti nāma.
tika-s0201t:1610_12: Tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ saṃsāradukkhassa ca adhiṭṭhānatāya dukkhavatthukatā.
tika-s0201t:1610_18: nāssa kassaci saṅkamoti bhavantarānupagamanasaṅkhātena saṅkamābhāvena vipariṇāmadhammataṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “bhavasaṅkanti upagamanasabhāva”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1610_26: udayabbayehi mā kilamiyatūti na ettha kassaci vasībhāvo atthi,
tika-s0201t:1610_27: svāyamassa avasavattanaṭṭho anattatāsallakkhaṇassa kāraṇaṃ hotīti āha “avasavattanākārena rūpaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0201t:1611_3: tasmā tadubhayenettha anattalakkhaṇavibhāvanaṃ katanti dassento “bhagavā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1611_10: tasmā cakkhu viya attāpi anicco āpanno.
tika-s0201t:1611_13: Iti cakkhu anattāti cakkhussa udayabbayavantatāya aniccatā,
tika-s0201t:1611_14: attano ca attavādinā aniccatāya anicchitattā cakkhu anattā.
tika-s0201t:1612_4: tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattatī”ti rūpassa anattatāya dukkhatā vibhāvitā viya dissati,
tika-s0201t:1612_6: tasmā anattā”ti pākaṭatāya sābādhatāya rūpassa attasārābhāvo vibhāvito,
tika-s0201t:1612_7: tato eva ca “na labbhati rūpe evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu,
tika-s0201t:1612_8: evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī”ti rūpe kassaci anissaratā,
tika-s0201t:1612_9: tassa ca avasavattanākāro dassitoti āha “dukkhavasena anattataṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1612_10: Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhanti yaṃ vatthu aniccaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1612_13: taṃ sukhaṃ yathā taṃ nibbānanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1612_17: Yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattāti ettha vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1612_18: Aniccanti iminā ghaṭādi viya paccayuppannattā rūpaṃ aniccanti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1612_19: Imināva nayena “anattā”ti vattuṃ labbhamānepi “anattā”ti vattā nāma natthi.
tika-s0201t:1612_20: Evaṃ dukkhanti vadantīti etthāpi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ “akkhisūlādivikārappattakāle viya paccayuppannattā dukkhaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā.
tika-s0201t:1613_0: Tasmātihātiādinā tiyaddhagatarūpaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā vuttanti āha “etarahi aññadāpī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1613_1: Taṃ pana yādisaṃ tādisampi tathā vuttanti ajjhattādivisesopi vattabbo. Pi-
tika-s0201t:1614_4: sā idha kathaṃ nibbidā nāma jātāti āha “vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya hī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1614_5: Iminā sikhāpattanibbedatāya vuṭṭhānagāminī idha nibbidānāmena vuttāti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1615_0: “So anupubbena saññaggaṃ phusatī”ti vatvā “saññā kho poṭṭhapāda paṭhamaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:1615_1: pacchā ñāṇa”nti vuttattā saññagganti vuttā lokiyāsu pahānasaññāsu sikhāpattabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1615_3: Tato parañhi asaṅkhatārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti. Tenāha –
tika-s0201t:1615_6: Pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅganti vuttā maggādhigamassa paripanthabhūtasabbasaṃkilesavisuddhi padhānikassa yogino,
tika-s0201t:1615_10: kāmataṇhādīsu tāya tāya nibbattattā tammayaṃ nāma tebhūmikappavattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1615_12: Tassā taṇhāya pariyādānato vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā atammayatāti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1615_19: Taṃ nissāyāti taṃ ekattasitaṃ upekkhaṃ paccayaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:1615_21: Pahānaṃ hotīti aññāṇupekkhato pabhuti sabbaṃ upekkhaṃ pajahitvā ṭhitassa “atammayatā”ti vuttāya vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya
tika-s0201t:1615_22: arūpāvacarasamāpattiupekkhāya vipassanupekkhāya ca pahānaṃ hotīti pariyādānanti vuttāti.
tika-s0201t:1615_23: Sabbasaṅkhāragatassa muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhānassa sikhāpattabhāvato vuṭṭhānagāminī muñcitukamyatā paṭisaṅkhānanti ca vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1617_1: Tathā hi taṃ pasaṃsanto satthā “ayaṃ vuccati,
tika-s0201t:1617_7: Nibbānanagarappavese vibandhanena paligho viyāti palighoti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1617_8: Matthakacchinno tālo pattaphalādīnaṃ anaṅgato tālāvatthu asive “sivā”ti samaññā viya.
tika-s0201t:1617_12: Evaṃbhūto pana punabbhavaṃ deti nāmāti āha “punabbhavadāyako”ti.
tika-s0201t:1617_13: Punabbhavakhandhānaṃ paccayoti iminā jātisaṃsāroti phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ vuttanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1617_21: Itarabhāroropanassa purimapadehi pakāsitattā “mānabhārasseva oropitattā pannabhāroti adhippeto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1617_23: Pañcapi khandhe avisesato asmīti gahetvā pavattamāno “asmimāno”ti adhippetoti vuttaṃ “rūpe asmīti māno”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1618_0: Nagaradvārassa parissayapaṭibāhanatthañceva sobhanatthañca ubhosu passesu esikatthambhe nikhaṇitvā ṭhapentīti
tika-s0201t:1618_2: Pākāraviddhaṃsaneneva parikkhāya bhūmisamakaraṇaṃ hotīti āha “pākāraṃ bhindanto parikkhaṃ saṃkiritvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1619_1: Anadhigamanīyaviññāṇatanti “idaṃ nāma nissāya iminā nāma ākārena pavattatī”ti evaṃ duviññeyyacittataṃ.
tika-s0201t:1619_3: Sattopi tathāgatoti vuccati “tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0201t:1619_4: Satto hi yatheko kammakilesehi itthattaṃ āgato,
tika-s0201t:1619_8: Sopi hi yatheko catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu sūpaṭṭhitacitto satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvā anuttaraṃ arahattaṃ āgato adhigato,
tika-s0201t:1620_0: Tathāgato satto puggaloti na paññapemi paramatthato sattasseva abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1620_3: anuppatti khema”ntiādinā asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā pakkhandhanavasena pavattaṃ aggaphalasamāpattiatthaṃ vipassanācittaṃ vā.
tika-s0201t:1621_4: Paramatthato vijjamānassa hi sattassa abhāvaṃ vadanto sattavināsapaññāpako ca nāma siyā,
tika-s0201t:1621_5: ahaṃ pana paramatthato avijjamānaṃ taṃ “natthī”ti vadāmi.
tika-s0201t:1621_8: tathābhūtaṃ maṃ ye samaṇabrāhmaṇā “venayiko samaṇo gotamo”ti vadantā asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhantīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1621_9: Appaṭisandhikassa khīṇāsavassa carimacittaṃ nirupādānato anupādāno viya jātavedo parinibbutaṃ idaṃ nāma
tika-s0201t:1621_10: nissitanti na paññāyatīti vadanto kimettāvatā ucchedavādī bhaveyya,
tika-s0201t:1621_13: Evaṃ sante kiṃ nissāya te moghapurisā sato sattassa nāma ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapetīti vadantā asatā…pe…
tika-s0201t:1622_1: Tena dhammacakkapavattanato pubbe vuttaṃ tantidesanaṃ vadati.
tika-s0201t:1622_2: Catusaccameva paññapemīti etena saccavimuttā satthudesanā natthīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1622_4: “pubbe ceva etarahi ca dukkhañceva paññapemi dukkhassa ca nirodha”nti vadanto bhagavā nāhaṃ kadācipi “attā ucchijjati,
