tika-s0201t:1883_11: Na hi dutiye moghavāre ekavārameva voṭṭhabbanaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0201t:1883_12: Dvikkhattuṃ vā tassa pavattiṃ sandhāya ekavāraggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1883_14: Tattha dutiyaṃ tatiyañca pavattamānaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ viya hoti.
tika-s0201t:1883_15: Yasmā pana “voṭṭhabbanaṃ patvā ekaṃ dve vāreāsevanaṃ labhitvā cittaṃ bhavaṅgameva otaratī”ti idaṃ dutiyamoghavāravasena vuttaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-s0201t:1883_16: So ca ārammaṇadubbalatāya eva hotīti abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ niyamito.
tika-s0201t:1883_17: Idha pana tikkhānupassanānubhāvena akusaluppattiyā asambhavavasena ayonisova āvajjato ayoniso vavatthānaṃ siyā,
tika-s0201t:1883_19: tasmiñca pavatte mahati atimahati vā ārammaṇe javanaṃ na uppajjeyyāti ayamattho vicāretvā gahetabbo.
tika-s0201t:1884_0: Etasseva vā satipi duvidhatāparikappane so ca yadi anulome vedanāttike paṭiccavārādīsu “āsevanapaccayā na magge dve,
tika-s0201t:1884_1: na maggapaccayā āsevane dve”ti ca vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-s0201t:1884_6: Na hi āsevanapaccayaṃ laddhuṃ yuttassa āsevanapaccayatāpi dhammo āsevanapaccayo hotīti avutto atthi,
tika-s0201t:1884_8: “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati nāsevanapaccayā.
tika-s0201t:1884_11: Athāpi siyā asamānavedanānaṃ vaseneva vuttanti ca,
tika-s0201t:1884_13: “āvajjanā kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1884_16: Bhūmibhinnassa kāmāvacarassa rūpāvacarādīnaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo viya jātibhinnassapi bhaveyyāti vattabbo eva siyā,
tika-s0201t:1884_22: na maggapaccayā āsevane eka”nti evaṃ gaṇanāya niddhāriyamānāya voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanapaccayattassa abhāvā ayaṃ moghavāro upaparikkhitvā gahetabbo.
tika-s0201t:1885_1: tato visadisassa javanassa karaṇato manasikāroti ca vattabbataṃ labheyya,
tika-s0201t:1885_2: evañca katvā paṭṭhāne “voṭṭhabbanaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādi na vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1885_4: tampi voṭṭhabbanato paraṃ catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ vā javanānaṃ ārammaṇapurejātaṃ bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ rūpādiṃ
tika-s0201t:1885_5: ārabbha pavattamānaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati.
tika-s0201t:1885_6: Javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvāti ca javanassa uppajjanaṭṭhāne dvikkhattuṃ pavattitvāti attho,
tika-s0201t:1885_8: Āsevanaṃ labhitvāti cettha āsevanaṃ viya āsevananti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0201t:1885_9: Vipphārikattā cassa dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhattuṃ vā pavattiyeva cettha āsevanasadisatā.
tika-s0201t:1885_11: Vipphārikampi javanaṃ viya anekakkhattuṃ appavattiyā asuppatiṭṭhitatāya ca na nippariyāyato āsevanabhāvena vattatīti na imassa āsevanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1885_12: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana phalacittesu maggapariyāyo viya pariyāyavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1886_0: Ayanti “sacepī”tiādinā vutto ekavārampi rāgādīnaṃ anuppādanavasena vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto yogāvacaro.
tika-s0201t:1886_3: Ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti “evaṃ me javanaṃ javita”nti sārammaṇassa javanassa hutvā abhāvavavatthāpanassa kammaṭṭhānabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1886_4: tathā āvajjanavasena vā taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vissajjetvā tāvadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti.
tika-s0201t:1886_5: Dutiyassa pana vasenāti “aparassa rāgādivasena ekavāraṃ javanaṃ javatī”tiādinā vuttassa nātitikkhavipassakassa
tika-s0201t:1886_6: vasena “tassa dhātārammaṇameva cittaṃ pakkhandatī”tiādinā imasmiṃ sutte āgatattā.
tika-s0201t:1886_7: “Tamenaṃ upadhipahānāya paṭipannaṃ upadhipaṭinissaggāya kadāci karahaci satisammosā upadhipaṭisaṃyuttā sarasaṅkappā samudācaranti.
tika-s0201t:1886_9: atha kho naṃ khippameva pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametī”ti laṭukikopame.
tika-s0201t:1886_11: puthujjano kathaṃ pajahatī”ti codanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā “āraddhavipassako hi satisammosena sahasā kilese uppanne
tika-s0201t:1886_12: ‘mādisassa nāma bhikkhuno kileso uppanno’ti saṃvegaṃ katvā vīriyaṃ paggayha vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggena
tika-s0201t:1886_14: iti so pajahati nāmā”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0201t:1886_16: “tassa dhātārammaṇameva cittaṃ pakkhandatītiādinā imasmiṃ sutte āgatattā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1886_17: Indriyabhāvane ca majjhimassa vasena ayamattho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1887_1: Mammacchedanādivasena pavattaakkosanādiṃ aniṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ patvā sotadvāre kilamati puggalo,
tika-s0201t:1887_2: tathā pothanapaharaṇādikaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ patvā kāyadvāre kilamati.
tika-s0201t:1888_1: Tayidaṃ amanāpehi samudācaraṇaṃ nāma pothanapaharaṇādivasena upakkamanamevāti āha “upakkamantī”ti,
tika-s0201t:1888_3: Tathāsabhāvoti yathā pāṇippahārādīhi ghaṭṭitamatto vikāraṃ āpajjati,
tika-s0201t:1888_7: kakacenā”tiādinā ovādadānaṃ nāma anaññasādhāraṇaṃ buddhānaṃyeva āveṇikanti āha “vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatāti anussarantopi…pe…
tika-s0201t:1888_10: Yaṃ pana kakacokantakesupi manussesu appadussanaṃ nibbikāraṃ,
tika-s0201t:1888_11: taṃ satthusāsanaṃ anussarantopi sammāpaṭipattilakkhaṇaṃ dhammaṃ anussaratiyevāti evaṃ vā ettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1888_13: So ca sabbesampi ariyānaṃ guṇoti taṃ anussarantopi saṅghaṃ anussarati evāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1889_1: tasmā upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātīti vipassanāvasena sabbasmimpi saṅkhāragate ajjhupekkhanaṃ na labhatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1889_2: Chaḷaṅgupekkhāti chaḷaṅgupekkhā viya chaḷaṅgupekkhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu nibbikāratāsāmaññena.
tika-s0201t:1890_4: Yasmā pana so āpobhāvasaṅkhāto allayūsabhāvo sasambhārapathavīsasambhāraudakādigate sabbasmimpi āpasmiṃ vijjati,
tika-s0201t:1891_1: Sabbatejesu gatanti indhanādivasena anekabhedesu sabbesu tejokoṭṭhāsesu gataṃ pavattaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1891_10: Tejodhātuvasena labbhamānā imasmiṃ kāye jarāpavatti pākaṭajarāvasena veditabbāti dassetuṃ “indriyavekallatta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1891_14: Satakkhattuṃ tāpetvā tāpetvā sītūdake pakkhipitvā uddhaṭasappi satadhotasappīti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1891_16: sarīrassa dahanavasena pavatto mahādāho paridāhoti ayameva tesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0201t:1891_20: Sammā paripākaṃ gacchatīti samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1893_4: saddena pittasemhalasikādinīharaṇavātassa ceva usumavātassa ca saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1893_7: saddena pana abbhantarassa vuccamānattā tadavasiṭṭho udarapadeso idha kucchi-
tika-s0201t:1893_8: saddena vuccatīti āha “kucchisayā vātāti antānaṃ bahivātā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1894_2: Yathādassitā hi catasso dhātuyo anattaniyaṃ kevalaṃ dhātumattā nissattanijjīvāti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1894_10: tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “yathā kaṭṭhādīnī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1895_0: Kāmaṃ heṭṭhā “mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassā”tiādinā avibhāgena ekadesena ca upādārūpampi kathitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1895_1: tathā vedanādayo khandhabhāvena pariggahetvā na kathitā,
tika-s0201t:1895_3: Itarāni pana saccāni sabbena sabbaṃ na kathitāni.
tika-s0201t:1895_11: Cakkhussa rūpārammaṇe āpāthagate uppajjanamanasikāro hadayasannissayopi cakkhumhi sati hoti,
tika-s0201t:1895_12: asati na hotīti katvā “cakkhuṃ paṭicca uppajjanamanasikāro”ti vutto.
tika-s0201t:1895_14: evaṃ pasādapaccayepi hotīti vuttaṃ “cakkhuñca rūpe ca paṭiccā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1896_0: Cattāri saccāni dasseti sarūpato atthāpattito cāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1896_6: Idañca satipi tadā bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanacittasamuṭṭhānarūpe kevalaṃ cakkhuviññāṇasamuṭṭhitarūpassa abhāvamattaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1896_7: Saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti nagaraṃ viya rajje rūpakkhandhe saṅgahetabbataṃ gahetabbataṃ gacchati.
tika-s0201t:1896_10: Saṅkhārāti cetanāva vuttā cetanāpadhānattā saṅkhārakkhandhassāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1897_3: te passantopi paccayadhamme passatīti vuttaṃ “yo paṭiccasamuppāda”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:1897_7: Ajjhogāhitvāti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya gilitvā viya niṭṭhapetvā viya daḷhaggahaṇavasena.
tika-s0201t:1897_8: Chandarāgo vinayati pahīyati etthāti chandarāgavinayo chandarāgapahānañcāti vuccati nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1897_9: Āharitvāti pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatampi atthato ānetvā saṅgaṇhanavasena gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1897_11: Imesu tīsu ṭhānesūti yathāvuttesu sukhadukkhādīsu tīsu abhisamayaṭṭhānesu.
tika-s0201t:1897_16: Ayaṃ maggoti ayaṃ catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ paṭivijjhanavasena pavatto aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
tika-s0201t:1897_17: Ettāvatāpīti evaṃ ekasmiṃ cakkhudvāre vatthu pariggahamukhenapi catusaccakammaṭṭhānassa matthakaṃ pāpanena
tika-s0201t:1897_18: bahuṃ vipulaṃ paripuṇṇameva bhagavato sāsanaṃ kataṃ anuṭṭhitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1898_0: Uppajjitvā niruddhameva bhavaṅgacittaṃ āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavatīti vuttaṃ “taṃ niruddhampī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1898_1: Mandathāmagatamevāti mahatiyā niddāya abhibhūtassa vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1898_2: kapimiddhaparetassa pana bhavaṅgacittaṃ kadāci āvajjanassa paccayo bhaveyyāti.
tika-s0201t:1898_5: Tathā hi paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ paguṇabhāveneva nirantaraṃ viya ajjhayamāne aññavihitatāya “ettako gantho gato,
tika-s0201t:1898_9: Pubbaṅgamattā oḷārikattā ca phassacetanāva saṅkhārakkhandhoti gahitā,
tika-s0201t:1898_11: Ekadesameva sammasantoti yathāuddiṭṭhaṃ atthaṃ heṭṭhā anavasesato aniddisitvā ekadesameva niddisanavasena desanāya āmasanto.
tika-s0201t:1898_15: “yaṃ upādārūpaṃ cattāro arūpino khandhā upari tīṇi ariyasaccānī”ti niddesavasena parihīnaṃ atthajātaṃ sabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1898_17: Catusaccavasena āraddhā desanā catusacceneva pariyosāpitāti āha “yathānusandhināva suttantaṃ niṭṭhapesī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1901_4: Pāṭiyekke jāteti vipannācāradiṭṭhitāya pakāsanīyakammakaraṇato paraṃ aññatitthiyasadise visuṃ bhūte.
tika-s0201t:1901_8: Jātisīsena idha jātivatthukaṃ dukkhaṃ vuttanti āha “otiṇṇoti yassa jāti anto anupaviṭṭhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1901_9: Jāto hi satto jātakālato paṭṭhāya jātinimittena dukkhena anto anupaviṭṭho viya vibādhīyati.
tika-s0201t:1901_12: catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ labbhamānānaṃ sukatabhāvo suṭṭhu abhisaṅkhatabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:1901_18: Sā pana appesakkhatā adhipateyyasampattiyā ca parivārasampattiyā ca abhāvena pākaṭā hoti.
tika-s0201t:1902_0: Sārenapi keci ajānanena aññālābhena vā asārabhūtampi kattabbaṃ karontīti tato visesanatthaṃ “sārena sārakaraṇīya”nti
tika-s0201t:1902_3: Mahārukkhassa maggaphalasārassa ñāṇadassanapheggukassa samādhitacassa sīlapapaṭikassa cañcalasabhāvā
tika-s0201t:1902_4: saṃsappacārīti ca cattāro paccayā sākhāpalāsaṃ nāma.
tika-s0201t:1902_6: Sāro me pattoti imasmiṃ sāsane adhigantabbasāro nāma iminā lābhādinibbattanena anuppattoti vosānaṃ niṭṭhitakiccaṃ āpanno.
tika-s0201t:1903_1: Ñāṇadassananti ñāṇabhūtaṃ dassanaṃ visayassa sacchikaraṇavasena pavattaṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1904_1: Asamayavimokkhaṃ ārādhetīti ettha adhippetaṃ asamayavimokkhaṃ pāḷiyā eva dassetuṃ “katamo asamayavimokkho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1904_3: maggavimokkhena pana vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthi.
tika-s0201t:1904_6: tassa gacchantassa tiṭṭhantassa nisīdantassa bhuñjantassa ca maggaphalapaṭivedho nāma na hotīti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1904_7: iti maggavimokkhena vimuccantassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthīti so asamayavimokkho.
tika-s0201t:1905_8: Yathāraddhassa sāropamena phalena desanā niṭṭhāpitāti āha “yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1908_8: Paññātāti yathāsakaṃ samādinnavatavasena ceva viññātaladdhivasena ca paññātā.
tika-s0201t:1908_12: kuto adhigamoti ekaṃsato andhaputhujjano evāti āha “assutavato andhabālaputhujjanassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1909_6: Tesaṃ sabbaññupaṭiññāya abhūtattā tassā abhūtabhāvakathanena tassa brāhmaṇassa na kāci atthasiddhīti
tika-s0201t:1910_4: Sāsanaṃ sithilaṃ katvā gaṇhāti sikkhāya na tibbagāravattā.
tika-s0201t:1918_4: tesaṃ pubbapurisena attano ñātīnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvena nivesito,
tika-s0201t:1918_6: Atha pacchā tattha dvīhi dāyādehi dvidhā vibhajitvā paribhutto.
tika-s0201t:1918_10: Tasmiṃ kira padese mattikā sakkharamarumbavālikādīhi asammissā akaṭhinā saṇhā sukhumā,
tika-s0201t:1918_11: tāya katāni kulālabhājanānipi silāmayāni viya daḷhāni,
tika-s0201t:1918_12: tasmā te upāsakā tāya mattikāya dīghaputhulaiṭṭhakā kāretvā tāhi ṭhapetvā dvārabāhavātapānakavāṭatulāyo
tika-s0201t:1918_13: sesaṃ sabbaṃ dabbasambhārena vinā iṭṭhakāhi eva pāsādaṃ kāresuṃ.
tika-s0201t:1919_5: Katakiccāpi hi te mahātherā attano diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanañca sampassantā
tika-s0201t:1919_6: paramañca vivekaṃ anubrūhantā sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavamānā tattha viharanti.
tika-s0201t:1919_10: Vipassanā hi pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantī pavattamānā sātisayaṃ pītisomanassaṃ āvahati.
tika-s0201t:1922_1: Sati hi maggaphalādhigame sāsane patiṭṭhā laddhā nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:1923_1: aggasāvakabhāvena pana nesaṃ visesadassanatthaṃ “dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattheresu vā”ti visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1923_2: Satipi hi sāmaññayoge visesavanto visuṃ gayhanti yathā “brāhmaṇā āgatā,
tika-s0201t:1923_4: Tesu pana visuṃ gahitesupi “asītimahāsāvakesū”ti asītiggahaṇaṃ appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanupagaṃ na hotīti.
tika-s0201t:1923_5: Antamasoti idaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa upaṭṭhākabhāvena āsannacāritāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1923_8: Kāḷasīho yebhuyyena yūthacaroti katvā vuttaṃ “yūthā nissaṭo kāḷasīho viyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1923_10: Vātacchinno valāhako viyāti vātacchinno pabbatakūṭappamāṇo valāhakacchedo viya.
tika-s0201t:1923_11: Tesaṃ paggaṇhanatoti yathā nāma jighacchitassa bhojane,
tika-s0201t:1923_16: evamevaṃ bhagavato kosambake bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ vivādāpanne disvā apare samaggāvāsaṃ vasante āvajjitassa ime tayo kulaputtā āpāthaṃ āgamiṃsu,
tika-s0201t:1923_18: evāyaṃ paṭipattianukkamena kosambakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayanupāyo hotīti.
tika-s0201t:1923_20: Eteneva pacchimajanataṃ anukampanatoti idampi kāraṇaṃ ekadesena saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1923_21: Ukkaṃsitvāti yathābhūtehi guṇehi sampahaṃsanena visesetvā visiṭṭhe katvā pasaṃsāvasena cetaṃ āmeḍitavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1925_2: Cīvaragabbhena paṭicchādetvāti cīvarasaṅkhāte ovarake nigūhitvā viya.
tika-s0201t:1925_3: Na hi cīvarapārupanamattena buddhānubhāvo paṭicchanno hoti.
tika-s0201t:1925_4: “Mā sudha kocimaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ aññāsī”ti pana tathārūpena iddhābhisaṅkhārena taṃ chādetvā gato bhagavā tathā vutto.
tika-s0201t:1926_0: Abhikkamathāti padaṃ abhimukhabhāvena vidhimukhena vadatīti āha “ito āgacchathā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1926_1: Buddhānaṃ kāyo nāma suvisuddhajātimaṇi viya sobhano,
tika-s0201t:1927_1: Anuruddhāti vā ekasesanayena vuttaṃ virūpekasesassapi icchitabbattā,
tika-s0201t:1927_3: Iriyāpatho khamatīti sarīrassa lahuṭṭhānatāya catubbidhopi iriyāpatho sukhappavattiko.
tika-s0201t:1927_4: Jīvitaṃ yāpetīti yāpanālakkhaṇaṃ jīvitaṃ imaṃ sarīrayantaṃ yāpeti sukhena pavatteti.
tika-s0201t:1927_5: Uḷuṅkayāguṃ vā kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ vāti idaṃ makaravuttiyā missakabhattena yāpanaṃ vattanti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1928_0: Aññamaññaṃ saṃsandatīti satipi ubhayesaṃ kalāpānaṃ paramatthato bhede pacurajanehi duviññeyyanānattaṃ
tika-s0201t:1928_1: khīrodakasammoditaṃ accantameva saṃsaṭṭhaṃ viya hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0201t:1928_7: taṃ pucchanto bhagavā “yathā kathaṃ panā”tiādimāhāti “kathanti kāraṇapucchā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1928_8: Yo nesaṃ mettāsahitānaṃyeva kammādīnaṃ aññamaññasmiṃ paccupaṭṭhānākāro,
tika-s0201t:1929_9: Tenāha “āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ceva parammukhā cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1929_13: Tathevāti yathā sammukhā kate mettākāyakamme vuttaṃ, tatheva.
tika-s0201t:1929_15: Yathā parehi saddhiṃ attano chiddaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1929_20: Suttapadaṃ nikkhipitvā tassa atthaniddesavasena sīlādidhammapaṭisaṃyuttā kathā dhammīkathā.
tika-s0201t:1929_22: Pañhassa ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa pucchanaṃ pañhapucchanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1930_7: Cīvaraṃ vā dhovantīti attano cīvaraṃ vā dhovanti.
tika-s0201t:1930_8: Paribhaṇḍaṃ vāti attano paṇṇasālāya paribhaṇḍaṃ vā karonti.
tika-s0201t:1931_1: Paṭiviruddhā evāti etthāpi “yebhuyyenā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1931_3: Kacci pana vo anuruddhā samaggāti etthāpi voti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1932_0: Paṇṇasālāyaṃ anto bahi ca sammajjanena sodhitaṅgaṇatā vattapaṭipatti.
tika-s0201t:1933_0: Hatthena hatthaṃ saṃsibbantāti attano hatthena itarassa hatthaṃ daḷhaggahaṇavasena bandhantā.
tika-s0201t:1933_1: Vilaṅgheti desantaraṃ pāpeti etenāti vilaṅghako, hattho.
tika-s0201t:1934_0: Taṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvāti taṃ tīsupi divasesu dhammassavanaṃ pavattanavasena akhaṇḍikaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:1934_6: Papañcakaraṇaṭṭhānānīti kathāpapañcassa karaṇaṭṭhānāni vissaṭṭhakathāpavattanena kammaṭṭhāne pamajjanaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0201t:1934_8: kammaṭṭhānaviruddhaṃ na paṭipajjāmā”ti sikhāppattaṃ attano appamādalakkhaṇaṃ thero dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1934_9: Ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ muñcitvāti pana idaṃ tadā vihārasamāpattīnaṃ vaḷañjābhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1935_2: Attano sammāpaṭipannatāya satthu cittārādhanatthaṃ tassa ca visesādhigamassa satthu paccakkhabhāvato thero “kiñhi no siyā,
tika-s0201t:1935_4: Yāvadevāti yattakaṃ kālaṃ ekaṃ divasabhāgaṃ vā sakalarattiṃ vā yāva satta vā divase.
tika-s0201t:1936_2: Sati hi upari visesādhigame heṭṭhimajjhānaṃ samatikkantaṃ nāma hoti paṭippassaddhi ca.
tika-s0201t:1936_8: taṃ pana aphassaṃ asaññaṃ acetananti sabbacittacetasikarahitameva.
tika-s0201t:1936_9: Tato ca satipi rūpadhammappavattiyaṃ tassa acetanattā sabbaso saṅkhāradukkhavirahitatāya santatarā paṇītatarā ca nirodhasamāpattīti vuccate.
tika-s0201t:1937_1: Sāmaggirasānisaṃsameva nesaṃ bhagavā kathesi ajjhāsayānukūlattā tassa.
tika-s0201t:1937_5: Tato paṭinivattitvāti etarahi bhagavato ekavihāre ajjhāsayoti satthu manaṃ gaṇhantā “idheva tiṭṭhathā”ti vissajjitaṭṭhānato nivattitvā.
tika-s0201t:1937_16: Attano guṇakathāya aṭṭiyamānāti bhagavantaṃ nissāya adhigantvāpi dhammādhikaraṇaṃ satthuvihesābhāvadīpane
tika-s0201t:1937_19: Mukhaṃ me sajjanti mukhaṃ me kathane samatthaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1938_3: Maccharāyantīti attano guṇānaṃ bhagavatopi ārocanaṃ asahamānā maccharāyantīti so cintetīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1939_0: 01 Tesaṃ lābhāti tesaṃ vajjirājūnaṃ vajjiraṭṭhavāsīnañca manussattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1939_4: Pasannacittaṃ anussareyyāti taṃ kulañhetaṃ sīlādiguṇe cittaṃ pasādetvā anussareyya.
tika-s0201t:1942_1: Kocidevāti gosiṅgasālavanasāmantato niviṭṭhesu yo koci gāmo gocaragāmo bhavissati,
tika-s0201t:1942_7: Savanante jātattāti catusaccagabbhassa dhammassavanassa pariyosāne ariyāya jātiyā jātattā.
tika-s0201t:1942_14: guṇamahantatā ca suttesu āgatanayeneva ñātabbāti taṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “na kevala”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1942_17: Therasīhanādasuttanti imassa ca therassa janapadacārikāya satthu sammukhā sīhanādasuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1942_18: Abhinikkhamananti therasseva mahatā ñātiparivaṭṭena mahatā ca bhogaparivaṭṭena saha gharāvāsapariccāgo abhinikkhamanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1943_0: Mahāpaññe bhikkhū gahetvāti āyasmato kira sāriputtattherassa parivārabhikkhūpi mahāpaññā eva ahesuṃ.
tika-s0201t:1943_4: gijjhakūṭapabbate gilānaseyyāya nisinno bhagavā ārakkhatthāya parivāretvā vasantesu sāriputtamoggallānādīsu
tika-s0201t:1943_5: ekamekaṃ attano parisāya saddhiṃ caṅkamantaṃ voloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi –
tika-s0201t:1943_8: sāriputtaṃ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ caṅkamantanti. Evaṃ, bhante.
tika-s0201t:1944_2: Samuddakucchito uggacchantassa viya upaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1944_5: Tathā sati lokantarikanirayesupi candimasūriyānaṃ ābhā phareyya.
tika-s0201t:1944_6: Ubbedhavasena hi cakkavāḷapabbatassa vemajjhato candimasūriyā vicaranti.
tika-s0201t:1944_8: Upagāyamānā viyāti payirupāsanavasena upecca gāyamānā viya.
tika-s0201t:1944_9: Kāya nu kho ajja ratiyāti ajja jhānasamāpattiratiyā eva nu kho,
tika-s0201t:1945_1: Dve sūriyamaṇḍalāni viya ativiya suvisuddhasamujjalāya guṇavibhūtiyā.
tika-s0201t:1946_9: Dibbā maññe gandhāti devaloke gandhā viya.
tika-s0201t:1947_2: Tattha yasmā adhammikampi vuddhassa anumatiṃ itaro paṭikkhipituṃ na labhati,
tika-s0201t:1947_10: Sikhāppattā vepullappattā na bhavissati padesañāṇe ṭhitehi bhāsitattā.
tika-s0201t:1947_13: Tattha paccatthikā aṭṭiyanti dukkhāyanti etenāti aṭṭo,
tika-s0201t:1947_24: Idaṃ panettha pakaticārittavasena vuttaṃ upameyyatthānurūpatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1948_1: sabhāvaniruttivasena buddhādīhi bhāsitattā ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷīti pāḷi,
tika-s0201t:1948_3: Purimassa atthassa pacchimena atthena anusandhānaṃ anusandhi.
tika-s0201t:1948_11: Uggahitanti byañjanaso atthaso ca uddhaṃ uddhaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1948_12: pariyāpuṇanavasena ceva paripucchāvasena ca hadayena gahitanti attho.
tika-s0201t:1948_20: Ekapadaṃ ekakkharampi avinaṭṭhaṃ hutvā sannicīyatīti sannicayo,
tika-s0201t:1949_7: Suttekadesassa suttassa ca vacasā paricayo idha nādhippeto,
tika-s0201t:1949_11: dasa vaggāgatā”tiādinā sallakkhetvā vācāya sajjhāyitāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1949_12: Manasā anu anu pekkhitā bhāgaso nijjhāyitā cintitā manasānupekkhitā.
tika-s0201t:1949_13: Rūpagataṃ viya paññāyatīti rūpagataṃ viya cakkhussa vibhūtaṃ hutvā paññāyati.
tika-s0201t:1949_14: Suppaṭividdhāti nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā suṭṭhu yāthāvato paṭividdhā.
tika-s0201t:1950_1: tadeva atthaṃ byañjetīti byañjananti āha “padameva atthassa byañjanato padabyañjana”nti.
tika-s0201t:1950_3: sā pana pāripūrī evaṃ veditabbāti āha “dasavidhabyañjanabuddhiyo aparihāpetvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1950_4: Aññaṃ upārambhakaranti yathānikkhittasuttato aññaṃ tassa ananulomakaṃ suttaṃ āharati.
tika-s0201t:1950_5: Tadatthaṃ otāretīti tassa āhaṭasuttasseva atthaṃ vicāreti.
tika-s0201t:1950_6: Tassa kathā aparimaṇḍalā nāma hoti atthassa aparipuṇṇabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1950_7: Yathānikkhittassa suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvaseneva suttantarampi ānento bahi ekapadampi na gacchati nāma.
tika-s0201t:1950_9: Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ suṭṭhu vavatthitaṃ katvā dassento tulikāya paricchindanto viya.
tika-s0201t:1950_10: Gambhīrataramatthaṃ gamento gambhīramātikāya udakaṃ pesento viya.
tika-s0201t:1950_11: Uttānamātikāya hi mariyādaṃ ottharitvā udakaṃ aññathā gaccheyya.
tika-s0201t:1950_12: Ekaṃyeva padaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi punappunaṃ saṃvaṇṇento padaṃ koṭṭento sindhavājānīyo viya.
tika-s0201t:1950_13: So hi vaggitāya gatiyā pade padaṃ koṭṭento gacchati.
tika-s0201t:1950_14: Kathāmaggena tassa kathā parimaṇḍalā nāma hoti dhammato atthato anusandhito pubbāparato ācariyuggahatoti sabbaso paripuṇṇabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1951_1: Nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇikaṃ nirantaraṃ ekarasañca katvā parisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ kathento vissaṭṭhāya kathāya katheti nāma,
tika-s0201t:1951_4: uṇhakhādanīyaṃ khādanto viyāti sīghaṃ sīghaṃ kathanassa udāharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1951_12: Kenaci rogena dukkhaṃ patto viya nitthunanto.
tika-s0201t:1951_16: yathā ca ācariyā taṃ taṃ suttaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ,
tika-s0201t:1951_18: Acchinnadhāraṃ katvāti “nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇika”ntiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena avicchinnaṃ kathāpabandhaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:1951_19: Anusayasamugghātāyāti iminā tassā kathāya arahattapariyosānataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1951_21: atha kho lakkhaṇe pavattanti dassento “tathārūpeneva bhikkhusatena bhikkhusahassena vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1955_2: na avasādanāpekkhā aññamaññaṃ pañhaṃ pucchantīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1957_2: Tenāha bhagavā “yathā taṃ ānandova sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1957_9: Bahussuto bhikkhu tattha tattha sutte sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne tesaṃ suviditattā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno
tika-s0201t:1957_11: Maggādipasavanāya vipassanāgabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā paripākaṃ gametvāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1958_0: 340. “Eseva nayo”ti atidesavasena saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “āyasmā hi revato”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1959_0: 342. Aparepi nānappakāre kileseti aparepi nānappakāre dosamohādikilese. Dhunitvāti vidhametvā.
tika-s0201t:1960_2: Sakalampi cakkhuviññāṇavīthigataṃ cittaṃ cakkhuviññāṇanti aggahetvā cakkhusannissitameva pana viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1960_4: tadanantaraṃ santīraṇantiādinā saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ atiittarakhaṇavantaṃ cittantaraṃ cittanānattaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1960_6: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tatheva tatiyaṃ jhānantiādinā ārammaṇaṃ anukkamitvā jhānasseva
tika-s0201t:1960_8: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā puna tadeva tejokasiṇetiādinā jhānaṃ anukkamitvā ārammaṇasseva
tika-s0201t:1960_10: “Paṭhamajjhānaṃ pañcaṅgika”ntiādinā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ duvaṅgikanti jhānaṅgamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ aṅgavavatthānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1960_13: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva itaresampi samāpajjanaṃ aṅgasaṅkanti.
tika-s0201t:1960_14: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tadeva āpokasiṇeti evaṃ sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkanti.
tika-s0201t:1960_16: Abhidhammabhājanīye hi vedanākkhandhaṃ bhājento bhagavā tike gahetvā dukesu pakkhipi,
tika-s0201t:1960_19: Tike ca duke ca ubhatovaḍḍhananīhārena kathesi,
tika-s0201t:1960_21: Evaṃ sesakhandhesu dhātāyatanādīsu ca yathārahaṃ vibhaṅgappakaraṇe abhidhammabhājanīye āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1960_23: Khandhādīsu sabhāvadhammesu tīsu lakkhaṇesu paññattiyaṃ samayantaresu ca kosallābhāvato ayaṃ sakavādo ayaṃ paravādoti na jānāti.
tika-s0201t:1961_1: Cittaṃ attano vase vattetuṃ sakkoti paṭisaṅkhānabhāvanābalehi pariggaṇhanasamatthattā.
tika-s0201t:1961_2: Idāni tamatthaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca vibhāvetuṃ “duppañño hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1962_6: bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto”tiādinā attano mahābodhipallaṅkaṃ sandhāyāha,
tika-s0201t:1962_8: na aññehīti āpannanti āha “apica pacchimaṃ janata”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:1962_11: Nippariyāyenevāti kenaci pariyāyena lesena vinā mukhyena nayeneva.
tika-s0201t:1962_12: Yo “arahattaṃ appatvā na vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti daḷhasamādānaṃ katvā nisinno taṃ adhigantvāva uṭṭhahati.
tika-s0201t:1962_15: Āsavakkhayāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ ārabhitvā āsavakkhayeneva desanāya pariyosāpitattā yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
tika-s0201t:1965_4: Ekekaṃ padaṃ nāḷaṃ mūlaṃ etissāti evaṃsaññitā ekanāḷikā,
tika-s0201t:1965_5: ekekaṃ vā padaṃ nāḷaṃ atthaniggamanamaggo etissāti ekanāḷikā.
tika-s0201t:1965_7: Cattāro aṃsā bhāgā atthasallakkhaṇūpāyā etissāti caturassā.
tika-s0201t:1965_9: Niyamato nisinnassa āraddhassa vatto saṃvatto etissā atthīti nisinnavattikā,
tika-s0201t:1965_10: yathāraddhassa atthassa visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpikāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1965_12: Ekekapadassāti piṇḍatthadassanavasena bahunnaṃ padānaṃ ekajjhaṃ atthaṃ akathetvā ekamekassa padassa atthavaṇṇanā.
tika-s0201t:1965_18: “kaṇhapakkhe upamaṃ dassetvā upamā ca nāma yāvadeva upameyyasampaṭidānatthāti upameyyatthaṃ āharitvā
tika-s0201t:1965_19: saṃkilesapakkhaniddeso ca vodānapakkhavibhāvanatthāyāti sukkapakkhampi upamūpameyyavibhāgena āharitvā
tika-s0201t:1965_21: Kaṇhapakkhe upameyyaṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamanādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0201t:1965_22: Apare pana “kaṇhapakkhe sukkapakkhe ca taṃtaṃupamūpameyyatthānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpetvāva kathanaṃ pariyosānagamana”nti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1965_25: Sabbācariyānaṃ āciṇṇāti sabbehipi pubbācariyehi ācaritā saṃvaṇṇitā,
tika-s0201t:1966_5: Taṃ pana pariharaṇaṃ pariggahetvā vicaraṇanti āha “pariggahetvā vicaritu”nti.
tika-s0201t:1966_8: parimānaparicchedopi sarīrarūpampīti āha “gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1967_0: Dhanusattisūlādīti ettha issāsācariyānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ dhanulakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1967_2: Issarabhattigaṇānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ sūlalakkhaṇanti yojanā. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:1967_3: saddena rāmavāsudevagaṇādīnaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ pharasucakkādilakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1971_2: Yathāruciṃ gahetvā gacchantīti gunnaṃ rucianurūpaṃ gocarabhūmiyaṃ vā nadipāraṃ vā gahetvā gacchanti.
tika-s0201t:1972_1: “Dvīhākārehī”ti vuttaṃ ākāradvayaṃ dassetuṃ “gaṇanato vā samuṭṭhānato vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1972_2: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatāti “upacayo santatī”ti jātiṃ dvidhā bhinditvā hadayavatthuṃ aggahetvā “dasa āyatanāni
tika-s0201t:1972_5: Rūpakoṭṭhāsāti vā visuṃ visuṃ appavattitvā kalāpabhāveneva pavattanato rūpakalāpā.
tika-s0201t:1972_9: tassa aṃsā kesādayo koṭṭhāsāti aññepi avayavā koṭṭhāsā viya koṭṭhāsā.
tika-s0201t:1972_11: Tattha rūpaṃ pariggahetvāti yathāvuttaṃ rūpaṃ salakkhaṇato ñāṇena pariggaṇhitvā.
tika-s0201t:1972_12: Arūpaṃ vavatthapetvāti taṃ rūpaṃ nissāya ārammaṇañca katvā pavattamāne vedanādike cattāro khandhe “arūpa”nti vavatthapetvā.
tika-s0201t:1972_13: Rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvāti puna tattha yaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1972_16: ubhayavinimuttaṃ kiñci natthi attā vā attaniyaṃ vāti evaṃ rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā.
tika-s0201t:1972_17: Tadubhayañca avijjādinā paccayena sappaccayanti paccayaṃ sallakkhetvā aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā yo kalāpasammasanādikkamena
tika-s0201t:1973_1: sotaghānajivhākāyāyatanaṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvitindriyanti aṭṭhavidhaṃ kammavasena,
tika-s0201t:1973_2: kāyaviññatti vacīviññattīti idaṃ dvayaṃ cittavasenāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1973_4: Rūpassa lahutā mudutā kammaññatāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ utucittāhāravasena tisamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1973_5: Rūpagandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ ākāsadhātu āpodhātu kabaḷīkāro āhāroti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ utucittāhārakammavasena catusamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1973_6: Upacayo santati jaratā rūpassa aniccatāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ na kutoci samuṭṭhātīti na jānāti.
tika-s0201t:1973_7: Samuṭṭhānato rūpaṃ ajānantotiādīsu vattabbaṃ “gaṇanato rūpaṃ ajānanto”tiādesu vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1974_0: Kammalakkhaṇoti attanā kataṃ duccaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti kammalakkhaṇo, bālo.
tika-s0201t:1974_11: Attanā kataṃ sucaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti kammalakkhaṇo, paṇḍito.
tika-s0201t:1974_23: Bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite na sevatīti yaṃ bālapuggale vajjetvā paṇḍitasevanaṃ atthakāmena kātabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1974_25: Tathābhūtassa ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ puna “bāle vajjetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1974_26: Tattha yaṃ bhagavatā “idaṃ vo kappatī”ti anuññātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1974_45: Taṃ ajānantoti kappiyākappiyaṃ garukalahukaṃ satekicchātekicchaṃ ajānanto suvisuddhaṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0201t:1974_46: kusalākusalaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ ajānanto khandhādīsu akusalatāya rūpārūpapariggahampi kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0201t:1975_0: Govaṇasadise attabhāve uppajjitvā tattha dukkhuppattihetuto micchāvitakkā āsāṭikā viyāti āsāṭikāti āha “akusalavitakkaṃ āsāṭikaṃ ahāretvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1976_2: pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato chahi vaṇamukhehi vissandamānayūso gaṇḍo viya
tika-s0201t:1976_3: pilotikakhaṇḍena chahi dvārehi vissandamānakilesāsuci attabhāvavaṇo satisaṃvarena pidahitabbo,
tika-s0201t:1976_4: ayaṃ pana evaṃ na karotīti āha “yathā so gopālako vaṇaṃ na paṭicchādeti,
tika-s0201t:1977_0: Yathā dhūmo indhanaṃ nissāya uppajjamāno saṇho sukhumo taṃ taṃ vivaraṃ anupavissa byāpento sattānaṃ ḍaṃsamakasādiparissayaṃ vinodeti,
tika-s0201t:1977_2: evaṃ dhammadesanāñāṇassa indhanabhūtaṃ rūpārūpadhammajātaṃ nissāya uppajjamānā saṇhā sukhumā taṃ taṃ
tika-s0201t:1977_5: ñāṇaggijālasamuṭṭhānassa pubbaṅgamoti dhūmo viyāti dhūmoti āha “gopālako dhūmaṃ viya dhammadesanādhūmaṃ na karotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1977_6: Attano santikaṃ upagantvā nisinnassa kātabbā tadanucchavikā dhammakathā upanisinnakathā.
tika-s0201t:1977_10: nanu attano jānāpanatthaṃ dhammakathādi na kātabbamevāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1977_12: suddhāsayena pana dhamme kathite tassa guṇajānanataṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1979_0: Bhāsaye jotaye dhammaṃ, paggaṇhe isinaṃ dhaja”nti. ;
tika-s0201t:1980_2: Yathā pana taṃ udakena otiṇṇasattānaṃ sarīramalaṃ pavāheti,
tika-s0201t:1980_5: evaṃ bahussutā attano samīpaṃ otiṇṇasattānaṃ dhammūdakena cittamalaṃ pavāhenti,
tika-s0201t:1980_11: idaṃ byañjanaṃ ayaṃ saddo kathaṃ imasmiṃ atthe ropetabbo,
tika-s0201t:1980_12: kena pakārena imassa atthassa vācako jāto.
tika-s0201t:1980_14: nirūpetabbaṃ ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti kathamettha niruḷhāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1980_15: Imassa bhāsitassa ko atthoti saddatthaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0201t:1980_18: Attho kiṃ dīpetīti bhāvatthaṃ vā saṅketatthaṃ vā.
tika-s0201t:1980_19: Na paripucchatīti vimaticchedanapucchāvasena sabbaso pucchaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0201t:1980_20: Na paripañhatīti pari pari attano ñātuṃ icchaṃ na ācikkhati na vibhāveti.
tika-s0201t:1980_23: Vivaraṇaṃ nāma atthassa vibhajitvā kathananti āha “bhājetvā na dassentī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1980_25: Na uttānīkarontīti sinerumūlakaṃ vālikaṃ uddharanto viya pathavīsandhārodakaṃ vivaritvā dassento viya ca uttānaṃ na karonti.
tika-s0201t:1980_26: Evaṃ yassa dhammassa vasena bahussutā “tittha”nti vuttā pariyāyato,
tika-s0201t:1980_27: idāni tameva dhammaṃ nippariyāyato titthanti dassetuṃ “yathā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1980_28: Dhammo hi taranti etena nibbānaṃ nāma taḷākanti “tittha”nti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1982_0: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe”ti. ;
tika-s0201t:1983_0: Dhammasseva nibbānassotaraṇatitthabhūtassa otaraṇapakāraṃ ajānanto “dhammatitthaṃ na jānātī”ti vutto.
tika-s0201t:1984_0: Pītāpītanti gogaṇe pītaṃ apītañca gorūpaṃ na jānāti na vindati.
tika-s0201t:1984_2: “Ānisaṃsaṃ na vindatī”ti vatvā tassa avindanākāraṃ dassento “dhammassavanaggaṃ gantvā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1985_3: Aṭṭhaṅgikanti ca visuṃ ekajjhañca aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ upādāya gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1985_5: Evañca katvā sattaṅgassapi ariyamaggassa saṅgaho siddho hoti.
tika-s0201t:1986_2: tattha sammohaviddhaṃsanavasena pavattā nibbānārammaṇā lokuttarāti evaṃ ime lokiyā,
tika-s0201t:1987_0: Anavasesaṃ duhatīti paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ ajānanto kismiñci dāyake saddhāhāniyā kismiñci paccayahāniyā anavasesaṃ duhati.
tika-s0201t:1988_0: Ime amhesu garucittīkāraṃ na karontīti iminā navakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammasampaṭipattiyā abhāvaṃ dasseti ācariyupajjhāyesu pitupemassa anupaṭṭhāpanato.
tika-s0201t:1988_3: Na hi sīlādiguṇehi sāsane thirabhāvappattā ananuggahetabbe sabrahmacārī anuggaṇhanti,
tika-s0201t:1988_8: Vuttavipallāsavasenāti “na rūpaññū”tiādīsu vuttassa paṭisedhassa paṭikkhepavasena aggahaṇavasena.
tika-s0201t:1988_9: Yojetvāti “rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanāto vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ jānātī”tiādinā,
tika-s0201t:1988_11: pañcagorasaparibhogatopi na paribāhiro hotī”tiādinā ca atthaṃ yojetvā.
tika-s0201t:1988_12: Veditabboti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ padese yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1991_3: Sabbā gaṅgā pākaṭā hutvā paññāyatīti pakaticakkhussa pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0201t:1991_4: dibbacakkhussa pana samantacakkhussa vā yattha katthaci nisinnassapi bhagavato pākaṭā hutvā paññāyateva.
tika-s0201t:1992_2: Paññāya nāma duṭṭhubhāvo natthi ekantānavajjatāya, tasmā du-
tika-s0201t:1992_5: Saddo ārambhatthoti āha “patāresīti tāretuṃ ārabhī”ti paratīraṃ gāvīnaṃ appattattā.
tika-s0201t:1992_7: Videharaṭṭhaṃ kira bhūmibhāgadassanasampattiyā ca vanarāmaṇeyyakādinā ca sundaraṃ.
tika-s0201t:1992_8: Āmaṇḍalikaṃ karitvāti āvatte patitā temaṇḍalākārena paribbhamitvā.
tika-s0201t:1992_9: Katipayāpi gāviyo asesetvā nadīsotena vūḷhattā vuttaṃ “avaḍḍhiṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇiṃsū”ti.
tika-s0201t:1992_10: Katipayāsupi hi avasiṭṭhāsu gāvīsu anukkamenapi siyā gogaṇassa vaḍḍhīti.
tika-s0201t:1992_12: Titthā bhaṭṭhāti gahetuṃ asamatthatāya titthaṃ appattā.
tika-s0201t:1992_13: Arogo nāma nāhosīti lomamattampi asesetvā sabbā gāviyo nadīsote vinaṭṭhāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1993_1: te ajānantā “akusalā imassa lokassā”ti vuttāti āha “idhaloke khandhadhātāyatanesu akusalā achekā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1993_2: Ayameva nayo “akusalā parassa lokassā”ti etthāpīti āha “paralokepi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1993_9: Te pana ukkaṭṭhaniddesena dassento āha “iminā cha satthāro dassitā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1994_2: Te pana dammataṃ upagatagoṇā ceva dhenuyo cāti āha “dantagoṇe ceva dhenuyo cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1995_1: Mārassa taṇhāsotaṃ chetvāti khandhamārasambandhītaṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ sotaṃ samucchinditvā.
tika-s0201t:1995_2: Tayo koṭṭhāse khepetvā ṭhitāti anāgāmino sandhāyāha.
tika-s0201t:1995_4: Tattha pana yathākkamaṃ catumaggavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ dve koṭṭhāse khepetvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0201t:1996_0: Jānatāti ettha jānanakiriyāvisayassa avisesitattā adhikāravasena anavasesañeyyavisesā adhippetāti āha “sabbadhamme jānantenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1996_1: Antosāravirahato abbhuggataṭṭhena ca naḷo viyāti naḷo,
tika-s0201t:1996_3: Khemaṃ patthethāti ettha catūhi yogehi anupaddavattā “khema”nti arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1996_6: Pattāyeva nāma tassa pattiyā na koci antarāyo.
tika-s0201t:1996_7: Sotthinā pāragamanaṃ uddissa desanaṃ ārabhitvā khemappattiyā desanāya pariyosāpitattā yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti.
tika-s0201t:2000_4: nigaṇṭhī pañcavādasatānī”ti evaṃ nigaṇṭho ca nigaṇṭhī ca pañca pañca vādasatāni uggahetvā vicarantā.
tika-s0201t:2001_3: kassa vissajjanaṃ hotū”ti paribbājikāhi vutte thero āha “pucchā nāma amhākaṃ pattā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2001_5: yasmā tumhe vādapasutā vādābhiratā dhajaṃ paggayha vicaratha,
tika-s0201t:2001_7: evaṃ santepi tumhākaṃ mātugāmabhāvato pubbapakkhaṃ demāti āha “tumhe pana mātugāmā nāma paṭhamaṃ pucchathā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2001_8: Tā paribbājikā ekekā aḍḍhateyyasatavādamaggaṃ pucchantiyo vādasahassaṃ pucchiṃsu.
tika-s0201t:2001_9: Yathā nisitassa khaggassa kumudanāḷacchedane kimatthi bhāriyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2001_10: evaṃ paṭisambhidāppattassa sāvakesu paññavantānaṃ aggabhāve ṭhitassa dhammasenāpatino puthujjanaparikappitapañhavissajjane kimatthi bhāriyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2001_12: Tattha nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvāti yathā tā puna tattha jaṭaṃ gaṇṭhiṃ kātuṃ na visahanti,
tika-s0201t:2001_14: Ayaṃ thero caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre sahassavaṭṭikaṃ dīpento viya aññesaṃ avisaye andhakārabhūte
tika-s0201t:2001_15: pañhe pucchitamatteyeva vissajjesīti therassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ disvā sayañca antimabhavikatāya kohaññe
tika-s0201t:2002_0: Neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ addasaṃsūti ekanti vattabbassa bahubhāvato tassā pucchāya attho evamanto evamavasānakoṭīti na passiṃsu na jāniṃsu.
tika-s0201t:2002_1: Thero tāsaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ olokento pabbajjāruciṃ disvā āha “idāni kiṃ karissathā”ti?
tika-s0201t:2002_2: Uttaritarapaññoti vādamaggaparicayena medhāvitāya ca yādisā tāsaṃ paññā,
tika-s0201t:2003_1: Tasmā tehi tehi parappavādādīhi bhassaṃ vādamaggaṃ pakārehi vadetīti bhassappavādako.
tika-s0201t:2003_2: Paṇḍitavādoti ahaṃ paṇḍito nipuṇo bahussutoti evaṃvādī.
tika-s0201t:2003_3: Yaṃ yaṃ nakkhattācārena ādisatīti nakkhattagatiyā kālañāṇena “asukadivase candaggāho bhavissati,
tika-s0201t:2003_4: sūriyaggāho bhavissatī”tiādinā yaṃ yaṃ ādesaṃ bhaṇati.
tika-s0201t:2003_6: Āropitoti paṭiññāhetunidassanādidosaṃ upari āropito vādo svāropito.
tika-s0201t:2003_7: Dosapadaṃ āropentena vādinā paravādimhi abhibhuyya tassa dhātukkhobhopi siyā,
tika-s0201t:2003_8: cittavikkhepena yena doso tena saṅkappito sampavedhitoti.
tika-s0201t:2003_11: Apica thūṇapado nāma atthi kathāmaggo vādamaggaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2003_12: Saccako pana kohaññe ṭhatvā attano vādappabhedavasena pare vimhāpento “thūṇaṃ cepāha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:2003_14: tañca dhammadesanā hotīti esā eva cassa anusāsanīti vinayanādimukhena sammāsambuddhassa mataṃ sāsanaṃ pucchanto saccako “kathaṃ pana, bho,
tika-s0201t:2003_16: Athassa thero “lakkhaṇattayakathā nāma anaññasādhāraṇā buddhāveṇikā dhammadesanā,
tika-s0201t:2003_17: tatra ca mayā aniccakathāya samuṭṭhāpitāya taṃ asahanto saccako tucchamānena paṭapaṭāyanto kurumāno licchavī gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ āgamissati,
tika-s0201t:2003_18: athassa bhagavā vādaṃ madditvā aniccanti patiṭṭhapento dhammaṃ kathessati,
tika-s0201t:2003_19: tadā bhavissati vijahitavādo sammāpaṭipattiyā patiṭṭhito”ti cintetvā aniccānattalakkhaṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ bhagavato anusāsanaṃ dassento “evaṃ, bho,
tika-s0201t:2004_0: Kasmā panettha dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ aggahitanti āha “thero panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2004_1: “Upārambhassa okāso hotī”ti saṅkhepato vuttaṃ vivarituṃ “maggaphalānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2004_4: Nayidaṃ tumhākaṃ sāsanaṃ nāmāti yattha tumhe avaṭṭhitā,
tika-s0201t:2004_5: idaṃ tumhākaṃ sabbaññusāsanaṃ nāma na hoti dukkhato anissaraṇattā,
tika-s0201t:2004_7: mahādukkhaniddiṭṭhattā pana nirayussado nāma ussadanirayo nāma,
tika-s0201t:2004_14: Tassa hi pariññatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati.
tika-s0201t:2005_4: Ekasmiṃ kāle tādise kāle rājakiccānaṃ santhānamettha vicārentīti sandhāgāraṃ,
tika-s0201t:2005_7: Idāneva piṭṭhiṃ parivattentoti bhagavato nalāṭaṃ anoloketvā vimukhabhāvaṃ āpajjanto.
tika-s0201t:2005_11: Sāṇasāṭakakaraṇatthanti sāṇasāṭakaṃ karonti etenāti sāṇasāṭakakaraṇaṃ, suttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2005_15: Te gahetvā sāṇānaṃ dhovanasadisaṃ kīḷitajātaṃ yathā “uddālapupphabhañjikā,
tika-s0201t:2005_17: Kiṃ so bhavamānoti kīdiso hutvā so bhavamāno,
tika-s0201t:2005_18: kiṃ honto loke aggapuggalassa sammāsambuddhassa vādāropanaṃ nāma tato uttaritarasūraguṇo eva yakkhādibhāvena so bhavamāno abhisambhuṇeyya.
tika-s0201t:2005_19: Ayaṃ pana appānubhāvatāya pisācarūpo kiṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ niddāyanto ajja pabujjhitvā evaṃ vadatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2006_4: Vattaṃ dassetvāti pacchābhattaṃ divāvihārūpagamanato pubbe kātabbavattaṃ dassetvā paṭipajjitvā.
tika-s0201t:2006_5: Bhagavantaṃ dassentoti bhagavati gāravabahumānaṃ vibhāvento ubho hatthe kamalamakulākāre katvā ukkhippa bhagavantaṃ dassento.
tika-s0201t:2007_0: Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ aparicchinnagaṇanaṃ sandhāya evaṃ “mahatiyā licchaviparisāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2007_1: Kiṃ sīsena bhūmiṃ paharanteneva vandanā katā hoti?
tika-s0201t:2007_5: Yattha katthacīti attano anurūpaṃ vacanaṃ asallapento yattha katthaci.
tika-s0201t:2008_1: Dissati “idaṃ imassa phala”nti apadissati etenāti deso, kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2008_2: tadeva tassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya okāsoti āha “kañcideva desanti kañci okāsaṃ kiñci kāraṇa”nti.
tika-s0201t:2008_3: Okāso ṭhānanti ca kāraṇaṃ vuccati “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso”tiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:2009_0: Ñatvā sayaṃ lokamimaṃ parañcāti idaṃ mahāsatto nirayaṃ saggañca tesaṃ paccakkhato dassetvā āha.
tika-s0201t:2010_1: yathāpi kusalo tathāti yathā pakārena sukusalo sabbaññū jānāti katheti,
tika-s0201t:2010_3: Tassa pana kāraṇaṃ akāraṇañca avijānanto rājānaṃ karotu vā mā vā,
tika-s0201t:2010_4: ahaṃ pana te akkhissāmīti āha “rājā ca kho…pe… na vā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2011_1: idha pana aññathā sāvakena assajinā kathitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2011_2: aññathā samaṇena gotamenāti vacanokāsapariharaṇatthaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ anāmasitvā therena kathitaniyāmeneva
tika-s0201t:2011_4: “rūpaṃ anattā yāva viññāṇaṃ anattā”ti vutte saccako taṃ asampaṭicchanto upamāya atthañāpane upamāpamāṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:2011_5: yathā “go viya gavayo”ti attānaṃ upameyyaṃ katvā upamāpamāṇena patiṭṭhāpetukāmo āha “upamā maṃ,
tika-s0201t:2011_9: upamāyapidhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānantīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2011_11: aññena vāpi pamāṇena tava attā patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na labbhā attano viya pamāṇassapi anupalabbhanatoti āha “paṭibhātu taṃ aggivessanā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2011_12: Yathā hi attā nāma koci paramatthato na upalabbhati ekaṃsena anupaladdhito,
tika-s0201t:2011_15: na tena tava attavādo patiṭṭhaṃ labhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2012_0: Yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ kāyikaṃ vā puññāpuññaṃ purisapuggale upalabbhati,
tika-s0201t:2012_2: tathā yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sukhadukkhapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ purisapuggale upalabbhati,
tika-s0201t:2012_7: Evaṃ rūpādilakkhaṇo attā tattha tattha kāye kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti,
tika-s0201t:2012_9: aññathā kammaphalasambandho na yujjeyyāti imamatthaṃ dassento “iminā kiṃ dīpetī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:2012_12: “Rūpattāyaṃ purisapuggalo”tiādinā rūpādidhamme “attā”ti vatvā puna “rūpe patiṭṭhāyā”tiādiṃ vadanto ayaṃ nigaṇṭho attano vādaṃ bhindati patiṭṭhānassa,
tika-s0201t:2012_14: Rūpādayo vedanādisabhāvā attā tannissayena puññādikiriyāsamupaladdhito idha yaṃ nissāya puññādikiriyā samupalabbhati,
tika-s0201t:2012_15: te rūpādayo sattasaññitā attasabhāvā diṭṭhā yathā taṃ devatādīsu,
tika-s0201t:2012_16: ye pana sattasaññitā tato aññe asattasabhāvā diṭṭhā yathā taṃ kaṭṭhakaliṅgarādīsūti evaṃ sādhetabbaṃ
tika-s0201t:2012_17: atthaṃ sahetuṃ katvā dassento nigaṇṭho nidassanaṃ ānesīti āha “ativiya sakāraṇaṃ katvā upamaṃ āharī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2012_18: Tassa pana “balakaraṇīyā”ti vuttapurisappayogā viya bījagāmabhūtagāmāpi sajīvā evāti laddhīti te sadisūdāharaṇabhāvena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2012_19: Sace pana ye jīvassa ādhāraṇabhāvena sahitena pavattetabbabhāvena sallakkhetabbā,
tika-s0201t:2012_22: Evaṃ sati “balakaraṇīyā kammantā”ti vadantena visadisūdāharaṇabhāvena upanītanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2013_0: Samattho nāma natthi attavādabhañjanassa anattatāpatiṭṭhāpanassa ca sugatāveṇikattā.
tika-s0201t:2013_1: Yaṃ panetarahi sāsanikā yathāsatti tadubhayaṃ karonti,
tika-s0201t:2013_2: taṃ buddhehi dinnanaye ṭhatvā tesaṃ desanānusārato.
tika-s0201t:2013_5: Sakalaṃ vesālinti sabbavesālivāsinaṃ janaṃ nissayūpacārena nissitaṃ vadati yathā “gāmo āgato”ti.
tika-s0201t:2014_1: Patiṭṭhapetvāti yathā taṃ vādaṃ na avajānāti,
tika-s0201t:2014_5: saddaṃ uppādetvā ghātetāyanti rūpasiddhiṃ icchantīti āha “ghātāraha”nti.
tika-s0201t:2014_9: Visesetvā dīpetīti “vattati”icceva avatvā “vattituñca marahatī”ti dutiyena padena bhagavatā vuttaṃ visesetvā dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:2015_1: Tato eva susajjitaṃ sabbakālaṃ suṭṭhu sajjitākārameva.
tika-s0201t:2015_4: Imasmiṃ ṭhāneti “vattati te tasmiṃ rūpe vaso”ti etasmiṃ kāraṇaggahaṇe.
tika-s0201t:2015_9: taṃ anattakameva diṭṭhaṃ yathā taṃ sampatti.
tika-s0201t:2015_12: pucchante abyākaraṇena vihesāya kayiramānattā tatiye vāre dhammatāvasena vihesakassa sattadhā muddhā
tika-s0201t:2015_13: phalati yathā taṃ sabbaññupaṭiññāya bhagavato sammukhabhāvūpagamane.
tika-s0201t:2015_15: Bhagavā viya anukampamāno mahantaṃ bhayānakaṃ rūpaṃ māpetvā tāsetvā imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ vissajjāpemīti tassa purato ākāse vajiraṃ āharanto tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0201t:2015_17: Na hi bhagavato purato kassaci anattho nāma hoti.
tika-s0201t:2015_18: Yasmā pana bhagavā ekaṃsato sahadhammikameva pañhaṃ pucchati,
tika-s0201t:2016_4: atha kho ādito mahābrahmānaṃ purato katvā attanā katapaṭiññāvasenāti dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:2016_8: Avīmaṃsakena hi taṃ disvā mahāyakkhoti vadeyya,
tika-s0201t:2016_10: ayaṃ pana aññesaṃ abhītabhāvaṃ upadhāretvā “addhāme yakkhaṃ na passanti,
tika-s0201t:2016_11: tasmā mayhameva bhayaṃ uppanna”nti tīretvā yuttappattavasena paṭipajji.
tika-s0201t:2017_2: Eseva nayoti saṅkhāraviññāṇesupi saññāya viya nayoti attho.
tika-s0201t:2017_4: akusalā domanassasampayuttā saññā mā ahosī”tiādinā nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:2017_5: Sappadaṭṭhavisanti sabbasattānaṃ sappadaṭṭhaṭṭhāne sarīrapadese patitaṃ visaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2017_9: Parito jāneyyāti samantato sabbaso kiñcipi asesetvā jāneyya.
tika-s0201t:2017_11: Tathābhūto cassa khayavayaṃ upaneti nāmāti āha “khayaṃ vayaṃ anuppādaṃ upanetvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2018_2: yathāparikappitassa vā sārassa abhāvato antosāravirahito ritto.
tika-s0201t:2018_3: Vippakāranti diṭṭhiyā sīlācārassa ca vasena virūpataṃ sāparādhataṃ sāvajjataṃ tesaṃ upari āropetvā.
tika-s0201t:2019_6: Yantāruḷhassa viyāti byākaraṇatthaṃ vāyamayantaṃ āruḷhassa viya.
tika-s0201t:2020_4: Tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ ñatvāti tesaṃ licchavikumārānaṃ iñjiteneva ajjhāsayaṃ jānitvā.
tika-s0201t:2021_1: Yasmiṃ adhigate puggalo satthusāsane visārado hoti parehi asaṃhāriyo,
tika-s0201t:2021_2: taṃ ñāṇaṃ visāradassa bhāvoti katvā vesārajjanti āha “vesārajjappattoti ñāṇappatto”ti.
tika-s0201t:2021_3: Tato evamassa na paro paccetabbo etassa atthīti aparappaccayo.
tika-s0201t:2021_4: Na paro pattiyo saddahātabbo etassa atthīti aparappattiyo.
tika-s0201t:2021_5: Kāmaṃ saccako sekkhabhūmi asekkhabhūmīti idaṃ sāsanavohāraṃ na jānāti.
tika-s0201t:2021_6: Passatīti pana dassanakiriyāya vippakatabhāvassa vuttattā “na ettāvatā bhikkhukiccaṃ pariyosita”nti aññāsi,
tika-s0201t:2022_7: Idāni nippariyāyatova tividhampi anuttariyaṃ dassetuṃ “suddhalokuttaramevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2022_8: Satipi sabbesampi lokuttaradhammānaṃ anuttarabhāve ukkaṭṭhaniddesena aggamaggapaññā tato uttaritarassa abhāvato dassanānuttariyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2022_16: Catusaccantogadhattā sabbassa ñeyyadhammassa “cattāri saccāni buddho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2024_10: Licchavīhi pesitena khādanīyabhojanīyena samaṇo gotamo sasāvakasaṅgho mayā parivisito,
tika-s0201t:2024_13: Yasmā pana bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca saccakena dānaṃ dinnaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2024_15: tasmā bhagavā saccakassa satiṃ parivattento “yaṃ kho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:2024_17: Nigaṇṭhassa matena vināyevāti saccakassa cittena vinā eva tassa dakkhiṇaṃ khettagataṃ katvā dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2027_1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharatīti iminā tadā bhagavato vesāliyaṃ nivāsaparicchinno pubbaṇhādibhedo sabbo samayo sādhāraṇato gahito,
tika-s0201t:2027_2: tathā tena kho pana samayenāti ca iminā.
tika-s0201t:2027_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “tīhi padehi ekova samayo vutto”ti vuttaṃ visesassa sāmaññantogadhattā.
tika-s0201t:2027_7: Mukhaṃ dhovitvā eva hi vāsadhuro ce,
tika-s0201t:2027_10: ganthaparicaye katipaye nisajjavāre anuyuñjitvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya vitakkamāḷaṃ upagacchati.
tika-s0201t:2028_2: Pubbe yathācintitaṃ pañhaṃ apucchitvā aññaṃ pucchanto maggaṃ ṭhapetvā ummaggato parivattento viya hotīti āha “passena tāva pariharanto”ti.
tika-s0201t:2029_3: “Andho nāma pabbataṃ abhiruhissatī”tiādīsu viya vimhayavācīsaddayogena hi “bhavissatī”ti anāgatavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2029_5: “Ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto”tiādinā kāyassa asubhāniccāditāya anupassanā kāyabhāvanāti
tika-s0201t:2029_7: Anāgatarūpanti abhīte atthe anāgatasaddāropanaṃ anāgatappayogo na sameti.
tika-s0201t:2029_8: Atthopīti “ūrukkhambhopi nāma bhavissatī”ti vuttaatthopi na sameti.
tika-s0201t:2030_1: Attano adhippetakāyabhāvanaṃ vitthārento vitthārato dassento ye taṃ anuyuttā,
tika-s0201t:2030_5: Purimaṃ pahāyāti kālaparicchedena anāhāraappāhāratādivasena kāyassa apacinanaṃ khedanaṃ pariccajitvā.
tika-s0201t:2030_6: Kāyabhāvanā pana na paññāyatīti niyamaṃ paramatthato kāyabhāvanāpi tava ñāṇena na ñāyati,
tika-s0201t:2031_4: kuto pana tvaṃ cittabhāvanaṃ jānissasī”ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne.
tika-s0201t:2031_5: Tathā “yo tvaṃ evaṃ oḷārikaṃ dubbalaṃ kāyabhāvanaṃ na jānāsi,
tika-s0201t:2031_6: so tvaṃ kuto santasukhumaṃ cittabhāvanaṃ jānissasī”ti etasmiṃ atthavaṇṇanāṭhāne.
tika-s0201t:2031_7: Abuddhavacanaṃ nāmetaṃ padanti kāyabhāvanāsaññitavipassanāto cittabhāvanā santā,
tika-s0201t:2031_8: vipassanā pana pādakajjhānato oḷārikā ceva dubbalā cāti ayañca etassa padassa attho.
tika-s0201t:2031_9: “Abuddhavacanaṃ nāmetaṃ vacanaṃ siyā”ti vatvā thero pakkamituṃ ārabhati.
tika-s0201t:2031_10: Atha naṃ mahāsīvatthero “vipassanā nāmesā na ādito subrūhitā balavatī tikkhā visadā hoti,
tika-s0201t:2032_4: Evaṃ vuttanti “sukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati dukkhā vedanā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2032_9: kadāci dukkhavedanā”ti pakkhadvayavasenapi vedanā cittassa pariyādāya hoti yathākkamaṃ abhāvitakāyassa abhāvitacittassa.
tika-s0201t:2033_1: Vipassanā ca sukhassa paccanīkāti sukkhavipassakassaādikammikassa mahābhūtapariggahādikāle bahi cittacāraṃ
tika-s0201t:2033_2: nisedhetvā kammaṭṭhāne eva satiṃ saṃharantassa aladdhassādaṃ kāyasukhaṃ na vindati,
tika-s0201t:2033_3: sambādhe vaje sanniruddho gogaṇo viya vihaññati vipphandati,
tika-s0201t:2033_7: Addhāne gacchante gacchanteti mahābhūtapariggahādivasena kāle gacchante.
tika-s0201t:2033_9: Dukkhaṃ dūrāpagataṃ hoti samāpattibalena vikkhambhitattā appanābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2033_14: Kāyapassaddhikammikassapi sammasanabhāvanā paṭṭhapetvā nisinnassa kassaci āditova kāyakilamathacittupaghātāpi sambhavanti,
tika-s0201t:2033_15: samādhissa pana apaccanīkattā siniddhabhāvato ca na sukkhavipassanā viya sukhassa vipaccanīko,
tika-s0201t:2033_16: anukkamena ca dukkhaṃ vikkhambhetīti āha “yathā samādhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2033_18: vipassanāya panetaṃ natthīti āha “na ca tathā vipassanā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2033_19: Tena vuttanti yasmā vipassanā sukhassa paccanīkā,
tika-s0201t:2033_21: tena vuttaṃ “uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0201t:2033_25: tena vuttaṃ “uppannāpi dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0201t:2034_1: Guṇe ghaṭṭetvāti apadesena vinā samīpameva netvā.
tika-s0201t:2034_2: Taṃ vata mama cittaṃ uppannā sukhā vedanā pariyādāya ṭhassatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:2035_2: sukhāpi dukkhāpi vedanā yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjatevāti attho.
tika-s0201t:2035_3: Tamatthanti sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ uppattiyā attano cittassa anabhibhavanīyatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2035_4: Tattha tāva pāsarāsisutte bodhipallaṅke nisajjā “tattheva nisīdi”nti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:2035_5: Idha mahāsaccakasutte dukkarakārikāya dukkaracaraṇe nisajjā “tattheva nisīdi”nti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:2038_8: ārakā udakā thale nikkhittabhāvo ca nidassito.
tika-s0201t:2039_2: yato evaṃ parehi cintitumpi asakkuṇeyyaṃ dukkaracariyaṃ chabbassāni akāsīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2039_4: “Yathāpi sabbesampi kho bodhisattānaṃ carimabhave antamaso sattāhamattampi dhammatāvasena dukkaracariyā hotiyeva,
tika-s0201t:2039_8: atha kho majjhimāya eva paṭipattiyā”ti tassā byatirekamukhena sadevakassa lokassa bodhāya amaggabhāvadīpanatthaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2039_9: imassa pana bhagavato kammavipākavasena chabbassāni dukkaracariyā ahosi.
tika-s0201t:2041_0: Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.
tika-s0201t:2046_0: Dukkaracariyāya bodhāya amaggabhāvadassanatthaṃ dukkaracariyaṃ akāsīti keci.
tika-s0201t:2046_1: Atha vā lokanāthassa attano parakkamasampattidassanatthāya dukkaracariyā.
tika-s0201t:2046_2: Paṇītādhimuttiyā hi paramukkaṃsagatabhāvato abhinīhārānurūpaṃ sambodhiyaṃ tibbachandatāya sikhāppattiyā
tika-s0201t:2046_3: tadatthaṃ īdisampi nāma dukkaracariyaṃ akāsīti loke attano vīriyānubhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ –
tika-s0201t:2046_4: “so ca me pacchā pītisomanassāvaho bhavissatī”ti lokanātho dukkaracariyaṃ akāsi.
tika-s0201t:2046_8: Saṅgāme dve tayo sampahāreti dvikkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ vā parasenāya pahārapayoge.
tika-s0201t:2047_3: So hi itaraṃ musalaṃ viya udukkhalaṃ visesato kassaci khādanakāle abhibhuyya vattati.
tika-s0201t:2048_1: Sīsaveṭhananti sīsaṃ rajjuyā bandhitvā daṇḍakena parivattakaveṭhanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2048_2: Arahanto nāma evarūpā hontīti iminā yathāyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2048_6: Supinappaṭiggahaṇato paṭṭhāyāti paṭisandhiggahaṇe setavāraṇasupinaṃ passitvā brāhmaṇehi byākatakālato paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0201t:2049_4: Ajajjitanti evaṃ abhuñjitaṃ bhakārassa jakārādesaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:2049_6: Evaṃ mā karitthāti “lomakūpehi ajjhohāressāma anuppavesessāmā”ti yathā tumhehi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2049_8: Yāpessāmahanti ahañca yāvadatthaṃ āhāramattaṃ bhuñjanto yathā yāpessāmi,
tika-s0201t:2050_2: na ito paraṃ opakkamikadukkhavedanāvediyanaṃ atthīti attho.
tika-s0201t:2050_3: Rañño gahetabbanaṅgalato aññāni sandhāya “ekena ūna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2050_8: ānāpānasamādhi pana kāyagatāsatipariyāpannattā sabbesañca bodhisattānaṃ vipassanāpādakattā “bodhāya maggo”ti vutto.
tika-s0201t:2050_12: Kassā pana satiyāti taṃ dassetuṃ “nayida”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2051_10: Bārāṇasimeva tatthāpi ca sabbabuddhānaṃ avijahitadhammacakkapavattanaṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu.
tika-s0201t:2052_2: no kāyabhāvana”nti imaṃ sandhāyāha “ekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi”nti.
tika-s0201t:2052_4: Asallīno taṇhādiṭṭhikilesānaṃ samucchinnattā tehi sabbaso na litto.
tika-s0201t:2052_8: Yaṃ sandhāya pāḷiyaṃ “purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte”ti vuttaṃ sannisīdāpemīti phalasamāpattisamādhinā accantasamādānavasena cittaṃ sammadeva nisīdāpemi.
tika-s0201t:2052_13: Evamassa paricchinnakālasamāpajjanaṃ yathāparicchinnakālaṃ vuṭṭhānañca buddhānaṃ na bhāriyaṃ vasībhāvassa
tika-s0201t:2052_16: Tadā hi desiyamānaṃ dhammaṃ upadhāretuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-s0201t:2052_17: tasmā tasmiṃ khaṇe desitadesanā niratthakā siyā.
tika-s0201t:2052_18: Na hi buddhānaṃ niratthakā kiriyā atthi.
tika-s0201t:2053_0: Okappanīyametanti “tassā eva kathāyā”tiādinā vuttaṃ ativiya acchariyagataṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ sutvā īdisī paṭipatti
tika-s0201t:2053_11: Arūpadhammatāya pañcaviññāṇānañceva kiriyāmayaviññāṇānañca appavattisaññitā avipphārikatā hoti,
tika-s0201t:2053_16: Taṃ sandhāyāti kāyassa darathasaṅkhātasarīragilānahetukaṃ niddaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0201t:2053_17: Sarīragilānañca bhagavato natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ “piṭṭhi me āgilāyatī”ti vacanato.
tika-s0201t:2053_18: Sammohavihārasminti paccatte etaṃ bhummavacananti āha “sammohavihāroti vadantī”ti,
tika-s0201t:2055_0: Gaṇaṃ vinodetvāti gaṇaṃ apanetvā gaṇapalibodhaṃ chinditvā.
tika-s0201t:2056_0: Sakalaṃ rattiṃ buddhaguṇānaṃyeva kathitattā therassa ñāṇaṃ desanāvibhavañca vibhāvento āha “ettakāva, bhante,
tika-s0201t:2056_2: tumhākaṃ dhammakathāya anavasesato buddhaguṇā kathitā viya jāyanti,
tika-s0201t:2056_4: kiṃ ito parepi vijjantevāti theraṃ tattha sīhanādaṃ nadāpetukāmo āha “udāhu aññepi atthī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2056_6: yathāvuttasubhāsitassa ca anagghattā vuttaṃ “ayaṃ me duggatapaṇṇākāro”ti.
tika-s0201t:2059_1: Tatrāti tasmiṃ pubbārāmamigāramātupāsādānaṃ atthavibhāvane ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā anupubbī kathā.
tika-s0201t:2059_2: Maṇīnanti ettha padumarāgamaṇīnaṃ adhippetattā āha “aññehi cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2060_0: Taṇhā sabbaso khīyanti etthāti taṇhāsaṅkhayo, tasmiṃ.
tika-s0201t:2060_1: Taṇhāsaṅkhayeti ca visaye idaṃ bhummanti āha “taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2060_4: sā sāsanacārigocarā paccattaṃ veditabbatoti āha “pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ saṃkhittena desethāti pucchatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2060_6: so eva aparihānasabhāvattā accantā niṭṭhā etassāti accantaniṭṭho.
tika-s0201t:2060_8: Na hi paṭividdhassa lokuttaradhammassa dassanaṃ kuppanaṃ nāma atthi.
tika-s0201t:2060_9: Accantameva catūhi yogehi khemo etassa atthīti accantayogakkhemī.
tika-s0201t:2060_11: tassa ca aparihānasabhāvattā accantaṃ brahmacārīti accantabrahmacārī.
tika-s0201t:2061_2: attanā yathā sutāya satthu desanāya anussaraṇavasena upadhāresi.
tika-s0201t:2062_1: Sakkāyasabbañhi sandhāya idha “sabbe dhammā”ti vuttaṃ vipassanāvisayassa adhippetattā,
tika-s0201t:2062_14: dukkhañca anattāti atthato) lakkhaṇattayaṃ supākaṭameva hotīti āha “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti ñātapariññāya abhijānātī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2062_15: Tatheva tīraṇapariññāyāti iminā aniccādibhāvena nālaṃ abhinivesāyāti nāmarūpassa upasaṃharati,
tika-s0201t:2062_17: Purimāya hi atthato āpannalakkhaṇattayaṃ gaṇhāti salakkhaṇasallakkhaṇaparattā tassā,
tika-s0201t:2062_23: bhavassādagadhitamānasatāya ca sakkassa vedanāvasena nibbattetvā dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2063_3: Tasmāti yasmā pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ khayato vayato dassanañāṇaṃ aniccānupassanā,
tika-s0201t:2063_6: Yaṃ āgamma sabbaso saṅkhārehi virajjanā hoti,
tika-s0201t:2063_9: “Eseva nayo”ti abhidisitvā taṃ ekadesena vivaranto “nirodhopi hi…pe…
tika-s0201t:2063_11: Sabbāsavasaṃvare vuttavossaggova idha “paṭinissaggo”ti vuttoti dassento “paṭinissaggo vuccati vossaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:2063_13: Pakkhandanavasena appanato pakkhandanavossaggo maggo aññassa tadabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2063_16: Evañhi maggato aññesaṃ nibbānārammaṇānaṃ pakkhandanavossaggābhāvo siddho hoti.
tika-s0201t:2063_17: Pariccajanena pakkhandanena cāti dvīhipi vā kāraṇehi.
tika-s0201t:2063_22: “Aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādivacanato yathā vipassanāya kilesānaṃ pariccāgapaṭinissaggo labbhati,
tika-s0201t:2063_23: evaṃ āyatiṃ tehi kilesehi uppādetabbakhandhānampi pariccāgapaṭinissaggo vattabbo,
tika-s0201t:2063_24: pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo pana magge labbhamānāya ekantakāraṇabhūtāya vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya vasena veditabbo,
tika-s0201t:2063_25: magge pana tadubhayampi ñāyāgatameva nippariyāyatova labbhamānattā.
tika-s0201t:2064_0: Pucchantassa ajjhāsayavasena “na kiñci loke upādiyatī”ti ettha kāmupādānavasena upādiyanaṃ paṭikkhipīyatīti āha “taṇhāvasena na upādiyatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2064_1: Taṇhāvasena vā asati upādiyane diṭṭhivasena upādiyanaṃ anavakāsamevāti “taṇhāvasena”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2064_4: Saṃkhitteneva khippaṃ kathesīti tassa ajjhāsayavasena papañcaṃ akatvā kathesi.
tika-s0201t:2065_1: Abhisamāgantvāti abhimukhañāṇena ñeyyaṃ samāgantvā yāthāvato viditvā.
tika-s0201t:2065_6: Mā niratthakā agamāsīti idaṃ dhammatāvasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2066_16: Evaṃbhūto ca yasmā tehi upaṭṭhito samannāgato nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:2066_22: Tattha tato tatoti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vādite tattha tattha ca vādakajane.
tika-s0201t:2067_3: mayaṃ sakena karaṇīyena appeva bahukiccāpi na homa.
tika-s0201t:2067_4: Apica devānaṃyevāti apica kho pana devānaṃyeva tāvatiṃsānaṃ karaṇīyena visesato bahukiccāti atthayojanā.
tika-s0201t:2067_5: Bhummaṭṭhakadevatānampi keci aṭṭā sakkena vinicchitabbā hontīti āha “pathavito paṭṭhāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2067_7: Taṃ pana karaṇīyaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “devānaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2069_1: Evaṃbhūto ca yasmā samūhavasena sampiṇḍito hoti,
tika-s0201t:2069_3: Anantare attabhāveti idaṃ dutiyaṃ sakkattabhāvaṃ tato anantarātītena sakkattabhāvena sakkattabhāvasāmaññato ekamiva katvā gahaṇavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2069_6: Atha vā yasmiṃ attabhāve so devāsurasaṅgāmo ahosi,
tika-s0201t:2069_8: Sattānaṃ hitesitāya mātāpituupaṭṭhānādinā cariyāhi bodhisattacariyā viyassa cariyā ahosi.
tika-s0201t:2070_5: Pañcasu ṭhānesūti pañcasu paribhaṇḍaṭṭhānesu nāgasenādīhi ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
tika-s0201t:2071_4: suvaṇṇatthambhesu rajatamaye”tiādinā suvaṇṇādimaye ghaṭake vāḷarūpakāni ca.
tika-s0201t:2072_1: tasmā sañjātaṃ acchariyabbhutaṃ vimhayanākāro etesanti sañjātaacchariyaabbhutā,
tika-s0201t:2072_5: Svāyaṃ saṃvego yasmā purimāvatthāya cittassa calanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:2073_1: Tamaṃ vinoditanti pāṭihāriyadassanena “aho therassa iddhānubhāvo”ti sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ sañjātabahumāno,
tika-s0201t:2073_2: īdisaṃ nāma sāsanaṃ labhitvāpi mayaṃ niratthakena bhogamadena sammattā bhavāmāti yoniso manasikāruppādanena sammohatamaṃ vinoditaṃ vidhamitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2073_3: Eteti mahāthero sakko cāti te dvepi samānabrahmacariyatāya sabrahmacārino.
tika-s0201t:2077_7: Tattha tatthevāti tesu tesu eva bhavesu nirujjhanti,
tika-s0201t:2077_12: Sandhāvatīti niccatāya kenaci asambaddhaṃ viya gacchati.
tika-s0201t:2078_0: “Paccaye sati bhavatī”tiādinā viññāṇassa anvayato byatirekato ca paṭiccasamuppannabhāvaṃ dassento sassatabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0201t:2078_1: Buddhena akathitaṃ kathesīti iminā “yaṃ abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena,
tika-s0201t:2078_2: taṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpetī”ti imasmiṃ bhedakaravatthusmiṃ sandissatīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2078_7: anicca”nti ca ādinayappavatte satthu dhammacakke khīlaṃ uppādento pahāraṃ deti.
tika-s0201t:2078_8: Sabbaññutaññāṇena aniccanti diṭṭhaṃ paveditañca viññāṇaṃ niccanti paṭijānanto vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhati.
tika-s0201t:2078_9: Sotukāmaṃ jananti ariyadhammādhigamassa ekantaupāyabhūtaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ sotukāmaṃ janaṃ niccaggāhapaggaṇhanena visaṃvādeti.
tika-s0201t:2078_10: Tato eva ariyapathe ariyadhammavīthiyaṃ tassā paṭikkhipanena tiriyaṃ nipatitvā.
tika-s0201t:2079_3: Tattha vado vedeyyotiādayo sassatadiṭṭhiyā eva abhinivesākārā.
tika-s0201t:2079_6: Iminā hi kārakabhāvupāyikasattānaṃ hitasukhāvabodhanasamatthataṃ attano dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2079_9: Īdisānañhi padānaṃ bahulā kattusādhanataṃ saddavidū maññanti.
tika-s0201t:2080_1: Taṃ vādaṃ paggayha ṭhitattā sātissa chinnapaccayatā aviruḷhadhammatā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:2080_4: Pāṭiyekko anusandhīti tīhipi anusandhīhi avomisso visuṃyeveko anusandhi.
tika-s0201t:2080_5: Nanu cāyampi sātissa ajjhāsayavasena pavattitattā ajjhāsayānusandhiyevāti? Na,
tika-s0201t:2080_7: Niyyānañhi purakkhatvā pucchādivasena pavattā itarā desanāpucchānusandhiādayo.
tika-s0201t:2080_9: Parisāya laddhiṃ sodhentoti yādisī sātissa laddhi,
tika-s0201t:2080_11: parisāya laddhisodhaneneva sāti gaṇato nissārito nāma jāto.
tika-s0201t:2081_1: Yaṃ yadevāti idaṃ yadipi avisesato paccayadhammaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2081_2: “viññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”ti pana vuttattā taṃtaṃviññāṇassa samaññānimittapaccayajātaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2081_5: Atha vā taṃtaṃdvāraniyataṃ itarampi sabbaṃ tassa tassa viññāṇassa paccayajātaṃ idha “yaṃ yadevā”ti gahitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2081_9: Svāyaṃ oḷārikanayena mandabuddhīnaṃ sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ nayadassanavasena vutto.
tika-s0201t:2081_10: Na hi kadāci paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ vigacchantaṃ anantaraviññāṇaṃ saṅkamati anantarādipaccayālābhe tassa anuppajjanato.
tika-s0201t:2082_0: Evamevāti yathā aggi upādānaṃ paṭicca jalanto anupādāno tattheva nibbāyati,
tika-s0201t:2082_3: na hettha anuppādanirodho icchito tādisassa nirodhassa idha anadhippetattā,
tika-s0201t:2082_7: taṃtaṃdvārikassa pana viññāṇassa dvārantaraṃ asaṅkamitvā tattha tattheva nirujjhanaṃ idhādhippetaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2082_10: tasmā paccayavekallena na sotādīni saṅkamitvā sotaviññāṇantiādi saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:2082_11: Etena yaṃ viññāṇaṃ cakkhurūpādipaccayasāmaggiyā vasena cakkhuviññāṇasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0201t:2082_14: evamappavattito tassa kuto saṅkamoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:2082_16: Dvārasaṅkantimattanti dvārantarasaṅkamanamattampi na vadāmi tattha tattheva bhijjanato paccayassa uppādavantato
tika-s0201t:2082_17: sati ca uppāde avassaṃbhāvī nirodhoti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccatā dīpitā hotīti.
tika-s0201t:2083_2: aññatra paccayā natthi viññāṇassa sambhavo”ti pāḷiyā anvayato ca byatirekato ca viññāṇassa saṅkhatatāva dassitāti āha “sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassetvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2083_4: taṃ atthato pañcakkhandhā tabbinimuttassa sappaccayassa abhāvato,
tika-s0201t:2083_11: Tassa paccayassa nirodhāti yena avijjādinā paccayena khandhapañcakaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0201t:2084_0: Nossūti saṃsayajotano nipātoti āha “bhūtaṃ nu kho idaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2084_2: Bhūtamidaṃ nossūti ca iminā khandhapañcakameva nu kho idaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2084_4: Tadāhārasambhavaṃ nossūti pana iminā sahetukaṃ nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2084_5: udāhu ahetukanti yathā ahetukabhāvāpanno saṃsayanākāro gahito,
tika-s0201t:2084_9: Nirodhadhammaṃ nossūti iminā yathā aniccaṃ nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2084_10: udāhu niccanti aniccataṃ paṭicca saṃsayanākāro gahito,
tika-s0201t:2084_14: udāhu na anattātipi saṃsayanākāro gahitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ aniccassa dukkhabhāvādiavassaṃbhāvato,
tika-s0201t:2084_18: Vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtāpi paññā vipassanā evāti vuttaṃ “vipassanāpaññāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2084_23: Ye yeti tassaṃ parisāyaṃ ye ye bhikkhū.
tika-s0201t:2085_6: sāti pana moghapuriso attabhāvepi taṇhāsaṃvaddhaniṃ viparītadiṭṭhiṃ paggayha tiṭṭhatī”ti sātiṃ niggaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:2085_8: Paccayadassanenāti kāraṇadassanena anavasesato hetuno paccayassa ca dassanena.
tika-s0201t:2085_13: Dhanaṃ viya icchantāti dhanaṃ viya drabyaṃ viya icchaṃ taṇhaṃ janentā.
tika-s0201t:2085_17: tassa vā saṇhasukhumassa vipassanādhammassa gahaṇaṃ nāma nikantiyā eva siyā,
tika-s0201t:2086_3: Yāva avijjā hi sabbo nesaṃ kāraṇaviseso idha dassito.
tika-s0201t:2086_5: antato paṭṭhāya yāva ādīti anulomato paṭilomato ca vaṭṭavivaṭṭadassanavasena nānānayehi paṭiccasamuppādo dassito,
tika-s0201t:2086_6: niccaggāhassa nimittabhūto kilesopi idha natthīti dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:2086_11: Sesaṃ paṭiccasamuppādakathābhāvato visuddhimagge vitthāritāvāti imināva saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2087_1: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotītiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2088_2: pubbe attano āgataṃ atītaṃ addhānaṃ uddissa taṇhādiṭṭhivasena paṭigamananti attho.
tika-s0201t:2089_11: Evaṃ nissaṭṭhānīti yathā mayā tumhākaṃ ovādo dinno,
tika-s0201t:2089_12: evaṃ nissaṭṭhāni vatādīni taṃ atikkamitvā kiṃ gaṇheyyātha.
tika-s0201t:2089_13: Sayaṃ ñāṇena ñātanti paraneyyataṃ muñcitvā attano eva ñāṇena yāthāvato ñātaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2089_14: Evaṃbhūtañca sayaṃ paccakkhato diṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti āha “sayaṃ paññācakkhunā diṭṭha”nti.
tika-s0201t:2089_15: Sayaṃ vibhāvitanti tehi bhikkhūhi tassa atthassa paccattaṃ vibhūtabhāvaṃ āpāditaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2090_5: tannissitattā pana sattasantāno “gabbho”ti vutto yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2090_8: Yathā hi nivāsaṭṭhānatāya sattānaṃ ovarako “gabbho”ti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:2090_9: evaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ yāva abhijāti nivāsaṭṭhānatāya mātukucchi “gabbho”ti vuttoti.
tika-s0201t:2091_6: Yebhuyyena sattā rattiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti rattiggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2091_8: abhimukhabhāvena vā uṭṭhito eva maraṇassāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2091_9: So yātīti so māṇavo yāti paṭhamakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya gacchateva.
tika-s0201t:2091_10: Sa gacchaṃ na nivattatīti so evaṃ gacchanto khaṇamattampi na nivattati,
tika-s0201t:2092_2: Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “mātugāmassa kira yasmi”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2092_7: Vatthu suddhaṃ hotīti paggharitalohitattā anāmayattā ca gabbhāsayo suddho hoti.
tika-s0201t:2092_8: Suddhavatthuttā tato paraṃ katipayadivasāni khettameva hoti gabbhasaṇṭhahanassa parittassa lohitalesassa vijjamānattā.
tika-s0201t:2092_9: Sambhavassa pana kathaṃ sabbhāvoti āha “tasmiṃ samaye”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2092_14: Gandhabboti gandhanato uppajjanagatiyā nimittupaṭṭhāpanena sūcanato gandhoti laddhanāmena bhavagāmikammunā abbati pavattatīti gandhabbo,
tika-s0201t:2092_17: Kammayantayantitoti tatrūpapattiāvahena kammasaṅkhātena pellanakayantena tathattāya pellito upanīto.
tika-s0201t:2092_19: na nu kho jīvissāmi ahaṃ vā,
tika-s0201t:2092_20: putto vā me”ti evaṃ pavattena jīvitasaṃsayena vipulena garutarena saṃsayena.
tika-s0201t:2093_10: Taṇhāvasena abhinandatīti sappītikataṇhāvasena abhimukhaṃ hutvā nandati.
tika-s0201t:2093_11: Abhivadatīti taṇhāvasena taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhinivissa vadati.
tika-s0201t:2093_12: Ajjhosāyāti anaññasādhāraṇaṃ viya ārammaṇaṃ taṇhāvasena anupavisitvā.
tika-s0201t:2093_14: Dukkhaṃ kathaṃ abhinandatīti ettha dukkhahetukaṃ abhinandanto dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2093_15: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yāvatā yassa dukkhe diṭṭhitaṇhā abhinandanā appahīnā,
tika-s0201t:2093_16: tāvatāyaṃ dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāmāti dassetuṃ “ahaṃ dukkhito mama dukkhanti gaṇhanto abhinandati nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2093_20: “Gabbhassāvakkanti hotī”tiādinā atthato sarūpato ca etarahi phalasaṅkhepassa.
tika-s0201t:2094_1: Samathayānikassa bhikkhuno vedanāmukhena saṅkhepeneva yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ idha kathitanti āha “saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ dhārethā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2094_2: “Imaṃ taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutti”nti ca bhagavā yathādesitaṃ desanaṃ avocāti vuttaṃ “imaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:2094_4: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ desanā vimuttīti āha “desanā hi…pe…
tika-s0201t:2094_6: Yassā taṇhāya vasena sāti bhikkhu sassataggāhamahāsaṅghāṭapaṭimukko,
tika-s0201t:2094_7: sā sabbabuddhānaṃ desanā hatthāvalambamānepi durugghāṭiyā jātāti āha “mahātaṇhājālataṇhāsaṅghāṭapaṭimukka”nti.
tika-s0201t:2094_10: Tathābhūto ca tassa abbhantare kato nāma hotīti āha “anupaviṭṭho antogadho”ti.
tika-s0201t:2097_2: janapadassa vā issarā rājakumārā gottavasena aṅgā nāma.
tika-s0201t:2097_5: Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya saliṅgavacanāni (pāṇini 1.2.51) icchanti.
tika-s0201t:2097_11: tāni sundarāni tattha santīti “assapura”nti so nigamo vuttoti kecī.
tika-s0201t:2097_12: Apare pana ājānīyo asso rañño tattha gahaṇaṃ upagatoti “assapura”nti vuttoti vadanti. Kiṃ tehi,
tika-s0201t:2097_14: Yasmā pana tattha bhagavato nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānaṃ kiñci nāhosi,
tika-s0201t:2097_16: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “assapuraṃ nāma aṅgānaṃ nigamo”ti gocaragāmakittanameva kataṃ.
tika-s0201t:2098_8: Bhikkhusaṅghasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathentīti idaṃ tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ yebhuyyena bhikkhūnaṃ guṇakittanapasutatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2098_9: Te pana saddhammepi sammāsambuddhepi abhippasannā eva.
tika-s0201t:2098_11: Vatthuttaye hi ekasmiṃ abhippasannā itaradvaye abhippasannā eva tadavinābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2098_14: Paccayadāyakānañhi kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇaṃ idha “piṇḍapātāpacāyana”nti adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2099_2: Te pana ekantato attano santāne uppāditā vaḍḍhitā ca hontīti āha “samādāya paripūritā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2099_13: Tathā hi tesaṃ samaṇabhāvāvahataṃ sandhāyāha “tepi ca samaṇakaraṇā hontiyevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2099_22: taṃ pana ukkaṭṭhaniddesena catubbidhaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2100_1: Yaṃ hirīyatīti yena dhammena hetubhūtena vā jigucchati.
tika-s0201t:2100_8: Ajjhattaṃ niyakajjhattaṃ jātiādi samuṭṭhānaṃ etissāti ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī,
tika-s0201t:2100_9: bahiddhā attato bahibhūto parasatto samuṭṭhānaṃ etissāti bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2100_13: Sappatissavalakkhaṇattā garunā kismiñci vutte gāravavasena patissavanaṃ patissavo,
tika-s0201t:2100_16: Jātiādimahattatāpaccavekkhaṇena uppajjamānā ca hirī tattha gāravavasena pavattatīti sappatissavalakkhaṇāti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:2100_18: vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇattā vajjaṃ bhāyati taṃ bhayato passatīti vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvī,
tika-s0201t:2100_20: Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā ca hirottappānaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭabhāveneva vuccati,
tika-s0201t:2102_1: avayavena ca samudāyassa apadisitabbato ovādūpasampadāvahaovādekadeso ovādūpasampadāti.
tika-s0201t:2102_4: Samaṇadhammā nāmāti dassitā mūlabhūtasamaṇabhāvakarā dhammāti katvā.
tika-s0201t:2103_0: Yassa adhigamena nippariyāyato samaṇā nāma honti,
tika-s0201t:2103_1: so ariyamaggo “samaṇassa kammaṃ paṭipadā”ti katvā sāmaññaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2103_11: phalanti āha “maggampi phalampi ekato katvā sāmaññattho kathito”ti.
tika-s0201t:2104_2: tato tādisampi akusalakammaṃ bhikkhussa kātuṃ na yuttanti duṭṭhullabhāveneva tato oramatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2104_4: Pānīyaghaṭe vā patte vā kākānaṃ hatthaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā leḍḍuṃ vāti sabbamidaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2104_5: Yattha katthaci hi ṭhitānaṃ aññesampi pāṇīnaṃ uṭṭhāpanādi sabbaṃ aniṭṭhakaraṇaṃ idha aparisuddhakāyasamācārabhāveneva saṅgahitanti.
tika-s0201t:2104_7: Evaṃbhūto ca kenaci anuppādabhūmiyaṃ sañjātasālakalyāṇīkhandho viya uparūpari uggatuggato pākaṭo ca hotīti āha “uggato pākaṭo”ti.
tika-s0201t:2105_1: Ettha yathā lahukataraṃ kākuṭṭhāpanādikāyakammaṃ kāyasamācārassa aparisuddhabhāvāvahaṃ sallekhavikopanato,
tika-s0201t:2105_3: evaṃ yaṃ kiñci aniyyānakathākathanamattaṃ vacīsamācārassa aparisuddhabhāvāvahaṃ sallekhavikopanato,
tika-s0201t:2106_2: So pana atioḷāriko kāyavacīsamācāravāresu vuttanayo evāti na gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2106_3: Ye pana “tādiso bhikkhūnaṃ ayogyato na gahito”ti vadanti,
tika-s0201t:2106_4: taṃ micchā tathā sati kāyavacīsamācāravārepi tassa aggahetabbabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0201t:2107_1: Anesanaṃ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye pariyesanto pariyesanamattaññū nāma.
tika-s0201t:2107_2: Dāyakassa deyyadhammassa attano ca pamāṇaññutāpaṭiggaṇhanto paṭiggahaṇamattaññū nāma.
tika-s0201t:2108_3: Dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi dakkhiṇahatthassa sarīraggahaṇādipayogakkhamato.
tika-s0201t:2109_1: Bhīrukā hi sesamigā attano āsayaṃ pavisitvā santāsapubbakaṃ yathā tathā sayanti,
tika-s0201t:2109_2: sīho pana abhīrukabhāvato satokārī bhikkhu viya satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva sayati.
tika-s0201t:2109_8: Tattha hi ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavā anukkamena aggamaggaṃ adhigato tathāgato jātoti keci,
tika-s0201t:2109_10: Apare pana “catutthajjhānasamanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyī”ti vuttapadaṃ gahetvā “lokiyacatutthajjhānasamāpatti tathāgataseyyā”ti vadanti,
tika-s0201t:2109_12: na ca bhagavā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjanabahulo vihāsi,
tika-s0201t:2109_14: Tattha yathā sattānaṃ niddupagamanalakkhaṇā seyyā bhavaṅgacittavāravasena hoti,
tika-s0201t:2109_16: evaṃ bhagavato ariyajātisamanvayaṃ yebhuyyavuttikaṃ aggaphalabhūtaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ “tathāgataseyyā”ti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2110_0: 426. Vigatantānīti iṇamūlāni. Tesanti iṇamūlānaṃ. Pariyantoti avaseso.
tika-s0201t:2111_8: Sesanti “tassa hi bandhanā muttomhīti āvajjayato tadubhayaṃ hotī”tiādinā vattabbaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0201t:2111_10: Yenakāmaṃ yathāruci gacchatīti yenakāmaṃgamoti anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā niddeso.
tika-s0201t:2111_11: Bhujo attano yathāsukhaviniyogo isso icchitabbo etthāti bhujisso, sāmiko.
tika-s0201t:2111_13: Dullabhaāpatāya kaṃ tārenti etthāti kantāroti āha “nirudakaṃ dīghamagga”nti.
tika-s0201t:2112_0: Vināsetīti khādanadubbiniyojanādīhi yathā iṇamūlaṃ kiñci na hoti,
tika-s0201t:2114_5: evaṃ vipassanāmaggaphalānīti neva tassa dhammassavanassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ jānāti.
tika-s0201t:2114_7: Aho kāraṇanti tattha tattha paṭiññānurūpena nikkhittasādhanavasena gahitakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2114_8: Aho upamāti tasseva kāraṇassa patiṭṭhāpanavasena anvayato byatirekato ca patiṭṭhaṃ udāharaṇādi.
tika-s0201t:2114_9: Bandhanāgāraṃ viya thinamiddhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ dukkhato niyyānassa vibandhanato.
tika-s0201t:2116_0: Soḷasavatthukā vicikicchā aṭṭhavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ anupaviṭṭhāti āha “aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vicikicchā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2116_8: ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitabhāvena chambhitaṃ hoti cittaṃ yassa dhammassa vasena,
tika-s0201t:2116_11: Kantāraddhānamaggo viyāti sāsaṅkakantāraddhānamaggo viya daṭṭhabbā appaṭipattihetubhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2117_9: Cha dhamme bhāvetvāti asubhanimittaggāhādike cha dhamme uppādetvā vaḍḍhetvā.
tika-s0201t:2117_10: Cha dhamme bhāvetvāti ca mettānimittaggāhādayo ca tattha tattha cha dhammāti vuttāti veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:2119_0: Bandhanā mokkhamiva thinamiddhappahānaṃ āha cittassa niggahitabhāvāvahato.
tika-s0201t:2120_0: Bhujissaṃ viya uddhaccakukkuccappahānaṃ āha cittassa seribhāvāvahato.
tika-s0201t:2121_2: Khemantabhūmiṃ viya vicikicchāpahānaṃ āha anussaṅkitāparisaṅkitabhāvena sammāpaṭipattihetubhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2122_4: Mātuyā hi sarīrasaṇṭhāpanavasena karato jātoti karajoti apare.
tika-s0201t:2122_10: Pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpehi sakalassa karajakāyassa pariphuṭatāya cettha taṃsamuṭṭhāpakapītisukhānaṃ sabbattha pavatti jotitā.
tika-s0201t:2122_13: sabbattha pavattapītisukhaṃ karotī”tiādinā yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:2122_14: Paripūretīti vāyunā bhastaṃ viya imaṃ karajakāyaṃ pītisukhena pūreti.
tika-s0201t:2122_15: Samantato phusatīti imaṃ karajakāyaṃ pītisukhena phusati.
tika-s0201t:2122_21: Aphuṭaṃ nāma na hoti pītisukhasamuṭṭhānehi rūpehi sabbatthakameva byāpitattā.
tika-s0201t:2122_22: Kātuñceva yojetuñca cheko sannetuṃ paṭibaloti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:2122_23: Nhānīyacuṇṇānaṃ parimaddanavasena piṇḍaṃ karontena hatthena bhājanaṃ nippīḷetabbaṃ hotīti āha “sannentassa bhijjatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2122_26: Tintabhāveneva samaṃ antaraṃ bāhirañca etissāti santarabāhirā.
tika-s0201t:2122_28: Na ca pagghariṇī pamāṇayuttasseva udakassa sittattā.
tika-s0201t:2122_30: taṃ temetvā sampiṇḍitapamāṇayuttaudakaṃ viya paṭhamajjhānasukhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2123_1: Heṭṭhā ubbhijjitvā uggacchanaudakoti rahadassa adhothūladhārāvasena ubbhijja uṭṭhahanaudako.
tika-s0201t:2123_2: Antoyeva ubbhijjanaudakoti rahadassa abbhantareyeva thūladhārā ahutvā uṭṭhitaudakasirāmukhehi ubbhijjanako.
tika-s0201t:2124_7: udakaṃ viya tatiyajjhānasukhanti ayampi attho “purimanayenā”ti atideseneva vibhāvitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2125_2: Amalīnampi kiñci vatthu pabhassarasabhāvaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “pabhassaraṭṭhenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2125_4: Sabbatthakameva jhānasukhena phuṭṭho karajakāyo yathā utunā phuṭṭhavatthasadisoti āha “vatthaṃ viya karajakāyo”ti.
tika-s0201t:2125_6: karajakāyassa vatthasadisattā catutthajjhānasukhassa ca utupharaṇasadisattāti attho.
tika-s0201t:2125_7: Santasabhāvattā ñāṇuttarattā cettha upekkhāpi sukhe saṅgahitāti catutthajjhānepi sukhaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0201t:2125_8: “Parisuddhena pariyodātena pharitvā nisinno hotī”ti vacanato catutthajjhānacittassa vatthasadisatā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:2125_9: Catutthajjhānasamuṭṭhānarūpehi bhikkhuno kāyassa phuṭabhāvaṃ sandhāya “taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ utupharaṇaṃ viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2125_10: Purisassa kāyo viya bhikkhuno karajakāyoti ayaṃ panattho pākaṭoti na gahito,
tika-s0201t:2126_2: Taṃdivasaṃkatakiriyāgahaṇaṃ pākatikasattassapi yebhuyyena pākaṭā hotīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2126_3: Taṃdivasagatagāmattayaggahaṇeneva mahābhinīhārehi aññesampi pubbenivāsañāṇalābhīnaṃ tīsu bhavesu katā
tika-s0201t:2126_4: kiriyā yebhuyyena pākaṭā hotīti dīpitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2127_2: Aparāparaṃ sañcaranteti taṃtaṃkiccavasena ito cito ca sañcarante.
tika-s0201t:2127_5: Dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare ṭhatvāti dvinnaṃ gehadvārānaṃ sammukhaṭṭhānabhūte antaravīthiyaṃ vemajjhe ṭhatvā.
tika-s0201t:2127_6: Tesu hi ekassa ce pācīnamukhadvāraṃ itarassa pacchimamukhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2127_7: tassa sammukhaṃ ubhinnaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitassa dakkhiṇāmukhassa,
tika-s0201t:2127_8: uttarāmukhassa vā cakkhumato purisassa tattha pavisanakanikkhamanakapurisā yathā sukheneva pākaṭā honti,
tika-s0201t:2127_10: Yathā pana tassa purisassa aññeneva khaṇena pavisantassa dassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2127_12: evaṃ imassapi aññeneva khaṇena cavamānassa dassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2128_1: Pabbatasikharaṃ yebhuyyena saṃkhittaṃ saṅkucitaṃ hotīti idha pabbatamatthakaṃ “pabbatasaṅkhepo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2128_4: Sā cassa anāvilatā kaddamābhāvena hotīti āha “nikkaddamo”ti.
tika-s0201t:2128_7: Itarā ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi carantīti vuccanti sahacaraṇañāyena.
tika-s0201t:2128_10: Dvayanti sippisammukaṃ macchagumbanti imaṃ ubhayaṃ tiṭṭhantanti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2129_3: Tattha ariyamaggena sabbaso pāpānaṃ samitāvīti samaṇo.
tika-s0201t:2129_16: mariyādavasena kilesānaṃ hiṃsitattā ariyamaggehi odhiso sabbaso kilesānaṃ samucchinnattāti attho.
tika-s0201t:2129_21: kilesānaṃ ārakattā hatattā dūrībhūtattā ca ariyo,
tika-s0201t:2132_1: Purimasadisamevāti “assapuravāsīnaṃ bhikkhusaṅghe gāravabahumānaṃ nipaccakārañca disvā bhikkhū piṇḍapātāpacāyane
tika-s0201t:2132_2: niyojento idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsī”ti purimasutte mahāassapure vuttasadisameva.
tika-s0201t:2132_3: Samaṇānaṃ anucchavikāti samaṇānaṃ samaṇabhāvassa anucchavikā patirūpā.
tika-s0201t:2132_4: Samaṇānaṃ anulomappaṭipadāti samaṇānaṃ sāmaññasaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa anukūlappaṭipadā.
tika-s0201t:2133_1: Ete dhammāti ete pāḷiyaṃ āgatā abhijjhābyāpādādayo pāpadhammā.
tika-s0201t:2133_21: Koñcasakuṇānaṃ kira kucchiyaṃ nivutthaṃ yaṃ kiñci kharaṃ tikhiṇañca hoti.
tika-s0201t:2133_22: Tathā hi tesaṃ vaccaṃ aṭṭhimpi pāsāṇampi vilīyāpeti.
