tika-s0201t:2133_24: Taṃ kira ayacuṇṇaṃ aggināpi kicchena dayhati,
tika-s0201t:2133_26: Tena vuttaṃ “susikkhitā ca naṃ ayakārā bahuhatthakammamūlaṃ labhitvā karontī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2133_28: aññataraṃ ayobandhanaṃ pheggudaṇḍaṃ viya sukheneva chindanti.
tika-s0201t:2133_29: Sasabiḷāracammehi saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena saṅghāṭīti vuccati āvudhaparicchadoti āha “saṅghāṭiyāti kosiyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2134_3: Rajojallañca vatasamādānavasena anapanītaṃ etassa atthīti rajojalliko, tassa.
tika-s0201t:2134_8: tasmā saṅghāṭikassāti pilotikakhaṇḍehi saṅghaṭitattā “saṅghāṭī”ti laddhanāmavatthadhārinoti attho.
tika-s0201t:2134_12: Kasmā panettha bhagavatā saṅghāṭikattādīniyeva vatasamādānāni paṭikkhittānīti?
tika-s0201t:2134_16: saṅghāṭikassa saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena sāmaññaṃ vadāmī”ti vutte tattha nisinno koci titthantaraladdhiko acelakattaṃ nu kho kathanti cintesi,
tika-s0201t:2134_18: evaṃ taṃ taṃ cintentānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena bhagavā imāneva vatasamādānāni idha paṭikkhipīti.
tika-s0201t:2135_2: Maggena asamucchinnattā visuddhoti pana na vattabbo.
tika-s0201t:2135_4: Tassa hi attano sammāpaṭipattiyā kilesānaṃ vikkhambhitattā cittassa visuddhataṃ passantassa pāmojjaṃ jāyati,
tika-s0201t:2135_8: Nāmakāyo passambhatīti iminā ubhayampi passaddhiṃ vadati.
tika-s0201t:2135_10: Idāni tena nīvaraṇehi cittassa visodhanattaṃ laddhanti āha “appanāppattaṃ viya hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2135_11: Aññattha uṭṭhitā aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatāti ettakena upamābhāvena uccanīcatāsāmaññena heṭṭhā asaddhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:2135_19: Yathā hi puratthimādidisāhi āgatā purisā taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ āgamma visuddharūpakāyā vigatapariḷāhā ca honti,
tika-s0201t:2135_20: evaṃ khattiyādikulato āgatā tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ sāsanaṃ āgamma visuddhanāmakāyā vigatakilesapariḷāhā ca honti.
tika-s0201t:2142_1: Mahājanakāye sannipatiteti keci “pahaṃsanavidhiṃ dassetvā rājakumāraṃ hāsessāmā”ti,
tika-s0201t:2142_2: keci “taṃ kīḷanaṃ passissāmā”ti evaṃ mahājanasamūhe sannipatite.
tika-s0201t:2142_5: Āma kusala”nti vacanapaṭivacanavasena pavattakusalavāditāya te manussā ādito kusalāti samaññaṃ labhiṃsu.
tika-s0201t:2143_1: tadavasarī”ti vacanato visesaṃ niviṭṭhamevāti āha “aturitacārikaṃ caramāno”ti.
tika-s0201t:2143_5: keci sīlasamādhipaññāsampannāti guṇamahattenapi so bhikkhusamūho mahāti.
tika-s0201t:2143_12: Aniyamitoti asukasmiṃ ārāme pabbate rukkhamūle vāti na niyamito,
tika-s0201t:2144_2: Avadhāraṇaphalattā sabbampi vākyaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇanti āha “padapūraṇamatte vā nipāto”ti.
tika-s0201t:2144_6: sadde gahite tena phullitamaṇḍitavibhūsitaṃ viya hontaṃ pūritaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:2144_8: na tasmiṃ aggahiteti āha “padapūraṇena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāmattamevā”ti. Matta-
tika-s0201t:2144_12: Sālāyaṃ jātā saṃvaḍḍhakā sāleyyakā yathā “katteyyakā ubbheyyakā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2145_1: Evañhi bāhirakavītarāgasekkhāsekkhapāpasamanato bhagavato pāpasamanaṃ visesitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:2145_2: Anekatthattā nipātānaṃ idha anussavattho adhippetoti āha “khalūti anussavanatthe nipāto”ti.
tika-s0201t:2145_6: Gotamoti hi pavattamānaṃ abhidhānaṃ buddhiñca ekaṃsikavisayatāya tāyati rakkhatīti gotamagottaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2145_7: Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati,
tika-s0201t:2145_9: tasmā so tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:2145_10: So pana atthato aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2145_12: Sabbakhattiyānañhi ādibhūtamahāsammatamahārājato paṭṭhāya asambhinnaṃ uḷāratamaṃ sakyarājakulaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2145_13: Kenaci pārijuññenāti ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā kenacipi pārijuññena parihāniyā anabhibhūto anajjhotthaṭo.
tika-s0201t:2145_14: Tathā hi kadācipi tassa kulassa tādisapārijuññābhāvo,
tika-s0201t:2145_15: abhinikkhamanakāle ca tato samiddhatamabhāvo loke pākaṭo paññātoti.
tika-s0201t:2145_16: Sakyakulā pabbajitoti idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavato saddhāpabbajitabhāvadīpanaṃ vuttaṃ mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ
tika-s0201t:2145_18: Ettha ca samaṇoti iminā parikkhakajanehi bhagavato bahumatabhāvo dassito samitapāpatādīpanato,
tika-s0201t:2146_2: taṃyogato pana “bhavantaṃ gotama”nti upayogavacanaṃ sāmiatthepi samānaṃ itthambhūtayogadīpanato “itthambhūtākhyānatthe”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2146_3: Tenāha “tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho”ti.
tika-s0201t:2146_7: Seṭṭhoti etthāpi eseva nayo yathā “bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭha”nti.
tika-s0201t:2146_8: “Bhagavā araha”ntiādinā guṇānaṃ saṃkittanato saṃsaddanato ca kittisaddo vaṇṇoti āha “kittiyevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2146_10: saddo yathā taṃ “uḷārasaddā isayo guṇavanto tapassino”ti.
tika-s0201t:2147_0: So bhagavāti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho
tika-s0201t:2147_1: devānaṃ atidevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi bhagavāti
tika-s0201t:2147_5: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kata”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:2147_7: Evaṃ “araha”ntiādīhi padehi ye sadevake loke ativiya paññātā buddhaguṇā,
tika-s0201t:2147_8: te nānappakārato vibhāvitāti dassetuṃ paccekaṃ itipi-
tika-s0201t:2147_13: itipetaṃ taccha”ntiādīsu viya hi idha iti-
tika-s0201t:2147_15: saddo sampiṇḍanattho tena tesaṃ guṇānaṃ bahubhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0201t:2147_16: Tāni guṇasallakkhaṇakāraṇāni saddhāsampannānaṃ viññujātikānaṃ paccakkhāni evāti dassento “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2147_20: Tato eva taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto “ārakāti arahaṃ suvidūrabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:2147_25: pāsaṃsabhāvato vā araha”ntiādinā “araha”ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho vitthārato veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:2150_0: Ārakā tehi bhagavā, dūre tenārahaṃ mato.
tika-s0201t:2152_0: Bhagavā tehi āsanno, tenāpi arahaṃ jino.
tika-s0201t:2154_0: Tesaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā, bhagavā arahaṃ mato.
tika-s0201t:2156_0: Na tehi rahito hoti, nātho tenārahaṃ mato.
tika-s0201t:2157_0: Raho vā gamanaṃ yassa, saṃsāre natthi sabbaso;
tika-s0201t:2159_0: Guṇehi sadiso natthi, yasmā loke sadevake;
tika-s0201t:2163_0: Bhavesu ca rahābhāvā, pāsaṃsā arahaṃ jino”ti.
tika-s0201t:2164_1: Tañca passantassa hitasukhāvahabhāvena veditabbanti āha “atthāvahaṃ sukhāvaha”nti.
tika-s0201t:2164_6: tehi catuppamāṇikassa lokassa sabbathāpi accantāya pasādanīyoti dassetuṃ “anekehipī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2164_8: arahatanti iminā dhammappamāṇānaṃ lūkhappamāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ bhagavato pasādāvahatamāha,
tika-s0201t:2164_10: Dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti ettha kosiyasakuṇassa vatthu kathetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2165_0: Iminā nayena agārikapucchā āgatāti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2165_4: vissajjentoti iminā satthu tesaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ niggaṇhanavidhiṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2165_8: so ca māno yathādesitassa atthassa ajānante appatiṭṭho hoti,
tika-s0201t:2165_9: iti bhagavā tesaṃ mānaniggahavidhiṃ cintetvā saṅkhepeneva pañhaṃ vissajjesi,
tika-s0201t:2166_2: so ca vibhattivacanavipallāsaṃ katvā paccatte karaṇavacanavasena “tividha”nti vutto.
tika-s0201t:2166_3: Attho pana karaṇaputhuvacanavasena daṭṭhabboti āha “tividhanti tīhi koṭṭhāsehī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2166_6: kāyadvārikabhāvasāmaññaṃ vā upādāya ekattaṃ netvā “tividha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2166_9: so ca adhammacariyāya dvārabhūto tena vinā tassā appavattanato.
tika-s0201t:2166_12: na ca sā paṭṭhāne āgatesu catuvīsatiyā paccayesu ekenapi paccayena cetanāya paccayo hoti,
tika-s0201t:2166_13: tassā pana tathāpavattamānāya kāyakammasaññitāya cetanāya pavatti hotīti tena dvārena lakkhitabbabhāvato tassā kāraṇaṃ viya ca sabbohāramattaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:2166_14: Kāyadvārenāti vā kāyena dvārabhūtena kāyadvārabhūtenāti taṃ itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2166_20: adhammā ca sā cariyā cāti adhammacariyā.
tika-s0201t:2166_28: Sabbesu kaṇhasukkapadesūti “catubbidhaṃ vācāya adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hotī”tiādinā uddesaniddesavasena āgatesu sabbesu kaṇhapadesu –
tika-s0201t:2166_29: “tividhaṃ kho gahapatayo kāyena dhammacariyāsamacariyā hotī”tiādinā uddesaniddesavasena āgatesu sabbesu sukkapadesu ca.
tika-s0201t:2167_0: Rodeti kurūrakammantatāya parapaṭibaddhe satte assūni mocetīti ruddo,
tika-s0201t:2167_8: Tathāvidho paresaṃ ghātanasīlo lohitapāṇītveva vuccati yathā dānasīlo paresaṃ dānatthaṃ adhotahatthopi “payatapāṇī”tveva vuccati.
tika-s0201t:2167_10: pavuddhaṃ paharaṇaṃ parassa māraṇaṃ pahatanti dassento “hate”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:2168_3: taṃ teneva sāminiddesena pakāsitanti āha “parassa santaka”nti.
tika-s0201t:2168_5: yaṃ kiñci parasantakaṃ visesato parassa vittūpakaraṇaṃ vāti attho.
tika-s0201t:2171_1: Yathā thaddhā visamā dubbinītā ca honti,
tika-s0201t:2171_5: so panassā kakkasabhāvo byāpādanimittatāya tato pūtikāti.
tika-s0201t:2171_12: Lagganakārīti evaṃ vadantassa evaṃ vadāmīti atthādhippāyena lagganakārī,
tika-s0201t:2171_15: Sadosavācāyāti attano samuṭṭhāpakadosassa vasena sadosavācāya vevacanāni.
tika-s0201t:2172_7: attano suṇantassa ca na saṃvaravinayāvahassa vattā.
tika-s0201t:2172_8: Hadayamañjūsāyaṃ nidhetunti ahitasaṃhitattā cittaṃ anuppavisetvā nidhetuṃ.
tika-s0201t:2172_9: Ayuttakāleti dhammaṃ kathentena yo attho yasmiṃ kāle vattabbo,
tika-s0201t:2172_12: Anapadesanti bhagavatā asukasutte evaṃ vuttanti suttāpadesavirahitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2172_19: tassa sarīrabhūtaṃ kathaṃ anāmasitvā tato bahibhūtaṃyeva kathaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2172_22: Āharitvāti nikkhittasuttato aññampi anuyogaupamāvatthuvasena tadanupayoginaṃ āharitvā.
tika-s0201t:2172_23: Jānāpetunti etadatthamidaṃ vuttanti jānāpetuṃ yo sakkoti.
tika-s0201t:2172_24: Tassa kathetunti tassa tathārūpassa dhammakathikassa bahumpi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0201t:2172_25: Na atthanissitanti attano paresañca na hitāvahaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2173_0: Abhijjhāyanaṃ yebhuyyena parasantakassa dassanavasena hotīti “abhijjhāya oloketā hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2173_1: Abhijjhāyanto vā abhijjhāyitaṃ vatthuṃ yattha katthaci ṭhitampi paccakkhato passanto viya abhijjhāyatīti vuttaṃ “abhijjhāya oloketā hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2174_2: Byāpādo hi visaṃ viya lohitassa cittaṃ pūtibhāvaṃ janeti.
tika-s0201t:2174_3: Dosena duṭṭhacittasaṅkappoti visena viya sappiādikopena dūsitacittasaṅkappo.
tika-s0201t:2174_6: Mā vā ahesunti sabbena sabbaṃ na hontu.
tika-s0201t:2175_3: Natthi dinnanti deyyadhammasīsena dānaṃ vuttanti āha “dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2175_10: Paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthīti paraloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo ayaṃ loko na hoti.
tika-s0201t:2175_11: Idhaloke ṭhitassapi paraloko natthīti idhaloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo paraloko na hoti.
tika-s0201t:2175_13: Ime sattā yattha yattha bhavayonigatiādīsu ṭhitā tattha tattheva ucchijjanti nirudayavināsavasena vinassanti.
tika-s0201t:2175_14: Phalābhāvavasenāti mātāpitūsu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalassa abhāvavasena “natthi mātā,
tika-s0201t:2175_17: nāpi tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ abhāvavasena tesaṃ lokapaccakkhattā.
tika-s0201t:2175_18: Bubbuḷakassa viya imesaṃ sattānaṃ uppādo nāma kevalova,
tika-s0201t:2175_19: na cavitvā āgamanapubbakoti dassanatthaṃ “natthi sattā opapātikā”ti vuttanti āha “cavitvā upapajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2175_20: Samaṇena nāma yāthāvato jānantena kassaci kiñci akathetvā saññatena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2175_23: tathā attano sampādanassa kassaci avasaro eva natthi tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti āha “ye imañca…pe…
tika-s0201t:2175_26: Dasavatthukāti paṭikkhipitabbāni dasa vatthūni etissāti dasavatthukā.
tika-s0201t:2177_7: Kāmaṃ cetāya sabbassapi brahmanikāyassa samaññāya bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2177_8: “ābhāna”ntiādinā pana dutiyajjhānabhūmikādīnaṃ upari gahitattā gobalībaddañāyena tadavasesānaṃ ayaṃ samaññāti
tika-s0201t:2177_11: parittābhādīnaṃyeva pana ābhāvantatāsāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā pavattaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2177_14: saddena appamāṇābhānaṃ devānaṃ ābhassarānaṃ devānanti imaṃ pāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:2177_19: Iti bhagavā āsavakkhayaṃ dassetvāti evaṃ bhagavā dhammacariyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2177_22: vivaṭṭanissitaṃ āsavakkhayagāmipaṭipadaṃ katvā tibhavabhañjanato āsavakkhayaṃ dassetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
tika-s0201t:2178_0: Idha ṭhatvāti imasmiṃ dhammacariyāsamacariyāya niddese ṭhatvā.
tika-s0201t:2178_4: Dasakusalakammapathehīti yathārahaṃ dasakusalakammapathehi kammūpanissayapaccayabhūtehi kevalaṃ upanissayabhūtehi ca nibbatti dassitā.
tika-s0201t:2179_5: Dutiyādīni bhāvetvātiādīsupi “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2179_12: avītikkamo sīla”ntiādinā sabbesupi jhānesu sīlaṃ uddhaṭanti tassa vasena uparidevalokānampi vipākena nibbatti vattabbāti? Na,
tika-s0201t:2179_14: pariññāya desanatā cassa “yattha ca pahāna”ntiādinā visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyañca pakāsitā eva.
tika-s0201t:2179_15: Tathā hi idhāpi “dasa kusalakammapathā hi sīla”ntiādinā sīlassa rūpārūpabhavānaṃ upanissayatā vibhāvitā,
tika-s0201t:2179_17: Kasmā panettha bhāvanālakkhaṇāya dhammacariyāya bhavavisese vibhajiyamāne asaññabhavo na gahitoti āha “asaññabhavo pana…pe…
tika-s0201t:2179_19: Bāhirakā hi ayathābhūtadassitāya asaññabhavaṃ bhavavippamokkhaṃ maññamānā tadupagajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā asaññesu nibbattanti.
tika-s0201t:2182_4: Aniyamitakiccenāti “iminā nāmā”ti evaṃ na niyamitena kiccena.
tika-s0201t:2182_5: Ayaṃ visesoti ayaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānadhammādhiṭṭhānakato imesu dvīsu suttesu desanāya viseso,
tika-s0201t:2182_6: attho pana desanānayo ca majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya avisiṭṭhoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2182_7: Kasmā pana bhagavā katthaci puggalādhiṭṭhānadesanaṃ deseti,
tika-s0201t:2182_28: Iti bhagavā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ avekkhitvā tattha tattha duvidhaṃ desanaṃ desetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2185_4: garunā kismiñci vutte gāravavasena patissavanaṃ patissavo,
tika-s0201t:2185_10: Etena sabhāveneva sagāravassa tathāpavattaṃ vacananti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2185_13: idha pana so na sambhavati kucchitāya paññāya abhāvatoti āha “paññāya duṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2185_17: Taṃ pana parimāṇaṃ yasmā parimeyyassa atthassa paricchindanaṃ hoti, nu-
tika-s0201t:2185_19: tasmā “kittāvatā nu khoti kāraṇaparicchedapucchā”ti vatvā “kittakena nu kho evaṃ vuccatīti attho”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:2185_22: tassa pucchāvisesabhāvañāpanatthaṃ mahāniddese āgatā sabbāva pucchā atthuddhāranayena dasseti “pucchā ca nāmā”tiādinā.
tika-s0201t:2185_28: bhikkhave”tiādipucchāya hi “kiṃ tumhākaṃ anumatī”ti anumati pucchitā hoti.
tika-s0201t:2186_0: Lakkhaṇanti ñātuṃ icchito yo koci sabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:2186_1: Aññātanti yena kenaci ñāṇena aññātabhāvaṃ āha.
tika-s0201t:2187_1: Sayaṃ vinicchinantoti sayameva tesaṃ pañhānaṃ atthaṃ visesena nicchinanto.
tika-s0201t:2187_3: na yaṃ kiñci anavaseseneva matthakaṃ pāpesīti.
tika-s0201t:2187_4: “Sayameva pañhaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā sayaṃ vinicchinanto”ti ettha catukkoṭikaṃ bhavatīti dassento “ekacco hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:2187_9: Therena sadisoti therena sadiso sāvako natthi.
tika-s0201t:2188_4: Dhammakathikatāya aggabhāvappattiyā tattha appaṭihatañāṇatāya buddhalīḷāya viya catunnaṃ parisānaṃ gamanaṃ gaṇhanto dhammakathaṃ katheti.
tika-s0201t:2189_0: Ito vā etto vā anukkamitvāti uggahitakathāmaggato yattha katthaci īsakampi anukkamitvā uggahitaniyāmenevāti attho.
tika-s0201t:2189_4: Heṭṭhā ca upari ca suttapadānaṃ āharaṇena tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ heṭṭhupariyaṃ karonto.
tika-s0201t:2189_6: suttapadaṃ vā nikkhipitvā tattha nānāupamākāraṇāni āharanto tāni ca tehi suttapadehi bodhento samuṭṭhāpento
tika-s0201t:2189_7: “jātassare pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni phullāpento viya sinerumatthake vaṭṭisahassaṃ jālento viyā”ti vutto.
tika-s0201t:2190_1: Padavasena saṭṭhi padasatasahassāni gāthāvasena pannarasa gāthāsahassāni.
tika-s0201t:2190_2: Ākaḍḍhitvā gaṇhanto viyāti paccekaṃ pupphāni anocinitvā vallimeva ākaḍḍhitvā ekajjhaṃ pupphāni katvā gaṇhanto viya.
tika-s0201t:2191_0: Anantanayussadanti paccayuppannabhāsitatthanibbānavipākakiriyādivasena anantapabhede visaye pavattiyā anantanayehi ussannaṃ upacitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2192_0: Yasmā pucchāyaṃ byāpanicchānayena “duppañño duppañño”ti āmeḍitavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2192_1: tasmā dhammasenāpati pucchitamatthaṃ vissajjento pucchāsabhāgena “nappajānāti nappajānātī”ti āmeḍitavasenevāha.
tika-s0201t:2192_5: Idaṃ dukkhanti idaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2192_6: Tañca kho ruppanaṃ vediyanaṃ sañjānanaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ vijānananti saṅkhepato ettakaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2192_7: Ito uddhaṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ nāma natthīti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato pavattikkamato
tika-s0201t:2192_8: ceva pīḷanasaṅkhatasantāpavipariṇāmalakkhaṇato ca yathābhūtaṃ ariyamaggapaññāya nappajānāti.
tika-s0201t:2193_0: Idaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ patvāti idaṃ nāma appavattikāraṇaṃ āgamma.
tika-s0201t:2193_3: Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇatoti yathābhūtaṃ accutirasato ceva nissaraṇavivekāsaṅkhatāmatalakkhaṇato ca.
tika-s0201t:2193_4: Ayaṃ paṭipadāti ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādikā samodhānalakkhaṇā paṭipajjati etāyāti paṭipadā.
tika-s0201t:2193_5: Dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchatīti dukkhanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena gacchati ārabbha pavattati.
tika-s0201t:2193_6: Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇatoti yathābhūtaṃ kilesappahānakaraṇasarasato ceva niyyānahetudassanādhipateyyalakkhaṇato ca nappajānāti.
tika-s0201t:2193_10: Tattha hi duppaññaniddesattā pajānanapaṭikkhepavasena desanā āgatā,
tika-s0201t:2194_4: No vivaṭṭeti vivaṭṭe abhiniveso na hoti avisayattā.
tika-s0201t:2195_1: Khandhavasena vipassanābhinivesassa cakkhādivasena vedanādivasena ca satipi anekavidhatte sukaraṃ suviññeyyanti
tika-s0201t:2195_3: Rūpanti vavatthapetīti ruppanaṭṭhena rūpanti asaṅkarato paricchindati.
tika-s0201t:2195_4: Tadārammaṇāti taṃ rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanakā.
tika-s0201t:2195_8: na ettha koci attā vā attaniyaṃ vāti nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti paricchindati pariggaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:2195_11: Yasmā sabbaṃ sabbattha sabbadā ca natthi,
tika-s0201t:2195_19: Evanti “taṃ paneta”ntiādinā vuttappakārena avijjādike paccaye ceva rūpavedanādike paccayuppannadhamme ca vavatthapetvā paricchinditvā pariggahetvā.
tika-s0201t:2196_3: Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropetīti tesu pañcasu khandhesu aniccatāsaṅkhātaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ niropeti.
tika-s0201t:2196_6: Udayabbayappaṭipīḷanākārenāti uppādanirodhehi pati pati abhikkhaṇaṃ pīḷanākārena hetunā dukkhā aniṭṭhā,
tika-s0201t:2196_10: nāpi nesaṃ koci attā atthīti anattāti.
tika-s0201t:2196_12: dukkhassa ca anattabhāvato khandhapañcake tividhampi sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā.
tika-s0201t:2196_13: Sammasantoti udayabbayañāṇuppattiyā uppanne vipassanupakkilese pahāya maggāmaggaṃ vavatthapetvā udayabbayañāṇādivipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0201t:2197_5: na ito bhiyyo”ti paricchinditvā yāthāvato jānanameva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti pariññāpaṭivedho,
tika-s0201t:2197_6: idañca yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0201t:2197_10: Pahīnassa puna apahātabbatāya pakaṭṭhaṃ hānaṃ cajanaṃ samucchindanaṃ pahānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2197_12: Ayampi yena kilesena appahīyamānena maggabhāvanāya na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2197_14: tassa padaghātaṃ karontassa anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentassa ñāṇassa tathāpavattiyā paṭighātābhāvena nissaṅgacāraṃ upādāya evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0201t:2197_15: Sacchikiriyā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ anussavākāraparivitakkādike muñcitvāva sarūpato ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ “idaṃ ta”nti yāthāvasabhāvato gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2197_17: Ayampi yassa āvaraṇassa asamucchindanato ñāṇaṃ nirodhaṃ ālambituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0201t:2197_18: tassa samucchindanato taṃ sarūpato vibhāvitameva pavattatīti evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0201t:2198_4: Paṭhamamaggopi hi yathārahaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyaṃ pavattaṃ parijānanādiṃ vaḍḍhento pavattoti tatthāpi vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanāti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0201t:2198_5: Dutiyādīsupi appahīnakilesappahānato puggalantarasādhanato ca uppādanaṭṭhena bhāvanā,
tika-s0201t:2198_7: Ayampi yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā maggadhammānaṃ sarūpaparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0201t:2198_10: yathāpavattesu phalesupi ayaṃ yathādhigatasaccadhammesu viya vigatasammohova hoti sekkhopi samāno.
tika-s0201t:2198_13: Yathā cassa dhammā tāsaṃ jotitā yathādhigatasaccadhammāvalambiniyo maggavīthito parato maggaphalapahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesanibbānānaṃ
tika-s0201t:2198_19: saddo luttaniddiṭṭho daṭṭhabbo nirodhepi asammohapaṭivedhassa labbhanato.
tika-s0201t:2199_0: Paññavāti niddiṭṭho nippariyāyato paññavantatāya idha adhippetattā.
tika-s0201t:2199_7: Viññāṇacaritoti vijānanacarito vīmaṃsanacarito tepiṭake buddhavacane vicāraṇācāravepullato.
tika-s0201t:2199_8: Paññavāti na vattabbo maggenāgatāya paññāya abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2199_9: Ajja ajjeva arahattanti ittaraṃ atikhippamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2199_11: Sutte pana paṭivedhova kathito saccābhisamayavasena āgatattā.
tika-s0201t:2200_5: sopi kassaci abhāvaggahaṇamukhena sukhaṃ vedanaṃ sabhāvato samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato
tika-s0201t:2200_6: ca yathābhūtaṃ paricchindanto pariggaṇhanto sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vijānāti nāma.
tika-s0201t:2200_11: Kāmañcetaṃ viññāṇaṃ vedanāto aññampi ārammaṇaṃ vijānāti,
tika-s0201t:2200_12: anantaravāre pana rūpamukhena vipassanābhinivesassa dassitattā idha arūpamukhena dassetuṃ “sukhantipi vijānātī”tiādinā niddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2201_5: Saṃsaṭṭhabhāvaṃ pucchatīti taṃcittuppādapariyāpannānaṃ pañcaviññāṇānaṃ saṃsaṭṭhabhāvaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0201t:2201_6: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ pucchāya avasaro visaṃsaṭṭhabhāvāsaṅkāya eva abhāvato? Na,
tika-s0201t:2201_9: Nānākaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ na sakkāti idaṃ kevalaṃ saṃsaṭṭhabhāvameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2201_12: Tenāha “ārammaṇato vā vatthuto vā uppādato vā nirodhato vā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2201_13: Idāni tameva sabhāvabhedaṃ visayabhedena suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “tesaṃ tesaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2201_15: yena cittapaññānaṃ tattha tattha pubbaṅgamatā vuccati.
tika-s0201t:2202_3: yathā pana lokiyadhammesu cittaṃ padhānaṃ tatthassa dhorayhabhāvena pavattisabbhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2202_5: evaṃ lokuttaradhammesu paññā padhānā paṭipakkhavidhamanassa visesato tadadhīnattā.
tika-s0201t:2202_6: Tathā hi maggadhamme sammādiṭṭhi eva paṭhamaṃ gahitā.
tika-s0201t:2202_8: tathā ca paññāpanavidhi na kevalaṃ thereheva dassito,
tika-s0201t:2202_11: tattha cittavasena pucchane vattabbameva natthi yathā “kiṃcitto tvaṃ bhikkhū”tiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:2202_14: “ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapeti sannisādeti ekodiṃ karoti samādahati,
tika-s0201t:2202_15: yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:2202_17: lokuttaradhammesu paññāvasena codanaṃ byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ “katamā te bhikkhu paññā adhigatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2202_19: Tathā hi katthaci lokiyadhammā paññāsīsenapi niddisīyanti –
tika-s0201t:2202_20: “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhino kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti hānabhāginī paññā”tiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:2202_22: “uddhumātakasaññāti vā sesarūpārūpasaññāti vā ime dhammā ekatthā,
tika-s0201t:2203_4: Kāmaṃ cetesu satiādayopi dhammā icchitabbāva tehi vinā tesaṃ asambhavato,
tika-s0201t:2203_5: tathāpi cettha saddhā visesato kiccakārīti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:2203_14: Ettha ca sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhā viya sammappadhānabhāvanāya vīriyaṃ viya ca satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya –
tika-s0201t:2203_15: “satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa”nti vacanato pubbabhāge kiccato sati adhikā icchitabbā.
tika-s0201t:2203_17: “ariyasaccabhāvanā paññābhāvanā”ti katvā tattha paññā pubbabhāge adhikā icchitabbāti pākaṭoyamattho,
tika-s0201t:2203_18: adhigamakkhaṇe pana samādhipaññānaṃ viya sabbesampi indriyānaṃ saddhādīnaṃ samarasatāva icchitabbā.
tika-s0201t:2203_19: Tathā hi “ettha saddhindriya”ntiādinā tattha tattha etthaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0201t:2203_23: Lokiyalokuttarā dhammā kathitāti lokiyadhammā lokuttaradhammā ca tena tena pavattivisesena kathitā.
tika-s0201t:2203_25: saddhāpañcamesu indriyesu saha pavattamānesu tattha tattha visaye saddhādīnaṃ kiccādhikatāya tassa tasseva daṭṭhabbatā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:2203_27: Evaṃ aññepi lokiyalokuttarā dhammā yathāsakaṃ visaye pavattivisesavasena bodhitāti.
tika-s0201t:2204_0: Idāni saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ tattha tattha atirekakiccataṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2204_1: Tatridaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ rājapañcamā sahāyā viya vimuttiparipācakāni pañcindriyāni.
tika-s0201t:2204_2: Nesaṃ kīḷanatthaṃ ekajjhaṃ vīthiotaraṇaṃ viya indriyānaṃ ekajjhaṃ vipassanāvīthiotaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2204_3: Sahāyesu paṭhamādīnaṃ yathāsakageheva vicāraṇā viya saddhādīnaṃ sotāpattiaṅgādīni patvā pubbaṅgamatā.
tika-s0201t:2204_4: Sahāyesu itaresaṃ tattha tattha tuṇhībhāvo viya sesindriyānaṃ tattha tattha tadanvayatā.
tika-s0201t:2204_6: Na hi tadā tesaṃ sasambhārapathavīādīsu āpādīnaṃ viya kiccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:2204_7: saddhādīnaṃyeva pana kiccaṃ vibhūtaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati puretaraṃ tathāpaccayehi cittasantānassa abhisaṅkhatattā.
tika-s0201t:2204_8: Ettha ca vipassanākammikassa bhāvanā visesato paññuttarāti dassanatthaṃ rājānaṃ nidassanaṃ katvā paññindriyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2205_1: Tatheva taṃ vijānātīti saccadhammaṃ “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā nayeneva vijānāti ekacittuppādapariyāpannattā maggānukūlattā ca.
tika-s0201t:2205_2: Yaṃ vijānātīti ettha vijānanapajānanāni vipassanācittuppādapariyāpannāni adhippetāni,
tika-s0201t:2205_3: na “yaṃ pajānātī”ti ettha viya maggacittuppādapariyāpannāti āha “yaṃ saṅkhāragata”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:2205_5: Ekacittuppādapariyāpannattā vipassanābhāvato ca samānapaccayehi saha pavattikatā ekuppādatā,
tika-s0201t:2205_6: tato eva ekajjhaṃ saheva nirujjhanaṃ ekanirodhatā,
tika-s0201t:2206_3: paññāya pana bhāvetabbatāya taṃsampayuttadhammāpi taggatikāva hontīti āha “taṃsampayuttaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2206_4: Kiñcāpi vipassanāpaññāya bhāvanāvasena pavattanato taṃsampayuttaviññāṇampi tatheva pavattati,
tika-s0201t:2207_1: Evaṃ santepīti vedanāti evaṃ sāmaññaggahaṇe satipi.
tika-s0201t:2207_3: tato eva sammasanañāṇassa gocarabhūtā vedanā eva adhippetā sabrahmacārīnaṃ upakārāvahabhāvena desanāya āraddhattā.
tika-s0201t:2207_6: Idha sukhādisaddā tadārammaṇavisayāti imamatthaṃ suttena sādhetuṃ “rūpañca hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2207_16: Sārāgā saṃyujjantīti bahalarāgahetu yathārahaṃ dasahipi saṃyojanehi saṃyujjanti.
tika-s0201t:2207_17: Saṃyogā saṃkilissantīti tathā saṃyuttatāya taṇhāsaṃkilesādivasena saṃkilissanti,
tika-s0201t:2207_22: Evaṃ avisesena pañcapi khandhe sukhādiārammaṇabhāvena dassetvā idāni vedanā eva sukhādiārammaṇabhāvena dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2207_23: Pākatikapacurajanavasenāyaṃ kathitāti katvā “purimaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2207_24: Visesalābhī pana anāgatampi sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoteva.
tika-s0201t:2207_26: Vedanāya hi ārammaṇaṃ vediyantiyā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo vedetīti vohāramattaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:2208_4: Pāpentoti bhāvanaṃ upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā upanento.
tika-s0201t:2209_5: yadaggena paññā viññāṇena saddhiṃ sampayogaṃ labhāpitā,
tika-s0201t:2210_0: Sañjānāti vijānātīti ettha “pajānātī”ti padaṃ ānetvā vattabbaṃ pajānanavasenapi visesassa vakkhamānattā.
tika-s0201t:2210_1: Jānātīti ayaṃ saddo ca laddatoyevettha aviseso,
tika-s0201t:2210_3: Anekatthattā hi dhātūnaṃ tena ākhyātapadena nāmapadena ca vuttamatthaṃ upasaggapadaṃ jotakabhāvena viseseti,
tika-s0201t:2210_6: Etena saññāviññāṇapaññāpadāni antogadhajānanatthe yathāsakaṃ visiṭṭhavisaye ca niṭṭhānīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2210_10: saddena kadācipi imissā te visesā natthevāti avadhāreti.
tika-s0201t:2210_12: Tattha viññāṇakiccampi kātuṃ asakkontī saññā kuto paññākiccaṃ kareyyāti “lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti”cceva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2211_0: Ārammaṇe pavattamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ na saññā viya nīlapītādimattasañjānanavasena pavattati,
tika-s0201t:2211_1: atha kho tattha aññampi tādisaṃ visesaṃ jānantameva pavattatīti āha “viññāṇa”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:2211_4: Lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya hi anekavāraṃ lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā pavattamānāya paguṇabhāvato paricayavasena
tika-s0201t:2211_6: yathā taṃ paguṇassa ganthassa ajjhayane tattha tattha gatāpi vārā na upadhārīyanti.
tika-s0201t:2211_15: attano pana aññāsādhāraṇena ānubhāvena ussakkitvā maggapātubhāvampi pāpeti.
tika-s0201t:2212_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2212_10: Jānanto ca pana naṃ rūpaṃ disvāpi…pe…
tika-s0201t:2212_11: asukācariyena katotipi jānāti tathā heraññikaganthassa suggahitattā.
tika-s0201t:2212_13: Saññāvibhāgaṃ akatvā piṇḍavaseneva ārammaṇassa gahaṇato dārakassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:2212_16: Paññā pana ārammaṇe anavasesāvabodhato heraññikakahāpaṇadassanasadisā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:2213_1: Tena abhinnavisayābhinnakālatādassanena avinibbhogavuttitaṃ vibhāvento duppaṭivijjhataṃyeva ulliṅgeti.
tika-s0201t:2214_5: Kāmāvacaramanoviññāṇaṃ na niyamato “idaṃ nāma pañcadvārikāsambandhā”ti sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-s0201t:2214_7: tasseva pañcahi indriyehi nissaṭatā vuttāti āha “rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānacittenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2214_13: saparasantānesu idaṃ atisayaṃ jānitabbato bujjhitabbaṃ bodhetabbaṃ vāti attho.
tika-s0201t:2214_14: Neyyanti vā attano santāne netabbaṃ pavattetabbanti attho.
tika-s0201t:2214_22: Sāvakasseva hi tatra anupadadhammavipassanā na sambhavati,
tika-s0201t:2215_2: Yadā hi lokanātho bodhimūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinno –
tika-s0201t:2215_3: “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā paṭiccasamuppādamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ katvā adhigantabbasabbaññutaññāṇānurūpaṃ
tika-s0201t:2215_4: chattiṃsakoṭisahassamukhena mahāvajirañāṇaṃ nāma mahābodhisattasammasanaṃ pavattento anekākārasamāpattidhammasammasane
tika-s0201t:2215_8: Kāmañcettha keci dhammā vedanādayo phassapañcamakādīsu vuttāpi jhānakoṭṭhāsādīsupi saṅgahitā,
tika-s0201t:2215_9: taṃtaṃpaccayabhāvavisiṭṭhena pana atthavisesena dhammantarāni viya hontīti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2215_15: tāhi vuṭṭhāya adhigandhabbattā tāvatikā veneyyānaṃ aññāpaṭivedho arahattasamadhigamo.
tika-s0201t:2216_0: Dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenāti andhassa yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ gahetvā maggadesako viya dhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvadassanasaṅkhātena pariṇāyakabhāvena.
tika-s0201t:2216_9: “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti pana vacanato asammohato pajānāti.
tika-s0201t:2216_13: Abhiññeyye dhammeti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇāvabodhavasena abhimukhaṃ ñeyye jānitabbe khandhāyatanādidhamme.
tika-s0201t:2216_14: Abhijānātīti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca abhimukhaṃ avirajjhanavasena jānāti.
tika-s0201t:2216_16: Pariññeyyeti aniccātipi dukkhātipi anattātipi paricchijja jānitabbe.
tika-s0201t:2216_20: Pahātabbe dhammeti niccasaññādike yāva arahattamaggavajjhā sabbe pāpadhamme.
tika-s0201t:2216_24: Sā panesā paññā lokiyāpi tippakārā lokuttarāpi,
tika-s0201t:2216_28: Nibbānamārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanato abhiññeyyādīsu vigatasammohato evāti āha “lokuttarā asammohato”ti.
tika-s0201t:2217_1: Kammassakatā sammādiṭṭhi ca vaṭṭanissitattā idha nādhippetā,
tika-s0201t:2217_2: vivaṭṭakathā hesāti vuttaṃ “vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā ca maggasammādiṭṭhiyā cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2218_1: Vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā anuggahitabhāvena gahitattā maggasammādiṭṭhīsu ca arahattamaggasammādiṭṭhi,
tika-s0201t:2218_4: Aggaphalasamādhimhi tapparikkhāradhammesuyeva ca kevalo cetopariyāyo niruḷhoti sammādiṭṭhīti arahattamaggasammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0201t:2218_5: Phalakkhaṇeti anantare kālantare cāti duvidhe phalakkhaṇe.
tika-s0201t:2218_6: Paṭippassaddhivasena sabbasaṃkilesehi ceto vimuccati etāyāti cetovimutti,
tika-s0201t:2218_10: sabbasaṃkilesehi cetaso vimuccanasaṅkhātaṃ paṭippassambhanasaññitaṃ pahānaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃso cāti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:2218_14: aññathā phaladhammā eva ānisaṃsoti gayhamāne punavacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā.
tika-s0201t:2219_4: Sammāsatisammāvāyāmā pana samādhipakkhiyā evāti āha “avasesā dhammā cetovimuttīti veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2219_10: Tattha kammaṭṭhānassa ekavāraṃ vīthiyā appaṭipajjanaṃ khalanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2219_13: Pūrentassāti vivaṭṭanissitaṃ katvā pālentassa brūhentassa ca.
tika-s0201t:2220_2: Evañhi “yathā hī”tiādinā vuccamānā ambupamā ca yujjeyya.
tika-s0201t:2220_4: Thiraṃ katvā bandhatīti asithilaṃ daḷhaṃ nātimahantaṃ nātikhuddakaṃ katvā yojeti.
tika-s0201t:2220_5: Thiraṃ karotīti udakasiñcanakāle tato tato vissaritvā udakassa anikkhamanatthaṃ ālavālaṃ thirataraṃ karoti.
tika-s0201t:2220_9: Koṭṭhakabandhanaṃ viya sīlaṃ sammādiṭṭhiyā vaḍḍhanupāyassa mūlabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2220_11: Mariyādāya thirabhāvakaraṇaṃ viya samatho yathāvuttabhāvanādhiṭṭhānāya sīlamariyādāya daḷhabhāvāpādanato.
tika-s0201t:2220_13: Samīpe valliādīnaṃ haraṇaṃ viya kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanacchedanaṃ ijjhitabbabhāvanāya vibandhāpanayanato.
tika-s0201t:2220_14: Mūlakhaṇanaṃ viya sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ bhāvanā tassā vibandhassa mūlakānaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīnaṃ palikhaṇanato.
tika-s0201t:2220_15: Ettha ca yasmā suparisuddhasīlassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa sappāyadhammassavanaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2220_19: Paripuṇṇavipassano maggasammādiṭṭhiṃ paribrūhetīti evametesaṃ aṅgānaṃ paramparāya sammukhā ca anuggaṇhanato ayamānupubbī kathitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2221_1: Idha kiṃ pucchatīti idha evaṃ arahattaphalaṃ pāpitāya desanāya “kati panāvuso,
tika-s0201t:2221_2: bhavā”ti bhavaṃ pucchanto kīdisaṃ anusandhiṃ upādāya pucchatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:2221_3: Teneva hi “mūlameva gato anusandhī”ti vatvā adhippāyaṃ pakāsento “duppañño”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:2221_6: Kāmabhavotiādīsu kammopapattibhedato duvidhopi bhavo adhippetoti dassento “kāmabhavūpagaṃ kamma”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:2221_9: Punabbhavassāti punappunaṃ aparāparaṃ bhavanato jāyanato punabbhavoti laddhanāmassa vaṭṭapabandhassa.
tika-s0201t:2221_14: Gamanāgamanaṃ hotītiādinā bhavādīsu sattānaṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2221_20: hetuphaladhammā ca samānakālāpi pubbāparakālā viya voharīyanti yathā –
tika-s0201t:2221_21: “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti paccayapaccayuppannakiriyā.
tika-s0201t:2222_1: Vivaṭṭakathāya parato jotitaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ patvā ṭhitassa ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ubhatobhāgavimuttassa
tika-s0201t:2222_2: nirodhasādhakaṃ vibhāvituṃ yuttanti āha “katamaṃ panāvusoti idha kiṃ pucchatī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2222_3: Tathā hi anantaraṃ nirodhasamāpajjanakena bhikkhunā jānitabbāni paṭhamassa jhānassa sampayogapahānaṅgāni pucchitāni.
tika-s0201t:2222_8: Upakārānupakārāni aṅgānīti nirodhasamāpattiyā upakārāni ca anupakārāni ca aṅgāni.
tika-s0201t:2222_9: Nirodhasamāpattiyā hi soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi ca pattabbattā taṃtaṃñāṇassa samādhicariyāhi
tika-s0201t:2222_12: Tesañhi vasena yathānupubbaṃ upasantupasantaoḷārikabhāvāya bhavaggasamāpattiyā saṅkhārāvasesasukhumataṃ
tika-s0201t:2222_17: Na hi nirodhassa koci dhammo anantarapaccayo nāma atthi.
tika-s0201t:2222_19: taṃ yathāvuttapubbābhisaṅkhārahetukāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā ahosīti sā tassa anantarapaccayo viya hotīti taṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2222_23: Nayaṃ vā dassetvāti ādiantadassanavasena nayadassanaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:2223_1: Evaṃ nirodhassa pādakaṃ vibhāvetvā idāni antonirodhe anupabandhabhāvato pañcannaṃ pasādānaṃ paccayapucchane
tika-s0201t:2223_2: paṭhamaṃ tāva te sarūpato āveṇikato āveṇikavisayato paṭissaraṇato ca pucchanavasena pāḷi pavattāti dassento
tika-s0201t:2223_6: vivariyamānaṃ pana ubhayampi ārammaṇasabhāvamevāti āha “gocarabhūtaṃ visaya”nti.
tika-s0201t:2223_19: Yadi vā nīlaṃ yadi vā pītakanti idaṃ nīlapītādisabhāvajānanamattaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0201t:2223_20: Nīlaṃ pītakanti pajānanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa nattheva avikappakabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2223_25: Yathāsakaṃ visayaṃ rajjanādivasena anubhavituṃ asamatthāni cakkhuviññāṇādīni,
tika-s0201t:2223_27: na kiñci atthato paṭisarantāni viya hontīti vuttaṃ “kiṃ etāni paṭisarantī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2223_28: Javanamano paṭisaraṇanti pañcadvārikaṃ itarañca sādhāraṇato vatvā puna yāya’ssa rajjanādipavattiyā paṭisaraṇatā,
tika-s0201t:2223_31: Etasmiṃ pana dvāreti cakkhudvāre javanaṃ rajjati vā dussati vā muyhati vā,
tika-s0201t:2224_4: Kiñci paharante mā paharantūti paṭikkhipato dātabbadaṇḍo māpahārakahāpaṇo.
tika-s0201t:2224_5: So sabbopi parittakesu gāmikamanussesu tathā labbhamāno ettako hotīti āha “aṭṭhakahāpaṇo vā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2225_1: Antonirodhasmiṃ pañca pasādeti nirodhasamāpannassa pavattamāne pañca pasāde.
tika-s0201t:2225_5: Jīvitindriyaṃ paṭiccāti indriyaatthiavigatapaccayavasena paccayabhūtaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ paṭicca pañcavidhopi pasādo tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0201t:2225_6: Jīvitindriyena vinā na tiṭṭhati jīvitindriyarahitassa kammasamuṭṭhānarūpakalāpassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2225_7: Tasmāti yasmā anupālanalakkhaṇena jīvitena anupālitā eva usmā pavattati,
tika-s0201t:2225_10: Jālasikhaṃ paṭicca ābhā paññāyatīti jālasikhāsaṅkhātabhūtasaṅghātaṃ saheva pavattamānaṃ nissāya “ābhā”ti laddhanāmā vaṇṇadhātu “ujjalati,
tika-s0201t:2225_13: Taṃ ālokaṃ paṭiccāti taṃ vuttappakāraṃ ālokaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā.
tika-s0201t:2226_2: Idāni upamopamitabbānaṃ sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “jālasikhā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2226_3: Ālokaṃ gahetvāva uppajjatīti iminā yathā jālasikhāya saheva āloko uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:2226_4: evaṃ kammajusmanā saheva jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjatīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2226_5: Jālasikhāsannissayo tassā satiyeva honto āloko tāya uppādito viya hotīti āha “attanā janitaālokenevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2226_6: Usmā nāmettha kammasamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu tannissitañca jīvitindriyaṃ tadanupālakañcāti āha “kammajamahābhūtasambhavena
tika-s0201t:2226_9: atha kho pabandhānupacchedassapi jīvitindriyaṃ kāraṇanti āha “vassasatampi kammajatejapavattaṃ pāletī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2226_10: Usmā āyuno paccayo honto sesabhūtasahito eva hotīti āha “mahābhūtānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2226_11: Tathā āyupi sahajātarūpaṃ pālentameva usmāya paccayo hotīti vuttaṃ “mahābhūtāni pāletī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2227_1: Āyu eva indriyapaccayādivasena sahajātadhammānaṃ anupālanavasena saṅkharaṇato āyusaṅkhāro.
tika-s0201t:2227_2: Bahuvacananiddeso pana anekasatasahassabhedesu rūpakalāpesu pavattiyā anekabhedanti katvā.
tika-s0201t:2227_6: Imesaṃ āyusaṅkhāravedanānaṃ ekantanirodhaṃ samāpannassa maraṇena bhavitabbaṃ vedanāya niruddhattā.
tika-s0201t:2227_7: Āyusaṅkhārānaṃ tathā aniruddhattā nirodhassa samāpajjanameva na siyā,
tika-s0201t:2227_11: Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2227_15: Jālāpavattaṃ viya arūpadhammā tejussadabhāvato visayobhāsanato ca.
tika-s0201t:2227_20: Imaṃ rūpakāyaṃ jahantīti imasmā rūpakāyā kaḷevarā vigacchanti nappavattanti.
tika-s0201t:2228_2: Vitakketvā vicāretvā hi vācaṃ bhindati katheti.
tika-s0201t:2228_4: Cittasaṅkhāranirodhacodanāya rūpanirodho viya cittanirodho acodito tesaṃ tato aññattāti na cittasampayuttanirodho
tika-s0201t:2228_6: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “vācā aniruddhā hotī”ti, tampi na.
tika-s0201t:2228_9: Cittaṃ pana niruddhesupi cittasaṅkhāresu tehi anabhisaṅkhatattā vitakkādinirodho viya pavattatiyevāti ayamettha parassa adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2228_11: cittassa aniruddhattā taṃ nissāya ca rūpadhammānaṃ anapagatattā te jīvanti eva nāmāti.
tika-s0201t:2228_12: Byañjane abhinivesaṃ akatvāti “cittasaṅkhārā niruddhā”ti vacanato teva niruddhā,
tika-s0201t:2228_13: na cittanti evaṃ neyyatthaṃ suttaṃ “nītattha”nti abhinivesaṃ akatvā.
tika-s0201t:2228_14: Ācariyānaṃ naye ṭhatvāti paramparāgatānaṃ ācariyānaṃ adhippāye ṭhatvāti attho.
tika-s0201t:2228_15: Upaparikkhitabboti suttantarāgamato suttantarapadassa aviparīto attho vīmaṃsitabbo.
tika-s0201t:2228_17: itare pana cittacetasikā santī”ti ayamettha attho na gayhati.
tika-s0201t:2228_19: na phassādayo”ti ayamettha attho na gayhati saññāsīsena desanāti katvā,
tika-s0201t:2228_22: Sabbepi pana cittacetasikā tattha nirujjhantevāti ayamettha aviparīto attho veditabbo,
tika-s0201t:2229_2: Ārammaṇaghaṭṭanāya indriyānaṃ kilamatho cakkhunā bhāsurarūpasukhumarajadassanena vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0201t:2229_3: Tathā hi uṇhakāle purato aggimhi jalante kharassare ca paṇave ākoṭite akkhīni bhedāni viya na sahanti
tika-s0201t:2230_4: Adhigamapaccayā pana kasiṇesu rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ heṭṭhimā tayo ca āruppā.
tika-s0201t:2230_5: Na hi sakkā tāni anadhigantvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanamadhigantuṃ.
tika-s0201t:2230_12: evaṃ vipassanāya nissandaphalabhūtaṃ sāmaññaphalanti āha “vipassanānissandāya phalasamāpattiyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2230_13: Ārammaṇā nāma sārammaṇadhammānaṃ visesato uppattinimittanti āha “sabbanimittānanti rūpādīnaṃ sabbārammaṇāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:2230_18: Na hettha tassa sambhavo anulomānantaraṃ uppajjanato.
tika-s0201t:2231_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāneti idha vuttanirodhassa ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ gahitānaṃ imasmiṃ pariyosānassa gahitaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0201t:2231_2: Tayo ca saṅkhārānanti kāyasaṅkhārādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2231_3: Soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhīti aniccānupassanā, dukkhā, anattā, nibbidā, virāgā, nirodhā,
tika-s0201t:2232_5: Addhānaparicchedoti ettakaṃ kālaṃ samāpattiyā vītināmessāmīti pageva kālaparicchedo.
tika-s0201t:2232_7: Tattha yasmā kammanimitte chabbidhampi ārammaṇaṃ labbhati,
tika-s0201t:2233_1: Nīlampi sañjānātītiādinā nīlādiggahaṇamukhena taṃvaṇṇānaṃ sattānaṃ sañjānanaṃ averādibhāvamanasikaraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:2233_2: jotitanti āha “etasmiñhi ṭhāne appamāṇā cetovimutti kathitā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2233_6: Nti “idha aññaṃ abhinavaṃ nāma natthī”tiādinā vuttaṃ atthavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2234_1: ārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanassa kiñcanassa asubhasamāpattīnampi paṭibhāganimittasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sabimbaṃ viya viggahaṃ kiñcanaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0201t:2234_3: Nanu brahmavihārapaṭhamāruppānampi paṭibhāganimittabhūtaṃ kiñci ārammaṇaṃ natthīti?
tika-s0201t:2234_5: ayaṃ pana paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ viya na paṭibhāganimittabhūtaārammaṇatāya evaṃ vuttā.
tika-s0201t:2234_7: Bhavati etena attāti abhidhānaṃ buddhi cāti bhāvo, attā. Bhāva-
tika-s0201t:2234_10: “Nānatā pākaṭāvā”ti vuttaṃ nānattaṃ bhūmito ārammaṇato ca dassetuṃ “attho panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2234_11: Parittādibhāvena atītādibhāvena ajjhattādibhāvena ca na vattabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etissāti navattabbārammaṇā nibbānārammaṇaphalasamāpattibhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2235_2: Nibbānampi appamāṇameva pamāṇakaraṇānaṃ abhāvenāti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0201t:2235_4: Kiñcatīti kattari paṭhito dhātu maddanatthoti āha “kiñcati maddatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2236_0: Samūhādighanavasena sakiccaparicchedatāya ca saviggahā viya upaṭṭhitā saṅkhārā niccādiggāhassa vatthutāya
tika-s0201t:2236_2: Vipassanā pana tattha ghanavinibbhogaṃ karontī niccādiggāhaṃ vidhamentī “nimittaṃ samugghātetī”ti vuttā ghananimittassa ārammaṇabhūtassa abhāvā.
tika-s0201t:2236_3: Na gahitāti ekatthapadaniddese pāḷiyaṃ kasmā na gahitā?
tika-s0201t:2236_9: Aññasmiṃ pana ṭhāneti ākiñcaññādisaddapavattihetuto aññena hetunā appamāṇātisaddappavattiyaṃ etassa cetovimuttiyā honti.
tika-s0201t:2236_11: Iminā pariyāyenāti iminā tāya tāya samaññāya voharitabbatāpariyāyena.
tika-s0201t:2236_12: Saccānaṃ dassanamukhena vaṭṭavasena uṭṭhitadesanaṃ arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
tika-s0201t:2239_2: tasmā pucchakavissajjake pucchānimittañca samudāyato vibhāvetuṃ “ko panāya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2240_0: “Kiṃ nu kho ajja bhavissati ayyaputto”ti vīthiṃ olokayamānā.
tika-s0201t:2240_1: Olambanatthanti tassa hatthāvalambanatthaṃ pubbāciṇṇavasena attano hatthaṃ pasāresi.
tika-s0201t:2240_2: Bahiddhāti attanā aññaṃ visabhāgavatthuṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0201t:2241_1: Puna taṃ anukampanto “sace kho panāha”ntiādiṃ cintesi.
tika-s0201t:2241_3: Vivaṭṭaṃ uddissa upacitaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ kusalaṃ upanissayo.
tika-s0201t:2241_7: āyatiṃ upanissayo bhavissatī”ti cirakālaparibhāvitāya ghaṭe padīpajālā viya abbhantare dippamānāya hetusampattiyā
tika-s0201t:2241_8: codiyamānā āha “evaṃ sante mayhaṃ pabbajjaṃ anujānāthā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2242_1: Abhinīhārasampannattāti sujātattherassa padumuttarassa bhagavato aggasāvakassa nipaccakāraṃ katvā –
tika-s0201t:2242_2: “tumhehi diṭṭhadhammassa bhāgī assa”nti nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ dānaṃ datvā katapatthanāsaṅkhātasampannābhinīhārattā.
tika-s0201t:2242_3: Nāticiraṃ kilamitthāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāventī vipassanāya paripākavasena ciraṃ na kilamittha.
tika-s0201t:2243_4: Eko eva pāso etissāti ekapāsakā, gaṇṭhi.
tika-s0201t:2243_8: Paṭisambhidāvisaye ṭhatvāti etena theriyā pabhinnapaṭisambhidataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2244_0: Theriyā visesādhigamassa attano avisayatāya visākho “na sakkā”tiādinā cintesīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2244_1: Saccavinibbhogapañhabyākaraṇenāti saccapariyāpannassa dhammassa dassanato aññānaññatthaniddhāraṇabhedanāsaṅkhātassa vinibbhogapañhassa vissajjanena.
tika-s0201t:2245_0: Na taṃyeva upādānaṃ te pañcupādānakkhandhā ekadesassa samudāyatābhāvato,
tika-s0201t:2245_2: Nāpi aññatra pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi upādānaṃ tassa tadekadesabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2245_4: Yadi hi taññevātiādinā ubhayapakkhepi dosaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2245_7: Aññatra siyāti pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi visuṃyeva upādānaṃ yadi siyā.
tika-s0201t:2245_9: Cittavippayutto anusayoti nidassanamattametaṃ nikāyavāde cittasabhāvābhāvaviññāṇādīnampi cittavippayuttabhāvapaṭijānanato.
tika-s0201t:2245_21: Sabbaso nivutthabrahmacariyatāya tiṇṇaṃ bhavānampi aparabhāge nibbāne nivutthavatīti bhavamatthake ṭhitā.
tika-s0201t:2246_1: “Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti paduddhāraṃ katvā “idhekacco”tiādinā paṭisambhidāpāṭhena tadatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0201t:2246_6: tasmā yaṃ rūpaṃ so ahanti yadetaṃ mama rūpaṃ nāma,
tika-s0201t:2246_7: so ahanti vuccamāno mama attā taṃ mama rūpanti rūpañca attañca advayaṃ anaññaṃ samanupassati.
tika-s0201t:2246_8: Tathā passato ca attā viya rūpaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2246_9: rūpaṃ viya vā attā aniccoti āpannameva.
tika-s0201t:2246_14: vaṇṇopi vā kāyādiviññeyyo acciyā anaññattāti upameyyaṃ viya upamāpi diṭṭhigatikassa ayuttāva.
tika-s0201t:2246_17: Arūpaṃ vedanādiṃ attāti gahetvā chāyāya rukkhādhīnatāya chāyāvantaṃ rukkhaṃ viya,
tika-s0201t:2246_18: rūpassa santakabhāvena attādhīnatāya rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati.
tika-s0201t:2246_19: Pupphādhīnatāya pupphasmiṃ gandhaṃ viya ādheyyabhāvena attādhīnatāya rūpassa attani rūpaṃ samanupassati.
tika-s0201t:2246_21: evaṃ rūpampi attano ādhāroti katvā attānaṃ rūpasmiṃ samanupassati.
tika-s0201t:2246_22: Eseva nayoti iminā attano vedanādīhi anaññattaṃ tesañcādhāraṇataṃ nissitatañca yathāvuttaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0201t:2247_0: Arūpaṃ attāti kathitaṃ “vedanāvanta”ntiādīsu viya rūpena vomissakatāya abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2247_1: Rūpārūpamissako attā kathito rūpena saddhiṃ sesārūpadhammānaṃ attāti gahitattā.
tika-s0201t:2247_5: attā me uppajjati ca veti cāti iccassa evamāgataṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2248_1: yebhuyyena taṃ niccaṃ sukhanti ca samanupassateva.
tika-s0201t:2248_2: Sāvako pana tappaṭikkhepena sabbe dhammā anattāti sudiṭṭhattā rūpaṃ attāti na samanupassati,
tika-s0201t:2248_3: tathābhūto ca aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti samanupassati,
tika-s0201t:2248_5: Evaṃ bhavadiṭṭhipi avijjābhavataṇhā viya vaṭṭassa samudayoyevāti diṭṭhikathāyaṃ “ettakena gamanaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2249_1: Heṭṭhā vuttamatthameva pucchitattā “theriyā paṭipucchitvā vissajjetabbo”ti vatvā paṭipucchanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “upāsakā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2249_3: Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatavasena lokiyalokuttaravasena saṅgahitāsaṅgahitavasenāti “vasenā”ti padaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2249_4: Tattha kāmaṃ asaṅkhato nāma maggo natthi,
tika-s0201t:2249_6: udāhu asaṅkhatoti pana pucchāvasena tathā vuttaṃ?
tika-s0201t:2249_8: saṅgāhakakhandhapariyāpannānaṃ pana maggadhammānampi siyā lokiyatāti idha lokiyaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2249_12: te saṅgahitā na hontīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ asaṅgahitaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2249_13: Saṅkhatotiādīsu samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katoti saṅkhato.
tika-s0201t:2249_14: Tathābhūto ca taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa pubbabhāgacetanāti mayhaṃ maggo aṭṭhaṅgiko hotu sattaṅgiko vāti cetitabhāvena cetito.
tika-s0201t:2249_18: Samāpajjantena attano santāne sammadeva āpajjantena uppādentena.
tika-s0201t:2249_19: Iti sattahipi padehi paccayanibbattitaṃyeva ariyamaggassa dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2250_0: Asaṅgahito khandhānaṃ padeso etassa atthīti maggo sappadeso.
tika-s0201t:2250_2: Padissati etena samudāyoti hi padeso, avayavo.
tika-s0201t:2250_6: Yathā nagaraṃ rajjekadesabhūtaṃ tadantogadhattā rajjena saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2250_7: evaṃ ariyamaggo khandhattayekadesabhūto tadantogadhattā tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitoti dasseti “nagaraṃ viya rajjenā”ti iminā.
tika-s0201t:2250_10: Ettha ca sīlakkhandho “nava koṭisahassānī”tiādinā vuttapabhedavasena ceva sampattasamādānaviratiādivasena ca gayhamāno nippadeso,
tika-s0201t:2250_12: Samādhikkhandho parittamahaggatādivasena ceva upacārappanāsamādhivasena ca anekabhedatāya nippadeso,
tika-s0201t:2250_15: Tathā paññākkhandho parittamahaggatādivasena ceva sutamayañāṇādivasena ca anekabhedatāya nippadeso,
tika-s0201t:2250_18: Attano dhammatāyāti sahakārīkāraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā attano sabhāvena attano balena appetuṃ na sakkoti vīriyena anupatthambhitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2250_20: Paggahakiccanti yathā kosajjapakkhe na patitā cittaṭṭhiti,
tika-s0201t:2251_1: Piṭṭhiṃ datvā onatasahāyo viya vāyāmo samādhissa ārammaṇe appanāya visesapaccayabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2251_2: Aṃsakūṭaṃ datvā ṭhitasahāyo viya sati samādhissa ārammaṇe daḷhapavattiyā paccayabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2252_2: yogāvacaro ca “kammaṭṭhānaṃ takkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:2253_3: Tañhi ekaṃyeva hutvā catukiccaṃ yathāvuttaupakārakasabhāvena ca parivāraṭṭhena parikkhāro hoti.
tika-s0201t:2254_0: Sattahi ñāṇehīti paramukkaṃsagatehi sattahi javanehi sampayuttañāṇehi,
tika-s0201t:2254_7: Evaṃ santeti yadi idaṃ suttaṃ nītatthaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2254_8: āsevanādi ca visuṃ visuṃ cittehi hoti,
tika-s0201t:2254_10: Āsevanādi nāma cittassa anekavāraṃ uppattiyā hoti,
tika-s0201t:2254_13: āsevanāvasena pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ sucirampi kālaṃ āsevanāvaseneva pavatteyya,
tika-s0201t:2254_15: na cettha ettakāneva cittāni āsevanāvasena pavattanti,
tika-s0201t:2254_19: Yathā pana pubbabhāgepi nānācittesu pavattapariññādikiccānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ paṭivedhakāle yathārahaṃ catukiccasādhanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2254_21: evaṃ vipassanāya pavattābhisaṅkhāravasena āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammāni paṭivedhakāle ekacittakkhaṇikāneva
tika-s0201t:2254_22: hontīti vadantānaṃ ācariyānaṃ na koci doso āsevanādīhi kātabbakiccassa tadā ekacittakkhaṇeyeva sijjhanato.
tika-s0201t:2254_25: Yāguṃ pivāhīti uyyojetabbo dhammasākacchāya abhabbabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2255_7: Nibbattīyatīti ca idaṃ kāye sati sabbhāvaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2255_12: Na hi taṃ vitakkavicārarahitacittaṃ vacīghosaṃ nibbattetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0201t:2255_13: Cittapaṭibaddhattāti etena cittassa nissayādipaccayabhāvo cittasaṅkhārasaṅkharaṇanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2255_14: Aññamaññamissāti atthato bhinnāpi kāyasaṅkhārādivacanavacanīyabhāvena aññamaññamissitā abhinnā viya,
tika-s0201t:2255_15: tato eva āluḷitā saṃkiṇṇā avibhūtā apākaṭā duddīpanā duviññāpayā.
tika-s0201t:2255_16: Ādānaggahaṇamuñcanacopanānīti yassa kassaci kāyena ādātabbassa ādānasaṅkhātaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2255_18: yathātathācalanasaṅkhātaṃ copananti imāni pāpetvā sādhetvā uppannā.
tika-s0201t:2255_23: Vācaṃ saṅkharontīti katvā idha vacīsaṅkhārātveva vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:2256_1: Samāpajjissanti padaṃ nirodhassa āsannānāgatabhāvavisayaṃ āsannaṃ vajjetvā dūrassa gahaṇe payojanābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2256_2: Nirodhapādakassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacittassa ca gahaṇato paṭṭhāya nirodhaṃ samāpajjati nāmāti adhippāyena
tika-s0201t:2256_4: Tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotīti ettha addhānaparicchedacittaggahaṇaṃ itaresaṃ nānantariyabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2256_5: Na hi baladvayañāṇasamādhicariyānaṃ vasībhāvāpādanacittehi vinā addhānaparicchedacittaṃ acittakabhāvāya hoti.
tika-s0201t:2257_3: Vuṭṭhahissanti padaṃ vuṭṭhahanassa āsannānāgatabhāvavisayaṃ āsannaṃ vajjetvā dūrassa gahaṇe payojanābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2257_4: Nirodhato vuṭṭhānassa ca cittuppādena paricchinnattā tato oramevāti āha “padadvayena antonirodhakālo kathito”ti.
tika-s0201t:2257_5: Tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotīti yathā yathāparicchinnakālameva acittakabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:2258_0: Paṭisaṅkhāti paṭisaṅkhāya idameva kātabbaṃ jānitvā appavattimattaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2258_4: tañca yebhuyyena āhārūpajīvīnaṃ sattānaṃ upādinnakapavattassa ekadivasaṃ bhuttāhārassa sattāhameva yāpanato.
tika-s0201t:2259_0: Sabbā phalasamāpatti assāsapassāse na samuṭṭhāpetīti idaṃ natthīti āha “samuṭṭhāpetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2259_5: Tassa pana phalasamāpatti catutthajjhānikāvāti niyamo natthīti āha “kiṃ vā etenā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2259_7: Nirodhassa pana pādakabhūtāya catutthajjhānādisamādhicariyāya vasena acatutthajjhānikāpi nirodhānantaraphalasamāpatti
tika-s0201t:2259_8: assāsapassāse na samuṭṭhāpetīti abhāvato eva te abbohārikā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:2259_9: Evañca katvā sañjīvattheravatthumhi ānītasamāpattiphalanidassanampi suṭṭhu upapajjati.
tika-s0201t:2259_13: Vācaṃ abhisaṅkhātuṃ na sakkonti aviññattijanakattā tesaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2260_4: rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvā appaṇihitāti āha “animittaappaṇihitesupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0201t:2260_5: Animittaṃ appaṇihitañca nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaphalasamāpattiyaṃ phasso animitto phasso appaṇihito
tika-s0201t:2260_6: phasso nāmāti imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati.
tika-s0201t:2261_5: Aniccato vuṭṭhātīti saṅkhārānaṃ aniccākāraggāhiniyā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā parato ekatovuṭṭhānaubhatovuṭṭhānehi nimittapavattato vuṭṭhāti.
tika-s0201t:2261_6: Aniccato pariggahetvāti ca idaṃ “na ekantikaṃ evampi hotī”ti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2261_9: suññatavipassanāya maggotiādinā ca yojanaṃ sandhāyāha “eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0201t:2261_10: Vikappo āpajjeyya āgamanassa vavatthānassa abhāvena avavatthānakarattā.
tika-s0201t:2261_11: Evañhi tayo phassā phusantīti evaṃ saguṇato ārammaṇato ca nāmalābhe suññatādināmakā tayo phassā phusantīti aniyamavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2262_0: Sabbasaṅkhatavivittatāya nibbānaṃ viveko nāma upadhivivekoti katvā.
tika-s0201t:2263_1: Cakkhādito rūpādīsu pavattarūpakāyato uppajjanato pañcadvārikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ nāma,
tika-s0201t:2263_6: Vedanā eva hi paramatthato ārammaṇaṃ vedeti,
tika-s0201t:2263_24: Adukkhamasukhañhi vedanaṃ jānantassa sukhaṃ hoti tassa sukhumabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:2263_25: yathā tadaññe dhamme salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca sammadeva avabodho paramaṃ sukhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2266_2: Aparo nayo jānanabhāvoti jānanassa ñāṇassa sabbhāvo.
tika-s0201t:2266_3: Ñāṇasampayuttā hi ñāṇopanissayā ca adukkhamasukhā vedanā sukhā iṭṭhākārā.
tika-s0201t:2266_5: Ajānanabhāvo dukkhanti ettha vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:2267_0: Katamo anusayo anusetīti kāmarāgānusayādīsu sattasu anusayesu katamo anusayo anusayavasena pavattati?
tika-s0201t:2267_3: Etena kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanārahatā nesaṃ dassitā.
tika-s0201t:2267_4: Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti.
tika-s0201t:2267_6: Te ca nippariyāyato anāgatā kilesā daṭṭhabbā,
tika-s0201t:2267_7: atītā paccuppannā ca taṃsabhāvattā tathā vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:2267_8: Na hi dhammānaṃ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi.
tika-s0201t:2267_10: nanu sabbepi kilesā appahīnā anusayā bhaveyyunti?
tika-s0201t:2267_12: atha kho pana appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagatā kilesā anusayā.
tika-s0201t:2267_13: Idaṃ thāmagamanañca rāgādīnameva āveṇiko sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0201t:2267_20: Tenāha “na sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya so appahīno”ti.
tika-s0201t:2267_22: Tenāha “na sabbaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārabbha uppajjatīti attho”ti.
tika-s0201t:2269_1: Bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma tesu khandhesu uppattirahaṃ kilesajātaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2269_2: Tena hi sā bhūmiladdhā nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:2269_5: Ārammaṇavasena hi sabbepi atītānāgate pariññātepi ca khīṇāsavānaṃ khandhe ārabbha kilesā uppajjanti mahākaccānauppalavaṇṇādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:2269_7: Yadi ca taṃ bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma siyā,
tika-s0201t:2269_8: tassa appaheyyato na koci bhavamūlaṃ pajaheyya,
tika-s0201t:2269_10: Yattha yattha hi vipassanāya apariññātā khandhā uppajjanti,
tika-s0201t:2269_11: tattha tattha uppādato pabhuti tesu vaṭṭamūlaṃ kilesajātaṃ anuseti.
tika-s0201t:2270_0: Esa nayo sabbatthāti iminā “na sabbāya dukkhāya vedanāya so appahīno,
tika-s0201t:2270_1: na sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ ārabbha uppajjatī”tiādiṃ atidisati.
tika-s0201t:2270_5: so pahīyamāno tattha pahīno nāma hotī”ti tattha tattha pahānapucchā,
tika-s0201t:2270_6: taṃ sandhāyāha “kiṃ pahātabbanti ayaṃ pahānapucchā nāmā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2271_2: Dve pucchāti anusayapucchā pahānapucchāti dvepi pucchā vissajjesi.
tika-s0201t:2271_6: “Dve pucchā vissajjesī”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “idhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2271_7: Tattha tathāvikkhambhitameva katvāti iminā yo rāgaṃ vikkhambhetvā puna uppajjituṃ appadānato tathāvikkhambhitameva katvā maggena samugghāteti,
tika-s0201t:2271_9: na tattha rāgānusayo anusetī”ti vattabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2271_10: Kāmoghādīhi catūhi oghehi saṃsārabhavogheneva vā vegasā vuyhamānesu sattesu taṃ uttaritvā pattabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2272_0: Suññatādibhedena anekabhedattā pāḷiyaṃ “anuttaresū”ti bahuvacananiddesoti “anuttarā vimokkhā”ti vatvā
tika-s0201t:2272_3: Patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentassāti “aho vatāhaṃ arahattaṃ labheyya”nti patthanaṃ upaṭṭhapentassa,
tika-s0201t:2272_7: Na kāci arahattaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā patthanā uppajjati anadhigatattā avisayabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2272_8: Parikappitarūpaṃ pana taṃ uddissa patthanā uppajjati.
tika-s0201t:2272_10: ujukaṃ pana paccayabhāvo natthīti vuttaṃ “na patthanāya paṭṭhapanamūlakaṃ uppajjatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2272_11: Idaṃ pana sevitabbaṃ domanassaṃ akusalappahānassa kusalābhivuḍḍhiyā ca nimittabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2273_0: Na kadāci pahātabbassa pahāyakatā atthīti dassento “na domanassena vā”tiādiṃ vatvā pariyāyenetaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2273_4: Paṭipadaṃ gahetvā patthanaṃ katvā patthanaṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0201t:2273_6: Sīlena hīnaṭṭhānanti aññehi arahattāya paṭipajjantehi sīlena hīnaṭṭhānaṃ kiṃ tuyhaṃ atthīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2273_7: Suparisuddhanti akhaṇḍādibhāvato sudhotajātimaṇi viya suṭṭhu parisuddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2273_8: Supaggahitanti kadācipi saṅkocābhāvato vīriyaṃ suṭṭhu paggahitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2273_9: Paññāti vipassanāpaññā paṭipakkhehi anadhibhūtatāya akuṇṭhā tikkhavisadā saṅkhārānaṃ sammasane sūrā hutvā vahati pavattati.
tika-s0201t:2273_11: Ārammaṇavasena anusayanaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “na taṃ ārabbha uppajjatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2273_12: Anuppajjanamettha pahānaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ “pahīnova tattha paṭighānusayoti attho”ti.
tika-s0201t:2273_14: sā eva ariyamaggena samucchindīyatīti “avijjānusayaṃ vikkhambhetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2274_1: Tasmāti paccanīkattā sabhāvato kiccato paccayato cāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2274_7: Yathā upekkhā sukhadukkhāni viya na oḷārikā,
tika-s0201t:2274_8: evaṃ avijjā rāgadosā viya na oḷārikā.
tika-s0201t:2274_9: Atha kho andhakārā avibhūtā duddīpanā duviññāpanāti attho.
tika-s0201t:2274_21: Pañhānaṃ paricchedapamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne aṭṭhatvā tato paraṃ pucchanto nāsakkhi pañhānaṃ pariyantaṃ gahetuṃ.
tika-s0201t:2274_25: tasmā nippariyāyato kiñci sabhāgapaṭibhāgaṃ sandhāya pucchatīti katvā “accayāsī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2274_26: Asaṅkhatassa hi appatiṭṭhassa ekantaniccassa sato nibbānassa kuto nippariyāyena sabhāgassa sambhavo.
tika-s0201t:2275_0: Viraddhoti ettha sabhāgapaṭibhāgaṃ pucchissāmīti nicchayābhāvato pucchitamatthaṃ virajjhitvāva pucchi,
tika-s0201t:2275_2: Etena heṭṭhā sabbapucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandananayena jānitvāva pavattāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:2275_3: Therī pana taṃ taṃ pucchitamatthaṃ sabhāvato vibhāventī satthu desanāñāṇaṃ anugantvāva vissajjesi.
tika-s0201t:2276_1: Paṇḍiccena samannāgatāti ettha vuttapaṇḍiccaṃ dassetuṃ “dhātukusalā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2276_6: āyatanakusalo ca paṭiccasamuppādakusalo ca ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalo ca.
tika-s0201t:2276_9: Paññāmahattaṃ nāma theriyā asekkhappaṭisambhidappattāya paṭisambhidāyo pūretvā ṭhitatāti taṃ dassetuṃ “mahante atthe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2279_1: Dhammoti gahitagahaṇānīti dhammo vā hotu itaro vā,
tika-s0201t:2280_1: Yathā cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ yathāsakaṃ visayaggahaṇaṃ sabhāvasiddhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2280_3: Te ca visayā iṭṭhākārato gahaṇe na koci doso,
tika-s0201t:2280_4: purisattabhāve na ca te dosaṃ pavattentīti ayaṃ tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ laddhīti āha “vatthukāmesupi kilesakāmesupi doso natthī”ti,
tika-s0201t:2280_12: kilesakāmavasena pana nesaṃ assādetabbatāti āha “vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena pātabyata”nti.
tika-s0201t:2280_14: Pātabyataṃ paribhuñjitabbatanti etthāpi kattuvaseneva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:2280_17: Pariññaṃ paññapentīti idaṃ “pahānamāhaṃsū”ti padasseva vevacananti “pahānaṃ samatikkamaṃ paññapentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2280_18: Tena kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammāti yāthāvato parijānanaṃ idha “pahāna”nti adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2280_21: Santāsaṃ āpajjeyyāti sāle adhivatthadevatāya pavattiṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2280_25: māluvāpattā pana koviḷārapattehi mahantatarāni ceva ghanatarāni ca honti.
tika-s0201t:2281_3: Keḷiṃ karontī viyāti vilambananadī viya keḷiṃ karontī.
tika-s0201t:2281_4: Idāni ahaṃ taṃ ajjhottharinti pamodamānā viya ito cito ca vipphandamānā vilambantī.
tika-s0201t:2281_7: Somanassajātāti pubbe anussavavasena bhavanavināsabhayā santāsaṃ āpajji,
tika-s0201t:2281_8: idāni tassā sampattidassanena palobhitā somanassajātā ahosi.
tika-s0201t:2282_0: Viṭabhiṃ kareyyāti ātānavitānavasena jaṭentī jālaṃ kareyya.
tika-s0201t:2282_1: Tathābhūtā ca ghanapattasañchannatāya chattasadisī hotīti āha “chattākārena tiṭṭheyyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2282_4: Yāva mūlā otiṇṇasākhāhīti māluvā bhārena onamitvā rukkhassa yāva mūlā otiṇṇasākhāhi puna abhiruhamānā.
tika-s0201t:2282_5: Sabbasākhāti heṭṭhā majjhe upari cāti sabbāpi sākhāyo paliveṭhentī.
tika-s0201t:2282_8: Sabbasākhā heṭṭhā katvā sayaṃ upari ṭhatvā mahābhārabhāvena vāte vā vāyante deve vā vassante padāleyya.
tika-s0201t:2283_1: Bahalarāgasabhāvoti paccavekkhaṇāhi nīharituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya balavā hutvā abhibhavanarāgadhātuko.
tika-s0201t:2283_3: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhe ārammaṇeti diṭṭhe diṭṭhe visabhāgārammaṇe.
tika-s0201t:2283_4: Nimittaṃ gaṇhātīti kilesuppattiyā kāraṇabhūtaṃ anubyañjanaso nimittaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-s0201t:2283_5: sikkhāgāravena pana kilesehi nissitaṃ maggaṃ na paṭipajjati,
tika-s0201t:2283_6: tato eva ācariyupajjhāyehi āṇattaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ karoteva.
tika-s0201t:2283_9: “ehi tāva tayā vuttaṃ mayā vuttañca amutra gantvā vīmaṃsissāmā”tiādinā hatthaggahaṇādīni karonto,
tika-s0201t:2284_2: Idāni taṃ lobhussadatādiṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “yassa hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2284_4: Lobho balavāti tajjāya sāmaggiyā sāmatthiyato lobho adhiko hoti.
tika-s0201t:2284_5: Alobho mandoti tappaṭipakkho alobho dubbalo hoti.
tika-s0201t:2284_6: Kathaṃ panete lobhālobhā aññamaññaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ekakkhaṇe pavattanti?
tika-s0201t:2284_7: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “ekakkhaṇe pavattantī”ti,
tika-s0201t:2284_8: nikantikkhaṇaṃ pana āyūhanakkhaṇameva katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2284_11: Yo hi “evaṃsundaraṃ evaṃvipulaṃ evaṃmahagghañca na sakkā parassa dātu”ntiādinā amuttacāgatādivasena pavattāya
tika-s0201t:2284_12: cetanāya sampayutto alobho sammadeva lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0201t:2284_14: Tasmāti lobhādosāmohānaṃ balavabhāvato alobhadosamohānañca dubbalabhāvatoti vuttameva kāraṇaṃ paccāmasati.
tika-s0201t:2285_0: Mandā alobhādosā lobhadose pariyādātuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-s0201t:2285_1: amoho pana balavā mohaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkotīti evaṃ yathārahaṃ paṭhamavāre vuttanayeneva atidesattho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:2286_5: eko tikoti lobhādiussadavasena akusalapakkhe eva satta vārā,
tika-s0201t:2286_6: tathā kusalapakkhe alobhādiussadavasenāti cuddasa vārā labbhanti.
tika-s0201t:2286_9: alobhadosāmohā balavantoti āgatehi kusalapakkhe tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi dosussadamohussadadosamohussadavārā gahitā eva honti.
tika-s0201t:2286_12: lobhādosamohā balavantoti āgatehi tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi adosussadaamohussadaadosāmohussadavārā gahitā
tika-s0201t:2286_13: evāti akusalakusalapakkhesu tayo tayo vāre antogadhe katvā aṭṭheva vārā dassitā.
tika-s0201t:2286_14: Ye pana ubhayasammissatāvasena lobhālobhussadavārādayo apare ekūnapaññāsa vārā kāmaṃ dassetabbā,
tika-s0201t:2286_16: Na hi “ekasmiṃ santāne antarena avatthantaraṃ lobho ca balavā alobho cā”tiādi yujjati.
tika-s0201t:2286_17: Paṭipakkhavasena vāpi etesaṃ balavadubbalabhāvo sahajātadhammavasena vā.
tika-s0201t:2286_18: Tattha lobhassa tāva paṭipakkhavasena anabhibhūtatāya balavabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:2286_27: so ca nesaṃ mandabalavabhāvo purimūpanissayato tathā āsayassa paribhāvitatāya veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:2289_1: Evaṃ idāni vuccamānākāro kāmo kāmanaṃ icchā etesanti evaṃkāmā.
tika-s0201t:2289_2: Evaṃ chando chandanaṃ rocanaṃ ajjhāsayo etesanti evaṃchandā.
tika-s0201t:2289_4: abhinivissa vā pakārehi eti upagacchatīti adhippāyo, laddhi.
tika-s0201t:2289_5: Sā hi laddhabbavatthuṃ abhimukhaṃ “evameta”nti abhinivisantī tena tena pakārena upagacchati,
tika-s0201t:2289_8: Bhagavā mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ etesaṃ yāthāvato adhigamāyāti bhagavaṃmūlakā.
tika-s0201t:2289_9: Tenāha “bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime dhamme ājānāma paṭivijjhāmā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2289_10: Amhākaṃ dhammāti tehi attanā adhigantabbatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2290_5: Asatipi mukhe atthato evaṃ vadanto viya hotīti āha “phasso āgacchati,
tika-s0201t:2290_9: attho pana sāmivacanavaseneva veditabboti dassento āha “bhagavato”ti paṭibhātūti ca bhagavato bhāgo hotu.
tika-s0201t:2290_13: Keci pana paṭibhātūti padissatūti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-s0201t:2291_2: Tatiyacatutthadhammasamādānāni hi apassāya sattānaṃ etarahi āyatiñca sampattiyo abhivaḍḍhanti.
tika-s0201t:2292_1: Uppaṭipāṭiākārenāti paṭhamaṃ saṃkilesadhamme dassetvā pacchā vodānadhammadassanaṃ satthu desanāpaṭipāṭi, yathā –
tika-s0201t:2292_5: sā ca kho purimesu dvīsu dhammasamādānesu,
tika-s0201t:2292_8: Sabhāvo hi yāthāvato rasitabbato jānitabbato “raso”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:2292_9: Paṭhamaṃ pahātabbadhamme dassetvā tadanantaraṃ “ime dhammā etehi pahīyantī”ti pahāyakadhammadassanaṃ desanānupubbī.
tika-s0201t:2293_2: micchā caritvā tathā apagamane ca pubbāparacetanānaṃ vasena micchācāro dukkhavedano hoti,
tika-s0201t:2293_6: Adinnādānaṃ musāvādo pisuṇavācā samphappalāpoti imesaṃ catunnaṃ sanniṭṭhāpakacetanānaṃ sukhasampayuttā
tika-s0201t:2293_7: vā upekkhāsampayuttā vāti ayaṃ nayo idha adhikatattā na uddhaṭo.
tika-s0201t:2293_8: Domanassameva cettha dukkhanti idaṃ pubbabhāgāparabhāgacetanāpi cettha āsannā domanassasahagatā eva hontīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2293_9: Anāsannā pana sandhāya “pariyeṭṭhiṃ vā āpajjantassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2293_10: Teneva micchācārābhijjhāmicchādiṭṭhīnaṃ pubbabhāgāparabhāgacetanā āsannā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāgatikāvāti dassitaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2293_13: Akicchenapi tesaṃ pariyesanaṃ sambhavatīti “vaṭṭatiyevā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati.
tika-s0201t:2294_2: Tāsaṃ cetanānaṃ asukhavedanatāpi labbhatīti “sukhavedanāpi hontiyevā”ti sāsaṅkavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2294_3: Somanassameva cettha sukhanti idaṃ pubbabhāgāparabhāgacetanāpi somanassasahagatā eva hontīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2294_5: Micchācārassa pana pubbāparabhāgassa vasena “kāyikaṃ sukhampi vaṭṭatiyevāti sāsaṅkavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2295_1: Dosajapariḷāhavasenassa siyā kāyikampi dukkhanti adhippāyena “so gaṇhantopi dukkhito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2295_2: Cetodukkhameva vā sandhāya tassa aparāparuppattidassanatthaṃ “dukkhito domanassito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2296_4: Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratassa kāyopi siyā vigatadarathapariḷāhoti pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādipaccayā kāyikapaṭisaṃvedanāpi
tika-s0201t:2296_5: sambhavatīti sahāpi sukhenāti ettha kāyiyasukhampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-s0201t:2299_4: Muttañhi passāvamaggato muccamānaṃ kāyusmāvasena uṇhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:2300_1: Yaṃ bhagandarasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ lohitaṃ pakkhandatīti bhagandarabyādhisahitāya lohitapakkhandatāya vasena yaṃ lohitaṃ vissavati.
tika-s0201t:2301_2: Abbhamahikādiupakkilesavigamena hi ākāsaṃ uttuṅgaṃ viya dūraṃ viya ca khāyati.
tika-s0201t:2301_5: Bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate ca idaṃ catutthaṃ dhammasamādānaṃ vibhajantena kusalakammapathassa vibhajitvā dassitattā.
tika-s0201t:2302_6: Iti attano visesādhigamanimittatāya ayaṃ devatā imaṃ suttaṃ piyāyati.
tika-s0201t:2305_2: Saṅkhāravīmaṃsakoti saṅkhatadhamme salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato vā āyatanādivibhāgato ca vīmaṃsako.
tika-s0201t:2305_3: Satthuvīmaṃsakoti “satthā nāma guṇato ediso ediso cā”ti satthu upaparikkhako.
tika-s0201t:2305_9: “idaṃ cittaṃ ito paraṃ pavattaṃ idamito para”nti parassa cittuppattiṃ pajānāti,
tika-s0201t:2306_2: Upaḍḍhaṃ attano ānubhāvenāti iminā puggalena sampādiyamānassa brahmacariyassa upaḍḍhabhāgamattaṃ attano vimuttiparipācakadhammānubhāvena sijjhati.
tika-s0201t:2306_3: Upaḍḍhaṃ kalyāṇamittānubhāvenāti itaro pana upaḍḍhabhāgo yaṃ nissāya brahmacariyaṃ vussati,
tika-s0201t:2309_3: Kalyāṇamittatāti kalyāṇo bhadro sundaro mitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto,
tika-s0201t:2309_7: Tesu eva cittena ceva kāyena ca ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena pavatti kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā.
tika-s0201t:2309_16: Idāni taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “mamaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2310_1: aññesupi suttesu kalyāṇamittupanissayameva visesoti dassento “bhikkhūnaṃ bāhiraṅgasampattiṃ kathentopī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:2311_0: Kāyiko samācāroti abhikkamapaṭikkamādiko satisampajaññaparikkhato pākatiko ca.
tika-s0201t:2311_6: Te pana tehi samannāgatā hontīti āha “kilesasampayuttā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2311_8: pāḷiyaṃ kathaṃ tathā vuttāti āha “yathā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2311_10: Bhavati hi taṃhetukepi tadupacāro yathā “semho guḷo”ti.
tika-s0201t:2311_11: “Mā me idaṃ asāruppaṃ paro aññāsī”ti pana paṭicchannatāya na na upalabbhanti.
tika-s0201t:2311_13: bhagavato kiñci garahāmā”ti vatvā garahitabbābhāvaṃ dassento “bhagavā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:2311_16: Esa uttaro māṇavo “buddhampi garahitvā pakkamissāmī”ti katvā anubandhi.
tika-s0201t:2311_17: Evaṃ cintesi mahābhinikkhamanadivase attano vacane aṭṭhitattā.
tika-s0201t:2314_1: kāle sukkāti yathāsamādinnaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ parisuddhaṃ katvā pavattetuṃ asakkontassa kadāci kaṇhā aparisuddhā kāyasamācārādayo,
tika-s0201t:2314_2: kadāci sukkā parisuddhāti evaṃ antarantarā byāmissavasena vomissakā.
tika-s0201t:2315_4: Attanā katassa asāruppassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ āraññako viya hutvā.
tika-s0201t:2315_5: Tassa parihāranti uḷārehi pūjāsakkārehi manussehi tassa parihariyamānataṃ.
tika-s0201t:2315_6: Atidappitoti evaṃ manussānaṃ sambhāvanāya ativiya datto gabbito.
tika-s0201t:2316_3: Idāni anekajātisamudācāravasena tathāgato imaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ dīgharattaṃ samāpanno,
tika-s0201t:2316_4: tañcassa ativiya acchariyanti dassetuṃ “anacchariyaṃ ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2317_1: Tattha nesaṃ divase divase piṇḍāya caraṇassa avicchinnataṃ dassetuṃ “piṇḍāya carantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2318_0: Tadā kira videharaṭṭhe soḷasa gāmasahassāni mahantāneva. Tenāha –
tika-s0201t:2318_3: Idāni kasmā “sannidhiṃ dāni kubbasī”ti maṃ ghaṭṭethāti vatthukāmo taṃ anāvikatvā “loṇa…pe…
tika-s0201t:2318_5: Gandhāro tassādhippāyaṃ vibhāvetukāmo “kiṃ mayā kataṃ vedehīsī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:2319_1: Itaro “dhammaṃ bhaṇāmī”ti gāthanti evaṃ sabbāpi nesaṃ vacanapaṭivacanagāthā.
tika-s0201t:2319_5: No ce assa sakā buddhītiādi vedehaisino –
tika-s0201t:2319_6: “ācariyo mama hitesitāya ṭhatvā dhammaṃ eva bhaṇatī”ti yoniso ummujjanākāradassanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2321_0: Tattha tattha vijjhantoti yasamadena parivāramadena ca matto hutvā gāmepi vihārepi janavivittepi saṅghamajjhepi
tika-s0201t:2321_1: aññe bhikkhū ghaṭṭento “mayhaṃ nāma pādā itaresaṃ pādaphusanaṭṭhānaṃ phusantī”ti aphusitukāmatāya aggapādena
tika-s0201t:2321_3: Onamatīti nivātavuttitāya avanamati anuddhato atthaddho hoti.
tika-s0201t:2321_4: Akiñcanabhāvanti “pabbajitena nāma akiñcanañāṇena samapariggahena bhavitabba”nti akiñcanajjhāsayaṃ paṭiavekkhitvā.
tika-s0201t:2321_6: alābhepi tādīti yathā alābhakāle lābhassa laddhakālepi tathevāti tādī ekasadiso.
tika-s0201t:2322_0: Abhayo hutvā uparatoti nibbhayo hutvā bhayassa abhāveneva oramitabbato uparato bhayahetūnaṃ pahīnattā.
tika-s0201t:2322_3: Atha kho bhāyitabbavatthuṃ avekkhitvā tato bhayena uparato.
tika-s0201t:2323_2: Dvinnaṃ majjhe thaṇḍilapīṭhakā dvāre ṭhatvā olokentassa nevāsikabhikkhussa na paññāyi.
tika-s0201t:2323_4: “Maṃ bhāyanto heṭṭhāmañcaṃ paviṭṭho bhavissatī”ti heṭṭhāmañcaṃ oloketvā.
tika-s0201t:2323_5: Ukkāsi “bahi gacchanto akkositvā mā apuññaṃ pasavī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2323_6: Adhivāsetunti tādisaṃ iddhānabhāvaṃ disvāpi paṭapaṭāyanto attano kodhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto.
tika-s0201t:2324_1: Na paṭisaṅkhāya vāretvāti na paṭisaṅkhānabalena rāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ nivāretvā vītarāgattā.
tika-s0201t:2324_3: Kāyasamācārādīnaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhānaṃ vītikkamiyānañca abhāvaṃ ācārassa vodānaṃ cirakālasamāciṇṇatāya ñātassa
tika-s0201t:2324_4: sahitabhāvepi anupakkiliṭṭhatāya abhayūparatabhāvasamannesanāya ākarīyati ñāpetuṃ icchito attho pakārato
tika-s0201t:2324_7: Tāni pana yasmā attano yathānumatassa atthassa ñāpakabhāvena vavatthīyanti,
tika-s0201t:2324_8: tasmā tāni tesaṃ mūlakāraṇabhūtāni anumānañāṇāni ca dassento bhagavā –
tika-s0201t:2324_9: “ke panāyasmato ākārā ke anvayā”ti avocāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “ākārāti kāraṇāni,
tika-s0201t:2324_11: Yathā hi loke diṭṭhena dhūmena adiṭṭhaṃ aggiṃ anveti anumānato jānāti,
tika-s0201t:2324_13: “bhagavā ekekavihāresu suppaṭipannesu duppaṭipannesu ca yathā ekasadisatādassanena abhayūparatataṃ anveti anumānato jānāti,
tika-s0201t:2324_16: evaṃ jānanto ca abhayūparato tathāgato sabbadhi vītarāgattā,
tika-s0201t:2324_18: na so tannimittaṃ kiñci bhayaṃ passati seyyathāpi brahmā kāmabhavanimittaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2324_21: suppaṭipanno saṅgho aveccappasannattā”ti vatthuttayaṃ guṇato yāthāvato jānāti.
tika-s0201t:2325_0: Gaṇabandhanenāti “mama saddhivihārikā mama antevāsikā”ti evaṃ gaṇe apekkhāsaṅkhātena bandhanena baddhā payuttā.
tika-s0201t:2325_1: Tāya tāya paṭipattiyāti “sugatā duggatā”ti vuttāya suppaṭipattiyā duppaṭipattiyā ca.
tika-s0201t:2325_4: Ubhayattha gehassitavasenāti iminā sammāpaṭipattiyā paresaṃ uyyojanatthaṃ – “paṇḍito,
tika-s0201t:2325_6: mahākaccāno”tiādinā guṇato ukkaṃsanampi āyatiṃ saṃvarāya yathāparādhaṃ garahaṇampi na nivāreti.
tika-s0201t:2326_6: Tathāgatova paṭipucchitabboti iminā pubbe sādhāraṇato vuttaṃ anumānaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā vadati.
tika-s0201t:2326_8: yadidaṃ sabbaññuvacanaṃ avisaṃvādaṃ sāmaññato aputhujjanagocarassa atthassa anumānato.
tika-s0201t:2326_13: yo ghaṭādīsu pasiddhena paccayāyattabhāvena sādhiyamāno saddādīnaṃ aniccatādiākāro.
tika-s0201t:2326_16: Tattha yassa satthuno vacanaṃ paccakkhasiddhe anumānasiddhe ca atthe na visaṃvādeti aviparītappavattiyā,
tika-s0201t:2326_18: saddheyyarūpā eva ca yebhuyyena satthuguṇā accantasambhavato.
tika-s0201t:2327_0: Esa mayhaṃ pathoti yvāyaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlasaṅkhāto mayhaṃ oramattako guṇo,
tika-s0201t:2327_1: esa aparacittaviduno vīmaṃsakassa bhikkhuno mama jānanapatho jānanamaggo.
tika-s0201t:2327_2: Esa gocaroti eso ettako eva tassa mayi gocaro,
tika-s0201t:2327_4: Tathā hi brahmajālepi bhagavatā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlameva niddiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2327_7: “imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”ti taṇhāya parāmasanto,
tika-s0201t:2327_9: nibbedhabhāgiyatāya vā akāraṇena taṇhaṃ anativattanato so tammayo nāma.
tika-s0201t:2328_0: Sutassa uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena uttaruttarañceva tassa ca visesassa anukkamena paṇītatarabhāvato paṇītatarañca katvā deseti.
tika-s0201t:2328_2: Kaṇhaṃ paṭibāhitvā sukkanti idaṃ dhammajātaṃ kaṇhaṃ nāma,
tika-s0201t:2328_3: imassa pahāyakaṃ idaṃ sukkaṃ nāmāti evaṃ kaṇhaṃ paṭibāhitvā sukkaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2328_4: Sukkaṃ paṭibāhitvā kaṇhanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0201t:2328_9: Tasmiṃ desite dhammeti tasmiṃ satthārā desite lokiyalokuttaradhamme.
tika-s0201t:2328_10: Ekaccaṃ ekadesabhūtaṃ maggaphalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ paṭivedhadhammaṃ abhiññāya abhivisiṭṭhāya maggapaññāya jānitvā.
tika-s0201t:2328_12: Desanādhammeti desanāruḷhe pubbabhāgiye bodhipakkhiyadhamme niṭṭhaṃ gacchati –
tika-s0201t:2328_15: tato bhiyyosomattāya aviparītadhammadesano sammāsambuddho so bhagavāti satthari pasīdati.
tika-s0201t:2328_18: saddena aññaṃ asāmīcipariyāyaṃ sabbaṃ dosaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:2329_3: Akkharasampiṇḍanapadehīti tesaṃyeva kāraṇānaṃ sambodhanehi akkharasamudāyalakkhaṇehi padehi.
tika-s0201t:2329_4: Idha vuttehi akkharehīti imasmiṃ sutte vuttehi yathāvuttassa atthassa abhibyañjanato byañjanasaññitehi akkharehi.
tika-s0201t:2329_6: Saddhāya mūlaṃ nāmāti aveccappasādabhūtāya saddhāya mūlaṃ nāma kāraṇanti saddahanassa kāraṇaṃ parisuddhakāyasamācārādikaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2329_9: Itaresu samaṇabrāhmaṇadevesu vattabbameva natthīti āha “samitapāpasamaṇena vā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2330_0: “Buddhānaṃ kesañci sāvakānañca vibādhanatthaṃ māro upagacchatī”ti sutapubbattā “ayaṃ māro āgato”ti cintesi.
tika-s0201t:2330_1: Ānubhāvasampannena ariyasāvakena pucchitattā musāvādaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0201t:2334_0: Ghositaseṭṭhinā kārite ārāmeti ettha ko ghositaseṭṭhi,
tika-s0201t:2334_1: kathañcānena ārāmo kāritoti antolīnāya codanāya vissajjane samudāgamato paṭṭhāya ghositaseṭṭhiṃ dassetuṃ “addilaraṭṭhaṃ nāma ahosī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2334_5: taṃ pana garu siniddhaṃ antarāmagge appāhāratāya mandagahaṇiko samāno jīrāpetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0201t:2334_8: Ghositaseṭṭhi nāma jātoti evamettha saṅkhepeneva ghositaseṭṭhivatthuṃ katheti,
tika-s0201t:2336_0: Kalahassa pubbabhāgo bhaṇḍanaṃ nāmāti kalahassa hetubhūtā paribhāsā taṃsadisī ca aniṭṭhakiriyā bhaṇḍanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0201t:2336_1: Hatthaparāmāsādivasenāti kujjhitvā aññamaññassa hatthe gahetvā parāmasanaaccantabandhanādivasena.
tika-s0201t:2336_4: Mukhasannissitatāya vācā idha “mukha”nti adhippetāti āha “mukhasattīhīti vācāsattīhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2337_0: Sace hoti desessāmīti subbacatāya sikkhākāmatāya ca āpattiṃ passi.
tika-s0201t:2337_1: Natthi te āpattīti anāpattipakkhopi ettha sambhavatīti adhippāyenāha.
tika-s0201t:2338_2: Yathānusandhināva gatanti kalahabhaṇḍanānaṃ sāraṇīyadhammapaṭipakkhattā tadupasamāvahā heṭṭhādesanāya
tika-s0201t:2338_8: Saṅgahaṇatthāyāti saṅgahavatthuvisesabhāvato sabrahmacārīnaṃ saṅgaṇhanāya saṃvattantīti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:2338_10: Sati ca avivādanahetubhūtasaṅgāhaṇatte tesaṃ vasena sabrahmacārīnaṃ samaggabhāvo bhedābhāvo siddhoyevāti āha “sāmaggiyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2338_17: Imāni mettakāyakammādīni bhikkhūnaṃ vasena āgatāni pāṭhe bhikkhūhi paccupaṭṭhapetabbatāvacanato.
tika-s0201t:2338_22: Vattavasena pavattiyamānā cetiyabodhīnaṃ vandanā mettāsadisīti katvā tadatthāya gamanaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammanti vuttaṃ. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:2338_23: saddena cetiyabodhibhikkhūsu vuttāvasesaapacāyanādiṃ mettāvasena pavattaṃ kāyikaṃ kiriyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:2339_2: Cintananti iminā evaṃ cintanamattampi mettaṃ manokammaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2340_1: Tesu karontesuyeva hi sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ sammukhā kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0201t:2340_2: Kevalaṃ “devo”ti avatvā guṇehi thirabhāvajotanaṃ devattheroti vacanaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2340_4: Ekantatirokkhakassa manokammassa sammukhatā nāma viññattisamuṭṭhāpanavaseneva hoti,
tika-s0201t:2340_5: tañca kho loke kāyakammanti pākaṭaṃ paññātaṃ hatthavikārādiṃ anāmasitvā eva dassento “nayanāni ummīletvā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:2340_6: Tathā hi vacībhedavasena pavatti na gahitā.
tika-s0201t:2341_2: Na sammā gayhamānāpi na dhammaladdhā nāma na hontīti tappaṭisedhanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “dhammaladdhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2341_3: Deyyaṃ dakkhiṇeyyañca appaṭivibhattaṃ katvā bhuñjatīti appaṭivibhattabhogī.
tika-s0201t:2342_1: passatīti iminā āgamanato paṭṭhāya sādhāraṇabuddhiṃ upaṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0201t:2343_1: Attano palibodhavasena sapalibodhasseva pūretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā odissakadānampissa na sabbattha vāritanti dassetuṃ “tena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2343_3: saddena dussīlassapi atthikassa sati sambhave dātabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2344_3: pattagataṃ na khīyatīti āha tesaṃ kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2344_4: Taṃ sutvā tepi therā “sāraṇīyadhammapūrako aya”nti abbhaññaṃsu.
tika-s0201t:2344_6: tassā ca paṭipattiyā avañjhabhāvavibhāvanatthaṃ “ete mayhaṃ pāpuṇissantī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:2345_1: mama pattapariyāpannenapi sabbāpimā bhikkhuniyo yāpessantīti āha “mā tumhe tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ cintayitthā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2346_0: Sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā,
tika-s0201t:2346_2: Na hi añño koci āpattikkhandhānaṃ anukkamo atthi.
tika-s0201t:2346_10: visabhāgavaṇṇeheva pana bindūhi antarantarā vimissaṃ kammāsaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2346_13: Bhujissabhāvakaraṇatoti iminā bhujissakarāni bhujissānīti uttarapadalopenāyaṃ niddesoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2346_16: “imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”ti taṇhāparāmāsena –
tika-s0201t:2346_17: “imināhaṃ sīlena devo hutvā tattha nicco dhuvo sassato bhavissāmī”ti diṭṭhiparāmāsena ca aparāmaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0201t:2346_19: Sīlaṃ nāma avippaṭisārādipārampariyena yāvadeva samādhisampādanatthanti āha “samādhisaṃvattakānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2346_21: paripuṇṇacatupārisuddhibhāvena majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇassa viya bhedābhāvato sīlena sāmaññaṃ sīlasāmaññaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2347_0: Yāyaṃ diṭṭhīti yā ayaṃ diṭṭhi mayhañceva tumhākañca paccakkhabhūtā.
tika-s0201t:2347_7: suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti ca diṭṭhiyā sāmaññaṃ samānadiṭṭhibhāvaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2347_10: tato eva tesaṃ saṅghāṭanikaṃ gopānasiyo aparipatante katvā saṅgaṇhāti dhāretīti saṅgāhikaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2348_3: Ettāvatāpīti ettakenapi rāgādīsu ekekena pariyuṭṭhitacittatāyapi pariyuṭṭhitacittoyeva nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:2348_7: Suṭṭhu ṭhapitanti yathā maggabhāvanā upari saccābhisambodho hoti,
