tika-s0201t:2348_10: Taṃ ñāṇanti “natthi kho me taṃ pariyuṭṭhāna”ntiādinā pavattaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2349_3: “Paccattaṃ attano citte nibbutiṃ kilesavūpasamaṃ labhāmī”ti imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati.
tika-s0201t:2350_1: Tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyāti idaṃ “yathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato”ti imassa atthassa paccāmasananti āha “tathārūpāya
tika-s0201t:2351_9: Evampi yuvāvatthāpi keci mandindriyā hontīti tannivattanatthaṃ “uttānaseyyako”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2351_12: Yathā tathā aṅgārassa phusanaṃ idha “akkamana”nti adhippetanti āha “ito cito cā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2352_11: Tanninno hotīti adhisīlasikkhādininnova hoti uccāvacānampi kiṃkaraṇīyānaṃ cārittasīlassa pūraṇavaseneva karaṇato,
tika-s0201t:2352_13: Therassa santike aṭṭhāsi yonisomanasikārābhāvato “taṃ taṃ samullapissāmī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2353_2: Atthikabhāvaṃ katvāti tena dhammena savisesaṃ atthikabhāvaṃ uppādetvā.
tika-s0201t:2353_3: Sakalacittenāti desanāyaādimhi majjhe pariyosāneti sabbattheva pavattatāya sakalena anavasesena cittena.
tika-s0201t:2354_1: Sabhāvoti ariyasāvakassa puthujjanehi asādhāraṇatāya āveṇiko sabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:2354_8: Ayaṃ tāva ācariyānaṃ samānakathāti “idamassa paṭhamaṃ ñāṇa”ntiādinā vuttāni paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni,
tika-s0201t:2354_9: na maggañāṇānīti evaṃ pavattā paramparāgatā pubbācariyānaṃ samānā sādhāraṇā imissā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathā atthavaṇṇanā.
tika-s0201t:2354_10: Tattha kāraṇamāha “lokuttaramaggo hi bahucittakkhaṇiko nāma natthī”ti.
tika-s0201t:2354_12: tathā sati saṃyojanattayādīnaṃ ekadesappahānaṃ pāpuṇātīti ariyamaggassa anantaraphalattā ekadesasotāpannatādibhāvo āpajjati,
tika-s0201t:2355_0: Yaṃ pana suttapadaṃ nissāya vitaṇḍavādī ariyamaggassa ekacittakkhaṇikataṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-s0201t:2355_1: taṃ dassento “satta vassānīti hi vacanato”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:2355_3: chijjantīti vadantena hi khippaṃ tāva kilesappahānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2355_5: Tattha sace maggassa bhāvanāya āraddhamattāya kilesā pahīyanti,
tika-s0201t:2355_8: kilesā pana lahu chijjantīti idaṃ micchā,
tika-s0201t:2355_11: Maggaṃ abhāvetvāti ariyamaggaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā abhāvetvā.
tika-s0201t:2355_12: Attharasaṃ viditvāti suttassa aviparīto attho eva attharaso,
tika-s0201t:2355_14: Evaṃ vitaṇḍavādivādaṃ bhinditvā vuttamevatthaṃ nigametuṃ “imāni satta ñāṇānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2358_1: “Sassato attā ca loko cā”ti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0201t:2358_15: Ṭhānena saddhiṃ tannivāsīnaṃ niccabhāvañhi so paṭijānāti.
tika-s0201t:2358_18: Paṭibāhatīti santaṃyeva samānaṃ ajānantova natthīti paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0201t:2358_19: Avijjāya gatoti avijjāya saha gato pavatto.
tika-s0201t:2359_1: Tadā bhagavato subhagavane viharaṇassa avicchinnataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “subhagavane viharatīti ñatvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2359_2: Tattha pana tadāssa bhagavato adassanaṃ sandhāyāha “kattha nu kho gatoti olokento”ti.
tika-s0201t:2359_3: Brahmalokaṃ gacchantaṃ disvāti iminā katipayacittavāravasena tadā bhagavato brahmalokagamanaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2359_6: “seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyyā”tiādivacanato.
tika-s0201t:2360_1: Tathā abhibhavato hi tassa sarīraṃ paviṭṭho viya hotīti vuttaṃ “sarīraṃ pavisitvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2360_3: tassa pākatikakiriyamayaṃ cittappavattiṃ nivāretvā attano iddhānubhāvena yaṃ icchitaṃ hasitalapitādi,
tika-s0201t:2360_6: “Attanovā”ti na vattabbametaṃ acinteyyattā kammajassa iddhānubhāvassāti keci.
tika-s0201t:2360_7: Apare pana yathā tadā cakkhuviññāṇādipavatti āviṭṭhapuggalasseva,
tika-s0201t:2360_10: Tathā hi mahānubhāvaṃ puggalaṃ te āvisituṃ na sakkonti,
tika-s0201t:2360_11: tikicchāvuṭṭhāpane pana chavasarīraṃ anupavisitvā satantaṃ karoti vijjānubhāvena.
tika-s0201t:2360_12: Korakhattiyādīnaṃ pana chavasarīrassa uṭṭhānaṃ vacīnicchāraṇañca kevalaṃ buddhānubhāvena.
tika-s0201t:2360_14: Abhibhavitvā ṭhitoti sakalalokaṃ attano ānubhāvena abhibhavitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0201t:2360_22: seṭṭhattā nimmāpakattā ca attano vase vatteti.
tika-s0201t:2361_2: Sattānaṃ nimmānaṃ tathā tathā sajanaṃ visajanaṃ viya hotīti āha “tvaṃ khattiyo”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2361_3: Jhānādīsu attano citte ca ciṇṇavasittā vasī.
tika-s0201t:2362_4: te yathābhūtavāditāya brahmakāyūpagā ahesunti māro pāpimā anvayato byatirekato ca pathavīādimukhena saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0201t:2362_12: Ābhassarādayo pana avisayatāya eva anena aggahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2362_17: Brahmuno ovāde ṭhitānaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ dassetīti tesaṃ tattha sannipatitabrahmānaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ tassa
tika-s0201t:2362_18: mahābrahmuno ovāde ṭhitattā nibbattaṃ katvā dasseti.
tika-s0201t:2362_21: Maṃ brahmaparisaṃ upanesīti yādisā brahmaparisā issariyādisampattiyā,
tika-s0201t:2362_23: Mahājanassa māraṇatoti mahājanassa vivaṭṭūpanissayaguṇavināsanena ānubhāvena māraṇato.
tika-s0201t:2363_6: Mama vatthusmiṃ sayanakoti mayhaṃ ṭhāne visaye vattanako.
tika-s0201t:2363_9: Jajjharikāgumbatoti ettha jajjharikā nāma pathaviṃ pattharitvā jātā ekā gacchajāti.
tika-s0201t:2364_4: Sesapadehīti vatthusāyiko yathākāmakaraṇīyo bāhiteyyoti imehi padehi.
tika-s0201t:2364_5: Mayhaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhissasīti mama ārakkhako bhavissasi.
tika-s0201t:2365_4: Tañhi kāraṇavasena gantabbato adhigantabbato gatīti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:2365_6: So hi jotanaṭṭhena virocanaṭṭhena jutīti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:2365_7: Mahatā ānubhāvena paresaṃ abhibhavanato mahesoti akkhāyatīti mahesakkho.
tika-s0201t:2365_8: Tayidaṃ abhibhavanaṃ kittisampattiyā parivārasampattiyā cāti āha “mahāyaso mahāparivāro”ti.
tika-s0201t:2366_1: Disāti bhummatthe etaṃ paccattavacananti āha “disāsu virocamānā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2366_4: Tattakena pamāṇenāti yattake candimasūriyehi obhāsiyamāno lokadhātusaṅkhāto eko loko,
tika-s0201t:2366_6: Idaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ buddhānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ padhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2366_7: tasmā yebhuyyena etthupapannā devatā aññesu cakkavāḷesu devatā abhibhuyya vattanti.
tika-s0201t:2366_8: Tathā hi brahmā sahampati dasasahassabrahmaparivāro bhagavato santikaṃ upagañchi.
tika-s0201t:2366_10: Idāni “ettha te vattate vaso”ti vuttaṃ vase vattanaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “paroparañca jānāsī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2366_12: saddaṃ ānetvā attho veditabboti dassento “ettha cakkavāḷasahasse”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:2366_13: Uccanīceti jātikularūpabhogaparivārādivasena uḷāre ca anuḷāre ca.
tika-s0201t:2366_14: Ayaṃ iddho ayaṃ pakatimanussoti iminā “sarūpato evassa sattānaṃ paroparajānanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2366_17: taṃ kāmaloke sattānaṃ ādānanikkhepajānanamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2366_23: Rāgayogato rāgo etassa atthīti vā rāgo,
tika-s0201t:2366_26: Sahassibrahmā nāma tvaṃ cūḷaniyā eva lokadhātuyā jānanato.
tika-s0201t:2366_28: Catuhatthāyāti anekahatthena sāṇipākārena kātabbapaṭappamāṇaṃ dīghato catuhatthāya,
tika-s0201t:2366_29: vitthārato dvihatthāya pilotikāya kātuṃ vāyamanto viya gopphake udake nimujjitukāmo viya ca pamāṇaṃ ajānanto vihaññatīti niggaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:2367_2: Jānitabbaṭṭhānaṃ patvāpīti anaññasādhāraṇā mayhaṃ sīlādayo guṇavisesā tāva tiṭṭhantu,
tika-s0201t:2367_5: tassa bhāvo nīceyyanti āha “tayā nīcatarabhāvo pana mayhaṃ kuto”ti.
tika-s0201t:2368_1: Evaṃ saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “anuppanne buddhuppāde”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:2368_3: Yathā kenaci bahūsu ānantariyesu katesu yaṃ tattha garutaraṃ balavaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2368_7: evaṃ catūsu rūpajjhānesu bhāvitesu yaṃ tattha garutaraṃ chandapaṇidhiadhimokkhādivasena sābhisaṅkhārañca,
tika-s0201t:2368_9: itarāni pana aladdhokāsatāya tassa anubalappadāyakāni honti,
tika-s0201t:2368_11: tannibbattitajjhāneneva āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti hotīti āha “tatiyajjhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:2368_16: tattha nibbattiyā hetubhūtaṃ attano katakammanti ubhayaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2368_18: Vītināmeti paṭipajjantīti ca tadā tassā kiriyāya pavattikkhaṇaṃ upādāya pavattamānapayogo.
tika-s0201t:2369_5: Vatasīlavattanti samādānavasena vatabhūtaṃ cārittasīlabhāvena samāciṇṇattā sīlavattaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2369_6: Suttappabuddhova anussarāmīti supitvā pabuddhamatto viya supinaṃ tava pubbanivutthaṃ mama pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena anussarāmi,
tika-s0201t:2370_0: Karamareti vilumpitvā ānīte. Kammasajjanti yuddhasajjaṃ, āvudhādāyininti attho.
tika-s0201t:2371_0: Eṇīkūlasminti eṇīmigabāhullena “eṇīkūla”nti saṅkhaṃ gate gaṅgāya tīrappadese.
tika-s0201t:2371_1: Gayhaka nīyamānanti gayhavasena karamarabhāvena corehi attano ṭhānaṃ nīyamānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2372_1: “Evaṃ amhesu kīḷantesu gaṅgeyyako nāgo kupito”ti mayi saññampi na karontīti.
tika-s0201t:2373_0: Gahītanāvanti viheṭhetukāmatāya gatinivāraṇavasena gahitaṃ niggahitaṃ nāvaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2374_2: Taṃ nissāyevāti raññā upaṭṭhiyamānopi rājānaṃ pahāya taṃ kappaṃ antevāsiṃ nissāyeva.
tika-s0201t:2375_0: Sambuddhimantaṃ vatinaṃ amaññīti ayaṃ sammadeva buddhimā vatasampannoti amaññi sambhāvesi ca.
tika-s0201t:2377_1: Mametamāyunti mayhaṃ etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ tattha tattha bhave pavattaṃ āyuṃ.
tika-s0201t:2377_7: Tathā hi sammāsambuddhattā eva te ayaṃ jalito jotamāno ānubhāvo obhāsayaṃ sabbampi brahmalokaṃ obhāsento
tika-s0201t:2378_4: “yattha neva pathavī”ti asādhāraṇato ca pathaviyā asabhāvena nibbānassa gahetabbatā atthi,
tika-s0201t:2378_5: taṃ nivattetvā pathaviyā anaññasādhāraṇaṃ sabhāvaṃ gahetuṃ “pathaviyā pathavattenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2378_7: Idha pathaviyā pāpuṇanaṃ nāma “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā gahaṇanti āha “taṇhādiṭṭhimānaggāhehi na gaṇhi”nti.
tika-s0201t:2379_1: Sabbanti akkharaṃ niddisitvāti “sabbaṃ kho ahaṃ brahme”tiādinā bhagavatā vuttaṃ sabba- saddaṃ –
tika-s0201t:2379_2: “sace kho te mārisa sabbassa sabbattena ananubhūta”nti paccanubhāsanavasena niddisitvā.
tika-s0201t:2379_3: Akkhare dosaṃ gaṇhantoti bhagavatā sakkāyasabbaṃ sandhāya sabba-
tika-s0201t:2379_7: Tattha yadi sabbaṃ ananubhūtaṃ “natthi sabba”nti loke anavasesaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0201t:2379_8: Sace sabbassa sabbattena anavasesasabhāvena ananubhūtaṃ appattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2379_9: taṃ gaganakusumaṃ viya kiñci na siyā.
tika-s0201t:2379_10: Athassa ananubhūtaṃ atthīti assa sabbattena ananubhūtaṃ yadi atthi,
tika-s0201t:2379_12: sabbaṃ nāma taṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2380_4: Kāraṇaṃ āharantoti sabbassa sabbattena ananubhūtassa atthibhāve kāraṇaṃ niddisanto.
tika-s0201t:2380_6: Anidassananti idaṃ nibbānassa sanidassanaduke dutiyapadasahitatādassananti adhippāyena “cakkhuviññāṇassa
tika-s0201t:2380_8: Sabbasaṅkhatavidhuratāya vā natthi etassa nidassananti anidassanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2381_3: Apabhassarabhāvahetūnaṃ sabbaso abhāvā sabbato pabhāti sabbatopabhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2381_8: Arūpībhāvena adesikattā sabbato pabhavati vijjatīti sabbatopabhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2381_15: Vādaṃ patiṭṭhapesīti evaṃ mayā sabbañca vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2381_17: tattha yaṃ tayā adhippāyaṃ ajānantena sahasā appaṭisaṅkhāya dosaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2381_18: taṃ micchāti brahmānaṃ niggaṇhanto bhagavā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhapesi.
tika-s0201t:2382_1: Tattha tattha dosadassanamukhena niggaṇhantena satthārā vissajjāpito kiñci gahetabbaṃ attano paṭisaraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:2382_2: adisvā parājayaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ laḷitakaṃ kātukāmo vādaṃ pahāya iddhiyā pāṭihāriyalīḷaṃ dassetukāmo.
tika-s0201t:2382_5: Mūlapaṭisandhiṃ gantukāmoti attano pākatikena attabhāvena ṭhātukāmo.
tika-s0201t:2382_6: So hi paṭisandhikāle nibbattasadisatāya mūlapaṭisandhīti vutto.
tika-s0201t:2382_10: Tena so abhisaṅkhatakāyaṃ apanetuṃ avisahanto attabhāvapaṭicchādakaṃ andhakāraṃ nimminituṃ ārabhi.
tika-s0201t:2383_2: saddo aṭṭhānapayuttoti dassento āha “ahaṃ bhave bhayaṃ disvāyevā”ti,
tika-s0201t:2383_3: sabbasmiṃ bhave jātiādibhayaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā yāthāvato disvā.
tika-s0201t:2383_8: Bhavañca vibhavesinaṃ vibhavaṃ nibbutiṃ esamānānaṃ sattānaṃ bhavaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2383_9: bhavesu uppattiñca disvāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:2383_10: Na abhivadinti “aho vata sukha”nti evaṃ abhivadāpanākārābhāvato na abhinivisiṃ,
tika-s0201t:2383_18: nandiñca na upādiyinti iminā maggasaccaṃ pakāsitanti āha “iti cattāri saccāni pakāsento”ti.
tika-s0201t:2383_20: Satthā pana tesaṃ brahmūnaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ saccāni vitthārato pakāsento vipassanaṃ pāpetvā arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
tika-s0201t:2383_25: Tena vuttaṃ “saccāni pakāsento satthā dhammaṃ desesī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2384_1: Mama vasaṃ ativattitānīti sabbaso kāmadhātusamatikkamanapaṭipadāya mayhaṃ visayaṃ atikkamitāni.
tika-s0201t:2384_5: nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsento veneyyajanaṃ nibbānaṃ diṭṭhameva karoti,
tika-s0201t:2384_6: tassa desanā avañjhā amoghā indena vissaṭṭhavajirasadisā,
tika-s0201t:2384_7: tassa ca āṇāya ṭhitā saṃsāre na dissantevā”ti nayaggāhena anumānena jānāti.
tika-s0201t:2384_8: Sace tvaṃ evaṃ anubuddhoti yathā tvaṃ paresaṃ saccābhisambodhaṃ vadati,
tika-s0201t:2384_9: evaṃ tvaṃ attano anurūpato sayambhuñāṇena buddho dhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0201t:2384_10: Taṃ dhammaṃ mā upanayasīti tayā paṭividdhadhammaṃ mā sāvakapaṭivedhaṃ pāpesi.
tika-s0201t:2384_11: Idanti idaṃ anantaraṃ vuttaṃ brahmaloke patiṭṭhānaṃyeva sandhāya māro vadati,
tika-s0201t:2384_14: ye keci vā pabbajitvā micchāpaṭipanne jane sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0201t:2384_17: Anullapanatāyāti yathā māro upari kiñci uttaraṃ lapituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0201t:2384_21: brahmuno vā nimantanaṃ ettha atthīti brahmanimantanikaṃ, suttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2387_4: Sukhumañhi tadanucchavikaṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā ayaṃ tattha paviṭṭho.
tika-s0201t:2387_13: Uttarapadalopena vinā atthaṃ dassetuṃ “māsapūritapasibbako viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2387_15: Kiṃ nu kho etaṃ mama kucchiyaṃ pubbaṃ bhārikattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2387_16: kiṃ nu kho kathaṃ nu kho jātanti adhippāyo?
tika-s0201t:2387_18: Byatirekato panassa anupāyaṃ dassetuṃ “sace panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2387_19: Attānameva vā sandhāya “mā tathāgataṃ vihesesī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:2387_21: saṅghaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotū”tiādīsu tathāgatoti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:2387_23: yathā ca purimakā dutiyaaggasāvakā kappānaṃ satasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā āgatā,
tika-s0201t:2388_2: tasmā nesaṃ manussagandho paricitattā nātijegucchoti āha “ākāsaṭṭhadevatāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:2388_7: Anādimati hi saṃsāre ñātibhāgarahito nāma satto kassacipi natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2388_8: Idanti “so me tvaṃ bhāgineyyo hosī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2388_9: Paveṇivasenāti tadā mayhaṃ bhāgineyyo hutvā idāni māraṭṭhāne ṭhitoti imissā paveṇiyā vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2389_6: Etesanti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tumhākaṃ akkosanādīhi bhikkhūnaṃ kilesuppattiyā.
tika-s0201t:2389_7: Tenettha dūsī māro otāraṃ labhati nāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2390_0: Manussānaṃ akusalaṃ na bhaveyya tesaṃ tādisāya abhisandhiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2390_1: Āvesakassa ānubhāvena āviṭṭhassa cittasantati viparivattatīti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0201t:2391_3: Purimanayenevāti “sace māro manussānaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena.
tika-s0201t:2391_7: sarīre pana anadhimuccitvā tādisaṃ pasādanīyaṃ pasādavatthuṃ dassesi.
tika-s0201t:2392_1: Asubhasaññāparicitenāti sakalaṃ kāyaṃ asubhanti pavattāya saññāya sahagatajjhānaṃ asubhasaññā,
tika-s0201t:2393_0: Sabbaloke anabhiratisaññāti tīsupi bhavesu aruccanavasena pavattā vipassanābhāvanā.
tika-s0201t:2393_2: Lokacitresūti hatthiassarathapāsādakūṭāgārādibhedesu ceva ārāmarāmaṇeyyakādibhedesu ca loke cittavicittesu.
tika-s0201t:2394_1: Sakkharaṃ gahetvāti sakkharāsīsena tattakaṃ bhinnapāsāṇamuṭṭhinti āha “antomuṭṭhiyaṃ tiṭṭhanapamāṇaṃ pāsāṇa”nti.
tika-s0201t:2394_8: Sakalasarīreneva nivattitvā apalokesīti vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2394_11: Sahāpalokanāyāti ca vacanatoti iminā vacanena imaṃ vacanamattaṃ gahetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:2394_13: Bhagavantañhi ṭhapetvā natthi tadā sadevake loke tādiso guṇavisesayuttoti.
tika-s0201t:2395_0: Visuṃ visuṃ paccattavedaniyo ayasūlena saddhiṃ bhūtāni cha phassāyatanāni etassāti cha phassāyatanaṃ, dukkhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2395_1: Taṃ ettha atthīti cha phassāyataniko, nirayo.
tika-s0201t:2395_5: anekasatabhedo saṅkusamāhato ettha atthīti saṅkusamāhato, nirayo.
tika-s0201t:2395_7: kāraṇākārakena vinā paccattaṃ sayameva vedaniyoti paccattavedaniyo.
tika-s0201t:2395_8: Ayasūlena saddhiṃ ayasūlanti pādapadesato paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ abhihananavasena āgatena paṇṇāsāya janehi
tika-s0201t:2395_9: gahitena ayasūlena saha sīsapadesato paṭṭhāya āgataṃ.
tika-s0201t:2395_12: Iminā te ṭhānena cintetvāti nissitavohārena nissayaṃ vadati.
tika-s0201t:2395_13: Evaṃ vuttanti “tadā jāneyyāsi vassasahassaṃ me niraye paccamānassā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2395_18: Dukkhatarā hoti padīpassa vijjhāyanakkhaṇe mahantabhāvo viya.
tika-s0201t:2396_6: Imaṃ pana atītavatthuṃ āharitvā attano ñāṇānubhāvadīpanamukhena māraṃ santajjento mahāthero “yo etamabhijānātī”ti gāthamāha.
tika-s0201t:2396_8: yo mahābhiñño etaṃ kammaṃ kammaphalañca hatthatale ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya abhimukhaṃ katvā paccakkhato jānāti.
tika-s0201t:2396_10: tādisaṃ uḷāraguṇaṃ āsajja ghaṭṭayitvā ekantakāḷakehi pāpadhammehi samannāgatattā kaṇha māra āyatiṃ mahādukkhaṃ vindissasi.
tika-s0201t:2397_0: Udakaṃ vatthuṃ katvāti tattha nibbattanakasattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammaphalena mahāsamuddaudakameva adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:2397_5: tassa ca kāraṇaṃ attapaccakkhaṃ katvā jānāti.
tika-s0201t:2397_6: Pādaṅguṭṭhena kampayīti pubbārāme visākhāya mahāupāsikāya kāritaṃ sahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍitamahāpāsādaṃ attano pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesi.
tika-s0201t:2397_8: Idanti “yo vejayanta”nti imissā gāthāya atthajātaṃ cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisutteneva dīpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2398_0: Tassa brahmagaṇassa tathācintanasamanantarameva tasmiṃ brahmaloke sudhammaṃ brahmasabhaṃ gantvā.
tika-s0201t:2398_5: anuruddhatthero uttaradisāyanti evaṃ cattāro therā brahmaparisamatthake majjhe nisinnassa bhagavato samantato catuddisā nisīdiṃsu.
tika-s0201t:2398_6: Gāthā vuttāti “yo brahmaṃ paripucchatī”ti gāthā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:2398_8: “tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādinā mahāvagge āgatena aññatarabrahmasuttena.
tika-s0201t:2399_6: Bhūmisayā narā nāma aparagoyānakā uttarakurukā ca.
tika-s0201t:2399_10: Etaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsīti esā yathā pubbe dūsimārassa,
tika-s0201t:2399_12: tasmā edisaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsīti mārassa ovādaṃ adāsi.
